original: 51-52. Chakkaṃ tirodhāne. Dhara āvaraṇe, apādipubbo. Apidharati āvuṇotīti pidhānaṃ,

original: alopo. Apadharatīti apadhāraṇaṃ. Tiro dharati pidahatīti tirodhānaṃ. Antaraṃ dharatīti
analyzed: a lopaḥ apadharati iti apadhāraṇam tiras dharati pidahati iti tirodhānam antaram dharati iti

original: antaradhānaṃ, niggahītalopo. Apidharatīti apidhānaṃ. Ettha ca apādiupasaggā dhātuno
analyzed: antara dhānam niggahīta lopaḥ apidharati iti apidhānam ettha ca ap ādi upasaggāḥ dhātuno

original: āvaraṇatthajotakā. Chādayatīti chādanaṃ. Byavadhā, antaradhiiccādayopi tirodhāne.
analyzed: chādayati iti chādanam tirodhāne

original: Sāddhapajjena candassa nāmāni. Indati nakkhattānaṃ paramissariyaṃ karotīti indu.
analyzed: sāddhapajjena candassa nāmāni indati nakkhattānam paramissariyam karoti iti indu

original: Candati hilādayati sukhayati pajanti cando. Nakkhattānaṃ rājā nakkhattarājā. Umā
analyzed: candati hilādayati sukhayati pajanti candaḥ nakkhattānam rājā nakkhatta rājā umā

original: kanti, tāya saha vijjatīti somo, sukhaṃ abhissavatīti vā somo, mapaccayo. Nisaṃ rattiṃ
analyzed: kanti tāya saha vijjati iti somaḥ sukham abhissavati iti vā somaḥ ma paccayaḥ nisam rattim

original: karoti, tattha vā karo raṃsi etassa nisākaro. Andhakāraṃ usenti dahanti vināsentīti
analyzed: karoti tattha vā karaḥ raṃsi etassa nisākaraḥ andhakāram usenti dahanti vināsenti iti

original: osā, raṃsayo, te ettha dhiyanti patiṭṭhahantīti osadhi, tārāviseso, tassa īso pati
analyzed: osāḥ raṃsayaḥ te ettha dhiyanti patiṭṭhahanti iti osadhi tārā viseso tassa īsaḥ pati

original: osadhīso. Himo sītalo raṃsi yassa himaraṃsi. Saso aṅko lakkhaṇaṃ yassa sasaṅko. Candaṃ
analyzed: osadhīso himaḥ sītalaḥ raṃsi yassa hima raṃsi sasaḥ aṅkaḥ lakkhaṇam yassa candam

original: kappūraṃ māti sadisaṃ nayatīti candimā. Ikārādeso. Sasalakkhaṇamettha atthi sasī.
analyzed: kappūram mā ati sadisam nayati iti candimā ikāra ādesaḥ sasa lakkhaṇam ettha atthi sasī

original: Sasati vā hiṃsati uṇhaguṇanti sasī, īpaccayo tadupalakkhite tadupacāraṃ. Sītā raṃsayo
analyzed: sasati vā hiṃsati tad upalakkhite tad upacāram sītā

original: yassatthīti sītaraṃsi. Nisāya rattiyā nātho tadālaṅkārabhāvatoti nisānātho. Uḷūnaṃ
analyzed: yassatthi iti sīta raṃsi nisāya rattiyā na atho uḷūnam

original: tārānaṃ rājā uḷurājā. Māti attānaṃ kappūrena sadisaṃ karotīti mā, māsaddoyaṃ pume,
analyzed: rājā uḷu rājā attānam kappūrena sadisam karoti iti mā pume

original: taṃsahacaraṇato uḷurājādayopi. Himaṃsu, kumudabandhu, vidhu, sudhaṃsu, subbhaṃsu,
analyzed: taṃ saha caraṇataḥ uḷu rāja ādayaḥ api himaṃsu kumudabandhu vidhu sudhaṃsu subbhaṃsu

original: nisāpati, migaṅko, kalānidhi, dvijarājo, sasadharo, nakkhattesoiccādīnipi candassa nāmāni.
analyzed: nisāpati migaṅkaḥ kalānidhi dvijarājaḥ sasadharaḥ candassa nāmāni

original: 53-54. Soḷasannaṃ bhāgānaṃ pūraṇo soḷasamo bhāgo candassa kalā, kala saṅkhyāne, kalīyate
analyzed: bhāgānam pūraṇaḥ soḷasamaḥ bhāgo candassa kalā saṅkhyāne kalīyate

original: ekādinā saṅkhyāyateti kalā. Dvayaṃ candassa sarīre. Maññate ñāyate aneneti bimbaṃ.
analyzed: eka ādinā saṅkhyāyatā iti kalā dvayam candassa sarīre maññate ñāyate anena iti bimbam

original: Manato vapaccayo, nipātanā massa bo, assi, nassa mo, vassa bo, bimbasaddo anitthiyaṃ.
analyzed: manataḥ va pa cayaḥ nipātanā massa baḥ assi nassa maḥ vassa baḥ bimba saddaḥ an itthiyam

original: Maṇḍayateti maṇḍalaṃ, alo, itthiyaṃ maṇḍalī, ayaṃ tīsvapi bimbo anitthī, maṇḍalaṃ tīsu (amara 3.15).
analyzed: maṇḍayata iti maṇḍalam itthiyam maṇḍalī ayam tīsu api bimbaḥ an itthī maṇḍalam tīsu

original: Pādahīnapajjena addhabhāgo. Asati khepeti samudāyanti aḍḍho, to. Tathā addho. Upaḍḍhoti
analyzed: pāda hīna pajjena addha bhāgaḥ asati khepeti samudāyanti aḍḍho tathā addho upaḍḍho ti

original: upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, ete tayo pume. Khaṇḍayati samudāyanti khaṇḍaṃ. Sakyate
analyzed: upasaggena padam vaḍḍhitam ete tayo pume khaṇḍayati samudāyanti khaṇḍam sakyate

original: ubbāhanādīsu thokattāti sakalaṃ, alo, khaṇḍasakalā vā pume, satthe rūpabhedato napuṃsake.
analyzed: ubbāhana ādīsu thoka ttā ati sakalam a laḥ khaṇḍa sakalā vā pume satthe rūpa bhedataḥ napuṃsake

original: Ete ca aḍḍhādayo tayo asame bhāge pume, same tu napuṃsaketi rūpabhedenāha “addhaṃ
analyzed: ete ca aḍḍha ādayaḥ asame bhāge pume same tu napuṃsaka iti rūpa bhedena āha

original: vuttaṃ same bhāge”ti. Khaṇḍādidvayaṃ pana asamepi vattamānaṃ punnapuṃsake vattati,
analyzed: vuttam same bhāge iti khaṇḍa ādi dvayam pana asame pi vattamānam punnapuṃsake vattati

original: tasmā “addhaṃ vuttaṃ same bhāge”ti ettha “aḍḍhaṃ, upaḍḍha”nti idaṃ dvayampi saṅgahitaṃ
analyzed: tasmai addham vuttam same bhāge iti ettha aḍḍham upaḍḍhanti idam dvayam pi saṅgahitam

original: asamabhāge pumāni, same aṃse napuṃsakattaṃ rūpabhedato, upacārato tabbhāgavati vāccaliṅgo
analyzed: asama bhāge pumāni same aṃse napuṃsaka ttam rūpa bhedataḥ upacārataḥ tad bhāgavati

original: – addhā sāṭī, addhaṃ vatthaṃ addho kambalo (cintāmaṇiṭīkā).
analyzed: addhā sāṭī addham vattham addho kambalo cintāmaṇiṭīkā

original: Pasādādayo cande avassambhāvino, aññatra tu pāsaṅgikā iti candapakkame uccante. Visesena sādayati pasādayatīti pasādo. Evaṃ pasanno, so eva pasannatā.
analyzed: pasāda ādayaḥ cande avassambhāvinaḥ aññatra tu pāsaṅgikāḥ iti canda pakkame ucca ante visesena sādayati pasādayati iti pasādaḥ evam pasannaḥ saḥ u eva pasanna tā

original: Tikaṃ candappabhāyaṃ. Kumudassāyaṃ vikāso vikāro (ka.) komudī. Candaṃ ācikkhati paṭipādayatīti
analyzed: tikam canda pabhāyam kumudassa ayam vikāsaḥ vikāro komudī candam ācikkhati paṭipādayati iti

original: candikā. Juti assātthīti juṇhā. Tassa ṇo, hapaccayo ca, candassa vā jutiṃ sobhaṃ
analyzed: candikā juti assa atthi iti juṇhā tassa ṇo ha paccayaḥ ca candassa vā jutim sobham

original: nayhati bandhatīti juṇhā.
analyzed: nayhati bandhati iti juṇhā

original: Catukkaṃ sobhanamatte. Kanati dippatīti kanti, kana dittiyaṃ, kāmīyatīti vā kanti.
analyzed: catukkam sobhana matte kanati dippati iti kanti kana dittiyam kāmīyati iti vā kanti

original: Sundaraṃ bhāti dippatīti sobhā. Jotayatīti juti. Chādayatīti chavi. Chada saṃvaraṇe, vipaccayo, dalopo.
analyzed: sundaram bhāti dippati iti sobhā jotayati iti juti chādayati iti chavi saṃvaraṇe vi pad cayaḥ da lopaḥ

original: 55. Sattakaṃ lakkhaṇe. Kaṃ attānaṃ laṅkayati hīnaṃ karotīti kalaṅko. Lañchate lakkhate
analyzed: sattakam lakkhaṇe kam attānam laṅkayati hīnam karoti iti kalaṅkaḥ lañchate lakkhate

original: aneneti lañchanaṃ. Lakkhyate aneneti lakkhaṃ. Tathā lakkhaṇaṃ. Aṅkīyate lakkhyate
analyzed: anena iti lañchanam lakkhyate anena iti lakkham tathā lakkhaṇam aṅkīyate lakkhyate

original: aneneti aṅko. Abhi visesaṃ jānāti etenāti abhiññāṇaṃ. Cihīyati lakkhīyati aneneti
analyzed: anena iti aṅkaḥ abhi visesam jānāti etena ati abhiññāṇam cihīyati lakkhīyati anena iti

original: cihanaṃ. Ciha lakkhaṇe.
analyzed: cihanam ciha lakkhaṇe

original: Sabbāsaṃ sobhānaṃ majjhe paramā sobhā susamā nāma, sobhanaṃ samaṃ sabbaṃ assaṃ susamā, seṭṭhā sobhā.
analyzed: sabbāsam sobhānam majjhe paramā sobhā susamā nāma sobhanam samam sabbam assam susamā seṭṭhā sobhā

original: 56. Guṇe phoṭṭhabbavisese sītanti napuṃsakaṃ bhavati. Devadattassa sītaṃ vattati.
analyzed: guṇe phoṭṭhabba visese sītam ti napuṃsakam bhavati devadattassa sītam vattati

original: Sītādayo tayo guṇīliṅgā guṇino liṅgaṃ gaṇhanti, taṃ yathā – sītalā bhūmi, sītalaṃ
analyzed: sītā ādayaḥ guṇī liṅgāḥ guṇinaḥ liṅgam gaṇhanti tam yathā sītalā bhūmi sītalam

original: jalaṃ, sītalo vāto. Uṇhābhitattehi sevīyatīti sītaṃ, tena yutto sīto. Sasa gatiyaṃ,
analyzed: jalam sītalaḥ vātaḥ uṇha abhitattehi sevīyati iti sītam tena yuttaḥ sītaḥ gatiyam

original: iro, ittañca, sītatthikena sarīyatīti vā sisiraṃ. Sītaṃ guṇaṃ lātīti sītalo.
analyzed: sītatthikena sarīyati iti vā sisiram sītam guṇam lāti iti sītalaḥ

original: Mahikāntaṃ hime. Hiṃsatīti himaṃ, sassa mo,niggahītalopo ca. Tuha adane, tohati hiṃsatīti
analyzed: mahi kāntam hime hiṃsati iti himam sassa mo niggahīta lopaḥ ca adane hiṃsati iti

original: tuhinaṃ, ino. Uparito savatīti ussāvo. Nīharanti nissasantyaneneti nīhāro, natthi
analyzed: tuhinam inaḥ uparitas savati iti ussāvaḥ nīharanti nissasanti anena iti nīhāraḥ natthi

original: īhā vā etasmā hetubhūtāti nīhāro, āro. Mahīyate rāgīhīti vācābhi (cintāmaṇiṭīkā) mahikā, ṇvu.
analyzed: īhā vai etasmai hetu bhūtā ati nīhāraḥ āraḥ mahīyate rāgīhi iti vācā abhi cintāmaṇi ṭīkā mahikā

original: 57. Chakkaṃ nakkhatte. Punappunaṃ udayattā na khīyate nakkhattaṃ, attano gamanaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: chakkam nakkhatte punappunam udaya ttā na khīyate nakkhattam attanaḥ gamana ṭhānam

original: na kharati na vināsetīti vā nakkhattaṃ, atha vā nakkha gatiyaṃ, nakkhatīti nakkhattaṃ.
analyzed: na kharati na vināseti iti vā nakkhattam atha vā nakkha gatiyam nakkhati iti nakkhattam

original: Jotati subhāsubhanimittaṃ pakāsetīti joti, nakkhatta bhaṃsaddehi sahacaraṇato napuṃsake.
analyzed: jotati subha asubha nimittam pakāseti iti nakkhatta sahacaraṇataḥ napuṃsake

original: Yathāvuttaṃ nimittaṃ bhāti pakāsetīti bhaṃ. Kattabbaṃ taranti lokā etāyāti tārā,
analyzed: yathā vuttam nimittam bhāti pakāseti iti bham kattabbam taranti lokāḥ etāya āti tārā

original: attano vīthiṃ tāyati arati gacchatīti vā tārā, tāreti vā loke ahitatoti tārā, ayañca
analyzed: vīthim tāyati arati gacchati iti vā tārā tārā iti vā loke tārā ayam ca

original: tārakā, uḷu ca ete tayo apume. Tarā eva ṇvu, tārakā tārā eva tārakā ṇvu (ka.). Uccaṃ
analyzed: tārakāḥ ca ete tayaḥ a pume tarāḥ eva tārakā tārāḥ eva tārakāḥ kaḥ uccam

original: lavati ulayati (ka.) gacchatīti ulu. So eva uḷu. Na kevalaṃ tārakā eva apume, atha
analyzed: lavati ulayati gacchati iti ulu saḥ u eva uḷu na kevalam tārakāḥ eva atha

original: kho uḷu cāti casaddattho. Uḷusahacariyato pakkhe napuṃsake ca.
analyzed: kho uḷu ca ati ca sadda tthaḥ uḷu sahacariyataḥ pakkhe napuṃsake ca

original: 58-60. Assayujādayo revatyantā sattādhikavīsatārakā nakkhattā nāma honti. Tāni ca
analyzed: assayuja ādayo revatī antā satta adhika vīsa tārakāḥ nakkhattāḥ nāma honti tāni ca

original: nakkhattāni ākāse yathāṭhitāni kamatoyeva ettha kathitāni, na uppaṭipāṭiyā. Vakkhati
analyzed: nakkhattāni ākāse yathā ṭhitāni ettha kathitāni na uppaṭipāṭiyā vakkhati

original: ca “kamato sattādhikavīsati nakkhattā”ti. Assarūpayogato assayujo. Yamasadisattāsabbatra
analyzed: ca kamataḥ satta adhika vīsati nakkhattā ati assa rūpa yogataḥ assa yujaḥ yama sadisa ttā a sabbatra

original: bharatīti bharaṇī. Yu, ī. Aggisadisattā kantati chindatīti kattikā, karoti tasmā
analyzed: bharati iti bharaṇī chindati iti kattikā karoti tasmai

original: vā katthikā, kattikāya sahitā sakattikā. Bharaṇī, rohiṇī vā. Kamalasambhavattā kamale
analyzed: vā katthikā kattikāya sahitā sa kattikā bharaṇī rohiṇī vā kamala sambhavattā kamale

original: ruhati vaḍḍhatīti rohiṇī. Migasīsaṇṭhānattā tārāpuñjo migasiraṃ, chaṭṭhīsamāso uttarappadhānattā
analyzed: ruhati vaḍḍhati iti rohiṇī migasī saṇṭhāna ttā tārā puñjaḥ miga siram chaṭṭhī samāsaḥ uttara ppadhāna ttā

original: napuṃsakattaṃ. Ruddarasāvaṭṭhitakodharuddasadisattā kadāci adati ghasatīti addā.
analyzed: napuṃsaka ttam kadāci adati ghasati iti

original: Punappunaṃ sattesu hitaṃ vassatīti punabbasu, vassa secane. Poseti kriyāni, posentyasminti
analyzed: punappunam sattesu hitam vassati iti punabbasu vassa secane poseti kriyāni posenti asmin ti

original: vā pusso. Bhujagasadisattā na silisyate nāliṅgyateti asileso.
analyzed: vā pussaḥ bhujaga sadisattā na silisyate na āliṅgyate iti a silesaḥ

original: Mahīyate kāriyatthikehīti maghā māghā (ka.), hassa gho. Phalaṃ gaṇhāpetīti phaggunī,
analyzed: mahīyate kāriyatthikehi iti maghā māghā phalam gaṇhāpeti iti phaggunī

original: yu, ī. Dveti pubbaphaggunī, uttaraphaggunī ceti dve. Hatthasaṇṭhānatāya hattho. Tacchakasadisattā
analyzed: dve iti pubbaphaggunī uttaraphaggunī ca iti dve hattha saṇṭhāna tāya hattho

original: vicittaṃ phalaṃ dadātīti cittā. Sobhanā āti, sāti vā tanuṃ karoti subhāsubhanti sāti
analyzed: vicittam phalam dadāti iti cittā sobhanā ā ati sā ati vā tanum karoti sā ati

original: svāti (ka.), subhāsubhaphaladānato vā sāti, “sāti dānāvasānesū”ti hi nānatthasaṅgahe
analyzed: subha asubha phala dānataḥ vā sā ati sā ati dāna avasānesu iti hi nānattha saṅgahe

original: vuttaṃ, ayaṃ dvīsu. Visadisaṃ phalaṃ khaṇatīti visākhā, vividhā vā sakhā mittā yassā
analyzed: vuttam ayam dvīsu visadisam phalam khaṇati iti visākhā vividhā vā sakhā mittā yassā

original: sā visākhā. Anurādhayati saṃsijjhati subhāsubhaphalametāyāti anurādhā. Guṇehi sabbāsaṃ
analyzed: sā visākhā anurādhayati saṃsijjhati subha asubha phalam etā āyāti anurādhā guṇehi

original: vuḍḍhattā jeṭṭhā. Mūlati patiṭṭhāti subhāsubhaphalametthāti mūlaṃ. Āsāḷho nāma bhatīnaṃ
analyzed: vuḍḍhattā jeṭṭhā mūlati patiṭṭhāti subha asubha phalam ettha ati mūlam āsāḷhaḥ nāma

original: daṇḍo, taṃsaṇṭhānattā āsāḷhā nāma dve nakkhattā pubbāsāḷhauttarāsāḷhavasena.
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ tad saṇṭhāna ttā āsāḷhā nāma dve nakkhattā pubbāsāḷha uttarāsāḷha vasena

original: Savati subhāsubhaphalametenāti savaṇo, savaṇaṃ vā. Dhanamesanti etthāti dhaniṭṭhā,
analyzed: savati subha asubha phalam etena ati savaṇaḥ savaṇam vā dhanam esanti ettha ati dhaniṭṭhā

original: dhanati vā vibhūti nidhānaṃ dhaniṭṭhā. Sataṃ bhisajā ettha, satabhisajānaṃ vā adhipati
analyzed: dhanati vā vibhūti nidhānam dhaniṭṭhā satam bhisajāḥ ettha sata bhisajānam vai adhipati

original: satabhisajo. Bhaddo go, tasseva padāni pādā assaṃ bhaddapadā, pubbabhaddapadā dve,
analyzed: sata bhisajaḥ bhaddaḥ go tassa iva padāni pādāḥ assam bhadda padā pubba bhadda padā dve

original: uttarabhaddapadā dve, samūho cesaṃ catusaṅkhyāti bahuvacanaṃ. Rā vuccati dhanaṃ,
analyzed: uttarabhadda padā dve samūhaḥ ca īsam catu saṅkhyāti bahuvacanam rā vuccati dhanam

original: tabbantatāya revatī, ākārasse, revato vā isibhedo, tassa apaccaṃ revatī.
analyzed: tad banta tāya revatī revataḥ vā isi bhedaḥ tassa apaccam revatī

original: 61. Dvayaṃ rāhuggahe. So vuccati saggo, tattha bhātīti sobbhānu. Rahati candādīnaṃ sobhaṃ jahāpetīti rāhu. Tamo, vidhuntudo, candādo, sehikeyotipi rāhussa nāmāni.
analyzed: dvayam rāhuggahe so vuccati saggaḥ tattha bhāti iti sobbhānu rahati canda ādīnam sobham jahāpeti iti rāhu tamaḥ vidhuntudaḥ candādaḥ rāhussa nāmāni

original: Sūra, canda, aṅgāraka, budha, jīva, sukka, asita, rāhu, ketūti ete sūrādayo navaggahā nāma.
analyzed: sūra canda aṅgāraka budha jīva sukka asita rāhu ketu uti ete sūra ādayaḥ nava ggahāḥ nāma

original: Mesādiko dvādasakoṭṭhāso rāsi nāma. Ādinā usabha, methuna, kakkaṭa, sīha, kaññā, tulā, vicchika, dhanu, makara, kumbha, mīne saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: mesa ādikaḥ dvādasa koṭṭhāsaḥ rāsi nāma ādinā usabha methuna kakkaṭa sīha kaññā tulā vicchika dhanu makara kumbha mīne saṅgaṇhāti

original: Dvayaṃ bhaddapadanakkhattānaṃ nāmaṃ. Poṭṭho go pāṭho bhaddo go (ka.), tasseva padāni pādā assaṃ poṭṭhapadā.
analyzed: dvayam bhaddapada nakkhattānam nāmam poṭṭhaḥ go pāṭhaḥ bhaddaḥ go ka tassa iva padāni pādāḥ assam poṭṭhapadā

original: 62-63. Pajjadvayena sūriyassa nāmāni. Ā bhuso dippatīti ādicco, ppassa cco. Lokānaṃ
analyzed: pajja dvayena sūriyassa nāmāni ā bhusaḥ dippati iti lokānam

original: sūrabhāvaṃ janetīti sūriyo. Tathā sūro. Sataṃ bahavo raṃsayo yassa sataraṃsi. Divā
analyzed: sūra bhāvam janeti iti sūriyaḥ tathā sūraḥ satam bahavaḥ raṃsayaḥ yassa divā

original: divasaṃ karotīti divākaro, divase vā karo ābhā yassa divākaro, divāsaddoyaṃ sabbakārakavacano,
analyzed: divasam karoti iti divākaraḥ divase vā karaḥ ābhā yassa divākaraḥ divā saddaḥ ayam sabba kāraka vacanaḥ

analyzed: na tu ādhāra vacanaḥ eva visesena rocate dippata iti verocanaḥ dinam karoti kumudānam

original: pisodarādi (cintāmaṇiṭīkā). Kirati timiraṃ kiraṇo. Kirati timiraṃ karo.
65. Dvayaṃ ādiccamaṇḍalotikhyāte uppātādijāte raṃsimaṇḍale. Sūriyassa pari samantato

analyzed: rajanī rāti gaṇhāti

original: Candikāyuttā candappabhāya yuttā ratti juṇhā nāma, juṇhāyogato juṇhā. Tamo ussanno yassaṃ sā tamussannā ratti timisikā nāma, timisaṃ ussannaṃ etthāti timisikā, upadhāya ittañca.

original: 70. Tikaṃ aḍḍharattiyaṃ. Majjhimāratti kammabhūtā “nisītho, aḍḍharatto, mahānisā”ti
analyzed: tikam aḍḍharattiyam majjhima āratti kamma bhūtāḥ nisīthaḥ aḍḍha rattaḥ mahānisā ati

analyzed: ca vuccati nissate sayate asmin nisīthaḥ aḍḍham ca tam ca ati aḍḍha rattaḥ ratta ekadese

original: rattisaddo, rattiyā aḍḍhanti vā aḍḍharatto. Mahatī ca sā nisā cāti mahānisā.
analyzed: ratti saddaḥ rattiyāḥ vā aḍḍharattaḥ mahatī ca sā nisā ca ati mahānisā

original: anitthī, taṃsahacaraṇato andhakāropi. Timisaṃ iso, atha vā timu temane, timanti ettha
analyzed: an itthī atha vā timu temane ettha

original: rāgenāti timisaṃ. Timiraṃ, pubbeva irapaccayo.

original: 71. Catuddasannaṃ rattīnaṃ pūraṇī catuddasīsaṅkhāto kāḷapakkho ca ekagghano vanasaṇḍo ca meghapaṭalañca aḍḍharatti ca etehi catūhi samannāgato tamo caturaṅgatamaṃ nāma.

original: 72. Andhañca taṃ tamañcāti andhatamaṃ, yaṃ lokaṃ andhakāraṃ karoti. Ayaṃ andhatamasaddo ghanatame bāḷhatame vattati.
analyzed: andham ca tam tamam ca ati andhatamam yam lokam andhakāram karoti ayam andhatama saddaḥ ghanatame bāḷhatame vattati

original: Dvayaṃ pahāre. Paharīyate bheriyādi atrāti pahāro, pume saññāyaṃ apaccayo. Yā pāpuṇe mo, upayameti vā aho ratti cānena yāmo, yamito ṇo. Pahāro eva yāmo iti saññito yāmasaññito.
analyzed: dvayam pahāre bheriya ādi pahāro pume saññā ayam a paccayaḥ yā pāpuṇe mā upayameti vā aho ca anena yāmaḥ yamitaḥ pahāro eva yāmaḥ iti saññitaḥ yāma saññitaḥ

original: Dutiyā tithi pāṭipado nāma. Paṭipajjate cando khayaṃ, udayaṃ vā yassaṃ pāṭipado. Tatiyādī tithiyeva, na pāṭipado. Tanotīti tithi, atha vā tā pālane ithi. Tithisaddo dvīsu.
analyzed: pāṭipadaḥ nāma paṭipajjate cando khayam udayam vā pāṭipadaḥ tatiya ādī tithiyā iva na pāṭipadaḥ tanoti iti tithi atha vā tā pālane tithi saddaḥ dvīsu

original: 73. Dvayaṃ pannarasiyaṃ, pannarasannaṃ tithīnaṃ pūraṇī pannarasī, paṇṇarasītipi pāṭho
analyzed: dvayam pannarasiyam tithīnam pūraṇī pannarasī paṇṇarasī itipi

original: atthi. Dvayaṃ puṇṇamāyaṃ tithiyaṃ. Miyyate tithīnaṃ khayo vuḍḍhi cānena māso, cando,
analyzed: atthi dvayam puṇṇa māyam tithiyam tithīnam khayaḥ vuḍḍhi ca anena māso cando

original: puṇṇo ca so māso cāti puṇṇamāso, tassāyaṃ tithi, puṇṇamāso yassamatthīti vā puṇṇamāsī.
analyzed: puṇṇaḥ ca saḥ māso ca ati puṇṇamāso tassa ayam puṇṇamāsaḥ yassa atthi iti vā puṇṇamāsī

original: Puṇṇo mā cando yattha, puṇṇamassāyaṃ vā tithi puṇṇamā, “puṇṇimā”ti pāṭhe pana sati
analyzed: puṇṇaḥ mā candaḥ yattha puṇṇamassa ayam vā pāṭhe pana sati

original: candassa puṇṇabhāvo puṇṇo, tena nibbattā bhāvapaccayantā tena nibbatte imo dissati,
analyzed: candassa puṇṇa bhāvaḥ puṇṇaḥ tena nibbattā bhāva paccaya ntā tena nibbatte imaḥ dissati

original: lokāsayattā liṅgassa itthiliṅgattaṃ, sā puṇṇamā ekakalāhīne cande sati anumati nāma,
analyzed: liṅgassa itthi liṅga ttam sā puṇṇamā eka kalā hīne cande sati anumati nāma

original: anumaññante anugacchante devatāpitūhi saha yassaṃ sā anumati. Puṇṇe pana cande sā
analyzed: anumaññante anugacchante devatā pitūhi saha sā anumati puṇṇe pana cande sā

original: puṇṇamā rākā nāma, rāti dassanāvakāsaṃ rākā, ko kalāhīne sā’numati puṇṇe rākā nisākare (amara 4.8).
analyzed: rākā nāma rāti dassana avakāsam rākā kalā hīne sānumati puṇṇe rākā nisākare amara

original: Aparā kāḷapakkhasambhūtāpannarasī pana amāvasī, amāvāsītipi uccate. Amā saha vasanti
analyzed: aparā pana amāvasī amāvāsī iti pi uccate amā saha vasanti

original: ravicandā yassaṃ amāvasī, amāvāsī ca dīghaṃ katvā, amāsaddo sahattho abyayaṃ. Dasso
analyzed: ravi candā yassam amāvasī amāvāsī ca dīgham katvā amā saddaḥ sahatthaḥ abyayam dassaḥ

original: dassalā (ka.), dissante ravicandā atra, “gaṇakehī”ti gha (cintāmaṇiṭīkā), sūriyindusaṅgamoti tassāyeva nāmāni.
analyzed: dassalā ka dissante ravi candāḥ atra cintāmaṇi ṭīkā sūriyindusaṅgamaḥ ti nāmāni

original: 74. Saṭṭhighaṭikāhi lakkhito kālo ahoratto nāma. Ghaṭenti ahorattiyoti ghaṭikā. Aho
analyzed: saṭṭhi ghaṭikāhi lakkhitaḥ kālaḥ ahorattaḥ nāma ghaṭenti ahorattiyaḥ ti ghaṭikā aho

original: ca ratti ca ahoratto, pume. Adiguttepi ahorattanti napuṃsakepi. Te pañcadasa ahorattā
analyzed: ca ratti ca ahoratto pume a diś utte pi napuṃsake pi te pañcadasa ahorattā

original: pakkho nāma. Pacanti pariṇamanti bhūtānyaneneti pakkho. Pubbāparabhūtā te ca pakkhā
analyzed: pakkhaḥ nāma pacanti pariṇamanti bhūtāni anena iti pakkhaḥ pubba apara bhūtā te ca pakkhā

original: yathākkamaṃ sukkakāḷā sukkapakkhakāḷapakkhā nāma. Jotisatthakkamena sukkapakkho pubbasaññito,
analyzed: yathākkamam sukkakāḷā sukkapakkhakāḷapakkhā nāma jotisattha kkamena sukkapakkhaḥ pubba saññitaḥ

original: kaṇhapakkho aparasaññito. Tato eva māsavisese loke sakaparapakkhoti lokepyaparapakkhoti
analyzed: kaṇhapakkhaḥ apara saññitaḥ tatas eva māsa visese loke saka parapakkhaḥ ti loke pi aparapakkhaḥ ti

original: (ka.) rūḷhī. Suca soke, sukko, socanti ettha andhakārābhilāsinoti katvā, sūceti pakāsetīti
analyzed: rūḍhī soke sukko socanti ettha andhakāra abhilāsinaḥ iti katvā sūca iti pakāseti iti

original: vā sukko. Kirati sukkanti kāro, ṇo, sova kāḷo, kena vā jotinā arati ettha kāro, sova
analyzed: vā sukkaḥ kirati kāraḥ no saḥ uva kāḷaḥ kena vā jotinā ettha kāraḥ saḥ uva

original: kāḷo. Te duve sukkakāḷapakkhā samuditā māso nāma. Masi parimāṇe, kammaniṇo.
analyzed: kāḷaḥ te duve sukka kāḷa pakkhā samuditā māsaḥ nāma masi parimāṇe

original: 75-76. Sāddhapajjena dvādasamāsānaṃ nāmāni. Cittāya paripuṇṇenduyuttāya yutto, upalakkhito
analyzed: sāddhapajjena dvādasa māsānam nāmāni cittāya paripuṇṇa indu yuttāya yuttaḥ upalakkhito

original: vā māso citto, saṃyogantattā na vuddhi, evaṃ sabbatra. Paripuṇṇenduyuttataṃtaṃnakkhattanāmavasena
analyzed: vā māso evam sabbatra

original: dvādasannaṃ māsānaṃ nāmāni veditabbāni. Cittamāsādayo phaggunamāsapariyantā dvādasa
analyzed: dvādasannam māsānam nāmāni veditabbāni cittamāsa ādayaḥ phagguna māsa pariyantāḥ dvādasa

analyzed: koṭṭhāsā kamena māsā ati ñeyyā pasattha tama ttā jeṭṭhā jeṭṭhaḥ asayhaḥ ravi

original: atreti āsāḷho. Yassa ḷo, savantyasmiṃ sāvaṇo, yu. Phalantyatra phagguno, yu, lassa
analyzed: atra iti savanti asmin phalanti atra phaggunaḥ

original: go, assa u. Kattikamāso pacchimakattiko nāma. Assayujamāso pubbakattiko nāma.
analyzed: go assa u kattika māsaḥ pacchima kattikaḥ nāma assayuja māsaḥ pubba kattikaḥ nāma

original: 77. Dvayaṃ sāvaṇamāse. Antovīthito bahi nikkhamati sūriyo ettha, adhikaraṇe anīyo. Dvayaṃ cittamāse. Nānāpupphaphalavicittatāya lokānaṃ rammaṃ karoti, ramanti vā etthāti rammako.
analyzed: dvayam sāvaṇa māse antar vīthitaḥ bahi nikkhamati sūriyaḥ ettha adhikaraṇe anīyaḥ dvayam citta māse nānā puppha phala vicitta tāya lokānam rammam karoti ramanti vā ettha ati rammako

original: 78. Kattikakāḷapakkhato pacchimakattikato paṭṭhāya caturo caturo māsā kamā kamato
analyzed: kattika kāḷapakkhataḥ pacchima kattikataḥ paṭṭhāya caturaḥ caturaḥ māsā kamā kamataḥ

original: hemantagimhānavassānasaññitā utuyo nāma honti. Himāni ettha santi hemo, so eva hemanto,
analyzed: hemanta gimhāna vassāna saññitāḥ utuyaḥ nāma honti himāni ettha santi hemaḥ saḥ eva hemanto

original: “suttanto vananto”ti yathā, hinoti vā hāniṃ gacchati sabbametthāti hemanto, antapaccayo,
analyzed: suttantaḥ vananto ti yathā hinoti vā hānim gacchati sabbam ettha ati hemantaḥ anta paccayo

original: māgamo ca. Girati pīḷayatīti gimhāno, māno, rassa ho, vaṇṇavipariyayo ca. Vassati
analyzed: ca girati pīḷayati iti gimhānaḥ mānaḥ vaṇṇa vipariyayo ca vassati

original: ettha vassānoyu. Utuyo dvīsūti paccāsatyā utusaddo eva dvīsu, na hemantādayo, amarakose
analyzed: ettha vassānoyu utuyaḥ dvīsu iti paccāsatyāḥ utu saddo eva dvīsu na hemanta ādayaḥ amarakose

original: pana utusaddo pume vutto amara 4.20.
analyzed: pana utu saddo pume vuttaḥ amara

original: 79. Aññathāpi utubhedaṃ dassetuṃ ariyasāmaññamāha “hemanto”iccādi. Vā atha vā vuttānusārena
analyzed: aññathā api utu bhedam dassetum ariya sāmaññam āha vā atha vā vutta anusārena

original: ututtayapabhede vuttavacanassānusārena. Idaṃ pana “kattikakāḷapakkhato”ti vacanaṃ
analyzed: ut uttaya pabhede vutta vacanassa anusārena idam pana kattika kāḷa pakkhato ti vacanam

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ, tasmā kattikakāḷapakkhato pabhuti dve dve māsā kamā kamato hemanto,
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam tasmā kattika kāḷapakkhataḥ pabhuti dve dve māsā kamā kamataḥ hemantaḥ

original: sisiro, vasanto, gimho, vassāno, sarado utūti cha utū bhavanti, punappunaṃ etīti
analyzed: sisiraḥ vasantaḥ gimhaḥ vassānaḥ saradaḥ utu iti cha utū bhavanti punappunam eti iti

original: katvā, tu, issa u. Sisiraṃ sītalaṃ, taṃyogā sisiraṃ, vāvidhānato na vuddhi, makāro

original: padasandhikaro. Vasa kantiyaṃ. Vasīyateti vasanto. Pupphadhanuttā pupphavantattā
analyzed: pada sandhi karaḥ vasa kantiyam vasīyatā iti vasantaḥ puppha dhanuttā pupphavanta ttā

original: (ka.) vā vasati kāmo ettha vasanto. Sarati pīḷayati asminti sarado, tassa do. Sā
analyzed: ka vā vasati kāmaḥ ettha vasantaḥ sarati pīḍayati asmin ti saradaḥ tassa daḥ sā

original: sunakhā ramanti etthāti vā sarado, massa do.
analyzed: su nakhāḥ ramanti ettha ati vā saradaḥ massa daḥ

original: 80-81. Tikaṃ gimhe. Usati dahatīti uṇho, ṇho, salopo ca. Nidahante yasminti nidāgho,
analyzed: tikam gimhe usati dahati iti ca nidahante yasmin ti nidāghaḥ

original: hassa gho. Girati pīḷayatīti gimho, mo, rassa ho, vaṇṇavipariyayo ca. Tikaṃ vassānotumhi.

original: Vassati pavassati etthāti vasso, vassāno, pāvuso ca. Assa u, saṃyogalopo ca.
analyzed: vassati pavassati ettha ati vassaḥ vassāno pāvuso ca assaḥ saṃyoga lopaḥ ca

original: Vassānādikehi tīhi utūhi dakkhiṇāyanaṃ sūriyassa dakkhiṇadisāgamanaṃ bhavati, aññehi
analyzed: vassāna ādikehi tīhi utūhi dakkhiṇāyanam sūriyassa dakkhiṇa disā āgamanam bhavati aññehi

analyzed: tīhi sisira vasanta gimhehi uttarāyanam uttara disā gamanam bhavati bhāve

original: idaṃ ayanadvayaṃ sampiṇḍitaṃ vasso nāma. Vassanti etthāti vasso, vassakālena vā upalakkhito

original: vasso, “citto, cakkhudasaka”nti yathā.
analyzed: vassaḥ cittaḥ yathā

original: Pajjaddhaṃ vasse. Saṃvasati ettha saṃvaccharo, charo, sassa co, “vaccharo”tipi tasseva
analyzed: pajjaddham vasse saṃvasati ettha saṃvaccharaḥ charaḥ sassa caḥ tassa iva

original: Saradakālena lakkhito sarado, yathā “sotadasakaṃ, vesākho”ti. Jahāti bhāveti hāyano,
analyzed: sarada kālena lakkhito saradaḥ yathā sotadasakam vesākhaḥ iti jahāti bhāveti hāyanaḥ

analyzed: padatthe vā jahantaḥ ayati iti hāyano vikalayati

analyzed: samā vasse thīliṅgaḥ tu samam sabba samānesu iti ruddaḥ

analyzed: sabba sattānam sabba pārisadattā sabba paṭipadattā sabba vohāra kusalattham kāla adhikāra ttā

original: “Esā dvādasasahassī, yugākhyā parikittitā;
analyzed: esā dvādasasahassī yuga ākhyā parikittitā

original: Etaṃ sahassaguṇitaṃ, aho brahmamudāhaṭa”nti “vedadīpakaganthe”ti nissaye.
analyzed: etam sahassa guṇitam aho brahmam udāhaṭanti veda dīpaka gantha iti nissaye

analyzed: sattarasa vassa lakkhāni tetāya channavuti sahassa adhikāni dvādasa vassa lakkhāni dvāparassa

original: catusaṭṭhisahassādhikāni aṭṭhavassalakkhāni, kalissa bāttiṃsasahassādhikāni cattāri

original: vassalakkhāni. Vuttañca –
analyzed: vassa lakkhāni vuttam ca

original: “Suññaṃ suññaṃ khaṃ nāgā, karamunisasino;
analyzed: suññam suññam kham nāgā kara muni sasino

analyzed: māna mādaḥ yugassa tetāya khaṃkhaṃsuññam

analyzed: rasa nava sūriyāḥ vassa saṅkhyā pasiddhā

analyzed: suññam suññam kham vedāḥ rasa bhujagam iti

original: Dvāpare vassasaṅkhyā, suññākāsaṃkhaṃnetta-;
analyzed: dvāpare vassa saṅkhyā

original: Guṇajalanidhayo, vassasaṅkhyā kalisse”ti.
analyzed: guṇa jalanidhayaḥ vassa saṅkhyā kalissa iti

original: Piṇḍo cesa vīsativassasahassādhikāni tecattālīsavassalakkhāni. Vuttañca “khākāsasuññambaradantasāgarā catuyugānaṃ parimāṇasaṅgaho”ti. Brahmuno ahorattena narānaṃ dve kappā.
analyzed: vīsati vassa sahassa adhikāni tecattālīsa vassa lakkhāni vuttam ca brahmunaḥ ahorattena dve kappā

original: Tatra aṭṭha nāgā, dve karā, satta munayo, eko sasī, cha rasā, dvādasa sūriyā, cattāro
analyzed: tatra aṭṭha nāgā dve karā satta munayo ekaḥ sasī cha rasā dvādasa sūriyā cattāro

analyzed: vedāḥ jalanidhayaḥ ca dve nettāni tayaḥ guṇāḥ bāttiṃsa dantā saṅkhyāya

original: saṅkhyā gahetabbā. Khākāsambarasaddā suññapariyāyā. Suññañca gaṇite bindunā saṅgahitaṃ.
analyzed: saṅkhyā gahetabbā kha akāsambara saddā suñña pariyāyā suññam ca gaṇite bindunā saṅgahitam

original: Sabbañcetaṃ paṭiyugaṃ paṭilomena patthāraye. Tatra katayugassa patthāro yathā – 1728000.
analyzed: sabbam ca etam paṭiyugam paṭilomena patthāraye tatra kata yugassa patthāraḥ yathā

original: Tetāya yathā – 1296000. Dvāparassa yathā – 864000. Kalissa yathā – 432000. Catuyugapiṇḍassa
analyzed: yathā dvāparassa yathā kalissa yathā

original: ca yathā – 4320000. Yugānaṃ paṭipatthārañca piṇḍassa ca yathākkamaṃ antimaṃ bindumādāya
analyzed: ca yathā yugānam paṭipatthāram ca piṇḍassa ca yathākkamam antimam bindum ādāya

original: paṭilomena gaṇaye. Taṃ yathā –
analyzed: paṭilomena gaṇaye tam yathā

original: “Ekaṃ dasa satañceva, sahassa’mayutaṃ tathā;
analyzed: ekam dasa satam ca iva sahassam ayutam tathā

original: Lakkhañca niyutañceva, kamā dasaguṇottara”nti.
analyzed: lakkham ca niyutam ca iva kamā dasaguṇa uttaranti

original: Tatra dasasahassāni ayutaṃ. Dasalakkhāni niyutaṃ. Tañca kalidvāparesu natthīti lakkhapariyantameva
analyzed: tatra dasa sahassāni ayutam dasa lakkhāni niyutam tat ca kali dvāparesu na atthi iti lakkha pariyantam eva

original: tatra gaṇaye, tadevaṃ yugānaṃ, taṃpiṇḍassa ca aṅkato pubbavuttā vassasaṅkhyā saññātā bhavatīti.
analyzed: tatra yugānam taṃ piṇḍassa ca aṅkataḥ pubba vuttā vassa saṅkhyā saññātā bhavati iti

original: Tatra brahmuno dinaṃ narānaṃ udayakappo, ratti pana khayakappo. Ekasmiñca brahmadine
analyzed: tatra brahmunaḥ dinam udaya kappaḥ ekasmin ca brahmadine

original: manusaññitā catuddasa brahmasutā bhavanti. Tatrekassa manvantarassa ekasattatidibbayugāni
analyzed: manu saññitā catuddasa brahma sutāḥ bhavanti tatra ekassa manvantarassa ekasattati dibba yugāni

original: pamāṇaṃ, tañca mānusaṃ catuddasabhi uttaraṃ caturāsītiuttaraṃ (?) yugasatadvayaṃ.
analyzed: pamāṇam tat ca mānusam uttaram catur asīti uttaram yuga sata dvayam

original: Tadevaṃ catuddasabhi manvantarehi catunavutyuttarāni navadibbayugasatāni bhavanti.
analyzed: tat evam catuddasabhi manvantarehi catunavuti uttarāni nava dibba yuga satāni bhavanti

original: Mānusaṃ tu catuvīsatiyugasahassacatukkaṃ. Esañca chasattatyādhikanavatiṃsayugasataṃ
analyzed: mānusam tu catuvīsati yuga sahassa catukkam esat ca cha sattati adhika navatiṃsa yuga satam

analyzed: vā kata yuga ppamāṇakā

original: pañca sandhayo bhavanti. Tena vuttaṃ sūriyasiddhante 1.18-19 –
analyzed: pañca sandhayaḥ bhavanti tena vuttam sūriyasiddhante

original: “Yugānaṃ sattati sekā, manvantara’miho’ccate;
analyzed: yugānam sat tati sekāḥ manvantaram iha uccate

original: Katassa saṅkhyā tassante, sandhi vutto jalaplavo.
analyzed: katassa saṅkhyā tassa ante sandhi vuttaḥ jala plavaḥ

original: Sasandhayo te manavo, kappe ñeyyā catuddasa;
analyzed: sa sandhayaḥ te manavaḥ kappe ñeyyā catuddasa

original: Katappamāṇā kappādo, sandhī pañcadasaṭṭhitā”ti.
analyzed: kata ppamāṇā sandhī pañcadasa ṭṭhitā ati

original: Katayugassa ca pādena kalino pamāṇaṃ, pādadvayena dvāparassa, pādattayena tetāya.
analyzed: kata yugassa ca pādena kalino pamāṇam pāda dvayena dvāparassa pāda ttayena tetāya

original: Catuyugañcetaṃ cakkamiva bhamatīti pañcadasahi sandhīhi narānaṃ yugāni catuvīsati
analyzed: catu yugam ca itam cakkam iva bhamati iti pañcadasahi sandhīhi yugāni catuvīsati

original: bhavanti. Devānaṃ tu yugacakkaṃ. Etāni ca sasandhicatuddasamanvantarānyekatopi piṇḍitāni
analyzed: bhavanti etāni ca piṇḍitāni

original: devānaṃ yugasahassaṃ bhavati, narānaṃ catuyugasahassaṃ, tañca brahmuno dinamekaṃ.

original: Añño manu asmiṃ manvantaraṃ, brahmasutā eva manavo.
analyzed: aññaḥ manu asmin manvantaram brahma sutāḥ eva manavaḥ

original: 82. Pañcakaṃ khayakappe. Kappate jagatī vinassateti kappo. Khayanti ettha khayo.
analyzed: pañcakam khaya kappe kappate jagatī vinassate iti kappaḥ khayanti ettha khayaḥ

original: Kappo ca khayo cāti kappakkhayā. Saṃvattate uparamate, vinassate vā jagatī asminti
analyzed: kappaḥ ca khayaḥ ca ati kappa kkhayā saṃvattate uparamate vinassate vā jagatī asmin ti

original: saṃvaṭṭo. Catuyugānamante jāto yuganto. Palīyate khīyate yattha lokoti palayo, pume,
analyzed: saṃvaṭṭo catu yugānam ante jātaḥ yuga anto palīyate khīyate pume

original: saññāyaṃ ṇo. Keci panettha “kappakkhayo tū”ti pāṭhaṃ vatvā dvinnamekābhidhānattaṃ
analyzed: keci pana ittha kappa kkhayo tu iti pāṭham vatvā

original: kappenti, taṃ amarakosena ca taṭṭīkāya ca na sameti. Vuttañhi tattha “saṃvaṭṭo, palayo,
analyzed: kappenti tam amarakosena ca tad ṭīkāya ca na sameti vuttam hi tattha saṃvaṭṭaḥ palayaḥ

original: kappo, khayo, kappantamiccapī”ti amara 4.22 ca “pañcakaṃ khayakappe”ti ca.
analyzed: kappaḥ khayaḥ ca pañcakam khaya kappa iti ca

original: Dvayaṃ kāḷakaṇṇiyaṃ. Ninditabbattā na lakkhīyateti alakkhī. Attano nissayaṃ kāḷavaṇṇasadisaṃ
analyzed: dvayam kāḷakaṇṇiyam ninditabba ttā na alakkhīyateti alakkhī attanaḥ nissayam kāḷa vaṇṇa sadisam

original: karoti appakāsakattāti kāḷakaṇṇī, karato ṇo, rassa ṇo, ī ca. Dvayaṃ siriyaṃ. Pasaṃsitabbattā
analyzed: karoti appakāsakattā ati kāḷakaṇṇī karataḥ ṇo rassa ṇo ī ca dvayam siriyam pasaṃsitabbattā

original: lakkhīyateti lakkhī. Katapuññehi sevīyate, te vā sevatīti sirī, ro, ī ca.
analyzed: lakkhīyate iti lakkhī kata puññehi sevīyate te vā sevati iti ca

original: 83. Dvayaṃ dānavānaṃ mātari. Dā avakhaṇḍane, dāyatīti danu. Dvayaṃ devānaṃ mātari. Ditīti asurānameva vemātikā mātā, tassā paṭipakkhabhāvena aditi.
analyzed: dvayam dānavānam mātari dāḥ avakhaṇḍane dāyati iti danu dvayam devānam mātari diti iti asurānam eva vemātikā mātā tassā paṭipakkha bhāvena

original: 84. Āguntaṃ pāpe. Pānti rakkhanti attānamasmāti pāpaṃ, pakāravaṇṇāgamo, duggatiṃ
analyzed: āguntam pāpe pānti rakkhanti attānam asma ati pāpam pakāra vaṇṇa āgamaḥ duggatim

original: pāpanato vā pāpaṃ. Kilyate sithilī kariyyate yeneti kibbisaṃ, lassa vo, iso ca, karoti
analyzed: pāpa nataḥ vā pāpam kilyate sithilī kariyyate yena iti kibbisam ca karoti

original: aniṭṭhaphalanti vā kibbisaṃ, ibbiso. Virūpena gacchatīti veraṃ. Na hanti dhaññanti
analyzed: vā kibbisam ibbisaḥ virūpena gacchati iti veram na hanti dhaññanti

original: aghaṃ, hanassa gho, sādhūhi agantabbattā vā aghaṃ, hana gatiyaṃ. Kucchitaṃ caritaṃ
analyzed: agham hanassa gho sādhūhi a gantabba ttā vā agham hana gatiyam kucchitam caritam

original: duccaritaṃ. Du ninditaṃ karaṇamassa dukkaṭaṃ. Na punātīti apuññaṃ. Kusalānaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ
analyzed: duccaritam du ninditam karaṇam assa dukkaṭam na punāti iti apuññam kusalānam paṭipakkham

original: akusalaṃ. Kaṃ sukhaṃ hanatīti kaṇhaṃ, vaṇṇavipariyayo. Kalyate anena kalusaṃ, uso,
analyzed: akusalam kam sukham hanati iti kaṇham vaṇṇa vipariyayo kalyate anena kalusam uso

original: kaṃ vā sukhaṃ lunanto setīti kalusaṃ. Du ninditaṃ itaṃ gamanamassa duritaṃ. Agantabbaṃ
analyzed: kam vā sukham lunantaḥ seti iti kalusam du ninditam itam gamanam assa duritam a gantabbam

original: gacchati etenāti āgu, ā pīḷayaṃ gacchatīti vā āgu, “ā tu kodhamudāṭṭīsū”ti hi ekakkharakose vuttaṃ.
analyzed: gacchati etena ati āgu ā pīḷayam gacchati iti vā āgu ā tu kodha mudā aṭṭīsu iti hi ekakkharakose vuttam

original: 85-86. Chakkaṃ dhamme. Kucchitenākārena santāne sentīti kusā, rāgādayo, te lunāti
analyzed: chakkam dhamme kucchitena ākārena santāne senti iti kusāḥ rāga ādayaḥ te lunāti

original: chindatīti kusalaṃ. Sukhaṃ karoti, sobhanaṃ vā karaṇamassa sukataṃ. Sukhaṃ karotīti
analyzed: chindati iti kusalam sukham karoti sobhanam vā karaṇam assa su katam sukham karoti iti

original: sukkaṃ. Punātīti puññaṃ. Dharati sabbanti dhammaṃ. Apare panidaṃ “puññadhamma”mityekapadaṃ
analyzed: sukkam punāti iti puññam dharati sabbanti dhammam apare pan idam puñña dhammam iti eka padam

original: vadanti, taṃ amarakosena amara 4.24 virujjhanato na gahetabbaṃ. Sundaraṃ caraṇamassa sucaritaṃ.
analyzed: vadanti tam amara kosena amara virujjhanataḥ na gahetabbam sundaram caraṇam assa su caritam

original: Tikaṃ diṭṭhadhammike. Diṭṭhadhammo nāma paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha nibbattaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ.
analyzed: tikam diṭṭhadhammike diṭṭhadhammaḥ nāma paccakkhaḥ attabhāvaḥ tattha nibbattam diṭṭhadhammikam

original: Ihaloke jātaṃ ihalokikaṃ. Sandiṭṭhe paccakkhe attabhāve jātaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ. Dvayaṃ
analyzed: ihaloke jātam ihalokikam sandiṭṭhe paccakkhe atta bhāve jātam sandiṭṭhikam dvayam

original: samparāyike. Taṃ vacanatthato suviññeyyaṃ.
analyzed: samparāyike tam vacana tthato su viññeyyam

original: Dvayaṃ takkāle. Tasmiṃyeva kāle jātaṃ, nāsannakālādīsūti takkālaṃ. Tadā tasmiṃyeva
analyzed: dvayam tad kāle tasmin yeva kāle jātam tadā tasmin yeva

original: kāle jātaṃ tadātvaṃ, tvaṃ, tadāttantipi pāṭho. Dvayaṃ āyatikāle. Uttarakālo pacchimo
analyzed: kāle jātam tadātvam tvam pāṭhaḥ dvayam āyati kāle uttara kālaḥ pacchimaḥ

original: kālo. Āgamissatīti āyati, āpubbo i gatimhi. Ettha ca yaṃ imasmiṃ attabhāve dūramāsannaṃ
analyzed: kālaḥ āgamissati iti āyati āpubbaḥ i gatimhi ettha ca yam imasmin atta bhāve dūram āsannam

original: vā, taṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ. Yaṃ pana imasmiṃ attabhāve vā samparāye vā dūrataraṃ, taṃ āyati.
analyzed: vā tam diṭṭhadhammikam yam pana imasmin atta bhāve vā samparāye vā dūrataram tam āyati

original: 87-88. Pamodantaṃ pāmojje. Hasati yenāti hāso. Attā mano yassa attamano. Duṭṭhassa
analyzed: pamodantam pāmojje hasati yena ati hāsaḥ attā manaḥ yassa atta manaḥ duṭṭhassa

original: hi mano attā nāma na hoti, tassa bhāvo attamanatā, pāmojjaṃ. Pīṇeti tappetīti pīti.
analyzed: hi manaḥ attā nāma na hoti tassa bhāvaḥ atta mana tā pāmojjam pīṇeti tat peti iti

original: Vindati sukhaṃ etāyāti vitti. Tussanti etāyāti tuṭṭhi, taṃsahacaraṇato vitti, taṃsahacaraṇato
analyzed: vindati sukham etāya ati vitti tussanti etāya ati tuṭṭhi tad sahacaraṇataḥ vitti tad sahacaraṇataḥ

original: pīti ca nāriyaṃ, attamanatā pana niddesato rūpabhedo. Ā bhuso nandayatīti ānando.
analyzed: ca nāriyam atta mana tā pana niddesato rūpa bhedaḥ ā bhusaḥ nandayati iti ānandaḥ

original: Muda hāse, pamudo, āmodopi. Santussanaṃ santoso. Nandanaṃ nandi. Sammado sammadāpi
analyzed: muda hāse pamudaḥ āmodaḥ api santussanam santosaḥ nandanam nandi sammadaḥ sammadā api

original: sammudo, sammadopi (?), ukārassa a. Pamoditassa puggalassa, cittassa vā bhāvo pāmojjaṃ.
analyzed: ukārassa a pamoditassa puggalassa cittassa vā bhāvaḥ pāmojjam

original: Tikaṃ sukhe. Suṭṭhu khaṇatīti sukhaṃ, kvi. Sādīyati assādīyatīti sātaṃ. Phassati
analyzed: tikam sukhe suṭṭhu khaṇati iti sukham kvi sādīyati assādīyati iti sātam phassati

original: sinehatīti phāsu, phusati vā bādhati dukkhanti phāsu. Sattakaṃ kalyāṇe. Bhadi kalyāṇe,
analyzed: sinehati iti phāsu phusati vā bādhati dukkhanti phāsu sattakam kalyāṇe kalyāṇe

original: bhaddatīti bhaddaṃ. Pasatthatarattā seyyo. Sobhatīti sobhaṃ. Khī khaye, khepeti asukhaṃ
analyzed: bhaddatī iti bhaddam seyyo sobhati iti sobham khī khaye khepeti asukham

original: khemaṃ, mo. Kalyaṃ nirogaṃ aṇati gacchati, kalyaṃ vā hitaṃ aṇayati pāpayatīti kalyāṇaṃ,
analyzed: khemam mā u kalyam nirogam gacchati kalyam vā hitam aṇayati pāpayati iti kalyāṇam

original: kammani ṇo kammani upapade ṇapaccayoti adhippāyo. Maṅga gatyattho, maṅgati dhaññaṃ
analyzed: kammani ṇo kammani upapade ṇa paccayaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ gati atthaḥ dhaññam

original: maṅgalaṃ, alo. Sameti dukkhanti sivaṃ, vo.
analyzed: maṅgalam alaḥ sameti dukkhanti sivam vaḥ

original: 89. Chakkaṃ dukkhe. Dukkaraṃ khamanamettha dukkhaṃ. Kasa gamane, kasati apuññanti
analyzed: chakkam dukkhe dukkaram khamanam ettha dukkham gamane kasati

original: kasiraṃ, iro, kucchitenākārena setīti vā kasiraṃ. Kira vikkhipane, kirati sukhanti
analyzed: kasiram kucchitena ākārena seti iti vā kasiram kira vikkhipane kirati sukhanti

original: kicchaṃ, katā vā puññakaraṇicchā yenāti kicchaṃ, “dukkhūpanisā saddhā”ti hi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: kiccham katā vā puñña karaṇa icchā yena ati kiccham dukkha upanisā saddhā ti hi vuttam

original: Natthi adhigamanatthaṃ īhā etthāti nīgho, hassa gho, atha vā nihantyapuññaṃ hiṃsati
analyzed: natthi adhigamana attham īhā ettha ati atha vā nihanti apuññam hiṃsati

original: gacchatīti vā nīgho, puññaṃ vā na hanti na gacchatīti nīgho. Virūpamasati yenāti
analyzed: gacchati iti vā nīghaḥ puññam vā na hanti na gacchati iti nīghaḥ virūpam asati yena ati

original: byasanaṃ, visiṭṭhaṃ vā asati khepetīti byasanaṃ. Na hanti dhaññanti aghaṃ. Ete pāpādayo
analyzed: byasanam visiṭṭham vai asati khepeti iti byasanam na hanti dhaññanti agham ete pāpa ādayaḥ

original: guṇe yathāvuttaliṅgā. Pāpapuññāni sukhādi ca ākicchaṃ kicchantaṃ guṇayogato dabbe
analyzed: guṇe yathā vutta liṅgā pāpa puññāni sukha ādi ca ākiccham kicchantam guṇa yogataḥ dabbe

original: visesye vattamānāni tīsu. Yathā –
analyzed: visesye vattamānāni tīsu yathā

original: Pāpā utumatī kaññā, pāpo rājāpyarakkhako;
analyzed: pāpā utumatī kaññā pāpaḥ

original: Pāpaṃ byādhakulaṃ hiṃsaṃ, pāpo vippo ca sevako;
analyzed: pāpam byādha kulam hiṃsam pāpaḥ ca sevakaḥ

original: Puññaṃ titthamidaṃ puññā, nadī puñño’ya’massamo.
analyzed: puññam tittham idam puññā nadī

original: Sukhaṃ kāmikulaṃ dabbaṃ sabbaṃ (?), sukho vāso sahā’mbayā sahānvayo (ka.);
analyzed: sukham kāmi kulam dabbam sabbam sukhaḥ vāsaḥ saha ambayā saha anvayaḥ ka

original: Sukhā yuvati’ricchantī, sukhā ve maghavaggahā sukhā yuvatikā gahā (ka.).
analyzed: sukhā yuvatiḥ icchantī sukhā ve maghavan gahā sukhā yuvatikā gahā ka

original: Yadā tu sakatthappadhānaṃ sukhādikameva visesyattena vattumicchate, na tu dabbaṃ (pubbamiva visesanaṃ,) ( ) cintāmaṇiṭīkāyaṃ na dissati tadā rūpabhedottameva liṅgaṃ. Yathā –
analyzed: yadā tu sa kattha ppadhānam sukha ādikam eva vattum icchate na tu dabbam pubbam iva visesanam cintāmaṇi ṭīkā ayam na dissati tadā rūpa bheda uttamā eva liṅgam yathā

original: “Dāliddepi valittepi (ka.) dhanittepi, vaso parijano sukhaṃ;
analyzed: dālidde pi valitte pi ka dhanitte pi vaso parijanaḥ sukham

original: Sukhaṃ sajjanavāso ca, sukhaṃ santi anuttarā”ti.
analyzed: ca sukham santi

original: Nanu “dukkaṭoyaṃ byāpāro, sukataṃ kammaṃ, kalusoyaṃ me byāpāro”ti aññesampi tīsu
analyzed: nanu dukkaṭaḥ yam byāpāro su katam kammam kalusaḥ yam me byāpāro ti aññesam pi tīsu

original: vutti attheveti kiṃ pāpapuññānameva gahaṇaṃ bhavatīti? Vuccate – “duṭṭhu kato dukkaṭo,
analyzed: vutti atthā iva iti kim pāpa puññānam eva gahaṇam bhavati iti vuccate duṭṭhu kataḥ dukkaṭaḥ

original: suṭṭhu kataṃ sukata”miccevaṃ kriyānibandhanāpi tīsu vutti sambhavati, nāvassaṃ guṇanibandhanā
analyzed: suṭṭhu katam su katam icca evam kriyā nibandhanā api tīsu vutti sambhavati guṇa nibandhanā

original: eva. Kalusassapi yadā siṭṭhapayogesu visesyavutti tiliṅgatā upalabbhate, tadā pāpaggahaṇa’matthappadhānaṃ byākhyātabbaṃ.
analyzed: eva kalusassa api yadā siṭṭha payogesu ti liṅga tā upalabbhate tadā pāpa ggahaṇam attha ppadhānam byākhyātabbam

original: 90. Pañcakaṃ subhāsubhakammamatte. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākabhāgo yattha atthīti bhāgyaṃ.
analyzed: pañcakam subha asubha kamma matte iṭṭha aniṭṭha vipāka bhāgaḥ yattha atthi iti bhāgyam

original: Subhāsubhaphalaṃ netīti niyati,ti. Subhāsubhaphalaṃ bhājetīti bhāgo. Iṭṭhāniṭṭhavibhāgabhāgodhīyati
analyzed: subha asubha phalam na iti iti subha asubha phalam bhājeti iti bhāgaḥ iṭṭha aniṭṭha vibhāga bhāgaḥ dhīyati

original: etthāti bhāgadheyyaṃ. Subhāsubhaphalaṃ vidadhātīti vidhi. Ayo, subhāvaho, devaṃ,
analyzed: ettha ati bhāgadheyyam subha asubha phalam vidadhāti iti subha āvahaḥ

original: diṭṭhaṃiccādīnipi subhāsubhakammamattassa nāmāni. Pañcakaṃ jātiyaṃ. Uppajjanaṃ uppatti,
analyzed: diṭṭham iccādīni pi subha asubha kamma mattassa nāmāni pañcakam jātiyam uppajjanam uppatti

original: nippajjanaṃ nibbatti, pada gatiyaṃ, nipubbo,ti, passa bo. Jananaṃ jāti. Janīyate
analyzed: nippajjanam nibbatti pada gatiyam nipubboti passa baḥ jananam jāti janīyate

original: jananaṃ. Uddhaṃ bhavanaṃ ubbhavo.
analyzed: jananam uddham bhavanam ubbhavaḥ

original: 91. Pajjaṃ hetumhi. Attano phalaṃ niminātīti nimittaṃ, mā parimāṇe, nipubbo. Karoti
analyzed: pajjam hetumhi attanaḥ phalam nimināti iti nimittam mā parimāṇe nipubbaḥ karoti

original: phalanti kāraṇaṃ. Tiṭṭhati phalametthāti ṭhānaṃ. Pajjati nipajjati phalametenāti
analyzed: phalanti kāraṇam tiṭṭhati phalam ettha ati ṭhānam pajjati nipajjati phalam etena ati

original: padaṃ, visesena jāyateti bījaṃ, rassassa dīghatā. Nissesena attano phalaṃ bandhati
analyzed: padam visesena jāyateti bījam rassassa dīgha tā nissesena attanaḥ phalam bandhati

original: pavattetīti nibandhanaṃ. Nidīyate nicchīyate aneneti nidānaṃ, yu, nidadāti phalanti
analyzed: pavattā iti iti nibandhanam nidīyate anena iti nidānam nidadāti phalanti

original: vā nidānaṃ. Pabhavati phalametasmāti pabhavo, hinoti gacchati pariṇamati kāriyarūpatanti
analyzed: vā nidānam pabhavati phalam etasmāt iti pabhavaḥ hinoti gacchati pariṇamati

original: hetu, tu, hinoti vā patiṭṭhāti phalametthāti hetu, hi patiṭṭhāyaṃ. Sambhavati yena
analyzed: hetu tu hinoti vā patiṭṭhāti phalam ettha ati hetu hi patiṭṭhā ayam sambhavati yena

original: phalanti sambhavo. Sinoti phalaṃ bandhatīti setu. Paṭicca phalametasmā etīti paccayo.
analyzed: phalanti sambhavaḥ sinoti phalam bandhati iti setu paṭicca phalam etasmai eti iti paccayo

original: 92. Yaṃ kāraṇaṃ samāsannaṃ āsannataraṃ phalena, taṃ padaṭṭhānanti mataṃ. Padānaṃ
analyzed: yam kāraṇam samāsannam āsannataram phalena tam padaṭṭhānam ti matam padānam

original: hetūnaṃ ṭhānaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, yathā “rājarājā”ti. Tividhaṃ kāraṇaṃ upādānakāraṇaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ
analyzed: hetūnam ṭhānam padaṭṭhānam yathā rājarāja ati tividham kāraṇam upādāna kāraṇam sahakārī kāraṇam

original: kāraṇakāraṇanti. Yathā bījaṃ aṅkurassa upādānakāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ, bhūmijalādi
analyzed: kāraṇa kāraṇam ti yathā bījam aṅkurassa upādānakāraṇa saṅkhātam padaṭṭhānam bhūmi jala ādi

original: sahakārīkāraṇaṃ, “kammassa kampassa (?) kāraṇaṃ jaro, tassa kāraṇaṃ kapho”ti kapho
analyzed: sahakārī kāraṇam kammassa kampassa kāraṇam jaro tassa kāraṇam kaphaḥ iti kaphaḥ

original: kāraṇakāraṇaṃ kammassa kampassa (?).
analyzed: kāraṇa kāraṇam kammassa kampassa

original: Tikaṃ sarīrādhipatideve. Jīvanti sattā yenāti jīvo. Pūreti nissayassābhilāsanti puriso,
analyzed: tikam sarīra adhipati deve jīvanti sattāḥ yena ati jīvo pūreti nissayassa abhilāsanti puriso

original: iso. Atanti satataṃ gacchanti sattā yenāti attā. Dvayaṃ sattarajotamosāmyāvatthāyaṃ.
analyzed: atanti satatam gacchanti sattāḥ yena ati attā dvayam

original: Padhīyante palīyante atra guṇā sattarajotamo rūpāti padhānaṃ, yu. Pakaroti purisopabhogatthaṃ
analyzed: padhīyante palīyante atra guṇā pakaroti purisa upabhoga ttham

original: saddādikāriyanti pakati,ti. Moharāgadosānaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sattarajotamānīti saññā.
analyzed: yathāsaṅkhyam saññā

original: Sato bhāvo sattaṃ, ṭhitiparatā. Rajjantyatrāti rajo, saṭṭhiparatā. Tamantyatrāti tamo, palayaparatā.
analyzed: sataḥ bhāvaḥ sattam ṭhiti paratā rajjanti atra ati rajaḥ saṭṭhi paratā tamanti atra ati tamaḥ palaya paratā

original: 93. Pajjena pāṇino nāmāni. Paṇanti jīvanti sattā yenāti pāṇo, so yassatthi, so pāṇo.
analyzed: pajjena pāṇinaḥ nāmāni paṇanti jīvanti sattāḥ yena ati pāṇaḥ saḥ yassa atthi so pāṇaḥ

original: Sarīrasaṅkhāto kāyo yassatthi, so sarīrī. Kammena bhavatīti bhūtaṃ, napuṃsake, pumevāti
analyzed: sarīra saṅkhātaḥ kāyaḥ yassa atthi saḥ sarīrī kammena bhavati iti bhūtam napuṃsake pum eva ati

original: vāsaddattho. Rūpādīsu sañjatīti satto, nicchandarāgāpi rūḷhiyā sattāti vuccanti.

original: Deho kāyo yassatthīti dehī. Pūretīti pūti, pūtisaṅkhātaṃ āhāraṃ gilati adatīti puggalo,

analyzed: upalakkhaṇa nirapekkham aparam vākya lakkhaṇam āha kriyā vā kāraka anvitā iti kriyāpadam

analyzed: bhaya ādīhi yam dvi kkhattum vā ti khattum vā udīraṇam kathanam sappaḥ sappaḥ

original: bhāve kammani ca to. Kammañca padaṃ vākyamhā.

original: Payodhare hare kāme, jaññā vāma’mapitthiya”nti.

analyzed: adhivacana antam nāme sañjānanti etāya ati saññā ā ākhyāyate etāya ati ākhyā ahvayate

analyzed: ka bhāga rūpa nāmehi dheyyaḥ pāṇini vā saka tthe dheyyaḥ yad ādinā tiṭṭhati

original: vā ettha atthoti dheyyaṃ, dharīyate uccāriyateti vā dheyyaṃ, nāmameva dheyyaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ.
analyzed: vā ettha attha uti dheyyam dharīyate uccāriyate iti vā dheyyam nāmam eva dheyyam nāmadheyyam

original: Adhīnaṃ vacanaṃ adhivacanaṃ, kena adhīnaṃ? Atthena. Puṭṭhassa paṭivacanaṃ paṭivākyaṃ.
analyzed: adhīnam vacanam adhivacanam kena adhīnam atthena puṭṭhassa paṭivacanam paṭivākyam

original: Paṭigataṃ pacchāgataṃ vākyaṃ paṭivākyaṃ. Uttarīyate atikkamyate yenāti uttaraṃ.
analyzed: paṭigatam pacchāgatam vākyam paṭivākyam uttarīyate atikkamyate yena ati uttaram

original: 115. Tikaṃ pucchāyaṃ. Pucchitabboti pañho, ñātumicchito hi attho pañho nāma. Puccha
analyzed: tikam puccha ayam pucchitabbaḥ iti pañhaḥ ñātum icchitaḥ hi atthaḥ pañhaḥ nāma puccha

original: pucchane, cassa ño, chassa ho, ussa a, pañha pucchanetipi dhātu. Yuja yoge, anuyuñjitabbo
analyzed: pucchane cassa ñaḥ chassa ho ussa a pañha pucchana itipi dhātu yuja yoge anuyuñjitabbaḥ

original: pucchitabboti anuyogo. Pucchanaṃ, pucchitabbāti vā pucchā. Eteneva nayena dvīsupi
analyzed: pucchitabbā iti anuyogaḥ pucchanam pucchitabbā ati vā pucchā etena iva nayena dvīsupi

original: bhāvasādhanampi kattabbameva.
analyzed: bhāva sādhanam pi kattabbam eva

original: Catukkaṃ nidassane. Pakatena sadisaṃ nidasseti etenāti nidassanaṃ, pakatassopapādanaṃ
analyzed: catukkam nidassane pakatena sadisam nidasseti etena ati nidassanam pakatassa upapādanam

original: vākyaṃ. Upogghaññate upohaññate (?) paṭipādīyate anenāti upogghāto. Upa upubbo hanadhātu
analyzed: vākyam upogghaññate upohaññate paṭipādīyate anena ati upogghātaḥ upa upubbaḥ hana dhātu

original: paṭipādanattho. Dassīyate anenāti diṭṭhanto, anto, diṭṭho vā pakatassa anto parisamatti
analyzed: paṭipādana tho dassīyate anena ati diṭṭha antaḥ antaḥ diṭṭhaḥ vā pakatassa antaḥ parisamatti

original: yenāti diṭṭhanto. Sabbatrāpi vā kammasādhanampi kattabbaṃ. Udāharīyati pakatassopapādanāyāti udāharaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yena iti diṭṭhantaḥ sabbatra api vā kamma sādhanam pi kattabbam udāharīyati udāharaṇam

original: 116. Catukkaṃ saṅkhepe. Samāti tulyatthā. Saṅkhipīyate ekadesato kathīyatīti saṅkhepo,
analyzed: catukkam saṅkhepe tulya atthā eka desataḥ kathīyati iti saṅkhepaḥ

original: khipa peraṇe. Saṃharīyate saṅkhepena paccākhyāyate etenāti saṃhāro. Samasyate saṅkhipīyateti
analyzed: khipa peraṇe saṃharīyate saṅkhepena pacca ākhyāyate etena ati saṃhāraḥ samasyate saṅkhipīyate iti

original: samāso, asu khepane. Saṅkhepena gayhate anenāti saṅgaho.
analyzed: samāsaḥ khepane saṅkhepena gayhate anena ati saṅgahaḥ

original: “Tvaṃ sataṃ suvaṇṇaṃ dhārayasi”ityādikaṃ tucchabhāsanaṃ abhūtabhāsanaṃ abbhakkhānaṃ nāma. Asaccena akkhānaṃ bhāsanaṃ abbhakkhānaṃ.
analyzed: tvam satam suvaṇṇam dhārayasi ityādikam tuccha bhāsanam abhūta bhāsanam abbhakkhānam nāma asaccena akkhānam bhāsanam abbhakkhānam

original: 117. Dvayaṃ vivādāya vibhāgavisaye iṇavādādivisaye (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 6.9). Viruddhaṃ
katvā avaharati vadati yanti vohāro. Viruddhaṃ katvā vadati yanti vivādo. Sabbatra
analyzed: katvā avaharati vadati yanti vohāraḥ viruddham katvā vadati yanti vivādaḥ sabbatra

original: bhāvasādhanaṃ vā yujjati. “Musāvādaṃ vadanto ghorāni tvaṃ narakāni yassasī”tyādisarūpaṃ
analyzed: bhāva sādhanam vā musāvādam vadantaḥ ghorāni tvam narakāni yaḥ sasi ityādi sarūpam

original: sapanaṃ. Sapa akkose, tho, sapatho.
analyzed: sapanam sapa akkose tho sapatho

original: Tikaṃ khyāte. Yajati etenāthi yaso, jassa so, sabbattha yātīti vā yaso, so, yasati
analyzed: tikam khyāte yajati etena athi yasaḥ jassa saḥ sabbattha yāti iti vā yasaḥ saḥ yasati

original: payasatīti vā yaso. Silokati pattharatīti siloko, siloka saṅghāte. Kitta saddane,
analyzed: payasati iti vā yaso pattharati iti siloko siloka saṅghāte kitta saddane

original: kittīyate kathīyateti kitti, i. Samaññā ca khyāte, saṃ āpubbo jānāti khyāte. Tathā
analyzed: kittīyate kathīyate iti samaññā ca khyāte sam āpubbaḥ jānāti khyāte tathā

original: hi “ñāto, abhiññāto, saṅkhyāto, vissuto, samaññāto”ti ratanakose vuttaṃ. Uccadhaninā
analyzed: hi ñātaḥ abhiññātaḥ saṅkhyātaḥ vissutaḥ samaññātaḥ iti ratana kose vuttam uccadhaninā

original: saddanaṃ ghosanā nāma, ghusa sadde, ghusanaṃ saddanaṃ ghosanā.
analyzed: saddanam ghosanā nāma ghusa sadde ghusanam saddanam ghosanā

original: 118-119. Dvayaṃ paṭisadde. Ghusanaṃ ghoso, taṃ paṭigato, dutiyāsamāso. Evaṃ ravaṃ
analyzed: dvayam paṭisadde ghusanam ghoso tam paṭigataḥ dutiyā samāsaḥ evam ravam

analyzed: paṭigataḥ paṭiravaḥ atha vā ghosassa patirūpaḥ paṭighosaḥ ravassa patirūpaḥ paṭiravaḥ

original: Paṭisuti, paṭiddhanītipi paṭisaddassa nāmāni, vacīmukhaṃ vacanopakkamo upaññāso nāma,
analyzed: paṭisaddassa nāmāni vacīmukham vacana upakkamaḥ upaññāsaḥ nāma

original: upanipubbo āsa upavesane, upa paṭhamaṃ purimavacanassa samīpaṃ vā nyāso ṭhapanaṃ

original: upaññāso, nyassa ño.
analyzed: upa ñāsaḥ nyassa ñaḥ

original: Sattakaṃ thutiyaṃ. Kattha silāghāyaṃ, yu, kathanaṃ vāasarūpadvibhāvavasena katthanā.
analyzed: sattakam thutiyam kattha kathanam katthanam

original: Silāgha katthane, silāghā. Sīlassa vā sabhāgaguṇassa āhananaṃ sīlāghā, sā eva rassaṃ
analyzed: katthane silāghā sīlassa vā sabhāga guṇassa āhananam sīlāghā sā eva rassam

analyzed: katvā silāghā pasaṃsāyam vaṇṇīyateti vaṇṇanā nu thutiyaṃti nu ti thu

original: thuti. Thoma silāghāyaṃ, thomanaṃ. Papubbo saṃsa pasaṃsane, a.
analyzed: thuti thoma silāghāyam thomanam papubbo saṃsa pasaṃsane a

original: Sikhaṇḍīnaṃ mayūrānaṃ nādo nadaravo kekā nāma, kā sadde, keiti kāyatīti kekā, kammani
analyzed: sikhaṇḍīnam nādaḥ nada ravaḥ kekā nāma kā sadde keiti kāyati iti kekā kammani

analyzed: a atha vā kāyati kāyanam vā kā ke mayūre pavattā kā kekā

original: nādo koñcanādo nāma, koñcasakuṇanādasadiso nādo koñcanādo. Hayānaṃ assānaṃ dhani

analyzed: saddaḥ hesā nāma hesa abratta sadde hesanam hesā he iti pavattati iti vā hesā

original: 120-121. Dvayaṃ pariyāye. Paribyattamatthaṃ ayanti gacchanti bujjhanti etenāti pariyāyo.
analyzed: dvayam pariyāye paribyattam attham ayanti gacchanti bujjhanti etena ati pariyāyaḥ

original: avirodhena kathā sākacchā, saṃkathā ca. To, thassa co, tassa cho.
analyzed: avirodhena kathā sākacchā saṃkathā ca to thassa co tassa cho

original: Sāddhapajjena garahassa nāmāni. Dosakkhānena vadanaṃ upavādo. Kusa avhāne bhedane

original: vadanaṃ anuvādo. Janānaṃ vādo garahaṇaṃ janavādo. Garahaṇena vādo apavādo. Parivadanaṃ
analyzed: vadanam anuvādaḥ janānam vādaḥ garahaṇam janavādaḥ garahaṇena vādaḥ apavādaḥ parivadanam

analyzed: parivādaḥ rassassa dīgha tā ete upavāda ādayaḥ tulya tthā samāna tthā visama vutta ppabhedesu

original: vattamidaṃ. Khipa peraṇe, khipanaṃ bahikaraṇaṃ khepo. Nidi kucchāyaṃ, a, nindā. Yathā
analyzed: vattam idam khipa peraṇe khipanam bahikaraṇam khepaḥ nidi a nindā yathā

original: upavādādayo garahatthā, kucchādayopi tathāti tathāttho. Kuccha avakkhepane, curādi,

analyzed: vā rūpam nipphajjati gupa gopa kucchanesu

original: “tijagupakitamānehi khachasā vā”ti cho. Garaha kucchane. Tattha keci “upavādādayo
analyzed: ti ja gupa kita mānehi kha cha sā vāti chaḥ garaha kucchane tattha keci upavāda ādayaḥ

original: abbhakkhānatthā, khepādayo nindatthā”ti vadanti, taṃ amarakosena virujjhanato abbhakkhānatthassa
analyzed: abbhakkhāna atthā khepa ādayaḥ vadanti tam amarakosena virujjhanataḥ abbhakkhāna atthassa

original: ca vuttattā na gahetabbaṃ. Ete upavādādayo satta abbhakkhānepi vattanti.
analyzed: ca vutta ttā na gahetabbam ete upavāda ādayaḥ satta vattanti

analyzed: vivāda kāmassa dubbādaḥ upārambho saḥ ca īdise sabba loka cūḷāmaṇi bhūte sakya kule sambhūtassa

analyzed: nindā pubbakaḥ api upārambhaḥ tatra yaḥ nindā pubbaḥ sa nindaḥ upārambho so paribhāsanam uccate

original: Upagantvā paresaṃ cittassa ārambhanaṃ vikopanaṃ upārambho. Dosakkhānena bhāsanaṃ paribhāsanaṃ.
analyzed: upagantvā paresam cittassa ārambhanam vikopanam upārambhaḥ dosa kkhānena bhāsanam paribhāsanam

original: 122. Anariyānaṃ lāmakānaṃ vohārato, ariyānaṃ uttamajanānaṃ vā avohārato anariyavohāroti
analyzed: an ariyānam lāmakānam vohārataḥ ariyānam uttama janānam vā a vohārataḥ an ariya vohāraḥ iti

analyzed: abhivākyam nāma siyā

original: 123. Muhuṃbhāsā bahuso abhidhānaṃ anulāpo nāma, anu punappunaṃ lāpo anulāpo. Anatthikā
analyzed: muhuṃbhāsā bahusaḥ abhidhānam anulāpaḥ nāma anu punappunam lāpaḥ anulāpaḥ anatthikā

analyzed: girā nippayojanam ummatta ādi vacanam palāpaḥ payojana rahitaḥ lāpaḥ palāpaḥ pasaddaḥ viyoga attha jotako

original: Gamanāgamanādisamaye ādimhi bhāsanaṃ piyavacanaṃ ālāpo, ādimhi lāpo ālāpo, āpucchāsaddopyatra.
analyzed: gamana āgamana ādi samaye ādimhi bhāsanam piya vacanam ālāpaḥ ādimhi lāpaḥ ālāpaḥ

original: Dosena patiṭṭhito pariddavo paridevanaṃ anusocanaṃ atikkamalāpo vilāpo nāma, vividhena,
analyzed: dosena patiṭṭhitaḥ pariddavaḥ paridevanam anusocanam atikkama lāpaḥ vilāpaḥ nāma vividhena

original: vividhaṃ vā lāpo vilāpo. Paridevanaṃ paridevo, so eva pariddavo, deva paridevane.
analyzed: vividham vā lāpaḥ vilāpaḥ paridevanam paridevaḥ saḥ eva pariddavaḥ deva paridevane

original: 124. Viruddhaṃ vacanaṃ virodhotti. Viruddhaṃ palāpo vippalāpo. Sandissateti sandeso,
analyzed: viruddham vacanam virodho tti viruddham palāpaḥ vippalāpaḥ sandissatā iti sandesaḥ

original: sandissamāno attho, tassotti. Yāya sandiṭṭho attho abhidhīyate, sā sandesotti vācikamuccate.
analyzed: sandissamānaḥ atthaḥ tassa itti yāya sandiṭṭhaḥ atthaḥ abhidhīyate sā sandesā itti vācikam uccate

original: Vaca sandese, sakatthe ṇiko, sandiṭṭhatthā vācā eva vācikamiccattho.
analyzed: vaca sandese saka tthe ṇikaḥ sandiṭṭha tthāḥ vācā eva vācikam iccatthaḥ

original: Mithu aññamaññaṃ virodharahitaṃ vacanaṃ “sambhāsanaṃ, sallāpo”ti ca vuccati. Yathā eko brūte “ajja sobhanaṃ nakkhatta”nti, itaropyāha “tathevā”ti.
analyzed: mithu aññamaññam virodha rahitam vacanam sambhāsanam sallāpaḥ ti ca vuccati yathā ekaḥ brūte ajja sobhanam nakkhattan ti itaraḥ api āha tathā iva iti

original: 125. Niṭṭhuraṃ vākyaṃ kakkasavacanaṃ pharusaṃ nāma, pare jane ussāpeti dāhetīti parusaṃ,
analyzed: niṭṭhuram vākyam kakkasa vacanam pharusam nāma pare jane ussāpa iti dāha iti iti parusam

original: tadeva passa phakāraṃ katvā pharusaṃ. Asavanīyattā na icchitabbanti niṭṭhuraṃ, uro,
analyzed: tat eva passa phakāram katvā pharusam a savanīya ttā na icchitabbanti niṭṭhuram uro

original: yathā “nāgo”ti. Dvayaṃ kaṇṇasukhavacane. Manaṃ ā bhusaṃ ñāpeti tosetīti manuññaṃ,
analyzed: yathā nāgā iti dvayam kaṇṇa sukha vacane manam ā bhusam toseti iti manuññam

original: ñā parimāṇatosananisānesu, assukāro. Hadayaṃ manaṃ gacchati pavisatīti hadayaṅgamaṃ.
analyzed: ñā parimāṇa tosana nisānesu assukāraḥ hadayam manam gacchati pavisati iti hadayaṅgamam

original: Saṃkulādidvayaṃ pubbāparavirodhini pubbāparaviruddhe vākye, yathā –
analyzed: saṃkula ādi dvayam pubba apara virodhini pubba apara viruddhe vākye yathā

original: Yāvajīvamahaṃ monī, brahmacārī ca me pitā;
analyzed: yāvajīvam aham monī brahmacārī ca me pitā

original: Mātā ca mama vañjhāsi, aputto ca pitāmaho.
analyzed: mātā ca mama vañjhā asi aputto ca pitāmahaḥ

original: Saṃkulanti jaḷībhavantyanenāti saṃkulaṃ. Kilissante etthāti kiliṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: saṃkulanti jaḷībhavanti anena ati saṃkulam kilissante ettha ati kiliṭṭham

original: 126. Samudāyattharahitaṃ dasadāḷimādivākyaṃ dasa dāṭhimāni ṭhaḷapūpā kuṇḍa’ majājinaṃ
analyzed: samudāya ttha rahitam dasa dāḷima ādi vākyam dasa dāṭhimāni ṭhaḷ apūpā kuṇḍa maja ajinam

original: palālapiṇḍā (nyāyabhāssa 5.2.10 moggallānapañcikāṭīkā 1.1) asambaddhattā abaddhamiti
analyzed: palālapiṇḍā nyāyabhāssa moggallānapañcikā ṭīkā abaddham iti

original: kittitaṃ kathitaṃ, na bajjhate hadayamatrāti abaddhaṃ, to.
analyzed: kittitam kathitam na bajjhate hadayam atrā ati abaddham

original: Natthi tathaṃ saccamatrāti vitathaṃ. Pharusādayo vitathasaddaṃ yāva tiliṅgikā.
analyzed: natthi vitatham pharusa ādayaḥ vitatha saddam yāva tiliṅgikā

original: 127. Pajjaddhaṃ saccavacane. Sammāsaddoyaṃ abyayaṃ, sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanesu ca
analyzed: pajjaddham sacca vacane abyayam sabba liṅga vibhatti vacanesu ca

original: samāno. Na vitathaṃ avitathaṃ. Santesu sādhūsu bhavaṃ saccaṃ. Sata sātacche vā, vajādinā
analyzed: samānaḥ na vitatham avitatham santesu sādhūsu bhavam saccam vā vaja ādinā

original: yo, saccaṃ. Tathasaddo bhūtapariyāyo, “tathena maggena yathātthabhājinā”ti tathāgatā
analyzed: yaḥ saccam tatha saddaḥ bhūta pariyāyaḥ tathena maggena tathāgatāḥ

original: jināti (ka.) payogo. Tathe sādhu tacchaṃ, sādhvatthe yo. Yathātathasaddāpi ca saccatthā
analyzed: jināti tathe sādhu taccham sādhu atthe yaḥ ca saccatthā

original: aliṅgā. Tabbantā saccavacanavantavācakā sammā saccaṃ yathātathaṃsaddavajjitā sesā
analyzed: aliṅgā tad bantā sacca vacanavanta vācakā sammā saccam yathātatham sadda vajjitā sesā

original: avitathādayo tīsu liṅgesu vattanti. Saccaṃsaddo tu aliṅgo. Amarakose pana sammā saccasaddānampi
analyzed: avitatha ādayaḥ tīsu liṅgesu vattanti saccaṃsaddo tu aliṅgaḥ amarakose pana sammā

original: tabbati tiliṅgattaṃ vuttaṃ, yathā – saccaṃ tacchaṃ ritaṃ sammā, amūni tīsu tabbati
analyzed: tabbati ti liṅga ttam vuttam yathā saccam taccham ritam sammā amūni tīsu tabbati

original: amara 6.22. Yathā – sacco brāhmaṇo, saccā nārī, saccaṃ vippakulaṃ. Idha pana sabbaliṅgavacanavibhattīsu
analyzed: amara yathā saccaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ saccā nārī saccam vippa kulam idha pana sabba liṅga vacana vibhattīsu

original: rūpabhedābhāvā sammāsaddassa abyayattaṃ, tiliṅgesvapi rūpabhedābhāvā saccaṃsaddassa

original: saccaṃ nārī, saccaṃ vippakulaṃ. Micchāmusāsaddā pana sabbatrāpi abyayameva bhavanti.

original: Yathā – micchā vācā, micchā vohāro, micchā vacanaṃ. Musā vācā, musā vohāro, musā vacanaṃ.

original: 128. Soḷasa saddamattapariyāye dassetuṃ upajātiṃ “ravo”iccādimāha. Ruyate saddāyateti
analyzed: soḷasa sadda matta pariyāye dassetum upajātim ravoicca ādim āha

original: ravo, ru sadde. Nadanaṃ nādo, nirattho nādo ninādo, nada abyattasadde. Evaṃ ninado,

analyzed: visesaḥ sappati uccārīyati iti saddaḥ sadde pātubhāvaḥ ghosaḥ nigghosaḥ

analyzed: nadanam nādaḥ dhana sadde dhanīyati iti dhani nigghoso ca nādo ca dhani ca nigghosa nāda dhanayo

original: Ravo eva rāvo. Ārāvoti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Tathā saṃrāvavirāvaāravā. Ghusanaṃ
analyzed: ravaḥ eva rāvaḥ ārāvaḥ iti upasaggena padam vaḍḍhitam tathā saṃrāva virāva āravāḥ

original: ghoso. Ārāvo ca saṃrāvo ca virāvo ca ghoso ca āravo cāti dvando. Su savane, suyyateti
analyzed: ghosaḥ ārāvaḥ ca saṃrāvaḥ ca virāvaḥ ca ghosaḥ ca āravaḥ ca ati dvandaḥ su savane

original: nipubbo. Saro ca nissano cāti dvando.

original: 129. Visajjīyate na laggīyate semhādīhīti visaṭṭho. Manitabbanti mañju, ju, mana
analyzed: visajjīyate na laggīyate

original: chinnassarānaṃ viya dvedhā na hotītyattho. Vindyate labbhateti bindu, vassa bo, niggahītāgamo,

original: 130. Khaggādīnaṃ tiracchānagatānaṃ rutaṃ vassitantyuccate. Ru sadde, rutaṃ. Vassa sadde, vassanaṃ ravanaṃ vassitaṃ.
analyzed: khagga ādīnam tiracchāna gatānam rutam vassitanti uccate sadde rutam vassa sadde vassanam ravanam vassitam

original: Tārādayo tayo vāccaliṅgattā tīsu. Tāro dhani, tārā vāṇī, tāraṃ rutaṃ iccādi. Abyattamadhurasaddo

analyzed: ātata ādi pañcakam pañcaṅgika tūriyassa nāmāni

original: 140. Cammāvanaddhesu cammena bandhanīyesu bheriyādīsu majjhe talekekayutaṃ ekekena

original: 141. Ubhayatalaṃ murajādikaṃ tūriyaṃ vitataṃ nāma, visesena saddaṃ tanotīti vitataṃ,

analyzed: sabba vinaddham sabba passesu pubba pacchābhāgesu ca pariyonaddham paṇava ādikam ādinā

original: caturassaālambaragomukhīādayo ātatavitataṃ nāma, “cammapariyonaddhaṃ hutvā tantibaddhaṃ
analyzed: ātatavitatam nāma camma pariyonaddham hutvā tanti baddham

original: ātatavitata”nti hi vuttaṃ. Paṇa byavahārathutīsu, paṇīyatīti paṇavo, avo.

analyzed: tāḷam taḷa tāḷane samman ca tam tāḷan ca iti samma tāḷam ādinā kaṃsa tāḷa silā tāḷa ādīnam

original: Catukkaṃ ātatādīnaṃ nāmaṃ. Ā samantato tujjate tāḷīyateti ātojjaṃ. Vaṃsādikepi mukhavāyunā

analyzed: vādayanti dhanayanti tanti vādittam vāditañca ca vādayanti tanti vajjam

original: 143. Dvayaṃ bheriyaṃ. Bhāyanti sattujanā etenāti bheri, ri. Ubha pūraṇe, ubhanaṃ

analyzed: haritakyākati tvaṅkyo

original: Yavamajjho tatho’ddhako;
analyzed: yavamajjhaḥ tathā uddhakaḥ

analyzed: cintāmaṇi ṭīkāyam pi

original: Tiṇavādīni cattāri paṇavassa nāmāni. Tanu vitthāre, avo, assa ittaṃ, ṇattañca, tiṇavo. Mā māne sadde ca, “ḍiṇḍi”iti māyate saddāyateti ḍiṇḍimo, ṇo.
analyzed: tiṇava ādīni cattāri paṇavassa nāmāni tanu vitthāre avaḥ assa ittam ṇattam ca tiṇavaḥ mā māne sadde ca ḍiṇḍiiti māyate saddāyate iti ḍiṇḍimaḥ ṇo

original: 144. “Ālamba”iti saddāyateti ālambaro. “Ālambaro tūriyarave, gajendānañca gajjite”ti amara 23.167 hi amarakosa nānatthasaṅgahesu.
analyzed: ālamba eti hi ālambaraḥ nānattha saṅgahesu

analyzed: vīṇā ādīnam vādana kaṭṭha kuṭila ādikam koṇo kuṇyate koṇaḥ ṇo daddaiti

original: saddaṃ karotīti daddari, daddati vā saddavisesena pariṇamatīti daddari, ri. “Paṭa”iti

original: 146. Catukkaṃ iṭṭhagandhe. Iṭṭho gandho iṭṭhagandho, atha vā iṭṭho gandho assa iṭṭhagandho.
analyzed: catukkam iṭṭha gandhe iṭṭhaḥ gandhaḥ iṭṭha gandhaḥ atha vā iṭṭhaḥ gandhaḥ assa iṭṭha gandhaḥ

original: Suṭṭhu rabhanti tussantyanenāti surabhi, i. Sundaro gandho assa sugandho, sugandhi
analyzed: suṭṭhu rabhanti tussanti anena ati surabhi i sundaraḥ gandhaḥ assa su gandhaḥ sugandhi

original: ca, antassikārādeso.
analyzed: ca antassikāra ādesaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ citādhūmādigandhe. Visa vippayoge, so. Āmassa vasādivatthuno gandho taṃyogā, i, yaṃsaddo tassa napuṃsakattadīpako.

analyzed: kasāvaḥ su savane tuvaraḥ api kasāya api nisāne to titto kaṭu

analyzed: kasāva ādi saddā tīsu liṅgesu vattanti

original: 149. Dvayaṃ phoṭṭhabbe. Phusitabbo phasso, phoṭṭhabbo ca, tabbo, sassa ṭo, tassa

analyzed: vuttam man indriye tu upacārāḥ man indriyesu upacārā kaṃ akkham indo attā tassa liṅgam

original: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tikkhamandādibhāvasambhavato tesu indati paramissariyaṃ karotīti vā indriyaṃ.

original: Chakkaṃ nayane. Neti attano nissitaṃ puggalanti nayanaṃ, yu. Asu byāpane, asati visayesu
analyzed: chakkam nayane neti attanaḥ nissitam nayanam byāpane asati visayesu

original: byāpībhavati, akkhati vā passati etenāti akkhi. Netīti nettaṃ. Locati passati etenāti
analyzed: byāpībhavati akkhati vā passati etena ati akkhi neti iti nettam locati passati etena ati

analyzed: locanam accha dassana byāpanesu i acchi cakkhati assādeti cakkhu u cakkhati

original: passatīti vā cakkhu.
analyzed: passati iti vā cakkhu

original: 150. Pañcakaṃ sote. Suṇāti etenāti sotaṃ. Saddo gayhate anenāti saddaggaho. Kara
analyzed: pañcakam sote suṇāti etena ati sotam saddaḥ gayhate anena ati saddaggaho kara

original: karaṇe, ṇo, kaṇṇo, kaṇṇati suṇāti etenāti vā kaṇṇo, kaṇṇa savane. Suṇāti yenāti savanaṃ, suti ca, yu,ti ca.
analyzed: karaṇe suṇāti etena ati vā kaṇṇo savane suṇāti yena ati savanam ca ca

original: Catukkaṃ ghāne. Nasanti etāyāti natthu, thu, ā, nāsā. Ṇvu, aka ca ikāro ca nāsikā. Ghā gandhopādāne, ghāyati gandhopādānaṃ karotīti ghānaṃ, yu, ghāyantyanenāti vā ghānaṃ.
analyzed: catukkam ghāne nasanti etāya ati natthu thu ā nāsā a ka ca i kāraḥ ca nāsikā ghā gandha upādāne ghāyati gandha upādānam karoti iti ghānam ghāyanti anena ati vā ghānam

original: Dvayaṃ jivhāyaṃ. Jīvati etāyāti jivhā, ho, jīva pāṇadhāraṇe. Jīvitanimittaṃ raso

analyzed: rasam jānāti iti vā rasanā nā nī vā a

original: 151. Pajjaṃ sarīre. Sarati gacchati, saranti vā taṃ hiṃsantīti sarīraṃ, īro. Vapa
analyzed: sarīre sarati gacchati saranti vā tam hiṃsanti iti sarīram īraḥ vapa

original: bījasantāne. Vapati kusalākusalabījametthāti vapu, u. Gacchati, gaṇhāti vā kusalākusalametenāti

original: gattaṃ, gamu gatiyaṃ, gaha upādāne vā. “Attā”ti abhidhānaṃ, buddhi ca bhavanti etasmāti
analyzed: upādāne vā attā ati abhidhānam ca bhavanti etasmā ati

original: Pajjaddhaṃ viratiyaṃ. Ramu uparame vipubbo, viramaṇaṃ veramaṇī, yu, nadādi, veraṃ maṇati vināsetīti vā veramaṇī. Viramaṇaṃ virati,ti. Dūrato viramaṇaṃ ārati.

original: 161. Catukkaṃ khantiyaṃ. Titikkhanaṃ khamanaṃ titikkhā, tija khantiyaṃ, kho, dvittaṃ,
analyzed: catukkam khantiyam titikkhanam khamanam titikkhā tija khantiyam kho dvittam

original: Dvayaṃ mettiyaṃ. Mida snehe, mijjati sinehatīti mettā, ta, ā. Metti,ti. Atha vā mitte

original: 165. Dvayaṃ upanāhe. Naha bandhane, punappunaṃ, upagantvā vā nayhati cittanti upanāho. Bajjhati veramanenāti baddhaveraṃ. Dvayaṃ soke. Suca soke, ṇo, sucanaṃ soko. Sucate socanaṃ.

original: tiṭṭhati, niṇṇayo vinicchayamattamevāti ayametesaṃ viseso. Atha vā adhimokkho pasādepi

original: pavattatīti dvīsupi vutto.
analyzed: pavattati iti dvīsu pi vuttaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ ummāde. Cittassa vibbhamo bhanti ummādo. Mada ummāde, uggatehi, ummaggasaṇṭhitehi vā dosehi madanaṃ ummādo.

analyzed: dvayam pamāde yena sakkaḥ samānaḥ sayam kattabbam na karoti saḥ pamādaḥ mada pamāde

original: 174. Vilāsādayo kriyā ceṭṭhā, kiṃvisiṭṭhā? Sā kriyā nārisiṅgārabhāvajā itthīnaṃ ratibhāvajā,
analyzed: vilāsa ādayaḥ kriyā ca iṭṭhā kiṃvisiṭṭhā sā kriyā nāri siṅgāra bhāva jā itthīnam rati bhāva jā

analyzed: gahaṇam tathā hi vuttam nāṭaka ratana kose

original: Vikatañceti viññeyyā, dasa thīnaṃ thīnaṃ ceṭṭhā (ka.) sabhāvajā;
analyzed: vikatam ca iti viññeyyāḥ dasa thīnam thīnam ca iṭṭhā sa bhāva jā

analyzed: dvayam ussave dāhe kam usavanti uggirayanti atra ati ussavaḥ nānā samiddhīhi savanti

original: 2. Bhūkaṇḍa

original: 1. Bhūmivaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: bhūmi vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 191-192. Tabbhedā tassa maggassa visesā jaṅghamaggādayo apathantā. Jaṅghāhi gato maggo jaṅghamaggo. Sakaṭehi gato maggo sakaṭamaggo. Te jaṅghamaggasakaṭamaggā mahāmagge vattanti.

original: Ettha ca “tethā”ti athasaddo na vattabbo, “te cā”ti pana vattabbo. “Matāddhanī”ti
analyzed: ettha ca tethā ati atha saddo na vattabbo te ca ati pana vattabbo matāt hani iti

original: Dukkhena gacchantyetthāti duggamo.

original: Dvayaṃ pasattheddhani. Sobhano patho, pantho cāti viggaho. Gantabbapathabhāvato apetaṃ uppathaṃ, apathañca, abyayībhāvasamāso, asaddo atra nipāto.
analyzed: dvayam sobhanaḥ patho pantho ca ati viggahaḥ gantabba patha bhāvataḥ apetam uppatham a patham ca abyayībhāva samāsaḥ a saddaḥ atra nipātaḥ
