analyzed: ādinā mathura madhura mādhura saṅgahitā

original: 202. Catukkaṃ abbhantaragāmamagge. Rathassa hitā racchā, pabbajjādi. Visayante pakāsayante
analyzed: catukkam abbhantara gāma magge rathassa hitā racchā pabbajja ādi

original: vikkayena dabbāni yassaṃ, sā visikhā, vipubbo si sevāyaṃ, kho, visanti etthāti vā
analyzed: vikkayena dabbāni yassam sā visikhā vipubbaḥ si sā iva ayam kho visanti ettha ati vā

original: visikhā, visa pavesane, kho. Rathassa hitā rathikā, iko. Vī gamane, thi, vīthi.
analyzed: visikhā visa pavesane kho rathassa hitā rathikā i kaḥ vī gamane thi vīthi

original: Anibbiddhā racchantarena majjhe anibbiddhā racchā byūho nāma. Byūheti sampiṇḍeti
analyzed: a nibbiddhā raccha antarena majjhe a nibbiddhā racchā byūhaḥ nāma byūha iti sampiṇḍa iti

original: jane aññatra gantumappadānavasenāti byūho, ūha sampiṇḍane vipubbattā. Na nibbijjhate
analyzed: jane aññatra gantum appadāna vasena ati byūhaḥ ūha sampiṇḍane vipubbattā na nibbijjhate

original: racchantarenāti anibbiddho, vidha sampahāre, a. Nibbiddhā racchantarena racchā patho,
analyzed: racchantarena ati anibbiddhaḥ vidha sampahāre a nibbiddhā racchantarena racchā pathaḥ

original: addhīti ca vuccati. Patha gamane, patho. Ada gamane,ti, addhi.
analyzed: addhi iti ca vuccati patha gamane pathaḥ ada gamane iti addhi

original: 203. Catukkaṃ caccare. Catunnaṃ pathānaṃ samāhāro catukkaṃ, cara gatibhakkhanesu,
analyzed: catukkam cat care catunnam pathānam samāhāraḥ catukkam gati bhakkhanesu

original: caro, rassa co, caccaraṃ, aṅgaṇavācako cāyaṃ. Dvinnaṃ, catunnaṃ vā maggānaṃ sandhi
analyzed: caro rassa caḥ caccaram aṅgaṇa vācakaḥ ca ayam dvinnam catunnam vā maggānam sandhi

original: maggasandhi. Siṅgha ghāyane, āṭako.
analyzed: maggasandhi siṅgha ghāyane āṭako

original: Dvayaṃ vappassopari iṭṭhakādiracite veṭhane. Vappaṃ nāma dugganagare parikhāmattikaṃ
analyzed: dvayam vappassa upari iṭṭhaka ādi racite veṭhane vappam nāma dugga nagare parikhāma ttikam

original: kūṭaṃ kuṭiṃ (ka.) katvā gohi, hatthīhi ca vimaddāpetvā tiṃsahatthappamāṇaṃ pākārassa
analyzed: kūṭam kuṭim ka katvā gohi hatthīhi ca vimaddāpetvā tiṃsa hattha ppamāṇam pākārassa

original: heṭṭhimatalaṃ, tathā hatthasataṃ tato uddharitvā paṃsunā vappaṃ kāraye, tassopari
analyzed: heṭṭhima talam tathā hattha satam tatas uddharitvā paṃsunā vappam kāraye tassa upari

original: pākāranti, pakubbanti tanti pākāro, samantato karīyateti vā pākāro, akattari ca kārake
analyzed: samantataḥ karīyate iti vā pākāraḥ a kattari ca kārake

original: saññāyaṃ ṇo, rassassa dīghatā. Vu saṃvaraṇe, vuṇotīti varaṇo, yu, rāgamo ca. “Sālo”tipi pākārassa nāmaṃ.
analyzed: saññā ayam ṇaḥ rassassa dīgha tā vu saṃvaraṇe vuṇoti iti varaṇaḥ yu rā gamaḥ ca pā kārassa nāmam

original: Dvayaṃ rājabhavanasāmaññe. Sabbagehānaṃ visesena pakāsanato uddāpo, dīpa pakāsane,
analyzed: dvayam rāja bhavana sāmaññe sabba gehānam visesena pakāsanataḥ uddāpaḥ pakāsane

original: īssākāro. Saṅgamma karonti tanti upakārikā, ṇvu. Ke paccaye thīkatākārapare pubbo
analyzed: īssā ākāraḥ saṅgamma karonti tanti upakārikā ṇu ke paccaye thīkata ākāra pare pubbo

original: akāro dīghaṃ kātanta 2.2.65, akādesopi hi “ko”ti vuccati, yathā devadatto “datto”ti. Kapaccayo vā.
analyzed: akāraḥ dīgham a ka ādesaḥ api hi kaḥ iti vuccati yathā devadattaḥ dattaḥ iti ka paccayaḥ vā

original: 204. Dvayaṃ gehādino mattikeṭṭhakādimayabhittiyaṃ. Kuṭa chedane, kuṭati chindati
analyzed: dvayam geha ādinaḥ chedane kuṭati chindati

original: magganti kuṭṭaṃ. Bhidi dvidhākaraṇe,ti, bhitti. Gunnaṃ vācānaṃ puraṃ gopuraṃ. Dvārasamīpe
analyzed: kuṭṭam bhidi dvidhākaraṇa iti bhitti gunnam vācānam puram gopuram dvāra samīpe

original: kato koṭṭhako dvārakoṭṭhako, kusa akkose, ṭhako, koṭṭhakoti gehaviseso.
analyzed: kataḥ koṭṭhakaḥ dvāra koṭṭhako akkose ṭhako koṭṭhako ti geha viseso

original: Dvayaṃ indakhīle. Isa icchāyaṃ, esa gavesane vā, iko. Indassa sakkassa khīlo kaṇṭako
analyzed: dvayam inda khīle isaḥ icchāyam gavesane vā ikaḥ indassa sakkassa khīlaḥ kaṇṭako

original: indakhīlo. Dvayaṃ dvārapassopasālāyaṃ’hamyādipiṭṭhe ca vātakuṭikāyaṃ. Aḍḍa atikkamahiṃsāsu,
analyzed: indakhīlaḥ dvayam ca vātakuṭi kāyam aḍḍa atikkama hiṃsāsu

original: a. Ālakapaccaye aṭṭālako.
analyzed: a ālaka paccaye aṭṭālakaḥ

original: 205. Upari mālādiyuttaṃ sobhanathambhadvayamubhayato nikhanitvā yaṃ bahidvāraṃ kappīyate,
analyzed: upari mālā ādi yuttam yam bahi dvāram

original: taṃ toraṇaṃ. Tura vāraṇe, yu, thavantā vā raṇantyatrāti toraṇaṃ, tu abhitthave. Raṇa
analyzed: tam toraṇam tura vāraṇe thavantā vā raṇanti atra ati toraṇam tu abhitthave raṇa

original: saddattho, vaṇṇavikāro. Dvārassa bahi bahidvāraṃ. Pari samantato khaññateti parikhā.
analyzed: saddatthaḥ vaṇṇa vikāraḥ dvārassa bahi bahi dvāram pari samantataḥ parikhā

original: Dīghabhāvena yuttā dīghikā.
analyzed: dīgha bhāvena yuttā dīghikā

original: 206-207. Sadumantaṃ gehe. Manda modanathutijaḷattesu, mandante yatthāti mandiraṃ,
analyzed: sadumantam gehe manda mandante mandiram

original: iro. Sīdanti tatthāti sadanaṃ, yu. Sada visaraṇagatyāvasānesu. Na gacchantīti agā,
analyzed: sīdanti tattha ati sadanam visaraṇa gatya avasānesu na gacchanti iti

original: thambhādayo, te rāti gaṇhātīti agāraṃ. Rassassa dīghatte āgāraṃ. Ci caye, nicīyate
analyzed: thambha ādayaḥ te rāti gaṇhāti iti agāram rassassa dīghatte āgāram ci caye nicīyate

original: chādīyateti nikāyo, yamhi cissa kādeso nipātanā. Lī silesane, ṇo, nilayo, ālayo ca.
analyzed: chādīyate iti nikāyaḥ yamhi cissa ka ādesaḥ nipātanā si lesane ṇaḥ nilayaḥ ālayaḥ ca

original: Vasa nivāse, āvasantyatrāti āvāso, ṇo. Bhū sattāyaṃ, bhavantyatrāti bhavanaṃ. Visanti
analyzed: vasa nivāse āvasanti atra ati āvāsaḥ bhavanti atra ati bhavanam visanti

original: tanti vesmaṃ, mo. Kita nivāse, adhikaraṇe yu, niketanaṃ. Nivisanti, nivasanti vā
analyzed: nivāse adhikaraṇe niketanam nivisanti nivasanti vā

original: yatra, taṃ nivesanaṃ. Ghara secane, gharati kilesametthāti gharaṃ, gayhatīti vā gharaṃ,
analyzed: yatra tam nivesanam secane gharati kilesam ettha ati gharam gayhati iti vā gharam

original: ṇo. Gahassa gharādeso. Gaṇhāti purisena ānītaṃ dhananti gahaṃ. Adhikaraṇe tho, āvasatho.
analyzed: ṇaḥ gahassa ghara ādesaḥ gaṇhāti purisena ānītam gaham adhikaraṇe tho āvasathaḥ

original: Sara gaticintāhiṃsāsu, saranti cintenti ettha subhāsubhakammāni, sarati vā sūriyasantāpādikanti
analyzed: gati cintā hiṃsāsu saranti cintenti ettha subha asubha kammāni sarati vā sūriya santāpa ādikanti

original: saraṇaṃ. Si sevāyaṃ, ṇo, patissayo. Uca samavāye, okaṃ. Sala gamane, “itthiyamatiyavo
analyzed: saraṇam si sevāyam no patissayaḥ uca samavāye okam gamane itthiya matiyavaḥ

original: vā”ti a, sālā, saradhātumhi sati lattameva viseso. Ci caye, kammani ṇo, cayo. Kuṭa
analyzed: vāti a sālā sara dhātumhi sati visesaḥ ci caye kammani ṇo cayaḥ

original: chedane, i. Vasa nivāse,ti. Upadhassa ette gehaṃ. Sadadhātumhā umo, sadumaṃ.
analyzed: chedane i vasa nivāse iti upadhassa geham

original: Dvayaṃ mukharahitadevakulasadise yaññāyatane. Cita pūjāyaṃ, kammani iyo. Yata yatane,
analyzed: dvayam mukha rahita devakula sadise yañña āyatane cita pūjāyam kammani yata yatane

original: āyatanti vāyamanti ettha phalakāmāti āyatanaṃ, atha vā āyantīti āyāni, tāni tanotīti
analyzed: āyatanti vā āyamanti ettha phala kāmāti āyatanam atha vā āyanti iti āyāni tāni tanoti iti

original: āyatanaṃ, phalakārakantyattho. Ettha tusaddo samāgatānaṃ dvinnaṃ pubbāparagamanattho.
analyzed: āyatanam ettha tu saddaḥ samāgatānam dvinnam pubba apara gamana tthaḥ

original: “Cetiyāyatanāni cā”tipi pāṭho.
analyzed: cetiya āyatanāni ca atipi

original: 208. Dvayaṃ devānaṃ, narapatīnañca iṭṭhakādimaye bhavane. Aññassāpi sādisyā. Pasīdanti nayanamanānyatrāti pāsādo. Yu missane, po, dīgho ca, dīghavidhānasāmatthiyā ottābhāvo.
analyzed: dvayam devānam narapatīnam ca iṭṭhaka ādi maye bhavane aññassa api sādisyā pasīdanti pasīdanti missane po dīghaḥ ca dīgha vidhāna sāmatthiyāḥ

original: Dvayaṃ rājato aññesaṃ dhanīnaṃ byavahārakādīnaṃ bhavane. Muṇḍo chadanametassa, na pāsādassa viyāti muṇḍacchado, dvittaṃ. Hara haraṇe, yo, yamhi miāgamo ca.
analyzed: dvayam rājataḥ aññesam dhanīnam byavahāraka ādīnam bhavane muṇḍo chadanam etassa na pāsādassa viyāti muṇḍacchadaḥ hara haraṇe ca

original: Duggapuradvāre vā, yattha katthaci vā mattikādimaye gajakumbhamhi yo yūpo pāsādo
analyzed: dugga pura dvāre vā yattha katthaci vā mattikā ādi maye gaja kumbhamhi yaḥ yūpaḥ pāsādaḥ

original: patiṭṭhito, so hatthinakho nāma, hatthisseva nakho yassāti hatthinakho, nakhasaddena
analyzed: patiṭṭhitaḥ saḥ hatthinakhaḥ nāma hatthissa iva nakhaḥ yassa ati hatthinakhaḥ nakha saddena

original: vā nakhasahito pāsādo gayhate.
analyzed: vā nakha sahitaḥ pāsādaḥ gayhate

original: 209. Supaṇṇassa garuḷassa vaṅkena pakkhena sadisachadanaṃ gehaṃ suvaṇṇavaṅkacchadanaṃ. Vaṅka gamane. Ekapasseyeva chadanato aḍḍhayogo.
analyzed: supaṇṇassa garuḷassa vaṅkena pakkhena sadisa chadanam geham suvaṇṇa vaṅka chadanam vaṅka gamane aḍḍha yogaḥ

original: Ekeneva kūṭena yutto anekakoṇo patissayaviseso māḷo nāma, vaṭṭākārena katasenāsananti keci. Mā māne, ḷo, māḷo.
analyzed: ekena iva kūṭena yuttaḥ aneka koṇaḥ patissaya visesaḥ māḷaḥ nāma vaṭṭa ākārena katasena āsananti keci mā māne ḷaḥ māḷaḥ

original: Caturasso patissayaviseso pāsādo nāma, āyatacaturassapāsādoti keci.
analyzed: caturassaḥ patissaya visesaḥ pāsādaḥ nāma āyata caturassa pāsādaḥ ti keci

original: 210. Santehi bhāti dibbatīti sabhāyaṃ, sabhā ca, purime yapaccayo, santassa sādeso
analyzed: santehi bhāti dibbati iti sabhāyam sabhā ca purime ya paccayaḥ santassa sa ādesaḥ

original: tūbhayatra. Maṇḍā raviraṃsayo, te pivati nāsayatīti maṇḍapo, vāsaddena maṇḍapapadassa
analyzed: tu ubhayatra maṇḍā raviḥ aṃsayo te pivati na āsayati iti maṇḍapaḥ vā saddena maṇḍapa padassa

original: pulliṅgattaṃ samuccinoti, janānaṃ ālayo sannipātaṭṭhānaṃ janālayo. Āsanatthāya katā
analyzed: samuccinoti janānam ālayaḥ sannipāta ṭṭhānam jana ālayaḥ āsana tthāya katā

original: sālā āsanasālā. Paṭikkamanti etthāti paṭikkamanaṃ, kamu padavikkhepe, adhikaraṇe yu.
analyzed: sālā āsana sālā paṭikkamanti ettha ati paṭikkamanam kamu pada vikkhepe adhikaraṇe yu

original: 211. Jinassa vāsabhūtaṃ bhavanaṃ gandhakuṭi nāma, dibbagandhehi paribhāvitā kuṭi gandhakuṭi.
analyzed: jinassa vāsa bhūtam bhavanam gandhakuṭi nāma dibba gandhehi paribhāvitā kuṭi gandhakuṭi

original: Tikaṃ pākaṭṭhāne. Rasāni santyassaṃ rasavatī, pacanaṃ pāko, tassa ṭhānaṃ pākaṭṭhānaṃ. Mahantāni bahūni asitabbāni santettha mahānasaṃ, asa bhakkhane, yu, vaṇṇavipariyayo.
analyzed: tikam pāka ṭṭhāne rasāni santi assam rasavatī pacanam pākaḥ tassa ṭhānam pāka ṭṭhānam mahantāni bahūni asitabbāni santi ittha mahānasam bhakkhane vaṇṇa vipariyayo

original: 212. Suvaṇṇakārādisippīnaṃ kammasālā āvesanaṃ. Āvisantyasmiṃ āvesanaṃ, yu. Pānamandiraṃ
analyzed: suvaṇṇakāra ādi sippīnam kamma sālāḥ āvesanam āvisanti asmin āvesanam pāna mandiram

original: surāpānatthaṃ katamandiraṃ soṇḍā nāma, kattabbākattabbaṃ vicāretvā attanā icchitavatthukāraṇā
analyzed: surā pāna attham kata mandiram soṇḍā nāma kattabba a kattabbam vicāretvā attanā icchita vatthu kāraṇā

original: sabbaṃ deyyadhammaṃ sanontīti soṇḍā, sana dāne, tanādi. Ḍo, assottaṃ, vaṇṇavikāro
analyzed: sabbam deyya dhammam sanonti iti soṇḍā sana dāne tan ādi ḍaḥ assa uttam vaṇṇa vikāraḥ

original: ca, tesaṃ esā vasati soṇḍā. Pānasaddasannidhānā surāsoṇḍāyevidha gahitā. Vaccassa
analyzed: ca tesam esā vasati soṇḍā pāna sadda sannidhānā surā soṇḍā āyevidha gahitā vaccassa

original: gūthassa visajjanaṭṭhānaṃ vaccaṭṭhānaṃ. Vaccassa visajjanaṭṭhānā kuṭi vaccakuṭi.
analyzed: gūthassa visajjana ṭhānam vacca ṭhānam vaccassa visajjana ṭhānā kuṭi vacca kuṭi

original: Munīnaṃ isīnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ assamo nāma, ā kodhaṃ samenti etthāti assamo, ā bhuso
analyzed: munīnam isīnam vasanaṭṭhānam assamaḥ nāma ā kodham samenti ettha ati assamaḥ ā bhuso

original: samenti ettha rāgādayoti vā assamo.
analyzed: samenti ettha rāga ādayaḥ ti vā assamo

original: 213. Tikaṃ paṇyavikkayasālāyaṃ. Paṇa byavahāre, paṇitabbāti paṇyā, vatthādayo, te
analyzed: tikam paṇya vikkaya sālāyam byavahāre paṇitabbā ati paṇyāḥ vattha ādayaḥ te

original: ettha vikkiṇantīti paṇyavikkayo, kī dabbavinimaye, so eva sālā gehanti paṇyavikkayasālā.
analyzed: ettha vikkiṇanti iti dabba vinimaye saḥ eva sālā paṇya vikkaya sālā

original: Āpaṇayante byavaharante asminti āpaṇo, ṇo. Paṇyānaṃ vikkayāya nīyamānānaṃ vīthi pantho
analyzed: āpaṇayante byavaharante asmin ti āpaṇaḥ naḥ paṇyānam vikkayāya nīyamānānam vīthi pantho

original: paṇyavīthikā. Vasa acchādane, to, udakaṃ vasitaṃ acchādanaṃ katamanenāti udosito,
analyzed: paṇya vīthikā udakam vasitam acchādanam katamanena ati

original: vassottaṃ, bhaṇḍaṭṭhapanassa sālā bhaṇḍasālā. Kamu padavikkhepe, caṅkamatyatrāti
analyzed: vassottam bhaṇḍa ṭṭhapanassa sālā bhaṇḍa sālā

original: caṅkamanaṃ, caṅkamo ca, dvittādi.
analyzed: caṅkamanam caṅkamo ca dvitta ādi

original: 214. Jalanti etthāti jantā, jala dittiyaṃ, anto, “itthiyamatiyavo vā”ti a, ā, lalopo,
analyzed: jalanti ettha ati jantā antaḥ itthiyamatiyavaḥ vā a la lopaḥ

original: janetyatra agginti vā jantā, jana janane, anto, sā eva gharaṃ jantāgharaṃ. Aggino
analyzed: jana iti atra vā jantā jana janane saḥ eva gharam agharam

original: sālā aggisālā. Pā pivane, papivantyassanti papā, a. Pānīyaṭṭhā sālā pānīyasālā, sā eva pānīyasālikā.
analyzed: sālā aggisālā pā pivane papivantī assanti papā a pānīya ṭṭhā sālā pānīyasālā sā eva pānīya sālikā

original: Gasa gamane, bho, sassa bo. Avati rakkhatīti ovarako, aro, sakatthe ko, assottañca.
analyzed: gasa gamane bho sassa bo avati rakkhati iti ovarakaḥ aro saka tthe kaḥ assa uttañca

original: Vasanaṃ vāso, tadatthaṃ agāraṃ vāsāgāraṃ. Sayati etthāti sayanī, yu, nadādi, sā eva gahaṃ sayaniggahaṃ.
analyzed: vasanam vāsaḥ tad attham agāram vāsāgāram sayati ettha ati sayanī nad ādi sā eva gaham sayaniggaham

original: 215. Catukkaṃ rājitthāgāre, tadatthiyato tadaṭṭhiyato (ka.) upacārena rājitthīsupi.
analyzed: catukkam rājittha āgāre tadatthiyato kaḥ upacārena rājitthī supi

original: Rājitthīnamagāraṃ itthāgāraṃ. Avarundhīyante rājitthiyo anenāti orodho, rudha āvaraṇe.
analyzed: rājitthīnam agāram itthā āgāram avarundhīyante rājitthiyaḥ anena ati orodhaḥ rudhaḥ āvaraṇe

original: Suddhā kāmāpagamattā parisuddhā rakkhakā ante samīpe yassāti suddhanto. Ante abbhantare
analyzed: suddhā kāma apagama ttā parisuddhāḥ rakkhakāḥ ante samīpe yassa ati suddha antaḥ ante abbhantare

original: puraṃ gehaṃ antepuraṃ, purassa anteti vā antepuraṃ. “Antopura”ntipi pāṭho.
analyzed: puram geham antepuram purassa anta iti vā antepuram antopura ntipi pāṭhaḥ

original: Raññaṃ rājūnaṃ asabbavisayaṭṭhānaṃ sabbehyasādhāraṇaṭṭhānaṃ “kacchantara”nti mataṃ
analyzed: raññam rājūnam asabba visaya ṭṭhānam sabbehi asādhāraṇa ṭṭhānam matam

original: kathitaṃ, yaṃ “pamadavana”nti vuccati, pamadavanaṃ nāma upakārikāsannihitaṃ vā purasannihitaṃ
analyzed: kathitam yam pamadavana nti vuccati pamadavanam nāma upakārikā sannihitam vā pura sannihitam

original: vā antepurocitaṃ, yatra antepurasahito eva rājā viharati, nāññajanappaveso amara
analyzed: vā antepura ucitam yatra antepura sahitaḥ eva rājā viharati na añña jana ppavesaḥ amara

original: 14.3. Pamadānaṃ vanaṃ pamadavanaṃ. Nipātanā yākārānaṃ īkāra ākārānanti attho itthigatānaṃ
analyzed: pamadānam vanam pamada vanam nipātanā yākārānam īkāraḥ ākārānam ti atthaḥ itthi gatānam

original: rasso kvacītirasso. Kacchassa pakoṭṭhassa antaraṃ abbhantaraṃ kacchantaraṃ. Pakoṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: rassaḥ kvaci iti rassaḥ kacchassa pakoṭṭhassa antaram abbhantaram kacchantaram pakoṭṭham

original: nāma abbhantaradvāraṃ.
analyzed: nāma ap bhantara dvāram

original: 216. Dvayaṃ iṭṭhakādiracite ārohane. Upānena saha vattateti sopāno, sopānaṃ vā napuṃsakepi. Ārūyhate yena taṃ ārohanaṃ, yu, ruha janane.

original: Soṇigāravena mattagajo viya bandhanagāminī mattakāsinī, kasa gatiyaṃ. Varavaṇṇayogā varavaṇṇinī, inī.

original: “Sīte sukhoṇhasabbaṅgī, gimhe yā sukhasītalā;
Bhattu bhattā ca yā nārī, sā bhave varavaṇṇinī”ti. ruddo;
analyzed: ca yā nārī sā bhave varavaṇṇinī iti ruddo

original: Dvayaṃ akhaṇḍitacaritrāyaṃ. Pati sāmikova kamanīyo yassā patibbatā, patimhi vatamassāti vā patibbatā. Asa bhuvi, anto, ī, ādilopo. Sametīti vā satī, samu upasame, anto, ī.

original: Dvayaṃ kāmarattarājaputtādino kulassa niyatapatiyaṃ. Kulānurūpā itthī kulitthī, kulaṃ pāleti rakkhatīti kulapālikā, ṇvu.

analyzed: dvayam matabhattikāyam vigataḥ dhavaḥ bhattā yassā vidhavā pati suññaḥ naṭṭhaḥ yassa ati patisuññā

original: Dvayaṃ atticchāya patyanvesiniyaṃ kaññāyaṃ. Patiṃ varati gavesatīti patimbarā, dutiyāyālopo. Sayameva patiṃ varatīti sayambarā, paṭhamāyālopo, vara patthanāyaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam sayam eva patim varati iti patimbarā dutiyāya ālopo sayam eva patim varati iti paṭhamāya ālopo

original: Catukkaṃ vijātāyaṃ. Vijanī gabbhavimokkhane, to, vijāyitthāti vijātā. Sū abhisave, to. Jātaṃ apaccaṃ putto etissāti jātāpaccā. Pasūtāva pasūtikā, kapaccayo, ittañca.
analyzed: catukkam vijātā ayam vijanī gabbha vimokkhane to vijāyittha ati vijātā abhisave to jātam apaccam putto etissa ati jāta apaccā pasūtā ava pasūtikā kapaccayaḥ ittañca

original: 236. Dvayaṃ dūtiyaṃ. Yā pesīyate, sā dūtī, du gamane,ti, īmhi dūtī. Sañcārayati yathābhimatanti, ṇvu.

original: Tikaṃ dāsiyaṃ. Du kucchitaṃ asati bhakkhatīti dāsī, ī, dīyante tāyāti vā dāsī, dā dāne, so, ī ca. Ciṭa pesane, kammani ṇo, ī. Kuṭaṃ udakakumbhaṃ dhāretīti kuṭadhārikā, ṇvu.

original: Dvayaṃ subhāsubhanirūpiniyaṃ saṃvarikādimhi. Vara gatiyaṃ, kattari inī. Subhāsubhassa ikkhaṇaṃ nirūpanaṃ yassātthīti, i, sakatthe ko. Ime dve saddā tulyatthā.
analyzed: dvayam subha asubha nirūpiniyam saṃvarikā ādimhi subha asubhassa nirūpanam yassa atthi iti saka tthe kaḥ ime dve saddā tulya tthā

original: Yā sayaṃ khattiyajāti yassa kassaci bhariyā, sā khattiyānī, khattiyā ca. Khattiyassāpaccaṃ khattiyānī, āno, ī. Ṇamhi khattiyā.
analyzed: yā sayam khattiya jāti yassa kassaci bhariyā sā khattiyānī khattiyā ca khattiyassa apaccam khattiyānī

original: 237. Pajjaṃ aggisakkhipubbakatapāṇigahitāyaṃ bhariyāyaṃ, aññatra tūpacārā. Dārayante
analyzed: pajjam aggi sakkhi pubba kata pāṇi gahitāyam bhariyāyam aññatra tu upacārāḥ dārayante

original: yenāti dāro, dara vidāraṇe, akattari ca kārake saññāyaṃ ṇo. Jāyati putto yāyāti jāyā,
analyzed: yenāti dāraḥ vidāraṇe a kattari ca kārake saññāyam no jāyati puttaḥ yāyā ati jāyā

original: jana janane, yo, janissa jā ca, ā, jayatīti vā jāyā, ji jaye, yo, jissa jā, ā, jāyā.
analyzed: jana janane yaḥ janissa jā ca ā jayati iti vā jāyā ji jaye yaḥ jissa jā ā jāyā

original: Kala saṅkhyāne, atto. Gharaṃ netīti gharaṇī, ṇattaṃ. Bharitabbato bhariyā, bhara
analyzed: kala saṅkhyāne attaḥ gharam neti iti gharaṇī bharitabbataḥ bhariyā bhara

original: bharaṇe, yo. Piyāyitabbato piyā,pī tappanakantīsu, yo. Pajaṃ puttaṃ pāletīti pajāpati,

original: pā pālane,ti, āttaṃ, rassattañca. Dvinnaṃ pūraṇī dutiyā. Paṭhamo bhattā, bhariyā
analyzed: pā pālana iti dvinnam pūraṇī dutiyā paṭhamaḥ bhattā bhariyā

original: dutiyā. Sāmikassa pāde paricaratīti pādaparicārikā, ṇvu. Patinī, pāṇigahitā, sahadhamminītipi tassāyeva nāmāni.
analyzed: dutiyā sāmikassa pāde paricarati iti pāda paricārikā patinī pāṇi gahitā sahadhamminī iti pi tassā yeva nāmāni

original: 238. Tikaṃ sakhiyaṃ. Tesu tesu kiccesu saha khāyati pakāsatīti sakhī, sahapubbo khā
analyzed: tikam sakhiyam tesu tesu kiccesu saha khāyati pakāsati iti sakhī sahapubbaḥ khā

original: pakāsanakathanesu, ī. Ala bhūsane āpubbo, i. Vayasā tulyā vayasā, tulye saññāyaṃ
analyzed: pakāsana kathanesu ī ala bhūsane āpubbaḥ i vayasā tulyā vayasā tulye saññāyam

original: so pāṇini 4.4.91 sutte yapaccayo dissati.
analyzed: saḥ pāṇini sutte ya paccayaḥ dissati

original: Jarovuccati corassāmiko, tassāyaṃ jārī, ṇo, ī. Sāmikaṃ atikkamma aññatra caratīti, inī.
analyzed: jaro vuccati cora ssāmiko tassa ayam jārī sāmikam atikkamma aññatra carati iti

original: 239. Pume tūti liṅganto tusaddo na pubbaṃ bhajate. Ara gamane, tu, arassuttaṃ. Ratiyā jāyatīti rajo, tilopo. Puppha vikasane, pupphaṃ.
analyzed: pume tu iti liṅga antaḥ tu saddaḥ na pubbam bhajate ara gamane tu ratiyā jāyati iti rajaḥ ti lopaḥ puppha vikasane puppham

original: Tikaṃ rajassalāyaṃ. Utuyogāutunī, inī. Rajayogā rajassalā, salo. Pupphavantatāya pupphavatī. Thīdhamminī, avī, atteyī, malinī, utumatī, udakīiccādīnipi tassā nāmāni.
analyzed: tikam utuyogā utunī inī rajayogā rajassalā salo tassā nāmāni

original: Tikaṃ gabbhiniyaṃ. Garu alahuko gabbho kucchi etissāti garugabbhā. Āpanno patto gabbhaṭṭho satto etāyāti āpannasattā. Gabbhayogā gabbhinī.
analyzed: tikam gabbhiniyam garu alahukaḥ gabbhaḥ kucchi etissa ati garugabbhā āpannaḥ pattaḥ gabbhaṭṭhaḥ satto etāya ati āpannasattā gabbhayogā gabbhinī

original: Tikaṃ yena veṭhito gabbho kucchiyaṃ tiṭṭhati, tatrāsayeti khyāte. Gabbho āsayate
analyzed: tikam yena veṭhitaḥ gabbhaḥ kucchiyam tiṭṭhati tatra āsayā iti khyāte gabbhaḥ āsayate

original: tiṭṭhatyatrāti, ṇo. Jaraṃ etīti jalābu. U, rassa lo, yassa bo, jarāpubbo i gatiyaṃ.

original: Kalaṃ jarataṃ lātīti kalalo, kala saṅkhyāne vā, alo.
analyzed: kalam jaratam lāti iti kalalo kala saṅkhyāne vā alo

original: 240-241. Sattakaṃ bhattari. Dhū kampane, santāsaṃ dhunotīti dhavo, a. Saṃ etassatthīti
analyzed: sattakam bhattari dhū kampane santāsam dhunoti iti dhavaḥ a sam etassa atthi iti

original: sāmiko, āmipaccayo, sakatthe ko, ipaccayo vā, niggahītassa mo, assa ca dīgho, sāmiko.

analyzed: bhara bharaṇe bharatīti bhattā icchā ayam taḥ pakkama ādīhi n taḥ ca ati

original: ntattaṃ. Pā rakkhaṇe, ati, pati. Vara icchāyaṃ, a, varo. Pī tappanakantīsu, yo.
analyzed: rakkhaṇe ati pati vare icchāyam a varaḥ tappana kantīsu yo

original: Ratikāraṇattā patino upa upapati, samāse kate abhidhānato pubbanipāto, appadhānabhūto vā pati upapati. Jara vayohānimhi, jīyante anenāti jāro, dāro ca.
analyzed: rati kāraṇa ttā patinaḥ upa upapati samāse kate abhidhānataḥ pubbanipātaḥ appadhāna bhūtaḥ vā pati upapati vayaḥ hānimhi jīyante anena ati jāraḥ ca

original: Sattakaṃ putte. Narake na patantyanena jātenāti apaccaṃ, pata gatiyaṃ, yo, tyassa
analyzed: sattakam putte narake na patanti anena jātena ati apaccam pata gatiyam yaḥ tyassa

analyzed: caḥ na patati na vicchindati vaṃsaḥ etena ati vā apaccam putte dhītari ca nicca napuṃsaka uyam

original: Pū pavane. Punāti pitaro tenāti putto. “Chadādīhi tatraṇa”ti to. Pūretīti vā putto.
analyzed: pu pavane punāti pitaraḥ tena ati putto chada ādīhi to pūreti iti vā putto

original: Attato jāto atrajo, “attajo”tipi pāṭho. Suyateti suto. Su abhisave, suṇātīti vā suto,
analyzed: jātaḥ atrajaḥ attajaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ suyatā iti sutaḥ abhisave suṇāti iti vā sutaḥ

original: to, su savane. Tanumhā jāto tanujo, tanayo ca, yo, tanoti mudanti vā tanayo, ayo.
analyzed: to su savane tanumhā jātaḥ tanujaḥ tanayo ca yaḥ tanoti mudanti vā tanayaḥ

original: Sūyateti sūnu, kammani nu, sū pasave.
analyzed: sūyata iti sūnu kammani nu su pasave

original: Puttādayo sūnupariyantā dhītari vattamānā itthiyaṃ vattanti. Duhitā, dhītā ca sadā
analyzed: putta ādayaḥ sūnu pariyantāḥ dhītari vattamānāḥ itthiyam vattanti duhitā dhītā ca sadā

original: nāriyameva. Duha papūraṇe, rātu, ottābhāvo, ikārāgamo ca. Dhā dhāraṇe, rātu, āssī.
analyzed: duha papūraṇe rātu ca dhāḥ dhāraṇe rātu

original: Puttādayo ca te sāmaññeneva kuṇḍagolakādīnaṃ vācakā. Savaṇṇāyaṃ tu ūḍhāyaṃ sajāto
analyzed: putta ādayaḥ ca te sāmaññena iva kuṇḍa golaka ādīnam vācakā savaṇṇā ayam tu ūḍhā ayam sajātaḥ

analyzed: sayam janitaḥ sutaḥ orasaḥ nāma sajāta saddena kuṇḍaka golaka khatta ādi byavacchedaḥ jīvati

analyzed: amate jāra jaḥ kuṇḍo

original: Mate bhattari golako”ti amara 16.36.
analyzed: mate bhattari amara

original: “Māgadho suddakhattājo”ti abhidhānu 503 gāthā ca.
analyzed: māgadhaḥ gāthā ca

original: 242. Catukkaṃpatipatinīnaṃ yuge, “dārā pume bahutte ca, daṃ kalatre napuṃsake”ti
analyzed: yuge dārā pume ca dam kalatre napuṃsaka iti

analyzed: bhavitabbam idha pana kaccāyana matena udāhaṭā jāyā ca pati ca jāyā pati itarītara yoga dvandaḥ

analyzed: puṃsaka bhāvaḥ nassa ca pakati tatiyā pakati saṇḍaḥ tassa nāmāni tatiyā

analyzed: chakkam ñāti matte bandhuyā iva bandhavaḥ a ussāvaḥ bandhati iti bandhu u

original: Dvayaṃ sattapurisāvadhikesu nikaṭañātīsu. Lohitena sambandho sālohito, sambandhassa
analyzed: dvayam satta purisa avadhikesu nikaṭa ñātīsu lohitena sambandhaḥ sālohitaḥ sambandhassa

original: (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 16.33). Tikaṃ pitari. Tā pālane, to kattari. Janayatīti janako, ṇvu.
Pā rakkhaṇe, ritu, assittaṃ.
analyzed: pā rakkhaṇe ritu assittam

original: 244. Chakkaṃ mātari. Ama pūjāyaṃ, kammani mo, bo ca, ammā, ambā. Janayatīti jananī,
analyzed: chakkam mātari ama ca ammā ambā janayati iti jananī

original: yu, nadādi. Māna pūjāyaṃ, puttaṃ mānetīti mātā, rātu, pātīti vā mātā, pātissa mo.
analyzed: puttam māneti iti mātā rātu pāti iti vā mātā

original: Janetīti janetti,ti. Janetīti janikā, ṇvu, ittaṃ.
analyzed: janeti iti janeti iti janikā

original: Appadhānabhūtā mātā upamātā, kumāre dhāretīti dhāti. Dhā dhāraṇe,ti. Jāyāya bhariyāya

analyzed: bhātiko kaniṭṭho ca jeṭṭho ca sālaḥ nāma sassa attano esā sā bhariyā tassā bhātā

analyzed: sālaḥ jāyāya bhātari alo sara gati cintā hiṃsāsu vā no lattam sāla vitakke vā curādi

original: 245. Sāmino bhattu bhaginī nanandā nāma, na nandatīti nanandā, attābhāvo nassa vibhāsādhikārā. Nanda samiddhiyaṃ, bhūvādi.
analyzed: sāminaḥ bhattu bhaginī nanandā nāma na nandati iti nanandā attā bhāvaḥ vibhāsa adhikārā nanda bhū vādi

original: Dvayaṃ ayyikāyaṃ. Mātuyā mātā mātāmahī. Pitūnaṃ pitari ca mātari ca āmahaṃ yadādinā, nadādi. Araha pūjāyaṃ, ṇvu, rahassa yo, aya gatimhi vā, ṇvu, ayyikā.
analyzed: mātuyā mātā mātāmahī pitūnam pitari ca mātari ca yad ādinā nad ādi yad ādinā nad ādi araha gatimhi vā ṇvu ayyikā

original: Mātuyā bhātā mātulo nāma, mātuyā bhātā mātulo, mātu bhātari ulapaccayo. Assa mātulassa
analyzed: mātuyāḥ bhātā mātulaḥ nāma mātuyāḥ bhātā mātulaḥ mātu bhātari ula paccayaḥ assa mātulassa

original: pajāpati jāyā mātulānī nāma, mātulassa bhariyā mātulānī, mātulabhariyāyaṃ āno, nadādi,

original: atha vā mātulassa esā mātulānī, ī, assa āno.
analyzed: atha vā mātulassa esā mātulānī assa āno

original: 246. Jāyāpatīnaṃ dvinnaṃ jananī mātā sassu vuttā, sasa gatihiṃsāpānesu. Tappitā tesaṃ
analyzed: jāyā patīnam dvinnam jananī mātā sassu vuttā sasa gati hiṃsā pānesu tad pitā tesam

original: jāyāpatīnaṃ pitā pana sasuro nāma, sasadhātumhā uro. Bhaginiyā putto pana bhāgineyyo
analyzed: jāyā patīnam pitā pana sasuraḥ nāma bhaginiyā putto pana bhāgineyyaḥ

original: nāma, bhaginiyā apaccaṃ bhāgineyyo, ṇeyyo.
analyzed: nāma bhaginiyāḥ apaccam bhāgineyyaḥ ṇeyyaḥ

original: 247. Dvayaṃ sutassa, sutāya ca puttesu. Naha bandhane, ritu, nī naye vā. Puttassa
analyzed: dvayam sutassa sutāya ca puttesu naha bandhane nī naye vā puttassa

original: putto paputto, ttalopo, ussattañca. Sāmibhātā devaro nāma, atha vā sāmibhātā kaniṭṭho
analyzed: putto paputto sāmi bhātā devaraḥ nāma atha vā sāmi bhātā kaniṭṭhaḥ

original: sāmino bhātā devaro nāma. Jeṭṭho tu sasuro evoccate. Divu kīḷāyaṃ, aro.
analyzed: sāminaḥ bhātā devaraḥ nāma jeṭṭhaḥ tu sasuraḥ eva uccate

original: Dvayaṃ dhītupatimhi. Jana janane, ritu, assāttaṃ, nassa mādeso ca. Dvayaṃ pitupitari. Pituno pitā pitāmaho.
analyzed: dvayam dhītu patimhi jana janane nassa ma ādesaḥ ca dvayam pitu pitari pituno pitā pitāmahaḥ

original: 248. Husāntāni padena padena nāmāni. Mātuyā bhaginī mātucchā, ccho. Pituno bhaginī pitucchā, pitubhaginī pitucchā bhavetyattho.
analyzed: husa antāni padena padena nāmāni mātuyā bhaginī mātucchā ccho pitunaḥ bhaginī pitucchā pitu bhaginī pitucchā

original: Pitāmahasaddo na kevalaṃ janakapitarameva vadati, atha kho janakapitupitādayopīti
analyzed: pitāmaha saddaḥ na kevalam janaka pitaram eva vadati atha kho janaka pitu pitā ādayaḥ api iti

original: etthāpi “papitāmaho” iccudāhaṭo. Pituno ayyako payyako, tulopo. Su savane, ṇhā. Ṇisamhi
analyzed: ettha api pa pitāmahaḥ i t udāhaṭaḥ pitunaḥ ayyakaḥ payyakaḥ tu lopaḥ su savane ṇhā ṇi samhi

original: suṇisā. Samhi husā, hattaṃ. Sabbatra “itthiyamato āpaccayo”ti ā.
analyzed: su nisā samhi husā hattam sabbatra itthiyam atas ā paccayā uti ā

original: 249. Catukkaṃ ekodare bhātari. Samānodare ṭhito sodariyo, samānassa so. Samāno gabbho
analyzed: eka udare bhātari samāna udare ṭhitaḥ sodariyaḥ samānassa saḥ samānaḥ gabbho

original: sagabbho, tatra bhavo sagabbho, ṇo. Samānodare jāto sodaro. Samānodare jāto sahajo.
analyzed: sa gabbhaḥ tatra bhavaḥ sa gabbhaḥ samāna udare jātaḥ sodaro samāna udare jātaḥ sahajaḥ

original: Sahasaddo tulyavacano.
analyzed: saha saddaḥ tulya vacanaḥ

original: Mātāpitū te dve janā pitaro vuccante. Ubhinnampi janakabyappadesaniyatattā abhedavacanicchāyaṃ
analyzed: mātā pitū te dve janā pitaraḥ vuccante abheda vacanicchāyam

original: pituttamattheva. Nanvabhedā jāti, tassā cobhayatra sattādekattaṃ, na ca jātiyā liṅgasaṅkhyā
analyzed: nanu abhedā jāti tassā ca ubhayatra sattāt ekattam na ca jātiyāḥ liṅga saṅkhyā

original: bhavanti, adabbattā bahuvacanaṃ na siyāti? Nesa doso, na hi jātipadatthikassa na
analyzed: bhavanti a dabba ttā bahuvacanam na siyā iti na isa dosaḥ na hi jāti padatthikassa na

original: dabbaṃ, dabbapadatthikassa vā na jātīti. Kintubhayesaṃpyubhayapadattho ihātthaviseso.
analyzed: dabbam dabba padatthikassa vā na iti kintu ubhayesam pi ubhaya padatthaḥ iha attha visesaḥ

original: Jātipadatthikassa jāti padhānabhūtā dabbaṃ guṇabhūtaṃ, dabbapadatthikassa tu vipariyayo,
analyzed: jāti padatthikassa jāti padhāna bhūtā dabbam guṇa bhūtam dabba padatthikassa tu vipariyayaḥ

original: tatra jātivacanicchāyaṃ dabbe viya liṅgasaṅkhyā vattabbā, tassa ca bahuttā bahuvacanaṃ.
analyzed: tatra jāti vacani chāyam dabbe viya liṅga saṅkhyā vattabbā tassa ca bahuttā bahuvacanam

original: Pubbe viyābhedavacanicchāyaṃ putto ca dhītā ca puttā vuccante, jaññattañhi puttabyapadesaniyataṃ
analyzed: pubbe ca dhītā ca puttāḥ vuccante jaññattam hi putta byapadesa niyatam

original: dhītaripyatthi, vipariyaye tu na bhavatyanabhidhānato. Bhedavacanicchāyaṃ puttadhītaroti bhavati.

original: 263. Dvayaṃ gīvāya purobhāge. Gala adane, karaṇe a, gila gilane vā, gilati anenāti galo, issattaṃ. Kaṇa saddattho daṇḍako dhātu, ṭho, kaṇṭho, muddhajadutiyoyaṃ.

original: Tikaṃ ekatthaṃ. Gā sadde, īvo. Kaṃ sīsaṃ dharatīti kandharā. Siraṃ dharatīti sirodharā, siro dhiyyate assanti vā sirodharā, dhā gatinivattiyaṃ, aro.

analyzed: gīvā kambu gīvā kamba saṃvaraṇe u kambu

analyzed: vayaḥ hānimhi vā tu tam napuṃsakam

original: Dvayaṃ bāhumūle. Bāhūnaṃ bhujānaṃ mūlaṃ bāhumūlaṃ. Kaca bandhane, cho. Assa kacchassa adhobhāgaṭṭhānaṃ passaṃ vuccati, disa pekkhane, apaccayo, disassa passādeso.
analyzed: dvayam bāhumūle bāhūnam bhujānam mūlam bāhumūlam kaca bandhane chaḥ assa kacchassa adhobhāgaṭṭhānam passam vuccati disa pekkhane apaccayaḥ disassa passa ādeso

original: 265. Tikaṃ bāhumhi. Vahati anenāti vāhu, vāhu eva bāhu, ku ṇvādi 6. Bhuñjate anenāti

original: bhujo. Bhuja pālanajjhohāresu. Bāhu ca bhujo ceti dvando, ete dve dvīsu, itthiyaṃ
analyzed: bhujaḥ bhuja pālana jhohāresu bāhu ca bhujaḥ ca iti dvandaḥ ete dve dvīsu itthiyaṃ

original: Tikaṃ hatthe. Hasa hasane, tho. Hara haraṇe vā. Nakkhattepyayaṃ. Kara karaṇe, a. Paṇa byavahārathutīsu, i. Pā rakkhane vā, ṇi. Karo ca pāṇi ca karapāṇayo. Pañcasākho, sayopyatra.
analyzed: tikam hatthe hasa hasane tho hara haraṇe vā nakkhatte pi ayam kara karaṇe a paṇa byavahāra thutīsu rakkhane vā karo ca ca ca kara pāṇayo sayaḥ pi atra

original: Pakoṭṭhanto hatthagaṇṭhi maṇibandho nāma. Pakoṭṭho nāma āmaṇibandhaṃ kapparassa adhobhāgo. Maṇivikatiṃ bandhati etthāti maṇibandho. Kusa akkose, ṭho, pakoṭṭho.
analyzed: pakoṭṭhantaḥ hattha gaṇṭhi maṇibandhaḥ nāma pakoṭṭhaḥ nāma āmaṇibandham kapparassa adhobhāgaḥ maṇi vikatim bandhati ettha ati maṇibandho akkose pakoṭṭho

original: Dvayaṃ bhujamajjhagaṇṭhimhi. Kapu hiṃsāyaṃ, aro. Kupparotipi pāṭho, tadā assuttaṃ. Kapu hiṃsāyaṃ, oṇi, kapoṇi, itthiyaṃ. Kaphoṇīpyatra, tattha passa phattaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam bhuja majjha gaṇṭhimhi kapu hiṃsāyam aro kupparaḥ iti pāṭhaḥ tadā hiṃsāyam oṇi itthiyam tattha passa phattam

original: 266. Pāṇissa pāṇitalassa sambandhīnaṃ maṇibandhakaniṭṭhānaṃ dvinnaṃ antaraṃ bahiṭṭhānaṃ

original: Dvayaṃ aṅgulimatte. Karassa pāṇissa sākhā karasākhā. Agi gatyattho, aṅga gamanattho vā, uli. Itthiliṅgoyaṃ (nadādi) (ka.), aṅguli.

analyzed: tikam sappa koṭṭhe vitata kare tanaḥ ma lopaḥ ratanam maṇi buddha ādīsu

original: Dvayaṃ sampuṭañjalimhi. Karamayo puṭo karapuṭo, añja byattigatikantīsu, ali, añjali. Karapuṭo ca añjali ceti karapuṭañjalī.

analyzed: dvayam nakhe kare jāyati ruhati iti kara jaḥ na atthi kham indriyam ettha ati nakhaḥ saññā saddattā na attam avisaya ttā vā punabbhavaḥ kararuhaḥ nakharoti pi nakhassa nāmāni

original: Dvayaṃ puṭaṅgulikaretikhyāte muṭṭhimhi. Khaṭa icchāyaṃ, ṇvu, khada hiṃsāyaṃ vā, dassa ṭo. Mu bandhane,ti, tassa ṭho, dvittaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam puṭa ṅguli kara iti khyāte muṭṭhimhi khaṭe iccha ayam ṇvu khada hiṃsa ayam vā dassa ṭaḥ mu bandhana iti tassa ṭhaḥ

analyzed: porisam jalam porisaḥ hatthī porisī yaṭṭhi

original: 270. Dvayaṃ urasi. Usa dāhe, ro, salopo, ara gatimhi vā, assukāro. Hara haraṇe, yo,

original: vitthāre, tanoti icchanti thano, tassa tho, thana devasadde, thana coriye vā. Kuca
analyzed: vitthāre tanoti icchanti tassa tho thana devasadde thana coriye vā

original: saṅkocane, kuco. Payo khīraṃ dhāretīti payodharo. Kuco ca payodharo cāti dvando.

original: uko, nalopo, assūkāro, cūcukaṃ.
analyzed: u kaḥ na lopaḥ cūcukam

original: Dvayaṃ piṭṭhe kāyassa pacchābhāge. Piṭa saddasaṅghātesu, to. Itaratra ti, pisu secane vā.
analyzed: dvayam piṭṭhe kāyassa pacchābhāge sadda saṅghātesu itaratra secane vā

original: 271. Tikaṃ tanumajjhe. Majjhe bhavo majjho. Laga saṅge, a. Majjhe bhavaṃ majjhimaṃ.
analyzed: tikam tanu majjhe majjhe bhavaḥ majjhaḥ laga saṅge a majjhe bhavam majjhimam

original: Catukkaṃ udare. Kusa akkose, chi, sassa co. Gaha upādāne, ani, īmhi gahaṇī, gabbhaṃ

analyzed: gaṇhāti dhāreti iti vā gahaṇī gabbhāsaya saññitaḥ mātu kucchi ppadeso tejaḥ dhātumhi pana

original: jaṭhara tundāpyatra.
analyzed: jaṭhara tunda api atra

original: Kucchisambhave kucchiṭṭhe koṭṭho, anto cāti ime dve vattanti, kusa akkose, to, ṭho vā. Ama gamanattho, to.
analyzed: kucchisambhave kucchiṭṭhe koṭṭhaḥ antaḥ ca ati ime dve vattanti kusa akkose to ṭhaḥ vā ama gamanattho to

original: 272. Catukkaṃ kaṭiyaṃ. Hanadhātumhā yu, hassa dvittaṃ, hassa jo, hanassa gho ca,
analyzed: catukkam kaṭiyam hana dhātumhā yu hassa dvittam hassa jaḥ hanassa ghaḥ ca

original: jaghanaṃ. Nicchayena tamatīti nitambo, tamudhātumhā bo. Sū pasave, ṇi. Kaṭa vassāvaraṇesu,
analyzed: jaghanam nicchayena tamati iti nitambaḥ tamu dhātu mhā baḥ sū pasave ṇi kaṭa vassa āvaraṇesu

original: kaṭyate āvarīyate vatthādīhi kaṭi, i, ete dve nāriyaṃ. Ettha ca jaghanasaddena itthikaṭiyā
analyzed: kaṭyate āvarīyate vattha ādīhi ete dve nāriyam ettha ca jaghana saddena itthi kaṭiyā

original: aggabhāgo, nitambasaddena itthikaṭiyā pacchābhāgo, sesadvayena kaṭisāmaññaṃ vuttanti
analyzed: aggabhāgaḥ nitamba saddena itthi kaṭiyā pacchābhāgaḥ sesa dvayena kaṭi sāmaññam vuttanti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ, vuttañca “pacchā nitambo thīkaṭyā, jaghanaṃ tu puro bhave”ti amara 16.74.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam vuttam ca pacchā nitambaḥ thī kaṭyā jaghanam tu puras bhava iti

original: 273. Liṅgantaṃ liṅgasāmaññe. Aṅge sarīre jāyatīti aṅgajātaṃ, aṅgasaddo sarīravācako,
analyzed: liṅg antam liṅga sāmaññe aṅge sarīre jāyati iti aṅga jātam aṅga saddo sarīra vācako

original: aṅgametassatthīti katvā. Rahasi ṭhāne jātaṃ aṅgaṃ rahassaṅgaṃ, sattamiyālopo, issattaṃ,
analyzed: aṅgam etassa atthi iti katvā rahasi ṭhāne jātam aṅgam rahassaṅgam

original: sassa dvittañca. Vatthena guyhitabbanti vatthaguyhaṃ. Miha secane, karaṇe yu, mihati
analyzed: sassa dvittam ca vatthena guyhitabbanti vatthaguyham miha secane karaṇe mihati

original: retomuttāni yenāti mehanaṃ. Nipubbo miha secane, to, nimittaṃ. Uttamaṅgattā varaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: retaḥ muttāni yena ati mehanam secane nimittam uttama aṅga ttā

original: Vaja gatiyaṃ, assīkāro, paccayehi vinā jāyatīti vā bījaṃ, virahattajotako hyettha
analyzed: vaja gatiyam assīkāro paccayehi vinā jāyati iti vā bījam hi ettha

original: vikāro. Phala nipphattiyaṃ, phalati etena puttanti phalaṃ. Liṅgati “itthī, puriso”ti
analyzed: vikāro phala nipphattiyam phalati etena putta nti phalam liṅgati itthī puriso ti

original: vibhāgaṃ gacchati yenāti liṅgaṃ. Liṅga gamane, līnaṃ apākaṭaṃ aṅganti vā liṅgaṃ.
analyzed: vibhāgam gacchati yena ati liṅgam liṅga gamane līnam apākaṭam vā liṅgam

original: Etesu bījaphalasaddā aṇḍepi vattanti.
analyzed: etesu bīja phala saddāḥ aṇḍe pi vattanti

original: Dvayaṃ purisaliṅgapasibbake. Ama gamane, ḍo, aṇasaddattho vā, ḍo, aḍi aṇḍatthe vā,
analyzed: dvayam purisa liṅga pasibbake ama gamane ḍaḥ aṇa sadda atthaḥ vā ḍaḥ aṇḍa atthe vā

original: to. Kusa akkose, ṇo. Aṇḍasaddo cettha bījepi, aṇḍakosoti samuditampi kosassa nāmaṃ,
analyzed: taḥ kusa akkose ṇo aṇḍa saddo ca ittha bīje pi aṇḍakoso ti samuditam pi kosassa nāmam

original: “kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā”ti pārā. 13, 14 hi vuttaṃ, amarakosepi amarakose
analyzed: kukkuṭa chāpakassa iva aṇḍakosamhā iti pārā hi vuttam amarakose pi amarakose

original: 16.76 aṇḍakosoti samuditeneva nāmaṃ vuttaṃ. Ettha ca aṇḍassa bījassa koso aṇḍakosoti viggaho kātabbo.
analyzed: aṇḍakoso ti samuditena iva nāmam vuttam ettha ca aṇḍassa bījassa kosaḥ aṇḍakoso ti viggaho kātabbo

original: Dvayaṃ itthiyā aṅgajāte. Yu missane, adhikaraṇeni, yoni, itthiyaṃ pume cāyaṃ, itthī ca pumā ca itthipumaṃ, tasmiṃ. Bhajanti asminti bhagaṃ. Māramandira mārakūpā cātra.
analyzed: itthiyā aṅga jāte adhikaraṇeni itthiyam pume ca ayam itthī ca pumā ca tasmin bhajanti asmin ti māra mandira ca atra

original: 274-275. Tikaṃ itthipurisānaṃ sambhave. Sucissa paṭipakkho asuci, ikāranto, dvīsu,
analyzed: tikam itthi purisānam sambhave sucissa paṭipakkhaḥ a suci ikāra antaḥ dvīsu

original: sambhavaliṅgo vā. Saṃpubbā bhūdhātumhā a. Saka sāmatthiyaṃ, to, tassa ko, assuttaṃ, suca soke vā, ko.
analyzed: sambhava liṅgaḥ vā saṃ pubbā bhū dhātu mhā a saka sāmatthiyam to tassa ko soke vā ko

original: Dvayaṃ vaccamagge. Punanti anenāti pāyu. Pū pavane, u, ūssāyo, paya gamanattho vā, payati vaccamanenāti pāyu, karaṇe u, ayaṃ purise pulliṅge vattati. Guda kīḷāyaṃ, a. Apānaṃpyatra.
analyzed: dvayam vaccamagge punanti anena ati pāyu pavane u gamana atthaḥ vā payati vaccamanena ati pāyu karaṇe ayam purise pulliṅge vattati

original: Aṭṭhakaṃ vacce. Gūtha karīsossagge, gupa gopane vā, tho. Kira vikiraṇe, īso, karīsaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhakam vacce gūtha karīsa ussagge gupa gopane vā tho kira vikiraṇe īso karīsam

original: Vara varaṇasambhattīsu, co, gūthañca karīsañca vaccañceti dvando, tāni vikappena
analyzed: vara varaṇa sambhattīsu caḥ gūtham ca karīsam ca vaccam ca iti dvandaḥ tāni vikappena

original: pume vattanti, niccaṃ napuṃsake, pulliṅgattaṃ tesaṃ katthaciyeva, sabbatra napuṃsakattameva
analyzed: pume vattanti niccam napuṃsake pulliṅga ttam tesam katthaciya iva sabbatra napuṃsaka ttam eva

original: bahulantyattho. Mala calane, a, mala dhāraṇe vā. Saka sattiyaṃ, sassa cho. Uccārīyate
analyzed: mala calane a mala dhāraṇe vā uccārīyate

original: jahyateti uccāro, upubbo caradhātu cajane, ukkhipane ca vattati. Miha secane, lo,
analyzed: jahyateti uccāraḥ upubbaḥ cara dhātu cajane ukkhipane ca vattati miha secane lo

original: vaṇṇavipariyayo, ḷattañca. Avakarīyateti ukkāro, avassuttaṃ, kira vikkhipane. Samalaṃpyatra. Samu upasame, alo.
analyzed: vaṇṇa vipariyayoḥ ukkāraḥ avassuttam kira vikkhipane sam upasame

original: Dvayaṃ mutte. Su savane, savanaṃ sandanaṃ, curādi, ṇo. Muca mocane, to, mutta passāve
analyzed: dvayam mutte su savane savanam sandanam cur ādi ṇaḥ muca mocane taḥ mutta passāve

original: vā. Uccate kathīyate. Gomutte gavaṃ sambandhini mutte pūtimuttasaddo vattati. Ajja
analyzed: vā uccate kathīyate gomutte gavam sambandhini mutte pūtimutta saddaḥ vattati ajja

original: pavattampi hi taṃ duggandhabhāvena pūtimuttantveva vuccati, yathā “pūtikāyo”ti. Assādīnaṃ
analyzed: pavattam pi hi tam duggandha bhāvena pūti muttam tu eva vuccati yathā assa ādīnam

original: male chakaṇasaddo, saka sattiyaṃ, yu, sassa cho.
analyzed: male cha kaṇa saddaḥ saka sattiyam yu sassa chaḥ

original: 276. Nābhiyā adhobhāgo vatthi nāma, so dvīsu. Vatthi muttapuṭaṃ. “Muttāsayapuṭo vatthi”riti
analyzed: nābhiyāḥ adhobhāgaḥ vatthi nāma saḥ dvīsu vatthi muttapuṭam muttāsayapuṭaḥ vatthiḥ iti

original: cintāmaṇiṭīkā 16.73 ratanamālā. Vasati muttametthāti vatthi, vasa nivāse,ti, tassa
tho, tthipaccayena vā siddhaṃ. Ucchaṅgaṃ aṅkañca ime dve ubho saddā pume vattanti.
analyzed: tho tthi paccayena vā siddham ucchaṅgam aṅkam ca ime dve ubho saddā pume vattanti

original: Ussajjati etthāti ucchaṅgaṃ, saja saṅge, sassa cho, dvittaṃ. Aṅka gamanattho, a,
analyzed: ussajjati ettha ati ucchaṅgam saja saṅge sassa chaḥ dvi ttam aṅka gamana tthaḥ a

original: aṅko, atha vā aṅka lakkhaṇe, a, aṅko, “ucchaṅgacihanesva’ṅko”ti amarakose amara kose 23.4.
analyzed: aṅko atha vā aṅka lakkhaṇe a aṅko amarakose amara kose

original: Dvayaṃ jāṇūparibhāge. Ara gamane, u, assūkāro. Sanja saṅge, āsajjati vatthamatrāti satthi, thi. Ūru ca satthi ceti dvando, napuṃsakepi.
analyzed: dvayam gamane u sanja saṅge āsajjati satthi thi ūru ca satthi ca iti dvandaḥ napuṃsake pi

original: Tikaṃ jāṇumhi, ūruno pabbaṃ gaṇṭhi ūrupabbaṃ. Jana janane, ṇu. Dvitte jaṇṇu.
analyzed: tikam ūruno pabbam gaṇṭhi ūru pabbam jana janane ṇu dvitte jaṇṇu

original: 277. Dvayaṃ pādagaṇṭhimhi. Gupa rakkhaṇe pho, sakatthe ko. Pādassa gaṇṭhi pādagaṇṭhi. Ghuṭikāpyatra. Ghuṭa parivattane, ghuṭyate aneneti ghuṭikā, ṇvu.
analyzed: dvayam pāda gaṇṭhimhi gupa rakkhaṇe pho saka tthe ko pādassa gaṇṭhi pāda gaṇṭhi ghuṭikā api atra ghuṭa parivattane ghuṭyate anena iti ghuṭikā

original: Dvayaṃ pādassa pacchābhāge gopphakassādho bhāge. Pume tūti tvantaṃ liṅgapadaṃ. Pasa
analyzed: dvayam pādassa pacchābhāge gopphakassa adhas bhāge pume tu u ti tu antam liṅga padam

original: bādhanaphusanesu,ti, tassa ṇo, sassa ho, vaṇṇavipariyayo, ṇipaccayena vā siddhaṃ.
analyzed: bādhana phusanesu ti tassa ṇo sassa haḥ vaṇṇa vipariyayaḥ ṇi paccayena vā siddham

original: Sakāravaṇṇāgame vuddhiyañca pāsaṇhi. Elipyatra, ila gatiyaṃ,ti, talopo.
analyzed: sakāra vaṇṇa āgame ila gatiyam ti ta lopaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ pādagge. Pādassa aggaṃ pādaggaṃ. Pakaṭṭhaṃ padaṃ papadanti kammadhārayo. “Papado”tipi
analyzed: dvayam pādagge pādassa aggam pādaggam pakaṭṭham padam papadanti kammadhārayaḥ

original: pāṭho. Tikaṃ pāde. Pada gatimhi, ṇo, pajjateti pādo. Pajjate gacchatīti, a. Caramhā
analyzed: pāde pada gatimhi no pajjata iti pādaḥ pajjate gacchati iti a caramhā

original: karaṇe yu, caraṇaṃ, idaṃ pume vikappena, niccaṃ napuṃsake. Aṅghipyatra, ahi gatiyaṃ. I, hassa gho.
analyzed: karaṇe yu caraṇam idam pume vikappena niccam napuṃsake aṅghi pi atra ahi gatiyam i hassa ghaḥ

original: 278. Dvayaṃ hatthādyavayave. Aṅgi gatyattho, a. Avapubbo yu missane, a. Patīko, apaghanopyatra. Patipubbā imhā ko. Apapubbā hanimhā a, ghanādeso ca.
analyzed: dvayam hattha ādi avayave aṅgi gati atthaḥ a avapubbaḥ missane a patīkaḥ apaghanaḥ upi atra patipubbāḥ imhā kaḥ apapubbāḥ hanimhā a ghana ādesaḥ ca

original: Dvayaṃ passaṭṭhimhi. Pā rakkhaṇe, su, ḷikāravaṇṇāgamo, sakatthe ko, passa pho. Aḷāgame phāsukā. “Pāsuḷikā, pāsukā”tipi pāṭho. Phusa samphassetipi dhātu, tadā upaccayādi.
analyzed: dvayam passa ṭṭhimhi pā rakkhaṇe su ḷi kāra vaṇṇa āgamaḥ saka atthe kaḥ passa phaḥ aḷ āgame phāsukā pāsuḷikā pāsukā atipi pāṭhaḥ phusa samphassa itipi dhātu tadā upaccaya ādi

original: Dvayaṃ aṭṭhimatte. Asu khepane, i, sassa ṭṭho, aṭṭhi, idaṃ paṇḍake napuṃsake vattati.
analyzed: dvayam aṭṭhi matte khepane i sassa ṭṭhaḥ aṭṭhi idam paṇḍake napuṃsake vattati

original: Dhā dhāraṇe, tu, itthī. Kīkasaṃ, kullaṃpyatra. Galassa kaṇṭhassa heṭṭhimante jātamaṭṭhi
analyzed: dhā dhāraṇe tu itthī kīkasam galassa kaṇṭhassa heṭṭhimante jātam aṭṭhi

original: galantaṭṭhi. Aka gamane, kho, sakatthe ko.
analyzed: galanta ṭṭhi aka gamane khaḥ saka tthe kaḥ

original: 279-280. Dvayaṃ sirasoṭṭhikhaṇḍe. Samudite tu karoṭi, itthī amara 16.69. Kapu sāmatthiye,
analyzed: dvayam sirasoṭṭhi khaṇḍe samudite tu karoṭi itthī amara kapu sāmatthiye

original: aro, kaṃ sīsaṃ pāletīti vā kapparo, rasso, lassa rattañca. Kaṃ pālayatīti, kammādimhi
analyzed: araḥ kam sīsam pāleti iti vā kapparaḥ rassaḥ lassa rattam ca kam pālayati iti kamma ādimhi

original: ṇo. “Siroṭṭhimhi kapālo’thī, ghaṭādisakalepice”ti ruddo cintāmaṇiṭīkā 16.68. Kapālo
analyzed: ṇo sirā uṭṭhimhi kapāla othī ghaṭa ādi sakale pi ca iti ruddo cintāmaṇiṭīkā kapālaḥ

original: athīti anitthīti attho chedo. Kapālasaddo vikappena pulliṅgo. Kaḍi chede, aro. Mahatī
analyzed: athi iti anitthi iti atthaḥ chedaḥ kapāla saddaḥ vikappena pulliṅgaḥ chede araḥ mahatī

original: sirā mahāsirā, sirāti ca. Si bandhane, ro.
analyzed: sirā mahāsirā sirā ati ca si bandhane ro

original: Tikaṃ susiravatyaṃ vāyuvahantasirāyaṃ. Tividhā hi kāyasirā ekā vāyuvahā, aparā suttamivāṭṭhibandhinī,
analyzed: tikam susiravatyam tividhā hi kāya sirā ekā vāyu vahā aparā

original: aññā āhāravāhinī antakhyā. Tatra tatiyena paṭhamā, paṭhamadutiyehi dutiyā ca dīpitā,
analyzed: aññā āhāra vāhinī anta khyā tatra tatiyena paṭhamā paṭhama dutiyehi dutiyā ca dīpitā

original: tatiyā pana parato vakkhati. Naha bandhane, aru. Si bandhane, ro. Dhama sadde, yu.
analyzed: tatiyā pana paratas vakkhati naha bandhane aru si bandhane ro dhama sadde yu

original: Nadādi, ani vā, dhamanī.
analyzed: nad ādi ani vā dhamanī

original: Tatiyaṃ dassetumāha “rasaggasā”tyādi. Rasaṃ gasatīti rasaggasā, gasa adane. Rasaṃ harati netīti rasaharaṇī, yu, nadādi.
analyzed: tatiyam dassetum āha rasaggasā atyādi rasam gasati iti rasaggasā adane rasam harati na iti iti rasaharaṇī nad ādi

original: Tikaṃ maṃse. Mana ñāṇe, so. Misa sadde, āpubbo āmasane vā. Pisa avayave, to. Palalaṃ, kabbaṃpyatra.
analyzed: tikam maṃse mana ñāṇe saḥ misa sadde āpubbaḥ āmasane vā pisa avayave to palalam

original: Dvayaṃ ātapādinā sukkhamaṃse. Tiliṅgakantūti tvantaṃ liṅgapadaṃ. Vala, valla saṃvaraṇe, ūro, itthiyaṃ “itthiyamato āpaccayo”ti ā, vallūrā. Uddhaṃ tattaṃ uttattaṃ. Tapa santāpe, to.
analyzed: dvayam ātapa ādinā sukkha maṃse tiliṅga kantu iti tva antam liṅga padam vala valla saṃvaraṇe ūro itthiyam itthiyam atas ā paccayo ti ā vallūrāḥ uddham tattam uttattam tapa santāpe to

original: 281. Catukkaṃ lohite. Ruha janane, to, ito vā. Runjhate cammenāti rudhiraṃ, iro. Soṇa vaṇṇe, to. Rañja rāge, to. Asaṃ, khatajaṃpyatra khatā jāyate (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 16.64).
analyzed: lohite janane to itas vā runjhate cammena ati rudhiram soṇa vaṇṇe to rañja rāge asam khatajaṃpi atra khatā jāyate cintāmaṇiṭīkā

original: Tikaṃ kheḷe. Lā ādāne, alo, itthiyamā, lala icchāyaṃ vā, itthiyamā. Khela gatiyaṃ,
analyzed: tikam kheḷe lā ādāne itthiyamā lalaḥ icchāyam vā itthiyamā

original: a. Khala calane, sañcaye vā, ṇo, ḷattaṃ, khaṃ vā ākāsaṃ ilatīti kheḷo. Ila gatiyaṃ,
analyzed: a khala calane sañcaye vā ṇo ḷattam kham vā ākāsam ilati iti kheḍaḥ ila gatiyam

original: kammani ṇo, ila gatimhi vā, a, isse.
analyzed: kammani ṇo ila gatimhi vā a isse

original: Dvayaṃ pitte. Mā parimāṇe, dhu. Mada ummāde vā, ṇu, dassa dho. Māyūti pāṭhe maya
analyzed: dvayam pitte mā parimāṇe madaḥ ummāde vā pāṭhe maya

original: gatiyaṃ, ṇu. Mādhumāyusaddā dve purise pulliṅge. Apidadhātīti pittaṃ. Apipubbo dhā
analyzed: gatiyam ṇu mādhumāyu saddā dve purise put liṅge apidadhāti iti pittam

original: pidhāne, to, alopo, bhujādi, pittaṃ, napuṃsake.
analyzed: pidhāne taḥ a lopaḥ bhuja ādi pittam napuṃsake

original: Dvayaṃ semhe. Silisa silesane, curādi, silisyate atreti semho, mana, lisassa ho,
analyzed: dvayam semhe silisa silesane curādi silisyate atra iti semhaḥ ho

original: vaṇṇavipariyayo. Itaratra umo, silesumo. Kaphopyatra, kena toyena phāti vuddhi yassa kapho, nerutto.
analyzed: vaṇṇa vipariyayo itaratra umaḥ silesumaḥ kaphaḥ upi atra kena toyena yassa kaphaḥ

original: 282-283. Vilīno vibhūto sneho vasātyuccate, vasa nivāse, ā. Dvayaṃ avilīnasnehe.
analyzed: vilīnaḥ snehaḥ vasa ati uccate vasa nivāse ā dvayam a vilīna snehe

original: Mida snehane, ṇo. Vapa bījasantāne, a, vapā. “Vapā vivaramedesū”ti nānatthasaṅgahe,
analyzed: snehane ṇo vapa bīja santāne a vapa vivara medesu uti nānattha saṅgahe

original: amarakose pana medādīnamekatthatā dīpitā, vuttañhi tattha “medo tu vapā vasā”ti amara 16.64.
analyzed: amarakose pana meda ādīnam ekattha tā dīpitā vuttam hi tattha medaḥ tu vapā

original: Tikaṃ candanasuvaṇṇādyalaṅkārakatasarīrasobhāyaṃ. Kapu sāmatthiye, ākappanaṃ ākappo,
analyzed: tikam candana suvaṇṇa ādi alaṅkārakata sarīra sobhāyam kapu sāmatthiye ākappanam ākappaḥ

original: ṇo. “Nepacche gehamatte ca, veso vesyāgahepi vessagahepi (ka.) ce”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā
analyzed: ṇaḥ nepacche geha matte ca vesaḥ vessagahe pi ka ca iti cintāmaṇi ṭīkā

original: 16.99 rabhaso. Vasa kantiyaṃ, visi byāpane vā, ṇo. Nissesato pathanaṃ pakhyānaṃ nepacchaṃ,
analyzed: rabhasaḥ vasa kantiyam visi byāpane vā naḥ nissesataḥ pathanam pakhyānam nepaccham

original: patha pakhyāne ghyaṇa. Paṭikammaṃ, pasādhanaṃpyatra.
analyzed: patha pakhyāne paṭikammam

original: Chakkaṃ hārādyābharaṇe. Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ, karaṇe yu. Sādha saṃsiddhiyaṃ, yu, sāṭha saṅkhāragatīsu
analyzed: hāra ādi ābharaṇe karaṇe sādha saṅkhāragatīsu

original: vā, pasāṭhanaṃ, muddhajadutiyotra. Bhūsa alaṅkāre, karaṇeyeva yu. Ābhariyyate tanti
analyzed: vā alaṅkāre alaṅkāre

original: ābharaṇaṃ, bhara bharaṇe, kammani yu. Alaṃ vibhūsanaṃ kariyyateneneti alaṅkāro, ṇo.

original: Piḷandha bhūsane, karaṇe yu. Parikkhāropyatra parikaropyatra (ka.).

original: Dvayaṃ makuṭe. Kira vikiraṇe, īṭo. Maki maṇḍane, uṭo. Mukuṭotipi pāṭho, ete dve anitthī.

analyzed: tantakam ca navambara iti amara

original: cintāmaṇiṭīkā 16.114 rabhaso. Dā chedane, kammani so, rasso.
Uttamaṅgamhi sīse yo kañcuko suvaṇṇādimayo, so “nāḷipatto”ti kathito. Nāḷipatto taṃsaṇṭhāno suvaṇṇādipaṭo nāḷipatto. Sīsakaṃ, siriyaṃ, sirohantipi tassa nāmāni.
analyzed: uttamaṅgamhi sīse yaḥ kañcukaḥ suvaṇṇa ādi mayaḥ so nāḷipatto ti kathitaḥ nāḷipatto tad saṇṭhānaḥ suvaṇṇa ādi paṭaḥ nāḷipatto sīsakam siriyam tassa nāmāni

original: 295. Tikaṃ dīghatte. Āpubbo yamu uparame, ṇo. Ā bhuso yāti gacchatīti vā āyāmo, yā gatipāpuṇesu, mo. Dīghassa bhāvo dīghatā. Ruha janane, ṇo.
analyzed: tikam dīghatte ā pubbaḥ uparame ṇaḥ ā bhusaḥ yāti gacchati iti vā āyāmaḥ gati pāpuṇesu maḥ dīghassa bhāvaḥ dīgha tā ruha janane ṇaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ vitthāre. Vatthavisaye “osāro”ti rūḷhe. Samantato nayhatīti pariṇāho, naha bandhane, ṇo. Vitthārena saraṇaṃ visāro, so eva visālatā.
analyzed: dvayam vitthāre vattha visaye rūḍhe samantataḥ pariṇāhaḥ bandhane no vitthārena saraṇam visāraḥ saḥ eva visāla tā

original: 296. Catukkaṃ cīvare. Arahataṃ dhajo arahaddhajo, rūḷhiyā tadaññacīvaresu. Kasāyena,
analyzed: catukkam cīvare arahatam dhajaḥ arahat dhajaḥ rūḷhiyā tad añña cīvaresu kasāyena

original: kasāvena ca rattaṃ kāsāyaṃ, kāsāvañca, samānaliṅgattā dvando. Ci caye, īvaro. Vatthakhandhehi cīyateti cīvaraṃ.
analyzed: kasāvena ca rattam kāsāyam kāsāvam ca samāna liṅga ttā dvandaḥ ci caye īvaraḥ vattha khandhehi cīyate iti cīvaram

original: Maṇḍalādayo tadaṅgāni samūhabhūtassa cīvarassa avayavāni. Maḍi bhūsāyaṃ, alo, maṇḍalaṃ.
analyzed: maṇḍala ādayaḥ tad aṅgāni samūha bhūtassa cīvarassa avayavāni maḍi bhūsāyam alaḥ maṇḍalam

analyzed: cīvara pariyantaḥ yam mahā pathaviyā cakkavāḷa pabbataḥ viya cīvarassa samantataḥ tiṭṭhati

analyzed: vivaṭṭaḥ nāma cīvara majjha gata maggo so hi visum visum vaṭṭati iti vivaṭṭaḥ iti vuccati

original: 297. Phalādīnaṃ yāni cattāri santi, etā vatthassa yoniyo kāraṇāni tato taduppattito.

original: phālā celī, phālaṃ vatthaṃ. Khomādayo pana paṭā tacabbhavā tacato sañjātā.

original: 298. Koseyyaṃ vatthaṃ kimijaṃ nāma. Migalomamayantu kambalaṃ. Dvayaṃ byavadhāyakapaṭe,
analyzed: koseyyam vattham kimijam nāma kambalam dvayam byavadhāyaka paṭe

original: kaṇḍapaṭepīti keci. Samānatthā ete dve tulyatthātyattho. Ju gatiyaṃ, bhūvādi, ju

original: bandhane vā, yu, anakādeso, sā itthī. Tiro karīyati pidhīyati yāya, sā tirokaraṇī,

original: yu. Patisīrāpyatra. Patipubbo si bandhane, ro.

original: 299. Dvayaṃ uparibandhapaṭe, athasaddotra liṅgādijotako. Uddhaṃ locate bandhīyateti

original: ullocaṃ, luca dassane. Candātape vitanyateti vitānaṃ, tanu vitthāre, ṇo, curādi.

original: Dvayampi punnapuṃsakanti īritaṃ kathitaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam pi punnapuṃsakam iti īritam kathitam

original: Dvayaṃ sināne. Naha soce, karaṇe yu, sinā soce, karaṇe yu, “sināne”ti sattamyantaṃ

vatu vattane, bhūvādi. Majja suddhiyaṃ, yu. Samanti dvayamidaṃ samānatthaṃ.

original: 300. Tikaṃ nalāṭakate cittake. Tilakākati tilako. Cittakākati cittakaṃ. Cakārena
analyzed: tikam cittake cittakam cakārena

original: tamālapattākati tamālapattaṃ. Sāmaññena visesakaṃ, ubho visesakatilakā anitthī, sesadvayaṃ

original: Tikaṃ candane, cadi hilādane, hilādanaṃ sukhāpanaṃ, yu. Gandhānaṃ sāro uttamo gandhasāro,
analyzed: tikam candane cadi hilādane hilādanam sukhāpanam gandhānam sāraḥ uttamaḥ gandha sāraḥ

original: 301. Tikaṃ pītacandane. “Gosīsa”iti pabbate malaye dese jātaṃ gosīsaṃ, go viya jalaṃ
analyzed: tikam pītacandane pabbate malaye dese jātam go sīsam go viya jalam

original: Gosīsādayo tayo pume, napuṃsake ca vattanti.
analyzed: go sīsa ādayo tayo pume napuṃsake ca vattanti

analyzed: ratta candana sadisassa ratta sārassa ekassa candanassa nāmāni

analyzed: dvayam vaṇija ādīnam rūḍhe pīta kaṭṭhe kāḷa vaṇṇam anusarati sīlena ati

original: Tikaṃ agarusāmaññe. Lū chedane, ho. Lahunāmattā agaru. Rassa latte agalu, dvayaṃ pume. Vaṃsikaṃ, rājārahaṃ, kimijaṃ, joṅgakaṃpyatra.

analyzed: asmin agarumhi kāḷe sati mallikā puppha gandhi agaru pana maṅgalyā uccate

original: Dvayaṃ sallakīdave. Turukkho vutto. Piḍi saṅghāte, ṇvu. Sihalo, yāvaṇopyatra.

original: 303. Dvayaṃ miganābhiyaṃ. Kattha silāghāyaṃ, ūro, nadādi, sakatthe ko. Migassa mado migamado, migo marati yenāti vā migamaro, so eva migamado.

original: Dvayaṃ kuṭṭhe. Kuṭa chedane, ṭho, to vā, “kuṭādīhi ṭho”ti ṭho, kuṭṭhaṃ, rogabhedepi.
analyzed: dvayam kuṭṭhe kuṭa chedane vā kuṭa ādīhi kuṭṭham roga bhede pi

original: uppalaṃ, vāppaṃpyatra.
analyzed: uppalam vā appam pi atra

original: Dvayaṃ piḍaṅge. Rogaṃ lunanto aṅgati gacchatīti lavaṅgo. Devānaṃ kusumaṃ pupphaṃ devakusumaṃ. Sirisaññaṃpyatra.

original: 304. Dvayaṃ dhunake. Yakkhehi kato dhūpo yakkhadhūpo, yakkho devo. Sajjarukkhassa
analyzed: dvayam dhunake yakkhehi kataḥ dhūpaḥ yakkha dhūpaḥ yakkhaḥ devaḥ sajja rukkhassa

analyzed: pāṭhaḥ rālaḥ sabbarasaḥ bahurūpaḥ api atra

original: Tikaṃ takkole. Takka vitakke, olo. Kula saṅkhyāne, ṇvu. Kosayuttaṃ phalametassāti

original: 305. Pajjaddhaṃ kappūre, ghano hutvā saratīti ghanasāro. Abbhamiva sitaṃ sitabbho, abhidhānato pubbanipāto, kappa sāmatthiye, ūro. Candasañño, himavāluko, himāvhayopyatra.

original: Pajjaddhaṃ lākhāyaṃ, ā bhuso rattaṃ karotīti alattako, lattaṃ, kvi. Yu missane, ṇvu. Lākha sosane, a, lā ādāne vā, kho. Jana janane, tu, nalopo. Dumāmayopyatra.
analyzed: ā bhusaḥ rattam karoti iti alattakaḥ lattam kvi yu missane ṇvu lākha sosane a ādāne vā khaḥ jana janane tu na lopaḥ

analyzed: dvayam sarala ddave siriyā lakkhiyā āvāso sirivāso sarala nāmakassa rukkhassa

original: yu. Kajja byasane. Kajjati roganti kajjalaṃ, alo.

analyzed: pāṭhaḥ dīghattam sekharaḥ ca āveḷā ca ati dvandaḥ alaṅkatam mālyam muddha mālyam

original: tasmiṃ. Avapubbo tasi alaṅkāre, uddhaṃ tasīyateti avataṃso, so eva vaṭaṃsako, sakatthe
analyzed: tasmin alaṅkāre alaṅkāre avataṃsaḥ saḥ eva vaṭaṃsakaḥ saka tthe

original: ko, tassa ṭo, anekatthattā upasagganipātānaṃ uddhaṃbhāvajotako cettha avasaddoti tathottaṃ.
analyzed: kaḥ tassa ṭaḥ aneka attha ttā upasagga nipātānam ca ittha ava saddaḥ ti tathā uttam

original: Tikaṃ seyyāyaṃ. Sayantyassaṃ seyyā, yo. Sayantyatreti sayanaṃ, senañca. Ubhayatrapi adhikaraṇe yu, isse, e aya, itaratra ettaṃ, “vā paro asarūpā”ti alopo ca, sayanīpyatra.
analyzed: tikam seyyāyam sayantyassam seyyā sayantyatra iti sayanam senam ca ubhayatra api adhikaraṇe itaratra vā paraḥ ca sayanīpi atra

original: Dvayaṃ mañce. Paripubbo aki lakkhaṇe, ṇo, ilopo, rassa lattaṃ. Maci dhāraṇocchāyapūjanesu,
analyzed: dvayam mañce pari pubbaḥ a ki lakkhaṇe ṇo i lopaḥ rassa lattam ma ci dhāraṇa ucchāya pūjanesu

original: bhūvādi a, sakatthe ko. Khaṭāpyatra, khaṭyate ākaṅkhate sayanatthikehīti khaṭā, khaṭa ākaṅkhāyaṃ.
analyzed: bhū ādi a sa katthe kaḥ khaṭā api atra khaṭyate ākaṅkhate sayanatthikehi iti khaṭā khaṭaḥ ākaṅkha ayam

original: 309. Dvayaṃ mañcādhāre. Mañcassa ādhāro mañcādhāro. Paṭipajjati pavattati seyyā yena,
analyzed: dvayam mañca ādhāre mañcassa ādhāraḥ mañca ādhāro paṭipajjati pavattati seyyā yena

original: so paṭipādo. Mañcaṅge mañcāvayave aṭanisaddo itthiyaṃ, aṭa gamanattho, ani, yu vā, nadādi, rasso.
analyzed: saḥ paṭipādaḥ mañcaṅge mañca avayave aṭa ni saddaḥ itthiyam aṭa gamana atthaḥ ani vā nada ādi rassaḥ

original: 310. Kuḷīrapādādayo ime cattāro mañcantarā mañcabhedā siyuṃ. Tattha kuḷīro kakkaṭako
analyzed: kuḷīrapāda ādayaḥ ime cattāro mañcantarāḥ mañca bhedāḥ siyum tattha kuḷīro kakkaṭako

original: tassa saṇṭhānapādattā kuḷīrapādo. Aṭaniyaṃ āhacco, āhacca vā pādo tiṭṭhati yassāti
analyzed: tassa saṇṭhāna pādattā kuḷīra pādaḥ aṭaniyam āhaccaḥ āhacca vā pādo tiṭṭhati yassa ati

original: āhaccapādo, pubbapakkhe “riccā”ti yogavibhāgena riccapaccayanto āhaccasaddo, parapakkhe
analyzed: āhacca pādaḥ pubba pakkhe ricca ati yogavibhāgena ricca paccaya ntaḥ āhacca saddaḥ para pakkhe

original: tu tvāpaccayanto, yassa aṭanichidde pādo pavisitvā tiṭṭhati, so āhaccapādo. Masa
analyzed: tu yassa aṭanichidde pādo pavisitvā tiṭṭhati saḥ āhacca pādaḥ

original: āmasane, āro, sakatthe ko. Yassa pādacchidde aṭani pavisitvā tiṭṭhati, so masārako.
analyzed: ā masane āraḥ saka atthe kaḥ yassa pāda chidde aṭani pavisitvā tiṭṭhati saḥ masārako

original: Bundena pādena saha ekābaddhā aṭani yassa so bundikābaddho, ekārassittaṃ. Ettha ca
analyzed: bundena pādena saha eka ābaddhā aṭani yassa saḥ bundikā baddhaḥ ettha ca

original: majjhe dvinnaṃ mañcānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ vipariyayenāpi vadanti.
analyzed: majjhe dvinnam mañcānam lakkhaṇam vipariyayena api vadanti

original: 311. Dvayaṃ sīsādhāre. Visesena sīsaṃ vahatīti bibbohanaṃ, yu, battaṃ, assottañca. Upadhīyate sīsāsanaṃ karīyateti upadhānaṃ, yu, dhā dhāraṇe.
analyzed: dvayam sīsa ādhāre visesena sīsam vahati iti upadhīyate sīsa āsanam upadhānam dhāraṇe

original: Tikaṃ sāmaññapīṭhe. Pīṭha hiṃsāsaṃkilesesu, bhūvādi, ṇvu, ā. Yadādinā ke paccaye
analyzed: tikam sāmañña pīṭhe pīṭha hiṃsā saṃkilesesu bhū vā ādi ṇvu ā yad ādinā ke paccaye

original: itthikatākāre pare pubbo akāro ikāramāpajjate, “ke”ti kiṃ? Cetanā. “Paccaye”ti kiṃ?
analyzed: itthikatā ākāre pare pubbaḥ akāraḥ ikāram āpajjate kā iti kim cetanā paccayā iti kim

original: Bakā. “Itthī”ti kiṃ? Pācakā. “Kata”iti kiṃ? Vuttakammā, kammapaccayoyaṃ, tapaccaye
analyzed: bakā itthī iti kim pācakā kata eti kim vutta kammā kamma paccayaḥ yam ta paccaye

original: pīṭhaṃ moggallāna 4.142 suttampi passitabbaṃ. Āsate asminti āsanaṃ.
analyzed: pīṭham moggallāna suttam pi passitabbam āsate asmin ti āsanam

original: Dvayaṃ uttamārahapīṭhe. Kuca saṃpaccanakoṭilyapatithambhavilekhanesu, cho. Bhaddaṃ
analyzed: dvayam uttama āraha pīṭhe cho bhaddam

original: kalyāṇaṃ pīṭhaṃ bhaddapīṭhaṃ. Gajadantādimayakesamajjaniyampi dvayamidamāhu. Tadā
analyzed: kalyāṇam pīṭham bhaddapīṭham dvayam idam āhu tadā

original: pasādhanī, kaṅkatikāpyatra. Pīṭhantare dīghapīṭhe āsandī matā. Sada visaraṇagatyāvasānesu,
analyzed: kaṅkatikā api atra pīṭha antare dīgha pīṭhe āsandī matā visaraṇa gatya avasānesu

original: nadādi, bindāgamo ca.
analyzed: nad ādi binda āgamaḥ ca

original: 312. Āyāmavitthāravasena mahanto āsanappabhedo “kojavo”ti mato, kuju theyyakaraṇe,
analyzed: āyāma vitthāra vasena mahantaḥ āsana ppabhedo kojavaḥ ti mataḥ theyya karaṇe

original: ṇo, kuyaṃ pathaviyaṃ javatīti vā kojavo, ju gatiyaṃ. Dīghena lomena yutto āsanappabhedo
analyzed: ṇo kuyam pathaviyam javati iti vā kojavaḥ gatiyam dīghena lomena yuttaḥ āsana ppabhedaḥ

original: “gonako”ti mato, gu sadde, yu, sakatthe ko, ussottaṃ.
analyzed: gonaka iti mataḥ gu sadde yu sa katthe kaḥ ussottam

original: Dvayaṃ attharaṇe. Migalomapuṇṇatāya jātaṃ uṇṇāmayaṃ. Thara santharaṇe, pādipubbova, na kadācipi pādirahito, ā bhuso tharīyateti attharaṇaṃ, yu.
analyzed: dvayam attharaṇe miga loma puṇṇa tāya jātam uṇṇāmayam santharaṇe na kadāci pi pādi rahitaḥ ā bhusaḥ tharīyate iti attharaṇam yu

original: Dvayaṃ saṃsibbanacittake. Cittarūpamassatthīti cittakaṃ. Bāhulyena na ikārāgamo. Vānena saṃsibbanena sañjātaṃ cittarūpamassāti vānacittakaṃ, sakatthe ko.
analyzed: dvayam saṃsibbana cittake citta rūpam assatthi iti cittakam bāhulyena na ikāra āgamaḥ vānena saṃsibbanena sañjātam citta rūpam assa ati vānacittakam sakatthe ko

original: 313. Dvayaṃ nirantarapupphapaṭe. Ghanaṃ sandhibhūtaṃ puppharūpametthāti ghanapupphaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam nirantara puppha paṭe ghanam sandhi bhūtam puppha rūpam etthā iti ghanapuppham

original: Paṭalametissātthīti paṭalikā, iko. Dvayaṃ bahumudulome setavatthe. Si sevāyaṃ, sivatthikehi
analyzed: paṭalikāḥ i kaḥ dvayam bahu mudu lome setavatthe si seva ayam

original: sevīyateti seto, to. Paṭa gamane, ṇvu, paṭikā, addhendupāsāṇepi.
analyzed: sevīyate iti to paṭa gamane paṭikā addhā indu pāsāṇe pi

original: Dvīsupi pariyantesu yassā dasā santi, sā uddalomī, uditaṃ dvīsu lomaṃ dasā yassā
analyzed: dvīsu pi pariyantesu yassā dasā santi sā uddalomī uditam dvīsu lomam dasā yassā

original: sā uddalomī, issattaṃ, dvittañca. Ekasmiṃ pariyanteyeva dasā yassā ekantalomī, ekasmiṃ
analyzed: sā ekasmin

original: ante pariyante lomaṃ dasā yassātthīti ekantalomī, uddalomī ca ekantalomī ceti uddalomiekantalomino,
analyzed: ante pariyante lomam dasā yassa atthi iti ekantalomī uddalomī ca ekantalomī ca iti uddalomi ekantalomino

original: “padānaṃ sandhi vatticchāto, na samāsantaragesū”ti vuttepi gāthābhāvato chandohānibhayā
analyzed: padānam sandhi vatti chātaḥ na samāsa antara gesu iti vutte pi gāthā bhāvataḥ chandohā nibhayā

original: visandhi. Yattha pana gāthāyampi agāthāyampi (?) visandhi “dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāya’ntiādimāhā”tyādīsu,
analyzed: visandhi yattha pana a gāthāyampi

original: tattha kathanti? “Na samāsantaraṅgesū”ti imassāniccattā tatthāpi na doso, “nena niddiṭṭhamanicca”nti
analyzed: tattha kathanti na samāsa antaraṅgesu iti imassa anicca ttā tattha api na dosaḥ nena niddiṭṭham aniccanti

original: hi paribhāsitaṃ naghaṭitaṃ aniccaṃ (paribhāsendusekhara 97).
analyzed: hi paribhāsitam na ghaṭitam aniccam paribhāsa indu sekhara

original: 314. Tadeva yathāvuttadvayameva soḷasannaṃ itthīnaṃ naccayoggaṃ naccassa yogyaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ
analyzed: tat eva yathāvutta dvayam eva itthīnam nacca yoggam naccassa yogya ṭṭhāna bhūtam

original: “kuttaka”mityuccate. Hi padapūraṇe. “Naccayogyamhī”tipi pāṭho, tadā bhāvasattamī.
analyzed: kuttakam iti uccate hi pada pūraṇe tadā bhāva sattamī

original: Karonti ettha naccanti kuttakaṃ, kara karaṇe, to, assu, bhujādi, sakatthe ko.
analyzed: karonti ettha naccanti kuttakam kara karaṇe to assu bhuja ādi sa katthe kaḥ

original: Sīhādirūpehi vicittarūpaṃ vatthaṃ, āsanaṃ vā vikatikā nāma bhave, ekasseva hi kattuno
analyzed: sīha ādi rūpehi vicitta rūpam vattham āsanam vā vikatikā nāma bhave ekassa iva hi kattunaḥ

original: pakativikatisaṅkhātāvatthāvasena dvittaṃ, vatticchāvasena liṅgasaṅkhyāvibhattibhedañca
analyzed: pakati vikati saṅkhāta avatthā vasena liṅga saṅkhyā vibhatti bhedaḥ ca

original: hoti, yathā – manussā yakkhabhattaṃ ahesuṃ, sattappakaraṇāni abhidhammo nāma bhavanti,
analyzed: hoti yathā manussāḥ yakkha bhattam ahesum satta ppakaraṇāni abhidhammaḥ nāma bhavanti

original: devadatto rajjaṃ pāpuṇātīti. Yatra hi pakatiyā vā vikatiyā vāti dvinnampi vuttatā
analyzed: devadattaḥ rajjam pāpuṇāti iti yatra hi vā vikatiyā vā ati dvinnam pi vutta tā

original: siyā, tatra vācako pakatiyāyeva saṅkhyaṃ gaṇhāti, netarassa tannissitabhāvenāppadhānato
analyzed: siyā tatra vācakaḥ pakatiyāya iva saṅkhyam gaṇhāti na itarassa tad nissita bhāvena appadhānataḥ

original: kaccāyanasāre 6-7 gāthāsu passitabbaṃ. Yadā pana pakatiyā sambandhādibhāvaṃ vattumicchati,
analyzed: icchati

original: tadā attanā vattabbassa aññatthassābhāvā vikatipyuccate vācakena, yathā – devadattassa
analyzed: tadā vattabbassa aññatthassa abhāvā vikatipī uccate vācakena yathā devadattassa

original: rajjaṃ pāpuṇāti, idha pana liṅgabhedeneva vuttaṃ “cittaṃ vikatikā bhave”ti. Vikarīyateti vikati.
analyzed: rajjam pāpuṇāti idha pana liṅga bhedena iva vuttam cittam vikatikā bhava iti vikarīyate iti vikati

original: 315. Kaṭṭissakoseyyasaṅkhātānaṃ dvinnamattharaṇānaṃ karaṇappakāraṃ dassetuṃ ariyāsāmaññamāha
analyzed: kaṭṭissa koseyya saṅkhātānam dvinnam mattharaṇānam karaṇa ppakāram dassetum ariya asāmaññam āha

original: “kaṭṭissa”miccādi. Kosiyakaṭṭissamayaṃ kosiyasuttakaṭṭissavākehi pakatamattharaṇaṃ
analyzed: kaṭṭissam iccādi kosiya kaṭṭissamayam kosiya sutta kaṭṭissavākehi pakatam attharaṇam

original: kaṭṭissaṃ nāma, virūpekasesavasena kosiyañca kaṭṭissañca kaṭṭissāni, tehi pakataṃ
analyzed: kaṭṭissam nāma virūpa ikasesa vasena kosiyam ca kaṭṭissañca kaṭṭissāni tehi pakatam

original: attharaṇaṃ kaṭṭissaṃ. Kosiyasuttena pakatantu attharaṇaṃ koseyyaṃ nāma. Ratanapatisibbitanti
analyzed: attharaṇam kaṭṭissam kosiya suttena pakatantu attharaṇam koseyyam nāma ratana pati sibbitanti

original: idaṃ dvinnampi visesanaṃ, attharaṇañca iti kamā kamato “bhave”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ.
analyzed: idam dvinnam pi visesanam attharaṇam ca iti kamā kamataḥ bhava iti ajjhāharitabbam

original: Attharaṇasaddassānuṇṇāmayesvapi pavattanato etthāpi “attharaṇa”nti vuttaṃ, yathā
analyzed: attharaṇa saddassa anuṇṇa āmayesu api pavattanataḥ ettha api attharaṇam ti vuttam yathā

original: – suttaṃ kammanti. Ettha ca cakāro pādantattā garūsu gaṇhitabbo, teneva hi sattapaññāsamattā
analyzed: suttam kammanti ettha ca cakāro garūsu gaṇhitabbo tena iva hi satta paññāsa mattā

original: paripuṇṇā honti, ariyāya hi paṭhamapāde dvādasamattā, tathā tatiye, dutiye aṭṭhārasa,
analyzed: paripuṇṇāḥ honti ariyāya hi paṭhama pāde dvādasa mattā tathā tatiye dutiye aṭṭhārasa

original: catutthe pannarasamattāti sampiṇḍitā sattapaññāsamattā honti.
analyzed: catutthe pannarasa mattā ati sampiṇḍitā satta paññāsa mattāḥ honti

original: 316. Tikaṃ dīpe. Dīpa dittiyaṃ, divādi. Dippatīti dīpo, ṇo. “Padīpo”ti aññapadanivattanatthaṃ upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ. Juti dittiyaṃ, bhūvādi, ṇo.
analyzed: tikam dīpe dīpa dittiyam divādi dippati iti dīpaḥ ṇo padīpo ti añña pada nivattana attham upasaggena padam vaḍḍhitam juti dittiyam bhūvādi ṇo

original: Dvayaṃ ādāse. “Pume tū”ti tvantaṃ liṅgapadaṃ. Ādissate asminti ādāso, ṇo, āpubbo disa pekkhane, issā. Dippati etthāti dappaṇo, yu, issattaṃ. Makuropyatra.
analyzed: dvayam ādāse pume tu iti tva antam liṅga padam ādissate asmin ti ādāsaḥ ṇaḥ āpubbaḥ disa pekkhane issā dippati ettha ati dappaṇaḥ yu issattam makuraḥ upi atra

original: Dvayaṃ cammamayakīḷāguḷake. Vāsabhavanehi yuvatīhi saha kīḷāsambhavā ñeyyā, tappakkamenassābhidhānaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam camma maya kīḷā guḷake vāsa bhavanehi yuvatīhi saha kīḷā sambhavā ñeyyā tat pakkam enassa abhidhānam

original: Guḍi vedhane, ṇuko, usse, gudda kīḷāyameva vā, tadā dassa ṇḍo. Kadi avhāne rodane
analyzed: vedhane ṇukaḥ usse vā tadā dassa ṇḍaḥ kadi avhāne rodane

original: ca, ṇuko, kudda kīḷāyameva vā, ussattaṃ, pubbadassa no.
analyzed: ca ṇukaḥ kudda kīḍāyam eva vai ussattam pubbadassa no

original: Dvayaṃ bījanīmatte. Vaṭi vibhājane, tālavaṇṭehi katattā tālavaṇṭaṃ. Vaṇṭaṃ nāma bījanādikaraṇatthaṃ
analyzed: dvayam bījanī matte vibhājane tālavaṇṭehi tālavaṇṭam vaṇṭam nāma bījana ādi karaṇattham

original: visuṃ bhājito tālapattāvayavo, tālavaṇṭasaddassa yathāvuttavacanatthayogepi sati
analyzed: visum bhājitaḥ tāla patta avayavaḥ tālavaṇṭa saddassa yathā vutta vacana ttha yoge pi sati

original: saññāsaddattā bījanīsāmaññe pavatti veditabbā. Yadā pana tālavaṇṭehi katabījanimeva
analyzed: saññā saddattā bījanī sāmaññe pavatti veditabbā yadā pana tāla vaṇṭehi

original: vattumicchati, tadā ekena tālasaddena visesetvā “tālatālavaṇṭa”nti vattabbaṃ. Yathā
analyzed: vattum icchati tadā ekena tāla saddena visesetvā tāla tāla vaṇṭanti vattabbam yathā

original: – tilassa telaṃ, sugatassa sugatacīvaranti. Bijanti vāyunā yojayanti yāya, sā bījanī,
analyzed: tilassa telam sugatassa sugata cīvaranti vāyunā yojayanti yāya sā bījanī

original: yu, nadādi, yuja yoge, yassa vo, ussī, vaja gatiyaṃ vā assī. Byajanaṃpyatra.
analyzed: yu nad ādi yujaḥ yoge yassa vaḥ vaja vaja vaja vaja

original: 317. Dvayaṃ caṅkoṭake. Kuṭa chedane, sakatthe ko. Karaḍi bhājanatthe, ko. Dvayaṃ
analyzed: dvayam caṅkoṭake kuṭa chedane saka atthe ko bhājana atthe ko dvayam

original: kappūrādisampuṭe sarūpakādisampuṭe (ka.). Samuggacchatīti samuggo, kvi. Puṭa saṃsilesane, bhūvādi, a.
analyzed: kappūra ādi sampuṭe sarūpaka ādi sampuṭe ka samuggacchati iti samuggo kvi puṭa saṃsi lesane bhū ādi

original: Pajjaddhaṃ methune. Gāmavāsīnaṃ dhammo ācāro gāmadhammo, gāmasaddena cettha gāmavāsino
analyzed: pajjaddham methune gāma vāsīnam dhammaḥ ācāraḥ gāma dhammo gāma saddena ca ittha gāma vāsinaḥ

original: vuttā, yathā “gāmo āgato”ti. Asataṃ asappurisānaṃ dhammo, saddhammapaṭipakkhattā
analyzed: vuttā yathā gāmaḥ āgataḥ ti asatam asappurisānam dhammo saddhamma paṭipakkha ttā

original: vā asaddhammo. Byaya khaye, byayati balametenāti byavāyo, majjhe vāgamo, atha vā
analyzed: vā asat dhammaḥ khaye byayati balam etena ati byavāyaḥ majjhe vā āgamaḥ atha vā

original: vigato ayo vuḍḍhi tasmāti avāyo, atisayo avāyo byavāyo. Mithunānaṃ itthipurisānaṃ
analyzed: vigataḥ ayaḥ vuḍḍhi tasmā ati avāyaḥ atisayaḥ avāyaḥ byavāyaḥ mithunānam itthi purisānam

original: samānacchandānaṃ ācāro methunaṃ, tadaññesu upacāro, ramu ramane, bhāve, karaṇe vāti.
analyzed: samāna chandānam ācāraḥ methunam tad aññesu upacāraḥ ramu ramane bhāve karaṇe vā ati

original: 318. Catukkaṃ vivāhe. Vaha pāpuṇe, ṇo. Upapubbo yamu uparame, a. Aññamaññassa pāṇino gahaṇaṃ pāṇiggaho. Nī naye, a. Ubbāho, pāṇipīḷanaṃpyatra.
analyzed: catukkam vivāhe vaha pāpuṇe ṇo upapubbaḥ uparame a aññamaññassa pāṇinaḥ gahaṇam pāṇiggahaḥ nī naye a ubbāhaḥ

original: Dhammakāmatthā tayo vaggā vuccante. Āgamaniddiṭṭho samācāro dhammo. Visayavisayisannipātajaṃ
analyzed: dhamma kāmatthā tayaḥ vaggāḥ vuccante āgama niddiṭṭhaḥ samācāraḥ dhammo visaya visayi sannipāta jam

original: sukhaṃ kāmo. Sabbopakaraṇaṃ attho. Samokkhakā mokkhasahitā dhammakāmatthā catubbaggo
analyzed: sukham kāmaḥ sabba upakaraṇam attho samokkhakāḥ mokkha sahitāḥ dhamma kāmatthāḥ catubbaggaḥ

original: vuccante. Tivaggena visaṃyutto mokkho nibbānaṃ. Tulyabalehi pana dhammādīhi catūhi
analyzed: vuccante ti vaggena visaṃyuttaḥ mokkhaḥ nibbānam tulya balehi pana dhamma ādīhi catūhi

original: madhumeho, rattameho, sukkamehotyanekavidho. Miha secane, bhūvādi, mihati muttanti

original: meho, ṇo. Jara roge. Bhūvādi, jaratīti, a. Jaro pasiddho. Kāsa saddakucchāyaṃ, dittiyañca,
analyzed: mehaḥ no jara roge bhūva ādi jarati iti a jaraḥ pasiddhaḥ kāsa saddakucchāyam dittiyam ca

original: bhūvādi, kāsatīti kāso, ṇo, kucchitaṃ asatīti vā kāso, kuāpubbo. Sasa pāṇane, sasanaṃ
analyzed: bhū vā ādi kāsati iti kāsaḥ ṇo kucchitam asati iti vā kāsaḥ sasa pāṇane sasanam

original: sāso, bhusaṃ sasanametassatthīti vā sāso, kuṭa chedane, ṭho, kuṭṭhaṃ. Sāmaññena tacovikāre.
analyzed: sāsaḥ bhusam sasanam etassa atthi iti vā sāsaḥ kuṭa chedane kuṭṭham sāmaññena taco vikāre

original: Sukke tu sittaṃ. Sūla rujāyaṃ, bhūvādi, sūlaṃ. Viddadhi, asmarī, muttakicchādayopyanekā rogabhedā.
analyzed: sukke tu sittam bhūvādi sūlam viddadhi asmarī muttakiccha ādayaḥ api anekāḥ roga bhedāḥ

original: Pajjaddhaṃ vejje. Āyubbedasaṅkhātaṃ vijjaṃ jānātīti vejjo, “ṇa rāgā tassedamaññatthesu
analyzed: pajjaddham vejje āyu bbeda saṅkhātam vijjam jānāti iti vejjaḥ ṇa rāgā tassa idam aññatthesu

original: cā”ti ṇo, vida ñāṇe vā, vindatīti vejjo, ṇyo, dyassa jo. Bhisajjati cikicchatīti
analyzed: ca ati naḥ vida ñāṇe vā vindati iti vejjaḥ ṇyaḥ dyassa jaḥ bhisajjati cikicchati iti

original: bhisakko, a, jassa ko. Rogaṃ harati sīlenāti rogahārī, ṇī. Harasaddoyaṃ kevalopi
analyzed: rogam harati sīlena ati roga hārī hara saddaḥ iyam kevalaḥ api

original: ānayanāpanayanesu vattati “manoharo, dukkhaharo”iccādīsu, idha apanayane. Kita rogāpanayane,
analyzed: ānayana apanayanesu vattati manoharaḥ dukkha haraḥ iccādīsu idha apanayane roga apanayane

original: bhūvādi. Tikicchatīti tikicchako, chapaccayo, ṇvu, dvittādi. Agadakaropyatra, agadaṃ
analyzed: bhū ādi tikicchati iti tikicchakaḥ cha paccayaḥ ṇvu dvitta ādi agada karaḥ api atra agadam

original: arogaṃ pāṇīnaṃ karotīti agadakaro, kammādimhi ṇo.
analyzed: arogam pāṇīnam karoti iti agada karo kamma ādimhi ṇo

original: 330. Dvayaṃ sallanīharaṇe vejje. Kāye paviṭṭhasarādisallassa nīharaṇo vejjo sallavejjo.
analyzed: dvayam salla nīharaṇe vejje kāye paviṭṭha sara ādi sallassa nīharaṇaḥ vejjaḥ sallavejjaḥ

original: Yathāvuttaṃ sallaṃ nīharaṇavasena kantati chindatīti sallakatto, kati chedane, to.
analyzed: yathāvuttam sallam nīharaṇa vasena kantati chindati iti chedane to

original: Dvayaṃ paṭikāre. Tikicchanaṃ tikicchā, bhāve a. Patipubbo karoti tikicchāyaṃ, karato ririyā.
analyzed: dvayam paṭikāre tikicchanam tikicchā bhāve a patipubbaḥ karoti tikicchāyam karato ririyā

original: Catukkaṃ osadhe. Bhisajānamidaṃ bhesajjaṃ, ṇya. Na vijjate gado yasminti agado. Bhisajānamidaṃ
analyzed: catukkam osadhe bhisajānam idam bhesajjam na vijjate gadaḥ yasmin ti a gadaḥ bhisajānam idam

original: bhesajaṃ, ṇo. Usa dāhe. Rogamosāpetīti osadhaṃ, dho, atha vā osadhī nāma asaṃyogadabbaṃ,
analyzed: bhesajam naḥ dāhe rogam osā apeti iti osadham atha vā osadhī nāma asaṃyoga dabbam

original: tehi saṃyojitaṃ osadhaṃ. Jāyupyatra. Ji jaye, ṇu.
analyzed: tehi saṃyojitam osadham jāyu pyatra ji jaye ṇu

original: 331. Tikaṃ ārogye. Anatthakārakattā kucchitākārena sarīre sentīti kusā, rogā, te
analyzed: tikam ārogye kucchita ākārena sarīre senti iti kusā rogā te

original: lunāti chindatīti kusalaṃ. Āmayassābhāvo anāmayaṃ, abyayībhāvo. Arogassa bhāvo ārogyaṃ.
analyzed: lunāti chindati iti kusalam āmayassa abhāvaḥ anāmayam abyayībhāvaḥ arogassa bhāvaḥ ārogyam

original: Kusalānāmayārogyanti samāhāradvando. Dvayaṃ anāmayajane. Kala gatisaṅkhyānesu. Kalati
analyzed: samāhāra dvandaḥ dvayam anāmaya jane gati saṅkhyānesu kalati

original: yathāsukhaṃ sabbiriyāpathesūti kallo, lo. “Kālaṃ khamatīti kalyaṃ, arogatā, tassaṃ
analyzed: yathāsukham sa biriyāpathesu iti kallaḥ lo kālam khamati iti kalyam aroga tā

original: niyutto kalyo”ti aṅguttaranikāyaṭīkāyaṃ. Natthi āmayo yasmiṃ nirāmayo. Vuttopyatra.
analyzed: niyuttaḥ kalyaḥ ti aṅguttara nikāya ṭīkāyam na atthi āmayaḥ yasmin nirāmayaḥ vuttaḥ api atra

original: Vutti jīvitavutti pasatthā assatthīti vutto. Rogato niggatajane pana ullāgho, lāgha
analyzed: vutti jīvita vutti pasatthā assatthi iti vuttaḥ rogataḥ niggata jane pana ullāghaḥ

original: sāmatthiye, usaddoyaṃ rogavimutyattho. Narādittā, narappadhānattā ca naravaggo.
analyzed: roga vimuti atthaḥ ca nara vaggaḥ

original: Naravaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nara vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 4. Catubbaṇṇavaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: catubbaṇṇa vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 332. Santatipariyantaṃ vaṃse. Kula santānabandhūsu, bhūvādi, ṇo, kulaṃ, vana sambhattiyaṃ,
analyzed: santati pariyantam vaṃse santāna bandhūsu bhū ādi no kulam sambhattiyam

original: so. Saṃtanu vitthāre, ṇo. Abhimukhaṃ janetīti abhijano, ṇo. Go vuccati abhidhānaṃ,
analyzed: saṃtanu vitthāre no abhimukham janeti iti abhijanaḥ go vuccati abhidhānam

original: buddhi ca, te tāyatīti gottaṃ. Gotrampi. Gavaṃ saddaṃ tāyatīti vā gottaṃ, tā pālane.
analyzed: ca te tāyati iti gottam gotrampi gavam saddam tāyati iti vā gottam pālane

original: Anupubbo i gatiyaṃ, karaṇe a. Tanotismāti, santati, nalopo, itthiyaṃ.
analyzed: anupubbaḥ i gatiyam karaṇe a tanoti sma ati santati na lopaḥ itthiyam

original: Santati pantivitthāra-gottesu kavibhī matā;
analyzed: kavibhiḥ matā

original: Paramparā bhave cāpi, puttakaññāsu santati.
analyzed: paramparā bhave ca api putta kaññāsu santati

original: Khattiyādayo khattiyabrāhmaṇavessasuddā cattāro vaṇṇā kulāni bhavanti, ete hi aññamaññamasaṅkarato vaṇṇetabbato ṭhapetabbato vaṇṇāti vuccante. Vaṇṇa ṭhapane.
analyzed: khattiya ādayaḥ khattiya brāhmaṇa vessa suddā cattāro vaṇṇā kulāni bhavanti ete hi aññam aññam asaṅkarataḥ vaṇṇetabbataḥ ṭhapetabbataḥ vaṇṇā ati vuccante vaṇṇa ṭhapane

original: 333-334. Chakkaṃ kulīne. Kulassāpaccaṃ kulino, ino apacce. Sobhano jano sajjano.
analyzed: chakkam kulīne kulassa apaccam kulinaḥ inaḥ apacce sobhanaḥ janaḥ sat janaḥ

original: Saparatthaṃ sādhetīti sādhu, sādha saṃsiddhimhi, u. Sabhāyaṃ sādhu sabhyo. Sādhvatthe
analyzed: saparattham sādha iti iti sādhu sādha saṃsiddhimhi sādhu sādhu

original: yo. Aya gatiyaṃ. Ayitabbo upagantabboti ayyo, kammani yo. Mahākulassāpaccaṃ mahākulo, ṇo.
analyzed: yaḥ gatiyam upagantabbaḥ iti ayyaḥ kammani yaḥ mahā kulassa a paccam mahā kulaḥ ṇo

original: Bhūbhujantaṃ rājasāmaññe. Atitejavantatāya visesena rājate dibbateti rājā, rāja dittiyaṃ.
analyzed: bhūbhujantam rāja sāmaññe ati tejavanta tāya visesena rājate dibba tā iti rājā rāja dittiyam

original: Bhuyā bhūmiyā pati bhūpati, bhuṃ pāletīti vā bhūpati, pā rakkhaṇe,ti, rasso. Pathaviyā
analyzed: bhuyā bhūmiyāḥ pati bhūpati bhum pāleti iti vā bhūpati pā rakkhaṇe iti rasso pathaviyā

original: issaro patthivo, ṇo, dvittaṃ, ittañca. Jagatiṃ bhūmiṃ pāletīti jagatipālo, kammani
analyzed: issaraḥ patthivaḥ naḥ dvittam ittañca jagatim bhūmim pāleti iti jagati pālaḥ kammani

original: ṇo. Disānaṃ pati disampati, disā, disaṭṭhe vā pāletīti disampati, rassattaṃ, niggahītāgamo
analyzed: ṇaḥ disānam pati disampati disā disaṭṭhe vā pāleti iti disampati rassattam niggahīta āgamaḥ

original: ca. Bhuṃ bhūmiṃ bhuñjatīti bhūbhujo, bhuja pālanajjhoharaṇesu, idha pālane, rudhādi.
analyzed: ca bhum bhūmim bhuñjati iti bhūbhujaḥ pālana jjhoharaṇesu idha pālane rudha ādi

original: Mahikhitopyatra. Khi nivāsagatīsu, mahiṃ akhi gatavā mahīkhito.
analyzed: mahi khitaḥ api atra nivāsa gatīsu mahim gatavā mahī khitaḥ

original: 335. Pajjaddhaṃ muddhābhisitte jātikhattiye, “rājajacce ca khattiye”ti vacanato.
analyzed: pajjaddham muddhābhisitte jātikhattiye rājajacce ca khattiya iti vacanataḥ

original: Rañño khattiyassāpaccaṃ rājañño, ñño apacce. “Khattiyo tu virā khattaṃ, rājaññadvijaliṅgano”ti
analyzed: raññaḥ khattiyassa apaccam rājaññaḥ apacce khattiyaḥ tu virā khattam

original: rabhasa, ratanakosesu pariyāyā. Khattassāpaccaṃ khattiyo, apacce iyapaccayo dissate,
analyzed: rabhasa rata na kosesu pariyāyā khattassa apaccam khattiyaḥ apacce iya paccayaḥ dissate

original: khettānaṃ adhipatibhūtattā vā khattiyotiādikappikarājā vuccati, tappabhavattā pana
analyzed: khettānam adhipati bhūta ttā vā khattiya uti ādikappika rājā vuccati tad pabhava ttā pana

original: muddhābhisittesvapi taṃsamaññā, essattaṃ. Khattassāpaccaṃ khattaṃ, ṇo. Rajjāropanasamaye
analyzed: muddha abhisittesu api taṃsamaññāḥ essattam khattassāpaccam khattam no rajja āropana samaye

original: dakkhiṇāvaṭṭasaṅkhodakena gaṅgānītena muddhani khattiyakaññādīhi abhisittattā muddhābhisitto,
analyzed: dakkhiṇā vaṭṭa saṅkha udakena gaṅgā ānītena muddhani khattiya kañña ādīhi abhisitta ttā muddhābhisittaḥ

original: paṭhamakhattiyo. Tappabhavatāya pana anabhisittā ca muddhābhisittākhyā, yathā – brahmabāhujassa
analyzed: tad pabhava tāya pana anabhisittā ca muddhābhisitta ākhyā yathā brahmabāhujassa

original: vaṃse jātassāpi brahmabāhujo. Brahmabāhuto jātattā bāhujoti hi nikāyantarikānaṃ laddhi.
analyzed: vaṃse jātassa api brahma bāhu jaḥ brahma bāhutaḥ jāta ttā bāhu jaḥ ti hi laddhi

original: Yasmiṃ pana rājini asesā sāmantā paṇamanti, so adhissarākhyo amara 18.2. Saṃ satto
analyzed: yasmin pana rājini asesā sāmantā paṇamanti saḥ adhissara ākhyaḥ sam satto
