analyzed: laggaḥ antaḥ yassā sā samantā sa visayā anantarā bhūmi samantāya ime sāmantāḥ anantara rājānaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ cakkavattini. Sabbabhūmiyā issaro sabbabhummo, ṇyo. Puññopanītena cakkaratanena
analyzed: dvayam cakka vattini sabba bhūmiyāḥ issaraḥ sabba bhummaḥ ṇyaḥ puñña upanītena cakka ratanena

analyzed: ākāse attanaḥ puratas gamayati iti vā cakkavattī puñña cakkam catu cakkam vā sattesu

original: dasarājadhammaṃ vattametassatthīti vā cakkavattī. Tattha antojanasmiṃ balakāye dhammikārakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā

original: saṃvidhānaṃ, khattiyesu, anuyuttesu, brāhmaṇagahapatikesu, negamajānapadesu, samaṇabrāhmaṇesu,
analyzed: saṃvidhānam khattiyesu anuyuttesu brāhmaṇa gahapatikesu negama jānapadesu samaṇa brāhmaṇesu

analyzed: miga pakkhīsu adhammakāra paṭikkhepaḥ adhanānam dhana uppādanam samaṇa brāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā

analyzed: pañha pucchanam ti idam dasavidham cakkavatti vattam idam eva ca gahapatike pakkhi jāte

original: ca visuṃ katvā gahaṇavasena dvādasavidhampi dīpesu. Catūsvapi dīpesu āṇādhammacakkāni
analyzed: ca visum katvā gahaṇa vasena dvādasavidham api dīpesu catūsu api dīpesu āṇādhammacakkāni

analyzed: sattesu pavatteti iti vā cakkavattī aññaḥ a sabba bhummaḥ an avakāsaḥ sāmantaḥ bhūpaḥ maṇḍalissaraḥ

original: nāma. Sayamāṇāpavattiṭṭhānavasena paricchinnasseva maṇḍalassa issaro, na sabbamaṇḍalassāti
analyzed: nāma sayamāṇā pavatti ṭṭhāna vasena paricchinnassa iva maṇḍalassa issaraḥ na sabba maṇḍalassa ati

original: maṇḍalissarotipi. Ettha ca “sabbabhummo, cakkavattī”ti dvīhi nāmehi catudīpissaro
analyzed: ettha ca sabba bhummo cakkavattī iti dvīhi nāmehi catu dīpi ssaraḥ

original: maṇḍalissarapadena padesissaro rājā dīpito. Atha vā maṇḍalissarapadena ekadīpissaro

analyzed: rājā sesehi rāja rājañña ādīhi bāhuja pariyantehi padesissaraḥ dīpitaḥ

original: 336. Dvayaṃ rājabhede. Sukhumatāya līnā apākaṭā chaviyo yesaṃ te licchavino. Licchavī
analyzed: dvayam rājabhede sukhumatāya līnāḥ te licchavinaḥ licchavī

original: ca vajjī cāti dvando. Dvayaṃ sammāsambuddhakule rājini. Purimatarasambhūte sakyakule
analyzed: ca vajjī ca ati dvandaḥ dvayam sammāsambuddha kule rājini purimatara sambhūte sakya kule

original: sañjātattā sakyo, ṇo. Sakkopi. Sakye bhavo sākiyo, iyo, yalopo, dīgho ca.
analyzed: sañjāta ttā sakyaḥ ṇaḥ sakko pi sakye bhavaḥ sākiyaḥ iyaḥ ya lopaḥ dīghaḥ ca

original: Pañcakaṃ buddhaputtassāyasmato rāhulassa mātari. Bhadda kalyāṇe, sokhye ca. Kulācārarūpādivasena
analyzed: pañcakam buddha puttassa ayasmataḥ rāhulassa mātari bhadda kalyāṇe sokhye ca kula ācāra rūpa ādi vasena

original: kalyāṇattā bhaddā. Kaccassāpaccaṃ kaccānā, apaccasaddoyaṃ niccaṃ napuṃsake putte,
analyzed: kalyāṇattā bhaddā kaccassa apaccam kaccānā apacca saddaḥ iyam niccam napuṃsake putte

original: puttiyañca bhavatīti. “Rāhu viya candaṃ mama nikkhamanaṃ lātukāmo cāyaṃ me puttoti
analyzed: puttiyam ca bhavati iti rāhu viya candam mama nikkhamanam lātu kāmo ca ayam me putto ti

original: rāhuloti nāmena bhavitabba”nti manasi katvā “rāhu jāto, bandhanaṃ jāta”nti pitarā
analyzed: rāhulaḥ ti nāmena bhavitabbanti manasi katvā pitarā

original: vutto sikkhākāmo āyasmā rāhuloyevettha rāhulo, tassa mātā rāhulamātā, bimbaṃ vuccati
analyzed: vuttaḥ sikkhā kāmo āyasmai rāhulo yā iva ittha rāhulo tassa mātā rāhula mātā bimbam vuccati

original: sarīraṃ, atisayavaṇṇasarīrayuttatāya bimbā, vamidhātumhā vā bo, vassa battaṃ. Yaso
analyzed: sarīram atisaya vaṇṇa sarīra yutta tāya bimbāḥ vami dhātumhā vā baḥ vassa battam yaso

original: vuccati parivāro, kitti ca, te dhāretīti yasodharā, manādittā asso.
analyzed: vuccati parivāro kitti ca te dhāreti iti yasodharā manā dittāḥ asso

original: 337-339. Yesaṃ khattiyānaṃ dhanaṃ sataṃ hoti, kīdisaṃ taṃ dhanaṃ? Nidhānagaṃ pathavādīsu
analyzed: yesam khattiyānam dhanam satam hoti kīdisam tam dhanam nidhāna gam pathavā ādīsu

original: nidhānavasena gataṃ pavattaṃ, tesaṃ dhanānaṃ sataṃ kahāpaṇānaṃ, kittakappamāṇānaṃ?
analyzed: nidhāna vasena gatam pavattam tesam dhanānam satam kahāpaṇānam kitta kappamāṇānam

original: Koṭīnaṃ sataṃ. Kena paricchedena? Heṭṭhimantena heṭṭhimakoṭṭhāsena, heṭṭhimaparicchedena
analyzed: koṭīnam satam kena paricchedena heṭṭhimantena heṭṭhima koṭṭhāsena heṭṭhima paricchedena

original: vā koṭīnaṃ sataṃ hoti. Divasavaḷañjo divase divase vaḷañjitabbo pana kahāpaṇo vīsatambaṇamattaṃ
analyzed: vā koṭīnam satam hoti divasa vaḷañjaḥ divase divase vaḷañjitabbaḥ pana kahāpaṇaḥ vīsa tambaṇa mattam

original: hoti, te khattiyā “khattiyamahāsālā”tyuccante. Mahanto dhanasāro yesante mahāsālā,
analyzed: hoti te khattiyā khattiya mahā sālā atyuccante mahantaḥ dhana sāraḥ yesante mahā sālā

original: lattaṃ, ambaṇamatra ekādasadoṇamattaṃ.
analyzed: lattam ambaṇa matre ekādasa doṇa mattam

original: Yesaṃ dvijānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ nidhānagāni nidhānavasena pavattāni asītikoṭidhanāni honti, divasavaḷañjo pana kahāpaṇo dasambaṇamattaṃ hoti, te dvijā “dvijamahāsālā”tyuccante.
analyzed: yesam dvijānam brāhmaṇānam nidhāna gāni nidhāna vasena pavattāni asīti koṭi dhanāni honti divasa vaḷañjaḥ pana kahāpaṇaḥ hoti te dvijāḥ

original: Nidhānage, vaḷañje ca dhane tadupaḍḍhe tesaṃ dvijamahāsālānaṃ dhanassa upaḍḍhabhāge sati gahapatimahāsālā nāma siyuṃ, ubhayatrāpi heṭṭhimanteneva dhanaparicchedo.
analyzed: nidhāna ge vaḷañje ca dhane tad upaḍḍhe tesam dvija mahāsālānam dhanassa upaḍḍha bhāge sati gahapati mahāsālāḥ nāma siyum ubhayatra api heṭṭhimantena iva dhana paricchedaḥ

original: 340. Yo na hīno, na cukkaṭṭho, majjhimādhikārabyavaṭṭhito rājaputtasenāpatimahākaṇittharādi, so mahāmatto. Mahatī mattā paricchedo yassa mahāmatto, rūpabhedena paṭṭhānaṃ klīvaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ na hīnaḥ na cukkaṭṭhaḥ majjhima adhikāra byavaṭṭhitaḥ rāja putta senāpati mahākaṇitthara ādi so mahāmattaḥ mahatī mattā paricchedaḥ yassa mahāmattaḥ rūpa bhedena paṭṭhānam klīvam

original: “Pakatiyaṃ mahāmatte, paññāyaṃ paramattani;
analyzed: pakatiyam mahāmatte paññāyam para mattani

original: Napuṃsakaṃ padhānaṃ taṃ, ekatte tu’ttame sadā”ti.
analyzed: napuṃsakam padhānam tam ekatte tuttame

original: Rabhaso ca. “Mahāmatto, paṭṭhāno cā”ti tu puṃsakaṇḍe vopālito. Pakaṭṭhe tiṭṭhatīti paṭṭhānaṃ, yu abhidhānappadīpikā ṭīkā 983, 1123 gāthāsupi passitabbaṃ.
analyzed: rabhaso ca mahāmatto paṭṭhāno ca ati tu puṃsakaṇḍe vopālito pakaṭṭhe tiṭṭhati iti paṭṭhānam abhidhānappadīpikā ṭīkā    gāthāsu pi passitabbam

original: Pañcakaṃ mantinimhi. Matippadhāno sacivo sahāyo. Itikattabbatāvadhāraṇaṃ manto, taṃyogā
analyzed: pañcakam mantinimhi mati ppadhānaḥ sacivaḥ sahāyaḥ iti kattabba tā avadhāraṇam manto taṃyogā

original: mantinī. Assatthyatthe inī, atha vā mantena nayatīti mantinī, atha vā mantayogā manti,
analyzed: mantinī atha vā mantena nayati iti mantinī atha vā manta yogā manti

original: netīti nī, manti ca nī cāti mantinī. “Matisacivamantinī”tipi pāṭho, tadā dvinnaṃ

original: tiṇṇaṃ vā dvando. Raññā saha jīvatīti sajīvo. Sacate samaveto bhavatīti sacivo. Saca
analyzed: tiṇṇam vā dvando raññā saha jīvati iti sajīvaḥ sacate samavetaḥ bhavati iti sacivaḥ saca

original: amāsaddoyaṃ nipāto sahatthe ccapaccayo. Sajīvamatte cāmaccasaddo vattati. Dvayaṃ
analyzed: amā saddaḥ iyam nipātaḥ sa hatthe cca paccayaḥ sa jīva matte ca a macca saddaḥ vattati dvayam

original: 341. Nyāsādīnaṃ iṇādānadāyavibhāgādīnaṃ vivādānaṃ vohārānaṃ upadaṭṭhari upadassite

analyzed: tena ati paṭihāraḥ ṇaḥ dvāre tiṭṭhati iti dvāraṭṭhaḥ saka atthe kaḥ dvāra pālakaḥ dvāra ṭṭhitaḥ dassakaḥ pi atra

original: 342. Rājūnaṃ aṅgarakkhagaṇo anīkaṭṭhoti mato. “Rakkhivaggo tu yo raññaṃ, so’nīkaṭṭho’bhidhīyate”ti amaramālāyañca, anīkena samūhena tiṭṭhatīti anīkaṭṭho, ṇo.
analyzed: rājūnam aṅga rakkha gaṇaḥ anīkaṭṭhaḥ ti mataḥ rakkhi vaggo tu yaḥ raññam saḥ nīkaṭṭhaḥ abhidhīyate iti amaramālāyan ca anīkena samūhena tiṭṭhati iti anīkaṭṭhaḥ ṇo

original: Dvayaṃ mahallake. Kañcukaṃ coḷaṃ, taṃyogā kañcukī. Sokaṃ vindatīti sovidallo. Vida
analyzed: dvayam mahallake kañcukam coḷam taṃ yogā kañcukī sokam vindati iti sovidallaḥ

original: āsīso, taṃyogā atthī.

original: vallabho”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.7.
analyzed: cintāmaṇi ṭīkā

original: Dvayaṃ anukūlane. Anurodhanaṃ anurodho, ṇo. Rudha āvaraṇe. Anurūpaṃ pavattanaṃ anuvattanaṃ, vatu vattane, bhū, yu.

original: Saha parisahane. Parisahanaṃ adussanaṃ, kho, halopo, sakhā, rājādi, samāno khyāto

analyzed: sattapadīna amara ino

original: Dvayaṃ abhejjamitte. Sabbakālaṃ bhajatīti sambhatto, bhaja sevāyaṃ, bhūvādi. Daḷho

original: a. Phusa bādhanaphusanesu, a, phasso.
analyzed: a phusa bādhana phusanesu a

original: Dvayaṃ dūte. Du paritāpe, to. Sandesaṃ vācikaṃ haratyaneneti haratīti (?).

original: Melānandā masimaṇi, melandhu vaṇṇakūpikā;

original: 349. Nāmamattena vuttānaṃ bhedādīnamidāni pariyāyānyāha. Tatra dvayaṃ bhede. Japa mānase ca japo cintanavācāsu (dhātvatthasaṅgaha, 135 gāthā), bhū, ṇo. Bhidi dvidhākaraṇe, ṇo.

original: Tikaṃ daṇḍe. Daṇḍa nipātane, curādi. Saho vuccati balaṃ, tabbhavaṃ sāhasaṃ. Damanaṃ damo, dīghapaṭisedho.

original: Amaccaraṭṭhaduggāni, koso daṇḍo ca pañcamo;

analyzed: kasi vaṇijjam pathaḥ duggam setu kuñjara bandhanam

original: Khanyākaradhanādānaṃ, suññānañca nivesanaṃ kāmandakīyanītisāra 5.78.
analyzed: khanya ākara dhana ādānam suññānam ca nivesanam kāmandakīya nīti sāra

original: Ityeso aṭṭhavaggo.
analyzed: iti esaḥ aṭṭhavaggaḥ

original: Yasmiṃ vā guṇe ṭhito sakammānaṃ vuḍḍhi, khayaṃ vā nābhipassati, taṃ ṭhānaṃ, yasmiṃ
analyzed: yasmin vā guṇe ṭhitaḥ sa kammānam vuḍḍhi khayam vā na abhipassati tam ṭhānam yasmin

original: vā guṇe ṭhito sakammānamupaghātaṃ passati, tasmiṃ na tiṭṭheyya, so khayo, ayaṃ nītivedīnaṃ
analyzed: vā guṇe ṭhito sa kammānam upaghātam passati tasmin na tiṭṭheyya saḥ khayaḥ ayam nīti vedīnam

original: tivaggo amara 18.19. Itaresaṃ dhammatthakāmā tivaggo.
analyzed: tivaggaḥ amaraḥ itaresam dhamma attha kāmā tivaggaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ guyhe. Rahasi bhavaṃ rahassaṃ, so, rahe vā bhavaṃ rahassaṃ. Guha saṃvaraṇe, kammani yo. Idaṃ dvayaṃ tīsu. Rahasso manto, rahassā vācā, rahassaṃ mantanaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam guyhe rahasi bhavam rahassam saḥ rahe vā bhavam rahassam guha saṃvaraṇe kammani yaḥ idam dvayam tīsu rahassaḥ mantaḥ rahassā vācā rahassam mantanam

original: 353. Pañcakaṃ vijane. Viji puthabhāve, bhū, to ca. Vici vivecane, puthubhāve ca vā.
analyzed: pañcakam vijane viji putha bhāve bhū to ca vici vivecane puthu bhāve ca vā

original: “Vivittaṃ tīsu vijane, asaṃpakkapavittesū”ti ruddo. Vigato jano asmāti vijano. Chādetīti
analyzed: vivittam tīsu vijane a saṃpakka pavittesu iti ruddaḥ vigataḥ janaḥ vijanaḥ chādeti iti

original: channo. Chada saṃvaraṇe. Vittamarahatīti raho, raha cāge, ramante asminti vā raho,
analyzed: channo chada saṃvaraṇe vittam arahatī iti rahaḥ raha ca āge ramante asmin ti vā rahaḥ

original: vaṇṇavikāro. “Raho nidhuvane cāpi, raho guyhe napuṃsaka”nti byākhyāsudhā 2.8.22 rabhaso.
analyzed: vaṇṇa vikāraḥ rahaḥ nidhuvane ca api rahaḥ guyhe byākhyā sudhā

original: Dutiyo rahosaddo abyayaṃ. Nissalākā, upāsupyatra. Nissalākā thī, upāsu abyayaṃ.
analyzed: dutiyaḥ rahaḥ saddaḥ abyayam nissalākā upāsu pyatra nissalākā thī upāsu abyayam

original: Dvayaṃ vissāse. Sasa pālane, ṇo. Sambha vissāse. “Vissambho kelikalahe, vissāse’paṇayepi ce”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkāyampi ruddo.
analyzed: dvayam vissāse pālane ṇo vissāse vissambho keli kalahe ca iti cintāmaṇi ṭīkāyam pi

original: Dvayaṃ nyāye. Yuja samādhimhi, samādhi abhyupagamo, to. Upagantabbattā upāyikaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam nyāye samādhimhi samādhi abhyupagamaḥ upāyikam

original: Upāyā sakatthe iko, opāyikaṃ, opayikampi pāṇini 5.4.34 (gaṇa), labbhaṃ, bhajamānaṃ,

original: abhinītaṃ, nyāyaṃ, ñāyaṃpyatra.
analyzed: abhinītam nyāyam atra

original: 354. Silokaṃ ovāde. Avapubbo vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, bhāve ṇo. Sāsa anusiṭṭhimhi,ti,
analyzed: silokam ovāde vada viyattiyam vācā ayam bhāve no sāsa anusiṭṭhimhi iti

analyzed: āssi anusiṭṭhi anusāsate anusāsanam puma vajje itthiyam napuṃsake ca ettha ca

original: ekassevatthassa bhinnaliṅgehi tīhi nāmehi kathanaṃ na kevalaṃ vāccaliṅgoyeva saddo,
analyzed: ekassa iva atthassa bhinna liṅgehi tīhi nāmehi kathanam na kevalam saddo

original: atha kho vācakaliṅgopyatthīti dīpanatthaṃ.
analyzed: atha kho vācaka liṅgā upi atthi iti dīpana ttham

original: Dvayaṃ āṇāyaṃ. Āṇa pesane, bhāve a, āṇā, itthī. Avavādo, niddeso, siṭṭhipyatra. Dvayaṃ bandhane. Dā dāne, bhāve yu, dā avakhaṇḍane vā, viyogadānato uddānaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam bandhane dāne bhāve avakhaṇḍane vā viyoga dānataḥ uddānam

original: 355-356. Dvayaṃ aparādhe. Apagacchantyanenāti āgu, ṇu, palopo, rassassa dīghatā,
analyzed: dvayam aparādhe apagacchanti anena ati ā gu ṇu pa lopaḥ rassassa dīgha tā

original: Kira vikiraṇe, kattari a, attaṃ. Bala pāṇane, i. Karasāhacariyato bali pulliṅge.
analyzed: kira vikiraṇe kattari a attam bala pāṇane i kara sāhacariyataḥ bali pul liṅge

original: Bhāgadheyyopyatra. Bhāgāsakatthe dheyyo pāṇini 5.4.36 (vā.), bhāgattena tiṭṭhatīti
analyzed: bhāgadheyyā upi atra bhāgāsaka tthe dheyyaḥ pāṇini vā bhāga ttena tiṭṭhati iti

analyzed: vā bhāgadheyyaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ tuṭṭhidāye. Manorathapuṇṇattā pattabbo bhāgo puṇṇapatto. Tussanaṃ tuṭṭho, sossatthīti tuṭṭhī, tena dātabbo dāyo tuṭṭhidāyo, ākārantānamāyo.
analyzed: dvayam tuṭṭhi dāye manoratha puṇṇa ttā pattabbaḥ bhāgaḥ puṇṇa patto tussanam tuṭṭho tuṭṭhī tena dātabbaḥ dāyaḥ tuṭṭhi dāyo ākāra antānamāyo

original: Chakkaṃ pābhate. Tathā hi –
analyzed: chakkam tathā hi

original: “Hemaṃ sīhāsanaṃ vesaṃ, vuttaṃ bhaddāsanaṃ tathā;
analyzed: hemam sīhāsanam vesam vuttam bhaddāsanam tathā

original: Upāyana’mupaggayhaṃ, pābhatañco’padā thiya”nti.

analyzed: nāma amara mālā

analyzed: yena ati vai upāyanam kuca saṅkocane ṇo vigataḥ kocaḥ yena ukkocaḥ paṇṇena sattha paṇṇena

original: Gumbādideyyo gumbaghaṭādiko gumbaghaṭādito (?) deyyosuṅkaṃ, anitthī, gumbo nāma jalathalamaggādīsu
analyzed: anitthī gumbaḥ nāma jala thala magga ādīsu

original: laddhabbabhāgo, tathā ghaṭṭopi, samānatthā hete. Ādinā pābhatampi saṅgaṇhāti. Suṅka
analyzed: tathā ghaṭṭaḥ api samāna atthā ha ete ādinā saṅgaṇhāti

analyzed: laddhabba bhāge aya gamane ṇo āyaḥ a paccaye ayaḥ dhanānam sampatta kāle āgamaḥ dhana āgamaḥ

analyzed: dvayam cāmare vālena katā bījanī vāla bījanī camaraḥ migo tassa idam cāmarī cāmarā

analyzed: bharati dadhāti bhiṅgāraḥ āraḥ karako kuṇḍikā api atra

original: Hatthī ca asso ca ratho ca patti ca, tesaṃ samūho hatthissarathapatti caturaṅginī
analyzed: hatthī ca assaḥ ca rathaḥ ca patti ca tesam samūhaḥ caturaṅginī

analyzed: cattāri aṅgāni sā

original: caturaṅginī, ī, inī.
analyzed: catur aṅginī ī inī

analyzed: danti antam hatthini kuñjaḥ hanu danto ca taṃ yogā kuñjaraḥ atisaye raḥ kum

analyzed: rada vilekhane danta iti hi nānattha saṅgahe gaja sadde gajati iti a nagaḥ pabbataḥ

analyzed: thāmena hāyanataḥ vā saṭṭhihāyanaḥ

original: Vanakarīnaṃ yo yūthajeṭṭho, so sayūthānaṃ jeṭṭhattā yūthajeṭṭho. Sayūthe pāti rakkhatīti yūthapoti coccate.

original: 361. Kāḷāvakādīni etāni hatthirājānaṃ kulāni. Kalambate saddāyateti kāḷāvako, ṇvu,
analyzed: kāḷāvaka ādīni etāni hatthi rājānam kulāni kalambate kāḷāvakaḥ ṇvu

original: malopo. Gaṅgāyaṃ jāto gaṅgeyyo, ṭhānavasena sā saññā. Paṇḍaravaṇṇatāya paṇḍaro. Vaṇṇavasena
analyzed: ma lopaḥ gaṅgā ayam jātaḥ ṭhāna vasena sā saññā paṇḍara vaṇṇa tāya paṇḍaraḥ vaṇṇa vasena

original: tambavaṇṇatāya tambo. Piṅgalavaṇṇatāya piṅgalo. Gandhayuttatāya gandho. Maṅga gamanattho,

original: sobhanagamanayuttatāya maṅgalo, atisāyane, pasaṃsāyaṃ vā lo. Hemavaṇṇatāya hemo.

original: Uposathakule jātattā uposatho, upagantvā arayo usatīti vā uposatho, tho, usa dāhe,
analyzed: uposatha kule jāta ttāḥ uposathaḥ upagantvā arayaḥ usati iti vai uposathaḥ dāhe

original: upapubbo vasa nivāse vā, vasso, uposatho, tithīviseso ca. Chabbaṇṇadantatāya chaddanto.
analyzed: upapubbaḥ vasa nivāse vā vassaḥ uposathaḥ tithī viseso ca chabbaṇṇa danta tāya chaddantaḥ

original: Etesañca kāḷāvako dasannaṃ purisānaṃ balaṃ dhāreti, gaṅgeyyo dasannaṃ kāḷāvakānaṃ,
analyzed: etesam ca kāḷāvakaḥ dasannam purisānam balam dhāra iti gaṅgeyyaḥ dasannam kāḷāvakānam

analyzed: evam yāva chaddantāḥ netabbaḥ sammāsambuddhaḥ pana dasannam chaddantānam balam dhāreti

original: teneva bhagavā kāḷāvakahatthigaṇanāya koṭisahassabalaṃ dhāreti, purisagaṇanāya dasannaṃ
analyzed: tena iva bhagavā kāḷāvaka hatthi gaṇanāya koṭi sahassa balam dhāreti purisa gaṇanāya

analyzed: purisa koṭi sahassānam balam

analyzed: pādo karipote pañcavassāni yāva kalabho kala saṅkhyāne abho kalabhaḥ ḷatte

analyzed: kaḷabhaḥ mātā pitūhi bharitabbattā bhiṅkaḥ bharatissa bhiṅko kari sāvakaḥ upi atra pādaḥ

original: mattamātaṅge. Dānaṃ pabhinno yassa pabhinno. Majjatīti matto, mada ummāde. Gaje jāyatīti
analyzed: matta mātaṅge dānam pabhinnaḥ yassa pabhinnaḥ majjati iti mattaḥ madaḥ ummāde gaje jāyati iti

original: gajjo, ṇyo, mado. So sañjāto yassa gajjito.
analyzed: gajjaḥ ṇyaḥ madaḥ saḥ sañjātaḥ yassa gajjitaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ hatthisamūhe. Hatthīnaṃ samūho hatthighaṭā. Gajānaṃ samūho gajatā, gāmajanabandhusahāyādīhi
analyzed: dvayam hatthi samūhe hatthīnam samūhaḥ hatthi ghaṭāḥ gajānam samūhaḥ gaja tā gāma jana bandhu sahāya ādīhi

analyzed: tā pādaḥ hatthiniyam hattha yogā hatthinī ī inī kaṇa sadde iru sakatthe kaḥ

original: Kareṇukātipi, tadā karayogā kareṇukā, iṇu. Kariṇī, dhenukā, vasā, kareṇupyatra.
analyzed: kareṇukā atipi tadā karayogā kareṇukā kariṇī dhenukā vasā kareṇupī atra

original: 363. Hatthisiropiṇḍā hatthino sirasi dve piṇḍā kumbhākhyā. Ke sirasi bhavatīti kumbho,
analyzed: hatthi siraḥ piṇḍā hatthino sirasi dve piṇḍā kumbha ākhyā ke sirasi bhavati iti kumbho

original: assu, niggahītāgamo ca. Dvinnaṃ pana kumbhānaṃ majjhimaṃ vidu nāma amara 18.37. Aṅkusasaṅghātaṃ

original: vindatyasminti vidu, pume, u. Dvayaṃ kaṇṇamūle. Cūḷa nimajjane, ṇvu, cūḷikā, cuda
analyzed: vindati asmin ti vidu pume u dvayam kaṇṇa mūle cūḍa nimajjane ṇvu cūḍikā cuda

analyzed: sañcodane vā codenti ettha aṅkusa ādīhi cūḷikā dassa ḷaḥ ṇvu

original: Āsate asminti āsanaṃ, khandhadeso. Khandho eva deso khandhadeso, tasmiṃ. Dvayaṃ pucchamūle. Pucchassa mūlaṃ heṭṭhimabhāgo.
analyzed: āsate asmin ti āsanam khandha deso khandho eva desaḥ khandha deso tasmin dvayam puccha mūle pucchassa mūlam heṭṭhima bhāgaḥ

original: 364. Tikaṃ gajabandhanathambhe. Ālantyasmiṃ, anena vā bandhanti ālānaṃ, yu. Āpubbo
analyzed: tikam gajabandhana thambhe anena vā bandhanti ālānam

original: bandhanattho lādhātu. Āhananti bandhantyasmiṃ, anena vā āḷhako, hanadhātu, nassa

original: ḷo, vaṇṇavipariyayo ca, ṇvu. Thambha paṭibandhane. Bandhopyatra.
analyzed: ḷaḥ vaṇṇa vipariyayo ca ṇvu thambha paṭibandhane bandho pi atra

original: Tikaṃ saṅkhale. Anitthī tūti tvantaṃ liṅgapadaṃ. Gala secane. Nigaḷati bandhati yenāti

original: saṅkhalaṃ, kaṭi vatthabandhanepi, “thīkaṭīvatthabandhepi, nigaḷe saṅkhalaṃ tisū”ti

original: cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.41 rabhaso. Saṅkhalikāpyatra.
Dvayaṃ gajagaṇḍe. Gaṇḍa vadanekadese, adhātūnampi dhātūsu pāṭho, dhātu hi kriyattho.
analyzed: dvayam gajagaṇḍe gaṇḍa vadana eka dese dhātūsu pāṭhaḥ dhātu hi

original: Gaṇḍo kapolasāmaññepi. Kaṭa vassāvaraṇesu, a. Dvayaṃ karimadajale. Dīyateti dānaṃ.
analyzed: kapola sāmaññe pi kaṭa vassa āvaraṇesu a dvayam kari mada jale dīyate iti dānam

original: Mada ummāde, karaṇe a.
analyzed: made ummāde karaṇe a

original: 365. Dvayaṃ hatthikare. Soṇa vaṇṇagatīsu, ḍo, soḍa gabbe vā, niggahītāgamo, ṇo ca. Dvīsu dvepi.

analyzed: dvayam soṇḍa agge karassa soṇḍassa aggam pusa posane kharaḥ sassa kaḥ ussottam pusa vuḍḍhimhi vā bhū pusa sneha secana pūraṇesu vā kiyā ādi pusa dhāraṇe vā curādi

original: Hatthissa kāyamajjhamhi bandhanarajju kacchā nāma. Kaca bandhane, cho. Dūsā, varatrāpyatra.

analyzed: sajjana ākappanānam pariyāyā ati ñeyyā

analyzed: hatthino pāde vijjhana kaṇṭakaḥ tomaraḥ tujjate inā iti tomaraḥ tuda byathane

original: 367. Hatthino kaṇṇamūlamhi vijjhanakaṇṭako “tutta”mityuccate. Tujjateneneti tuttaṃ,
analyzed: hatthino kaṇṇa mūlamhi tuttam iti uccate tujjatena iti tuttam

original: to. Hatthino matthakamhi vijjhanakaṇṭako “aṅkuso”tyuccate. Aṅkate aneneti aṅkuso,

analyzed: aṅka lakkhaṇe so assu

original: Ādhoraṇo, nisādinopyatra.
analyzed: ādhoraṇaḥ nisādinā api atra

analyzed: vājī gandhabbaḥ sattiḥ icca ādīni pi asse ghuṭa parivattane ṇvu pā pāne iti pāne

original: satti, sāmatthiyepi.

analyzed: dvayam khure khura chedane sam sukham pharati anena sapham sapham klīve

original: 372. Dvayaṃ yuddhatthe cakkayuttayāne. Sanda gamane, sandate gamyateneneti sandano, yu. Ramateneneti ratho, tho, malopo. Sataṅgopyatra. Satamaṅgānyassa.

original: 373. Dvayaṃ purisayuttayāne. Si sevāyaṃ. Sukhatthikehi sevīyateti sivikā, ṇvu, vāgamo,
analyzed: dvayam purisa yutta yāne si sevā ayam sukhatthikehi sevīyateti sivikā ṇvu vā āgamaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ sakaṭe. Anitthī tūti tvantaṃ liṅgapadaṃ. Saka sattiyaṃ, aṭo. Ana pāṇane, karaṇasādhanaṃ,

original: Dvayaṃ cakke. Karoti gamanamaneneti cakkaṃ, dvittaṃ, cakkādi. Rathassa aṅgaṃ rathaṅgaṃ.

analyzed: bhavati yathottaram iti vacanena yathāpubbam iti attham āha tena idam vuttam bhavati

original: Vāhinittayaṃ putanā. Putanattayaṃ camū. Camuttayaṃ anīkinī. Tāsaṃ anīkinīnaṃ dasa akkhobhinī”ti.
analyzed: vāhinittayam putanā putanattayam camū camuttayam anīkinī tāsam anīkinīnam dasa akkhobhinī iti

original: Tatra rathānaṃ saṅkhyā sattatisahitehi aṭṭhasatehādhikānyekavīsatisahassāni, evameva gajānampi saṅkhyā, tathā ca –
analyzed: tatra saṅkhyā sattati sahitehi aṭṭha satehi adhikāni ekavīsati sahassāni evam eva saṅkhyā tathā ca

analyzed: saṅkhyā tā vinā rathe turaṅgame

analyzed: sata sahassam sahassāni nava iva ca

analyzed: nāma senā ukkaṭṭha paricchedena kenaci akkhobhinī nad ādi calane

original: 385. Catukkaṃ sampattiyaṃ. Dhanukkaṃso sampatti. Pada gamane, bhāveti. Yupakkhe “itthiyamatiyavo
analyzed: catukkam sampattiyam dhanukkaṃsaḥ sampatti pada gamane bhāveti yu pakkhe itthiyamatiyavaḥ

original: vā”ti a. Lakkha dassanaṅkesu, ī, lakkhī, sirī ca pubbe devatāvasena vuttā, idha dhanukkaṃsavasena.

original: Dvayaṃ sampattiviparītāyaṃ. Virūpaṃ pajjatīti vipatti, padimhā kattariti. Virūpaṃ pajjanaṃ vā vipatti, bhāveti. Āpadāsahacaraṇato vipatti thiyaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam sampatti viparītā ayam virūpam pajjati iti vipatti padimhā kattar iti virūpam pajjanam vā vipatti bhāveti āpadā sahacaraṇataḥ vipatti thiyam

original: Catukkaṃ satthamatte. Ādāya yujjhante yanti āvudhaṃ, yassa vo. Āyudhaṃ vā. Hara haraṇe.
analyzed: catukkam sattha matte ādāya yujjhante yanti āvudham yassa vaḥ āyudham vā hara haraṇe

original: Harati jīvitanti heti,ti, asse, ralopo, hanativasena vā siddhaṃ. Sasa hiṃsāyaṃ, tho.
analyzed: harati jīvitanti asse ra lopaḥ han ati vasena vā siddham

original: Atthaṃpyatra. Asu khepane.
analyzed: atthaṃpyatra asu khepane

original: 386-387. Saṅkhepenāyudhaṃ dassetumāha. Muttāmuttañca amuttañca pāṇito muttañca yantamuttañceti sakalaṃ taṃ āyudhaṃ catubbidhaṃ bahūnampi tabbhedānativattanato.
analyzed: saṅkhepena āyudham dassetum āha mutta amuttam ca amuttam ca pāṇitaḥ muttam ca yanta muttam ca iti sakalam tam āyudham catubbidham bahūnam pi tad bhedān ativattanato

original: Catunnaṃ sarūpamāha “muttāmuttañcā”di. Yaṭṭhi nāma satthaviseso, na kattaradaṇḍo.
analyzed: catunnam sarūpam āha nāma sattha visesaḥ na kattara daṇḍaḥ

original: “Yaṭṭhi hāralatāsattha-bhedesu dhanudaṇḍake”ti hi nānatthasaṅgahe.
analyzed: hāra latā sattha bhedesu dhanudaṇḍaka iti hi nānattha saṅgahe

original: Tadādi āyudhaṃ muttañca taṃ amuttañceti muttāmuttaṃ, kammadhārayo, yathā katākataṃ. Churikā asiputti, tadādikaṃ amuttaṃ. Yanta saṅkocane, yantaṃ, dhanvādi.
analyzed: tad ādi āyudham muttam ca taṃ amuttam ca iti mutta amuttam kammadhārayaḥ yathā kata akatam churikā asi putti tad ādikam amuttam yanta saṅkocane yantam dhanva ādi

original: 388-389. Pañcakaṃ dhanumhi. Usuṃ asati khipatīti, kammani ṇo, ussi. Dhana dhaññe,
analyzed: pañcakam dhanumhi usum asati khipati iti kammani ṇo ussi dhana dhaññe

original: u, hana hiṃsāyaṃ vā, u, hassa dho, dhanu. “Dhanu vaṃsavisuddhopi, nigguṇo kiṃ karissatī”ti
analyzed: u hana hiṃsa ayam vai u hassa dho dhanu dhanu vaṃsa visuddhaḥ api nigguṇaḥ kim karissati iti

original: hitopadesa kathāmukha 23 pume payogo. “Sarā vāpo dhanu itthī, tuṇatā tiṇatāpice”ti
analyzed: hitopadesa kathāmukha pume payogaḥ sarā vāpaḥ dhanu itthī tuṇa tā tiṇa tā pica iti

original: tikaṇḍasesa 2.8.51 tikaṇḍaseso. Kiṃ nāmena daṇḍayatīti kodaṇḍaṃ, daṇḍa nipātane,
analyzed: tikaṇḍasesa kim nāmena daṇḍayati iti kodaṇḍam daṇḍa nipātane

original: kiṃ nāmena damyatīti vā kodaṇḍaṃ, damudhātumhā ḍo, kiṃ nāmena dunotīti vā kodaṇḍaṃ,
analyzed: kim nāmena damyati iti vā kodaṇḍam ḍo kim nāmena dunoti iti vā kodaṇḍam

original: du paritāpe, ḍo nipātito, kuṭilattā vā kucchito daṇḍo yassatthīti kodaṇḍaṃ. Capa
analyzed: du paritāpe ḍaḥ nipātitaḥ kuṭila ttā vā kucchitaḥ daṇḍaḥ yaḥ atthi iti kodaṇḍam

original: santāpe, a, capo, vaṃsabhedo, tabbikāro cāpo, ṇo. Saramasati khipatīti sarāsanaṃ.
analyzed: santāpe a capaḥ vaṃsa bhedaḥ tad vikāraḥ cāpaḥ no khipati iti sarāsanam

original: Kammukampi. Kammāya pabhavatīti kammukaṃ.
analyzed: kammukam pi kammāya pabhavati iti kammukam

original: Tikaṃ guṇe. Gacchati saro yenāti guṇo, massa ṇo, assu, gu sadde vā, gavati etenāti
analyzed: tikam guṇe gacchati saraḥ yena ati guṇaḥ massa ṇo assu gu sadde vā gavati etena ati

original: guṇo, yu, ṇattaṃ. Jara vayohānimhi, a, jiyādeso. Pakkhe ikāralopo, jayā. “Jiyā cāthā”tipi
analyzed: guṇaḥ yu ṇattam jara vayaḥ hānimhi a jiyā ādesaḥ pakkhe ikāra lopaḥ jayā jiyā ca atha atipi

analyzed: tadā dvayam guṇe mubbī siñjinī ipi atra mubba vikāraḥ mubbī siñja abyatta sadde inī

original: Tipādo kaṇḍe. Sara hiṃsāyaṃ. Sarantyanenāti, pume, saññāyaṃ ṇo. Pattaṃ vājo, taṃyogā
analyzed: kaṇḍe sara hiṃsa ayam saranti anena ati pume saññā idam no pattam vā ajaḥ taṃyogā

original: pattī, ī. Sā tanukaraṇāvasānesu, divādi, ṇvu, yassālopo. Vaṇyate saddāyateneneti
analyzed: pattī ī sā tanu karaṇa avasānesu div ādi ṇvu vaṇyate

original: vāṇo, ṇo, vaṇa sadde. Kaṇyateneneti kaṇḍaṃ, kaṇa sadde, ḍo, kaṇḍa bhede vā. Isa gamane,
analyzed: vā ṇaḥ vaṇa sadde kaṇyate nena iti kaṇḍam kaṇa sadde ḍo kaṇḍa bhede vā isa gamane

original: u, issu, usa dāhe vā. Khura chedane, apo, atha vā khe arati gacchatīti khuro, assu,
analyzed: u issu usa dāhe vā khura chedane apaḥ atha vā khe arati gacchati iti khuraḥ assu

original: āsugo, kalambo, maggaṇo, ropopyatra. Visanto khaṇatīti visikho. Kala made, ambo.
analyzed: āsugaḥ kalambaḥ maggaṇaḥ ropaḥ api atra visantaḥ khaṇati iti visikhaḥ kala made ambo

analyzed: magga anvesane yu rupa vimohane thūlakheḍaḥ vipāṭaḥ ca citrapuṅkhaḥ

original: saropi ce”ti tikaṇḍasesa 2.8.52 tikaṇḍasese.
analyzed: ca iti tikaṇḍa sesa tikaṇḍa sese

original: Pañcakaṃ kalāpe. Tūṇa pūraṇe, curādi, nadādi. “Tūṇo nisaṅgo tūṇiro, upāsaṅgo ca vāṇadhi”riti
analyzed: pañcakam kalāpe tūṇa pūraṇe curādi nadādi tūṇaḥ nisaṅgaḥ tūṇiraḥ upāsaṅgaḥ ca vāṇadhiḥ iti

original: cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.88 amaramālāyaṃ puṃsakaṇḍe. “Tūṇā”tipi itthiliṅgappakaraṇe vutto,
analyzed: cintāmaṇi ṭīkā puṃsa kaṇḍe tūṇa atipi itthi liṅga ppakaraṇe vuttaḥ

original: idha pana “tuṇī, tūṇo”ti dvīsu, sarasamūhānaṃ ṭhānattā kalāpo. Irapaccaye tūṇiro.
analyzed: idha pana tuṇī tūṇo ti dvīsu sara samūhānam ṭhāna ttā kalāpaḥ ira paccaye tūṇiraḥ

analyzed: vāṇā sarā vāṇadhi tūṇaḥ u pasaṅga tūṇiḥ anisaṅgā vāṇadhi dvi sūti amarasīhe

original: 390. Dvayaṃ vāje, yaṃ “kaṇḍapatta”mityuccate. Pata gamane, karaṇe kho, tassa ko,
analyzed: dvayam vāje yam kaṇḍapattam iti uccate pata gamane karaṇe kho tassa ko

original: pakkhena katattā vā pakkho. Vajatyanenāti vājo, ṇo. Visamapivitthāti visappīto saro
analyzed: pakkhena katattā vā pakkhaḥ vajati anena ati vājaḥ no visamapivittha ati visappītaḥ saraḥ

original: diddho nāma. Disa appītiyaṃ, to. Littopyatra.
analyzed: diddhaḥ nāma to littaḥ api atra

original: Tikaṃ vijjhitabbe. Vijjhanatthaṃ lakkhyateti lakkhaṃ. Vijjhitabbanti vejjhaṃ, ṇyo,
analyzed: tikam vijjhitabbe vijjhana ttham lakkhyate iti lakkham vijjhitabbanti vejjham ṇyaḥ

original: jhassa jjho, isse. Saro vayati gacchati yasmiṃ sarabyaṃ, vassākāralopo. Niccaṃ sarānamabhyāsanaṃ
analyzed: saraḥ vayati gacchati yasmin sarabyam vassa ākāra lopaḥ niccam sarānam abhyāsanam

original: vasīkaraṇaṃ sarābhyāso. “Byādhepyupāsanāyañca, vāṇābhyāsepyupāsana”nti ruddo. Lakkhamupagantvā
analyzed: vasīkaraṇam sara abhyāsaḥ vāṇa abhyāse pi upāsanam ti ruddhaḥ lakkham upagantvā

original: asanaṃ khipanaṃ upāsanaṃ.
analyzed: asanam khipanam upāsanam

original: 391. Pañcakaṃ khagge. Maṇḍalaṃ aggaṃ yassa. Niggato tiṃsato’ṅgulito nettiṃso. Asa
analyzed: pañcakam khagge maṇḍalam aggam yassa niggataḥ nettiṃsaḥ asa

original: khepane, asate khippateti asi, i. Khagga khaṇḍabhede. Sāyako sarepi. Candahāso, riṭṭhi,
analyzed: khepane asate khippateti asi i

original: kakkhalako, karavālopyatra. Tassa khaggassa pidhāne kosi, itthī. Kusa silesane, i,
analyzed: kakkhalakaḥ karavālaḥ api atra tassa khaggassa pidhāne itthī

original: kosi, rassanto. Khaggachurikādīnaṃ muṭṭhiyaṃ tharusaddo. Thara satthagatiyaṃ, u.
analyzed: kosi rassa antaḥ khagga churikā ādīnam muṭṭhiyam tharu saddo thara sattha gatiyam u

original: 392. Tikaṃ khaggādīnaṃ satthānaṃ vāraṇaphalake. Kheṭa bhakkhane, ṇvu. Phala visāraṇe, ṇvu. Phalatīti phalakaṃ, anitthī. Cara gatibhakkhanesu, mo, camu adane vā, a. Phalampi.
analyzed: tikam khagga ādīnam satthānam vāraṇaphalake kheṭa bhakkhane visāraṇe phalati iti phalakam anitthī cara gati bhakkhanesu mo camu adane vā a phalampi

original: Vaṇṭānihārassākhaggākati hatthakuṇḍādi illī, ilīpi, ila gatiyaṃ, nadādi. Karaṃ pālayatīti karapālikā, ṇvu.
analyzed: hatthakuṇḍa ādi illī ilīpi ila gatiyam nada ādi karam pālayati iti karapālikā

original: Dvayaṃ asiputtiyaṃ. Chura chedane, ṇvu. Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ,ti, nadādi. Asino puttī, asidhenukāpi.
analyzed: dvayam asiputtiyam chura chedane ṇvu sasu hiṃsāyaṃti nad ādi asino puttī asidhenukā api

original: Dvayaṃ vaḍḍhakīnaṃ muggarehi samānākārāyudhabhede. Laga saṅge, alo, assu, ḷattañca. Muraṃ giratīti muggaro, rassa go, gira niggiraṇe, muccatīti vā muggaro, aro. Dughaṇo, ghanopi.
analyzed: dvayam vaḍḍhakīnam muggarehi samāna ākāra āyudha bhede saṅge alaḥ muram girati iti muggaraḥ rassa go niggiraṇe muccati iti vā muggaraḥ araḥ dughaṇaḥ ghanaḥ api

original: 393. Dvayaṃ salle. Sala āsugatiyaṃ, a, sara hiṃsāyaṃ vā, lo, rassa lo. Saṅka saṅkāyaṃ, u. Sūlampi. Sūla rujāyaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam vā sūlampi sūla

original: Dvayaṃ vāsiyaṃ. Vasa chedanasnehāvahāraṇesu, ṇī. Taccha tanukaraṇe, yu, nadādi.
analyzed: dvayam vāsiyam vasa chedana sneha avahāraṇesu ṇī taccha tanu karaṇe yu nad ādi

original: Dvayaṃ pharasumhi. Chedakattā kucchitā dhārā yassāti kudhārī. Kudhāropi. Paraṃ sasati
analyzed: dvayam dhārā yassa ati kudhārī kudhāraḥ api param sasati

original: hiṃsatīti pharasu. U, passa pho, salopo ca. Parasupi, so parasusaddo napuṃsako. Parasudhopyatra.
analyzed: hiṃsati iti pha rasu passa phaḥ sa lopaḥ ca para supi saḥ para su saddaḥ napuṃsakaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ pāsāṇavidāraṇe. Ṭaṅka bandhane. Dara vidāraṇe. Pāsāṇaṃ dārayatīti pāsāṇadāraṇo, yu. Pāsāṇadārakopi.
analyzed: dvayam pāsāṇa vidāraṇe bandhane vidāraṇe pāsāṇam dārayati iti pāsāṇa dāraṇaḥ pāsāṇa dārakaḥ api

original: 394. Dvayaṃ hatthappamāṇe kaṇaye kaṇḍe (cintāmaṇiṭīkā). Cakkapūraṇādivāyuvasena khippate.
analyzed: dvayam hattha ppamāṇe kaṇaye kaṇḍe cintāmaṇi ṭīkā cakka pūraṇa ādi vāyu vasena khippate

original: Kaṇa sadde, ayo. Bhindanasīlatāya bhindī, vāti gacchati tenāti vālo, alo, bhindī
analyzed: ayaḥ bhindana sīla tāya bhindī vāti gacchati tena ati vālaḥ alaḥ bhindī

original: ca so vālo cāti bhindivālo, ḷatte bhindivāḷo, rasso.
analyzed: ca saḥ vālaḥ ca ati bhindivālaḥ ḷatte bhindivāḷaḥ rassaḥ

original: Cakkādayo satthabhedā. Tatra cakkākāro āyudhaviseso cakkaṃ. Kanta chedane, assu, kunto dīghadaṇḍo. Gadā, satti ca pasiddhā.
analyzed: cakka ādayaḥ sattha bhedā tatra cakka ākāraḥ āyudha viseso cakkam chedane assu kuntaḥ dīghadaṇḍaḥ gadā ca pasiddhā

original: Tikaṃ koṇabhāge. Kuṇa saddopakaraṇesu, kuṇa saṅkocane vā, ṇo. Si sevāyaṃ, a, rasso, asso. Kuṭa koṭille, iṇa.
analyzed: tikam koṇa bhāge sadda upakaraṇesu kuṇa saṅkocane vā ṇo si rassaḥ assaḥ kuṭa koṭille

original: 395. Dvipādaṃ vijigīsassa yātrāyaṃ, sabbatra bhāvasādhanaṃ. Yā pāpuṇe, nikkhamitvā
analyzed: dvi pādam vijigīsassa yā atrā ayam sabbatra bhāva sādhanam yā pāpuṇe nikkhamitvā

original: yāyate niyyānaṃ, yu. “Chadādīhi tatraṇa”ti traṇa. Yātrā, ā. Nadādino ākatigaṇattā
analyzed: niyyānam yu yātrā ā nad ādinaḥ

original: īpaccayābhāvo. Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ, papubbo yāne, yu, patiṭṭhīyate paṭṭhānaṃ, purecārimhi paṭṭho.
analyzed: ī pa caya abhāvaḥ ṭhā gati nivattiyam pa pubbaḥ yāne yu patiṭṭhīyate paṭṭhānam purecārimhi paṭṭhaḥ

original: Pañcakaṃ dhūlīmatte. Tathā ca “paṃsu khodo mato reṇu, cuṇṇo dhūli’tthiyaṃ bhave”tyamaramālā.
analyzed: pañcakam dhūlīmatte tathā ca paṃsu khodaḥ mataḥ reṇu cuṇṇaḥ dhūlitthiyam bhava iti amaramālā

original: Cuṇṇa pisane, cuṇṇa sañcuṇṇane vā. Paṃsa nāsane, u. Ranja rāge, rajo, manogaṇopi
analyzed: cuṇṇa pisane cuṇṇa sañcuṇṇane vā paṃsa nāsane u ranja rāge rajaḥ

original: napuṃsake, taṃsahacaraṇato paṃsupi. “Klivaṃ’parādhe reṇumhī”ti rabhaso. Atha vā cuṇṇarajosahacaraṇato
analyzed: napuṃsake paṃsupi rabhasaḥ atha vā cuṇṇa rajaḥ sahacaraṇataḥ

original: paṃsu napuṃsake. Dhū vidhunane, dhū kampane vā, li, nadādi. Ri gatiyaṃ, ṇu, isse.
analyzed: paṃsu napuṃsake dhū vidhunane dhū kampane vā li nad ādi ri gatiyam ṇu isse

original: 396. Vaṃsakkamavedīvaṃsathutiṃ yo kubbati, so māgadho. Tasmiṃ madhuko vutto. So ca
analyzed: vaṃsakkama vedī vaṃsathutim yaḥ kubbati saḥ māgadhaḥ tasmim madhukaḥ vutto so ca

original: khattiyāvessasambhavo bhavati, vaṃsamaggaṃ thavatīti māgadho, thassa dho. Maggaṃ
analyzed: khattiyāvessasambhavaḥ bhavati vaṃsa maggam thavatī iti māgadhaḥ maggam

original: dhavatīti madhuko, ṇvu, ggalopo.
analyzed: dhavati iti madhukaḥ ṇvu gga lopaḥ

original: Vīriyādithutiṃ sīlena yo paṭhati, so vandī, tassīlādīsu ṇī.

original: Pañcakaṃ anukkame. Patirūpena patanaṃ paṭipāṭi, pata gamane, ubhayatrāpi tassa ṭo,
analyzed: pañcakam anukkame pati rūpena patanam paṭipāṭi pata gamane ubhayatra api tassa ṭaḥ

original: i. Sā itthī. Anurūpo kamo, kamo eva vā anukkamo. Pari anatikkamena ayanaṃ pavattanaṃ
analyzed: i sā itthī anurūpaḥ kamaḥ kamaḥ eva vā anukkamaḥ pari anatikkamena ayanam pavattanam

original: pariyāyo. Pubbassānurūpā anupubbī, nadādi. Ayaṃ apume. Anupubbampi. Kamu icchākantīsu, ṇo.
analyzed: pariyāyaḥ pubbassa anurūpā anupubbī nad ādi ayam a pume anupubbam pi kamu icchā kantīsu ṇo

original: 430. Tikaṃ sīle. Tapa santāpe. Kilese tāpetīti tapo, a. Yamu uparame, uparamo viramaṇaṃ,
analyzed: tikam sīle tapa santāpe kilese uparame uparamaḥ viramaṇam

original: bhāve ṇo. Si bandhane, sinoti cittametenāti sīlaṃ, lo, sīla samādhāne vā, samādhānaṃ
analyzed: bhāve ṇo si bandhane sinoti cittam etena ati sīlam samādhāne vā samādhānam

original: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvo. Sīla samādhimhi vā, samādhiratra kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
analyzed: kusalānam dhammānam adhiṭṭhāna bhāvaḥ sīla samādhimhi vā samādhiḥ atra kusalānam dhammānam

original: abhyupagamo, aññatra sīle tupacārā, atha vā attānaṃ, parañca nirayādīsu tāpetīti
analyzed: abhyupagamaḥ aññatra sīle atha vā attānam param ca niraya ādīsu tāpeti iti

original: tapo. Kusaladhammato saṃyamanaṃ viramaṇaṃ saṃyamo, samādhānañcātrākusaladhammavasenevāti
analyzed: tapaḥ kusala dhammataḥ saṃyamanam viramaṇam saṃyamaḥ samādhānam ca atra akusala dhamma vasena iva ati

original: ayaṃ aññatra sīle nibbacanaṃ.
analyzed: ayam aññatra sīle nibbacanam

original: Satthavihito niyamo vataṃ. “Mantanāyaṃ paṭiññāyaṃ, niyamo nicchaye vate”ti rabhaso.
analyzed: sattha vihitaḥ niyamaḥ vatam mantana ayam paṭiññā ayam niyamaḥ nicchaye vata iti rabhasaḥ

original: Tañca vataṃ upavāsādilakkhaṇaṃ puññamuccate. “Sīlaṃ cārittaṃ vārittamupavāsādipuññaka”ntyamaramālā.
analyzed: tat ca upavāsa ādi lakkhaṇam puññam uccate sīlam cārittam vārittam upavāsa ādi puññakanti amaramālā

original: Ādinā akkhāralavaṇāsanādi akhādanābhojanādi (ka.). Ettha ca tapādayo mukhyavasena
analyzed: ādinā a khāra lavaṇa āsana ādi a khādana a bhojana ādi kaḥ ettha ca tapa ādayaḥ mukhya vasena

original: kusalasīle vattanti, rūḷhīvasena akusalasīlepi. Niyamādayo mukhyavasena akusalasīle
analyzed: kusala sīle vattanti rūḷhī vasena akusala sīle api niyama ādayaḥ mukhya vasena akusala sīle

original: vattanti, rūḷhīvasena kusalasīleti ayaṃ sīlabbatānaṃ viseso. Yamu uparame. Vatu vattane,
analyzed: vattanti rūḷhī vasena kusala sīle iti ayam visesaḥ uparame vatu vattane

original: vattanañcātra caraṇaṃ, samādhānaṃ vā. Vā pulliṅgepi.
analyzed: vattanam ca atra caraṇam samādhānam vā vā pulliṅge pi

original: Dvayaṃ mariyādātikkame. Kamu padavikkhepe, virūpo atikka mo vītikkamo. Mariyādātikkamo
analyzed: dvayam mariyādā atikkame pada vikkhepe virūpaḥ atikkamaḥ vītikkamaḥ mariyādā atikkamaḥ

original: ācāro ajjhācāro. Kāyavivekādayo tayo ettha viveko. Vica vivecane, puthabhāve ca,
analyzed: ācāro ajjhācāro kāya viveka ādayo tayo ettha vivekaḥ vivecane putha bhāve ca

original: bhāve ṇo, dvittādi. Puthu visuṃbhūto gaṇādīhi attā sarīraṃ mano sabhāvo ca etesanti
analyzed: bhāve ṇaḥ dvitta ādi puthu visuṃbhūtaḥ gaṇa ādīhi attā sarīram mano ca

original: puthugattā, tesaṃ bhāvo puthugattatā puthagattatā (ka.) kāyavivekādayo, majjhe gāgamo.
analyzed: puthugattā tesam bhāvo puthugatta tā puthagatta tā kāya viveka ādayaḥ majjhe

original: “Evaṃsarūpoyaṃ puriso, evaṃsarūpā vā amhepi nesaṃ pakati”riti pakatipurisānaṃ vibhāgena
analyzed: evaṃsarūpaḥ ayam purisaḥ evaṃsarūpā vā amhe pi na īsam pakatiḥ iti pakati purisānam vibhāgena

original: ñāṇaviveko. Attā buddhi, so puthubhāvena yassa, tabbhāvo puthugattatātyaññe. Aññato
analyzed: ñāṇa vivekaḥ so puthu bhāvena yassa aññe aññatas

original: vilakkhaṇassa bhāvo puthugattatātyaññe.
analyzed: vilakkhaṇassa bhāvaḥ

original: 431. Khuddānukhuddakaṃ cūḷavattaṃ, mahāvattañca, vattapaṭipatti vā “ābhisamācārika”mityuccate,
analyzed: khuddānukhuddakam cūḷavattam mahāvattam ca vatta paṭipatti vā ābhisamācārikam iti uccate

original: abhisamācāre uttamasamācāre bhavaṃ ābhisamācārikanti katvā, tadaññaṃ khuddānukhuddakato
analyzed: abhisamācāre uttama samācāre bhavam ābhisamācārikanti katvā tad aññam khudda anukhuddakato

original: aññaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlādikaṃ sīlaṃ brahmacariyassāriyamaggassa ādimhi tadatthāya
analyzed: aññam pātimokkha saṃvara sīla ādikam sīlam brahmacariya ssāriya maggassa ādimhi tad atthāya

original: caritabbattā ādibrahmacariyamityuccate.
analyzed: ādi brahmacariyam iti uccate

original: 432. Pāpehi akusaladhammehi upāvatto upāvuto (ka.) anāvuto vigato sabbannapānabhogādīhi
analyzed: pāpehi akusala dhammehi upāvattaḥ upāvutaḥ ka anāvutaḥ vigataḥ sabba anna pāna bhoga ādīhi

original: vivajjitova hutvā guṇehi sīlādīhi saddhiṃ yo vāso vasanaṃ thambhanamatthi, so “upavāso”ti
analyzed: vivajjitaḥ uva hutvā guṇehi sīla ādīhi saddhim yaḥ vāsaḥ vasanam thambhanam atthi saḥ upavāsaḥ ti

original: vijānitabbo. Vasu thambhe, divādi, upavasanaṃ upavāso, ṇo, vigato, upeto ca vāsoti vā upavāso.
analyzed: vijānitabbaḥ thambhe divādi upavasanam upavāsaḥ vigataḥ upetaḥ ca vāsaḥ iti vai upavāsaḥ

original: 433. Pajjaddhaṃ bhikkhumhi. Tapo kammamassatthīti tapassī, tapādito sī, dvittaṃ.
analyzed: pajjaddham bhikkhumhi tapaḥ kammam assa atthi iti tapassī tapa āditaḥ sī dvittam

original: Bhayadassanasīlo bhikkhu, rū, rasso. Sametīti samaṇo, yu. Pabbajā sañjātā yassāti
analyzed: bhaya dassana sīlaḥ bhikkhu sameti iti samaṇaḥ pabbajā sañjātā yassa ati

original: pabbajito, sañjātatthe ito, seṭṭhattaṃ vajatīti vā pabbajito, vaja gamane, to. Tapokammaṃ
analyzed: pabbajitaḥ sañjāta tthe itas seṭṭhattam vajati iti vā pabbajitaḥ gamane to tapokammam

original: dhanaṃ yassāti tapodhano.
analyzed: dhanam yaḥ sāti tapodhanaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ monabbate. Vācato yamatīti vācaṃyamo, niggahītāgamo, rasso ca. Monamassatthīti
analyzed: dvayam vācataḥ yamati iti vācaṃyamaḥ niggahīta āgamaḥ rasso ca monamassa atthi iti

original: muni, rasso, ossu. Dvayaṃ ābhusopavāsanabrahmacariyādiyutte. Tapoyogā tāpaso, saṇa.
analyzed: dvayam tapaḥ yogā tāpasaḥ

original: Isa gavesane, i, isi, isa gatiyaṃ vā, ñāṇassa, saṃsārassa vā pāraṃ gamanato isi,
analyzed: gavesane vā ñāṇassa saṃsārassa vā pāram gamanataḥ

original: i. Pārikaṅkhīpyatra, pāramassatthīti pārī, brahmañāṇaṃ, taṃ kaṅkhatīti pārikaṅkhī.
analyzed: i pārikaṅkhī ipi atra pāramaḥ satthi iti pārī brahmañāṇam tam kaṅkhati iti pārikaṅkhī

original: 434. Dvayaṃ jitindriyagaṇe. Yesaṃ saṃyatā indriyānaṃ gaṇā, te yatino, vasino ca nāma.
analyzed: dvayam jitindriyagaṇe saṃyatāḥ indriyānam te yatinaḥ ca nāma

original: Yataṃ indriyasaṃyamo niccametesamatthīti yatino, ī. Yatayopi, yata payatane, i. Vasa
analyzed: indriya saṃyamaḥ niccam etesam atthi iti yatino yata payatane i vasa

original: pāguṇye, vaso yesamatthīti vasino, ī.
analyzed: pāguṇye vasaḥ vasinaḥ ī

original: Tikaṃ dhammasenāpatimhi. Sārī nāma brāhmaṇī, tassā putto sāriputto. Tussantyasmiṃ
analyzed: tikam dhammasenāpatimhi sārī nāma brāhmaṇī tassā putto sāriputto

original: atthasiddhitoti tisso, so, tussi ca. Pūjito tisso upatisso, atha vā “tisso”ti vā
analyzed: attha siddhito ti tissaḥ saḥ tussi ca pūjitaḥ tissaḥ upatissaḥ atha vā tissaḥ ti vā

original: “phusso”ti vā “upatisso”ti vā daharakāle mātāpitūhi yadicchāya gahitaṃ nāmaṃ, “sāriputto”ti
analyzed: phusso ti vā upatisso ti vā dahara kāle mātā pitūhi yad icchāya gahitam nāmam sāriputto ti

original: mātuvasena, “dhammasenāpatī”ti pana ariyabhāvappatte sammāsambuddhena gahitaṃ nāmaṃ.
analyzed: mātu vasena dhammasenāpati iti pana ariya bhāva ppatte sammāsambuddhena gahitam nāmam

original: Kusaladhammāvudhehi kāmādikā akusaladhammasenā jitā yesaṃ dhammasenā, anekakoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā
analyzed: kusala dhamma avudhehi kāma ādikā akusala dhamma senā jitā yesam dhamma senā aneka koṭi sata sahassa saṅkhyā

original: bhagavato sāvakasaṅghā, tesaṃ pati nāyakaṭṭhena dhammasenāpati.
analyzed: bhagavato sāvaka saṅghā tesam pati nāyaka ṭṭhena dhamma senāpati

original: 435. Dvayaṃ bhagavato vāmapassaṭṭhe mahāmoggallāne. Kule jāyatīti koliko, so eva
analyzed: dvayam bhagavataḥ vāma passaṭṭhe mahāmoggallāne kule jāyati iti saḥ eva

original: kolito. Moggallibrāhmaṇiyā apaccaṃ moggallāno, ṇāno. Dvayaṃ ariyasāmaññe. Kilesārayo
analyzed: kolitaḥ moggalli brāhmaṇiyāḥ apaccam moggallānaḥ dvayam ariya sāmaññe kilesa arayo

original: hanatīti araho, so eva ariyo, ara gamane vā, arati adhigacchati maggaphaladhammeti
analyzed: hanati iti araho saḥ eva ariyaḥ gamane vā arati adhigacchati magga phala dhamme iti

original: ariyo, ṇyo. Adhigacchitthāti adhigato, to.
analyzed: ariyaḥ ṇyaḥ adhigacchittha ati adhigataḥ taḥ

original: Asekkhassa gahitattā “sotāpannādikā”ti etthādinā chaḷeva puggalā saṅgahitā, tena
analyzed: asekkhassa gahita ttā sotāpanna ādikā ti ettha ādinā chaṭ eva puggalā saṅgahitā tena

original: sotāpattimaggaṭṭhādayo satta sekkhā, eko arahā asekkhāti siddhaṃ. Tīhi sikkhāhi yuttatāya
analyzed: sotāpatti magga ṭṭha ādayaḥ satta sekkhāḥ ekaḥ arahā asekkhā ati siddham tīhi sikkhāhi yutta tāya

original: sekkhā, kakāralopena “sekhā, asekhā”tipyatthi. Dvayaṃ anadhigate. Ariyehi puthu visuṃbhūto
analyzed: sekkhā kakāra lopena sekhā asekhā atipi atthi dvayam anadhigate ariyehi puthu

original: jano puthujjano, puthu vā nānākilese janetīti puthujjano.
analyzed: janaḥ puthujjanaḥ puthu vā nānā kilese janeti iti puthujjanaḥ

original: 436. Dvayaṃ aggaphale. Paṭhamamaggādīhi diṭṭhamariyādamanatikkamitvā jānitthāti aññā,
analyzed: dvayam agga phale paṭhama magga ādīhi diṭṭham ariyādam an atikkamitvā jānittha ati aññā

original: rasso, rūparāgādīnaṃ vā pañcuddhambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ odhivasena māraṇato aññā,
analyzed: rassaḥ rūpa rāga ādīnam vā pañca uddhambhāgiyānam saṃyojanānam odhi vasena māraṇataḥ aññā

original: mariyādattho cettha ākāro, ñā māraṇatosananisānesu, itthiyamati a. Arahato bhāvo
analyzed: ca ittha ākāraḥ ñā māraṇa tosana nisānesu itthiyamati a arahataḥ bhāvaḥ

original: arahattaṃ, bhāve tto, bhāvotra abhidhānabuddhīnaṃ pavattiyā nimittaṃ, tañca duvidhaṃ
analyzed: arahattam bhāve ttaḥ abhidhāna buddhīnam pavattiyāḥ nimittam tat ca duvidham

original: byuppattipavattinimittavasena. Tatra visesehi kriyāpakatipaccayādīhi uppajjatīti
analyzed: byuppatti pavatti nimitta vasena tatra visesehi kriyā pakati paccaya ādīhi uppajjati iti

original: byuppatti, goādisaddasarūpaṃ, tassā nimittaṃ byuppattinimittaṃ, kriyāpakatipaccayādayo,
analyzed: byuppatti go ādi sadda sarūpam tassāḥ nimittam byuppatti nimittam kriyā pakati paccaya ādayaḥ

original: vividhaṃ vā goādisaddasarūpaṃ uppādetīti byuppatti, sā eva nimittaṃ, yathāvuttā kriyādayoyeva.
analyzed: vividham vā go ādi sadda sarūpam uppādeti iti byuppatti sā eva nimittam yathā vuttā

original: Pavattayati tattha tattha atthe payojayatīti pavatti, goādiko saddo, tassa nimittaṃ
analyzed: pavattayati tattha tattha atthe payojayati iti go ādiko saddo tassa nimittam

original: pavattinimittaṃ, jātikriyāguṇadabbanāmāni. Tatra byuppattinimittaṃ saddasarūpuppattiyā
analyzed: pavatti nimittam jāti kriyā guṇa dabba nāmāni tatra byuppatti nimittam sadda sarūpa uppattiyā

original: kāraṇaṃ, pavattinimittaṃ pana saddappayojanassa kāraṇanti ayametesaṃ saṅkhepato lakkhaṇaviseso.
analyzed: kāraṇam pavatti nimittam pana sadda payojanassa kāraṇanti ayam etesam saṅkhepataḥ lakkhaṇa viseso

original: Dvayaṃ cetiye. Thu abhitthave, po, dīghādi. Cita pūjāyaṃ, cetitabbaṃ pūjetabbanti,
analyzed: dvayam cetiye thu abhitthave po dīgha ādi cita pūjā ayam cetitabbam pūjetabbanti

original: ṇyo, cetiyaṃ. Ettha ca thūpasaddo samukhepi, cetiyasaddo pana mukharahiteyeva vattati.
analyzed: cetiyam ettha ca thūpa saddo samukhe pi cetiya saddo pana mukha rahitā iya iva vattati

original: “Cetiyamāyatane buddha-bimbe coddissapādape”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 12.7 byākhyāsudhā 2.2.7 ruddo.
analyzed: cetiyam āyatane buddha bimbe ca uddissa pādapā iti cintāmaṇi ṭīkā byākhyā sudhā ruddo

original: Dvayaṃ ānande. Dhammo pariyatti, sova bhaṇḍaṃ dhanaṃ sukhadāyakato, tassa agāraṃ
analyzed: dvayam ānande dhammo tassa agāram

original: ṭhapanaṭṭhānaṃ gehaṃ, tabbhāve tiṭṭhatīti dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko, iko. Nanda samiddhiyaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhapana ṭhānam geham tad bhāve tiṭṭhati iti dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaḥ nanda samiddhiyam

original: Ime dve saddā samā samānatthā.
analyzed: ime dve saddā samā samānatthā

original: 437. Dvayaṃ visākhāyaṃ seṭṭhidhītari. Vividhā bahukā puttanattapanattādikā sākhā yassā sā visākhā. Migārassa seṭṭhino mātuṭṭhāniyattā migāramātā.
analyzed: dvayam visākhā ayam seṭṭhi dhītari vividhā bahukā putta natta panatta ādikā sākhā yassā sā visākhā migārassa seṭṭhinaḥ mātuṭṭhā niyattā migāra mātā

original: Dvayaṃ anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhimhi. Sundaro attā yassa sudatto, sundaraṃ dattaṃ dānamassa
analyzed: dvayam anāthapiṇḍika seṭṭhimhi sundaraḥ attā yassa su dattaḥ sundaram dattam dānam assa

original: vā sudatto, idamassa daharakāle pavattaṃ nāmaṃ. Anāthānaṃ piṇḍaṃ dadātīti anāthapiṇḍiko,
analyzed: vā sudattaḥ idam assa dahara kāle pavattam nāmam anāthānam piṇḍam dadāti iti anāthapiṇḍiko

original: idamassa kriyānāmaṃ.
analyzed: idam assa kriyā nāmam

original: 438-439. Bhikkhuādayo ete pañca sahadhammikā. Saha ekato dhammaṃ carantīti sahadhammikā.
analyzed: bhikkhu ādayaḥ ete pañca sahadhammikā saha ekatas dhammam caranti iti sahadhammikā

original: Pattādayo aṭṭha parikkhārā ukkaṭṭhavasena vuttā, majjhimavasena pana kattaradaṇḍopi
analyzed: patta ādayaḥ aṭṭha parikkhārāḥ ukkaṭṭha vasena vuttāḥ majjhima vasena pana kattara daṇḍaḥ api

original: telanāḷipīti dasa parikkhārā vattabbā, omakavasena chattampi upāhanāpīti dvādasa
analyzed: tela nāḷi pi iti dasa parikkhārāḥ vattabbāḥ omaka vasena chattam pi upāhanā api iti dvādasa

original: parikkhārā ca vattabbā.
analyzed: parikkhārā ca vattabbā

original: 440. Dvayaṃ sāmaṇere. Samaṇassāpaccaṃ sāmaṇero. Samaṇaliṅgācārattā “samaṇoya”nti uddisitabboti samaṇuddeso. Disī uccāraṇe.
analyzed: dvayam sāmaṇere sāmaṇero uddisitabbaḥ iti samaṇuddesaḥ disī uccāraṇe

original: Tikaṃ acelake. Disā eva ambaraṃ vatthaṃ, na pakativatthametassa digambaro, sassa
analyzed: tikam acelake disāḥ eva ambaram vattham na pakativattham etassa digambaraḥ

original: go. Natthi celaṃ vatthametassa, samāsante ko. Catūhi ganthehi bandhanīyattā nigantho,
analyzed: go na atthi celam vattham etassa samāsante kaḥ catūhi ganthehi bandhanīya ttā niganthaḥ

original: nisaddo bandhane. Dvayaṃ jaṭāvati. Jaṭaṃ yassatthi jaṭilo, ilo. Jaṭaṃ dhāretīti jaṭādharo.
analyzed: nisaddaḥ bandhane dvayam jaṭāvati jaṭam yassa atthi jaṭilaḥ ilaḥ jaṭam dhāreti iti jaṭādharaḥ

original: 441. Kuṭisakādikā catuttiṃsa laddhiyo parasamayānamāgamato gahetabbā, tathā dvāsaṭṭhi
analyzed: kuṭisaka ādikā catuttiṃsa laddhiyaḥ para samayānam āgamataḥ gahetabbā tathā

original: diṭṭhiyo brahmajālasuttantato. Itīti parisamāpanattho. Eteti nidassanattho. Ete channavutiladdhiyo
analyzed: diṭṭhiyaḥ brahmajāla suttantataḥ iti iti parisamāpana attho ete iti nidassana attho ete channa vuti laddhiyaḥ

original: taṇhāpāsaṃ, diṭṭhipāsañca ḍenti pavattentīti pāsaṇḍāti sampakāsitā kathitā. “Iti
analyzed: taṇhā pāsam diṭṭhi pāsam ca ḍenti pavattenti iti pāsaṇḍā ati sampakāsitā kathitā iti

original: channavuti etā”tipi pāṭho.
analyzed: channavuti eta atipi

original: 442. Tikaṃ sucimhi. Pu pavane, to. Dvittādi. Yata payatane, to. Dīghādi. Dvayaṃ cammani. Caritaṃ tanti cammaṃ, caratimhā mana, camu adane vā, mana. Aja gamane, yu, ino vā.
analyzed: tikam sucimhi pu pavane to dvitta ādi yata payatane to dīgha ādi dvayam cammani caritam tanti cammam caratimhā mana camu adane vā mana aja gamane yu inaḥ vā

original: Dvayaṃ dantakaṭṭhe. Dante punāti sodheti yenāti dantapono, yu. Dantapoṇopi. Dantasodhanatthaṃ
analyzed: dvayam dantakaṭṭhe dante punāti danta ponaḥ danta poṇaḥ api danta sodhana attham

original: kaṭṭhaṃ dantakaṭṭhaṃ. Dvayaṃ rukkhattace. Vakka tace, alo. Tara taraṇe, ito, sakatthe ko.

original: 448. Tikaṃ dātte. Danti lunantyanenāti dāttaṃ, dā lavane, to. Dātrampi. Lū chedane, lavittaṃ, asu khepane. Asitaṃ, sabbatra karaṇe paccayo.

original: dadhimaṅgala”nti hi ratanāmālā. Dhā dhāraṇe. I, dvittaṃ, nipātanā. Dadhito vā ghataṃ,
analyzed: dadhimaṅgalanti hi ratanā mālāḥ dhā dhāraṇe nipātanā dadhitaḥ vā

original: nonītañca. Sabbaseso takkaṃ, khīratoyeva vā.
analyzed: takkam khīra toyā iva vā

original: Chakkaṃ eḷake. Bādhiyamānopi na ravatīti urabbho. Ru sadde, bho. Meṇḍa kuṭilatthe,
analyzed: chakkam eḷake bādhiyamānaḥ api na ravati iti sadde bho meṇḍa kuṭilatthe

original: ko. Misati paddhate aññamaññaṃ meso. “Saṃhasane meso, paddhāya’masamunnatī”ti nānatthasaṅgahe.
analyzed: kaḥ misati paddhate aññam aññam meso saṃhasane meso nānattha saṅgahe

original: Na raṇatīti uraṇo, raṇa sadde. Ava rakkhaṇe, i. Avi, “avayo selamesakkā”tyamarasīho
analyzed: na raṇati iti uraṇaḥ raṇa sadde ava rakkhaṇe avi avayo

original: amara 23.207. “Ajī”tipi pāṭho. Ila gatiyaṃ, ṇvu. Uṇṇāyupyatra, uṇṇāyogā uṇṇāyu, yu,
analyzed: amara ajī tipi pāṭhaḥ ila gatiyam ṇvu uṇṇāyu pyatra uṇṇāyu gāḥ uṇṇāyu yu

original: luhu ubhe ulomasasaddā ca rabhasena vuttā.
analyzed: ubhe uloma sasaddā ca rabhasena vuttā

original: 502. Tikaṃ aje. Vasa nivāse. To, vasto, vattopi. Aññe tu “vasa gandhaadane”ti curādimāhu,
analyzed: tikam aje vasa nivāse aññe tu vasa gandha adana iti curādim āhu

original: aja gamane, na jāyatīti vā ajo. Chindanto gacchatīti chagalako, cho chedane, gamu
analyzed: aja gamane na jāyati iti vai ajaḥ chindantaḥ gacchati iti chagalakaḥ chedane

original: gamane, ṇo, massa lo, ossattaṃ, sakatthe ko, chakalakopi. Chāgopyatra. Dvayaṃ karabhe.
analyzed: gamane ṇaḥ massa laḥ ossattam sa katthe kaḥ chakalakaḥ pi chāgaḥ upi atra dvayam karabhe

original: Vasa kantimhi, to, vassottaṃ, usa dāhe vā, ottādi, oṭṭho, dantacchadepi. Kara karaṇe,
analyzed: vasa kantimhi taḥ vassa uttam usa dāhe vā otta ādi oṭṭhaḥ dantacchade pi kara karaṇe

original: abho. “Kharabho”tyeke paṭhanti. Kamelako, mayo, mahāṅgopyatra.
analyzed: abho kharabho iti eke paṭhanti kamelakaḥ mayaḥ mahāṅgaḥ api atra

original: Dvayaṃ gadrabhe. Gadatismā rabho, gadrabho. Khaṃ kaṇṭhavivaraṃ mahantamassatthīti
analyzed: dvayam gadrabhe gadatisma rabhaḥ gadrabho kham kaṇṭha vivaram

original: kharo, ro. Cakkavā, bāleyyo, rāsabhopyatra. Cakkayogā, vantu. Balayuttattā bāleyyo.
analyzed: bāleyyaḥ

original: Rasa sadde, abho. Dvayaṃ aviyaṃ. Uraṇassa ayaṃ uraṇī. Avino esā avī. Ajāsaddo eko
analyzed: rasa sadde uraṇassa ayam uraṇī avino esā avī ajāsaddaḥ ekaḥ

original: chāgiyaṃ. Aññe tu “uraṇī tu ajī ajā”tipi pāṭhaṃ vatvā tiṇṇampi uraṇīpariyāyattaṃ
analyzed: chāgiyam aññe tu uraṇī tu ajī aja atipi pāṭham vatvā tiṇṇam pi uraṇī pariyāyattam

original: vadanti, tesaṃ mate ajīajāsaddāpi uraṇīpariyāyā atthīti daṭṭhabbā. Atha vā tikaṃ
analyzed: vadanti tesam mate ajī ajā saddā api uraṇī pariyāyā atthi iti daṭṭhabbāḥ atha vā tikam

original: ajiyaṃ. Uraṇasaddassāpi ajapariyāyassa sambhavato “uraṇī tu ajī ajā”ti vuttaṃ, vakkhati
analyzed: uraṇa saddassa api aja pariyāyassa sambhavato uraṇī tu ajī ajā ti vuttam vakkhati

original: hi anekatthavagge “ummāre eḷako aje”ti abhidhāna 1124 gāthā, uraṇapariyāyo hettha eḷako.
analyzed: hi aneka attha vagge ummāre eḷakaḥ aja iti abhidhāna gāthā uraṇa pariyāyaḥ ha ittha eḷakaḥ

original: Vessavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vessa vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 503. Tikaṃ sudde. Sada assādane, do, assu. Antavaṇṇo lāmakavaṇṇo. Vasa secane, vasetabbo
analyzed: tikam sudde sada assādane daḥ assu anta vaṇṇaḥ lāmaka vaṇṇaḥ vasa secane vasetabbaḥ

original: asucitattā vasalo, alo. Yatra yatra vā muttaṃ karīsaṃ siñcatīti vasalo, alo, jaghaññajopyatra.
analyzed: vasalaḥ alaḥ yatra yatra vā muttam karīsam siñcati iti vasalaḥ alaḥ jaghañña jaḥ upi atra

original: Brahmuno jaghaññaṅge pāde jāto jaghaññajo.
analyzed: brahmunaḥ jaghaññaṅge pāde jātaḥ jaghaññajaḥ

original: Māgadhādayo sūtapariyantā vijātiyamātāpitikattā ubhayavaṇṇoppattiyā saṃkiṇṇajātiyo
analyzed: māgadha ādayaḥ sūta pariyantāḥ vijātiya mātā piti kattāḥ ubhaya vaṇṇa uppattiyā saṃkiṇṇa jātiyaḥ

original: iccattho, bhinnajātisaṃsaggo eva hi saṅkaro. Suddena sambandhāya khattāya jāto putto
analyzed: icca atthaḥ bhinna jāti saṃsaggaḥ eva hi saṅkaraḥ suddena sambandhāya khattāya jātaḥ putto

original: māgadho. Thutikriyāvutti. Suddāya sambandhena khattiyena jāto uggo, uca samavāye, ṇo.
analyzed: māgadhaḥ thuti kriyā vutti suddāya sambandhena khattiyena jātaḥ uggaḥ u ca samavāye ṇo

original: 504. Brāhmaṇiyā sambandhena khattiyena jāto sūto, su abhibhave, to, dīghādi.
analyzed: brāhmaṇiyā sambandhena khattiyena jātaḥ sūtaḥ su abhibhave to dīgha ādi

original: Suddāvessahi karaṇo-mbaṭṭho vessādvijātihi. Māhiṃso vessākhattajo, khattā khattāya suddajo.
analyzed: karaṇa umbaṭṭhaḥ vessā dvijātihi māhiṃsaḥ vessā khatta jaḥ khattā khattāya sudda jaḥ

original: Brāhmaṇīkhattajo sūto,
analyzed: brāhmaṇīkhatta jaḥ sūtaḥ

original: Tassaṃ vedehako vesse;
analyzed: tassam vedehakaḥ vesse

original: Rathakāro tu māhiṃsā,
analyzed: rathakāro tu mā ahiṃsā

original: Karaṇyaṃ yassa sambhavo;
analyzed: karaṇyam yassa sambhavaḥ

original: Caṇḍālo nāma janito,
analyzed: caṇḍālaḥ nāma janitaḥ

original: Brāhmaṇīvasalehi yo.
analyzed: yaḥ

original: Tatra karaṇo lipilekhanavutti, ambaṭṭho vicikicchāvutti.
analyzed: tatra karaṇaḥ lipi lekhana vutti ambaṭṭhaḥ vicikicchā vutti

original: Dvayaṃ sippini. Karoti nimmināti citralepyādikanti kāru, ṇu. Sippamassatthīti sippiko. Sajātīnaṃ tesaṃ sippīnaṃ saṅghāto “seṇī”tyuccate. Si sevāyaṃ, ṇi.
analyzed: dvayam sippini karoti nimmināti citralepi ādikanti kāru nu sippam assatthi iti sippikaḥ sajātīnam tesam sippīnam saṅghātaḥ seṇī iti uccate si

original: 505. Tacchakādayo ime pañca kāravo sippino nāma siyuṃ. Vuttañca –
analyzed: tad śaka ādayaḥ ime pañca kāravaḥ sippinaḥ nāma siyum vuttam ca

original: “Tacchako tantavāyo ca, rajako ca nahāpito;
analyzed: tantavāyo ca rajakaḥ ca

original: Pañcamo cammakāro ca, kāravo sippino matā”ti.
analyzed: pañcamo cammakāro ca kāravaḥ sippinaḥ matā ati

original: 506. Pañcakaṃ tacchake. Taccha tanukaraṇe. Tacchati tanuṃ karotīti tacchako, ṇvu,
analyzed: pañcakam tacchake tanu karaṇe tacchati tanum karoti iti tacchakaḥ

original: vaddhayati chindatīti vaddhakī, vaddha chedane, curādi, “chedane cāpi vaddhana”nti
analyzed: vaddhayati chindati iti vaddhakī chedane curādi chedane ca api

original: ratanamālā, ṇvu. Sakatthe ī, vaddhakī, vaḍḍhakīpi. Palādyummānappakārena gaṇḍati
analyzed: ratanamālā saka atthe ī vaddhakī vaḍḍhakī pi gaṇḍati

original: chindatīti palagaṇḍo. Gaṇḍa chedanopalepanasannicayavadanekadesesu. Palagaṇḍo sudhājīvinyapi.
analyzed: chindati iti palagaṇḍaḥ chedana upalepana sannicaya vat aneka desesu sudhā jīvinī api

original: Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ,ti, pakāravaṇṇāgamo. Ṭhātissa thopi. Rathaṃ karotīti, kammani
analyzed: ṭhā gati nivattiyam ti pakāra vaṇṇa āgamaḥ ratham karoti iti kammani

original: ṇo, rathakāro, cammakārepi. Dvayaṃ suvaṇṇakāre. Nāḷiṃ dhamati mukhe vināsayitvā mukhavāyunā
analyzed: ṇo rathakāro cammakāre pi dvayam suvaṇṇakāre nāḷim dhamati mukhe vināsayitvā mukha vāyunā

original: aggidīpanatthaṃ nāḷiṃ saddāpayatīti nāḷidhamo.
analyzed: aggi dīpana attham nāḷim saddāpayati iti nāḷidhamo

original: 507. Athoparaṃ pukkusaṃyāvapādena nāmaṃ. Ve tantasantāne, tantaṃ vāyatīti, ṇo. Pesa
analyzed: atha uparam pukku saṃyāva pādena nāmam tanta santāne tantam vāyati iti ṇo

original: peraṇapayatanagatīsu. Pesanaṃ peso, taṃ karotīti, ṇo. Kuvindopyatra, kucchitaṃ vindatīti
analyzed: peraṇa payatana gatīsu pesanam pesaḥ tam karoti iti no kuvindaḥ api atra kucchitam vindati iti

original: kuvindo. Mālāsippayogā, mālāpanayogā vā māliko, iko.
analyzed: kuvindaḥ mālā sippa yogāḥ mālāpana yogāḥ vā

original: Kuṃ lalayati icchatīti kulālo, lala icchāyaṃ, ṇo. Dvayaṃ sūcikammopajīvini. Sūcivānakammaṃ
analyzed: kum lalayati icchati iti kulālaḥ lalaḥ icchāyam ṇaḥ dvayam sūci kamma upajīvini sūcivāna kammam

original: duvidhaṃ sūcanaṃ, tunnañcāti, tatra tunnavānakammena pavattinimittena tunnavāyo,
analyzed: duvidham sūcanam tunnam ca ati tatra tunna vāna kammena pavatti nimittena

original: sūcivānasippayogā sociko.
analyzed: sūcivāna sippa yogā socikaḥ

original: 508. Cammaṃ karoti vikāramāpādayatīti, kammani ṇo. Pādukaropyatra. Kappa chedane,
analyzed: cammam karoti vikāram āpādayati iti kammani ṇo pādukara upi atra kappa chedane

original: ṇvu. Naha soceyye, divādito nipātanā pakārāgamādi, na hāpetīti vā nahāpito, hā parihāne,
analyzed: ṇvu naha soceyye divā āditaḥ nipātanā pakāra āgama ādi na hā apeti iti vā nahā apitaḥ hā parihāne

original: ṇāpe paccayo, to, essittaṃ, saññāsaddattā nassapakati. Khurī, muṇḍī, divākittipyatra.
analyzed: ṇāpe paccayaḥ taḥ es sittam saññā saddattā khurī muṇḍī divākittipī atra

original: Khuravā khurī, muṇḍavā muṇḍī, muṇḍo, muṇḍī, muṇḍakoti pasiddhi. Divā divase kitti
analyzed: khuravā khurī muṇḍavā muṇḍī muṇḍaḥ muṇḍī muṇḍakaḥ iti divā divase

original: byāpāro assa divākitti. “Caṇḍāle tu divākitti, nahāpito”ti ruddo.
analyzed: byāpāraḥ assa divākitti caṇḍāle tu divākitti nahāpitaḥ iti ruddo

original: Rañjate suttaṃ rattamāpajjate yasmiṃ, sa raṅgo. Haritālamanosilādi, tamājīvatīti, kammani ṇo.
analyzed: rañjate suttam rattam āpajjate yasmin sa raṅgaḥ haritāla manosila ādi tam ājīvati iti kammani ṇo

original: Puñjaṃ kasatīti pukkuso, nipātanā, atha vā “pu”iti purisassa nāmaṃ, taṃ kuseti apanetīti pukkuso. Pupphaṃ vuccati karīsaṃ, kusumaṃ vā, taṃ chaḍḍetīti, ṇvu. Chaḍḍa apanayane.
analyzed: puñjam kasati iti pukkusaḥ nipātanā atha vā puiti purisassa nāmam tam kuseti apaneti iti pukkusaḥ puppham vuccati karīsam kusumam vā tam chaḍḍeti iti ṇvu chaḍḍaḥ apanayane

original: 509. Venādayo tayo samā tulyatthā. Veṇunā jīvatīti veno. Ṇassa nattaṃ. Veṇopi. Veṇuvettādīnaṃ
analyzed: vena ādayaḥ samā tulya tthā veṇunā jīvati iti venaḥ nassa nattam veṇo pi veṇu vetta ādīnam

original: vikati vilīvā, tehi vilīvaṃ karotīti vilīvakāro. Naḷopi veṇuvettādīnaṃyeva vikati,
analyzed: vikati vilīvā tehi vilīvam karoti iti vilīva kāraḥ naḷaḥ api

original: taṃ karotīti, kammani ṇo. Naḷehi vā vilīvaṃ karotīti naḷakāro.
analyzed: tam karoti iti naḷehi vā vilīvam karoti iti naḷakāraḥ

original: Ito paraṃ soṇḍikaṃ yāva pādena nāmaṃ. Cunda chedane, sañcodane ca. Cunda nisāmane
analyzed: itas param soṇḍikam pādena nāmam cunda chedane sañcodane ca cunda nisāmane

original: vā. Bhamu anavaṭṭhāne, taṃ karotīti bhamakāro. Kara karaṇe, māro, kammāro, kammani
analyzed: vā anavaṭṭhāne tam karoti iti bhamakāro kara karaṇe māraḥ kammāraḥ kammani

original: ṇvu. Lohakārako. Ākaroṭṭhitaṃ āṭavoṭṭhitaṃ (ka.) yo lohaṃ dhamitvā saṅkharoti, tatrāpi lohakārako.
analyzed: lohakārakaḥ ākara uṭṭhitam āṭava uṭṭhitam ka yaḥ loham dhamitvā saṅkharoti tatra api lohakārakaḥ

original: 510. Rajakassa dve kammāni celadhovanaṃ, rajanañca. Tatra celadhovano ninnejako,
analyzed: rajakassa dve kammāni cela dhovanam rajanam ca tatra cela dhovanaḥ ninnejakaḥ

original: ṇvu, niji suddhiyaṃ, niji soceyyasocanesu vā. Vattharañjanā rajako. Ranja raṅge,
analyzed: ṇvu niji suddhiyam niji soceyya socanesu vā vattha rañjanā rajakaḥ ranja raṅge

original: ṇvu. Netīti nettiko. Sakatthe ko, nettiyaṃ udakanayena niyuttoti vā nettiko, nettiyā
analyzed: neti iti nettikaḥ saka atthe kaḥ nettiyam udaka nayena niyuttaḥ iti vā nettikaḥ nettiyā

original: mātikāya netīti vā nettiko, iko. Udakaṃ hāretīti udahārako. Kalopo, ṇvu.
analyzed: mātikāya neti iti vā i kaḥ udakam hāreti iti udahārakaḥ ka lopaḥ ṇvu

original: Vīṇāvādanasīlattā vīṇāvādi. Vīṇāvādanasippayogā veṇiko. Usumhi, usukāro vā vaḍḍhakī
analyzed: vīṇā vādana sīlattā vīṇā vādi vīṇā vādana sippayogā veṇikaḥ usumhi usu kāraḥ vā vaḍḍhakī

original: usuvaḍḍhakī, etena vaḍḍhakīsaddassa sabbesampi sippikānaṃ vācakatā dīpitā, tena suvaṇṇavaḍḍhakī,
analyzed: usu vaḍḍhakī etena vaḍḍhakī saddassa sabbesam pi sippikānam vācaka tā dīpitā tena suvaṇṇa vaḍḍhakī

original: tantavaḍḍhakītyādayopi yojjā.
analyzed: tantavaḍḍhakī ityādayaḥ api yojjā

original: 511. Veṇuṃ vaṃsaṃ dhamatīti veṇudhamo. Veṇuvādanasippayogā veṇaviko, ṇiko. Yo pāṇineva
analyzed: veṇum vaṃsam dhamati iti veṇudhamaḥ veṇu vādana sippa yogāḥ veṇavikaḥ ṇikaḥ pāṇinā iva

original: pāṇantare murajādisaddaṃ uṭṭhāpayati, so pāṇivādo. Pāṇiṃ hantīti pāṇigho. Pāṇiyopi.
analyzed: pāṇa antare muraja ādi saddam uṭṭhāpayati saḥ pāṇi vādaḥ pāṇim hanti iti pāṇighaḥ

original: Pāṇivādanasippayogā pāṇiyo, yo.
analyzed: pāṇi vādana sippa yogā

original: Pūpena jīvatīti pūpiyo, pūpo paṇiyo vikkeyyo yassa. Pānāgāraṃ suṇḍā, taṭṭhattā surā
analyzed: pūpena jīvati iti pūpiyaḥ pūpo paṇiyaḥ vikkeyyaḥ yassa pānāgāram suṇḍā taṭṭhattā surā

original: soṇḍā, taṃ vikkiṇātīti soṇḍiko, “nenaniddiṭṭhamanicca”nti kātanta 1.2.18 naghaṭītaṃ
analyzed: soṇḍā tam vikkiṇāti iti soṇḍikaḥ

original: aniccaṃ (paribhāsendusekhara 97) paribhāsato vuddhi. Majjaṃ vikkiṇāti sīlena. Maṇḍahāropyatra,
analyzed: aniccam paribhāsa indu sekhara paribhāsataḥ majjam vikkiṇāti sīlena

original: maṇḍaṃ surāsambandhamaggabhāgaṃ harati uddharatīti maṇḍahāro.
analyzed: maṇḍam surā sambandha magga bhāgam harati uddharati iti maṇḍahāraḥ

original: 512. Dvayaṃ indacālakhye kapaṭe. Mayena asurena sure vañcayituṃ calayituṃ (ka.) payuttattā
analyzed: dvayam kapaṭe mayena asurena sure vañcayitum calayitum

original: mayassa ayaṃ māyā, mayo eva sambaro, tassāyaṃ sambarī, ṇī, nadādi. Dvayaṃ māyākāre.
analyzed: mayassa ayam māyā mayaḥ eva sambaraḥ tassa ayam nada ādi dvayam māyākāre

original: Indajāle niyutto indajāliko. Pāṭihārakopi. Paṭiharati nayanamanenāti pāṭihārako, ṇvu.
analyzed: indajāle niyuttaḥ indajāliko pāṭihārakaḥ api paṭiharati nayanam anena ati pāṭihārakaḥ ṇvu

original: 513. Ariyāsāmaññaṃ orabbhikādīnaṃ catunnamatthe. Ye urabbhaṃ eḷakaṃ hantvā jīvantīti
analyzed: ariyā sāmaññam orabbhika ādīnam catunnam atthe ye urabbham eḷakam hantvā jīvanti iti

original: orabbhikā. Sūkare hantvā jīvanti sūkarikā, tathā magaṃ hantvā jīvanti māgavikā. Sakuṇe
analyzed: orabbhikā sūkare hantvā jīvanti sūkarikā tathā magam hantvā jīvanti māgavikā sakuṇe

original: pakkhino hantvā jīvanti sākuṇikā, iti kamato bhavanti.
analyzed: pakkhinaḥ hantvā jīvanti sākuṇikāḥ iti kamataḥ bhavanti

original: 514. Dvayaṃ jālike. Vāgurā migabandhanajālaṃ, tāya caratīti vāguriko, vākarikopi.
analyzed: dvayam jālike vāgurā miga bandhana jālam tāya carati iti vāgurikaḥ vākarikaḥ api

original: Vaka ādāne, aro, ā, vākarā, tāya caratīti vākariko, pubbapakkhe kassa go, assu ca,
analyzed: vakaḥ ādāne araḥ ā vākarā tāya carati iti vākarikaḥ pubbapakkhe kassa go assu ca

original: vāguriko. Dvayaṃ bhāravāhe. Bhāraṃ vahatīti, kammani ṇo. Bhāraṃ vahatīti bhāriko.
analyzed: vāgurikaḥ dvayam bhāra vāhe bhāram vahati iti kammani ṇo bhāram vahati iti bhārikaḥ

original: Tikaṃ vetanopajīvini kiṅkare. Vetanena jīvatīti vetaniko. Bhato vetanena kīto, so
analyzed: tikam vetana upajīvini kiṅkare vetanena jīvati iti vetanikaḥ bhataḥ vetanena saḥ

original: eva bhatako, saññāyaṃ vā ko. Bhatiṃ vetanaṃ bhuñjatīti vā bhatako, ko, issattaṃ.
analyzed: eva bhatako saññāyam vā kaḥ bhatim vetanam bhuñjati iti vā bhatako ko issattam

original: Kammaṃ karotīti kammakaro, kammakāropi.
analyzed: kammam karoti iti kammakaro kamma kāro api

original: Tadeva rājopavanameva upakārikāsannihitaṃ, purasannihitaṃ vā antepurācitaṃ pamadavanākhyaṃ.
analyzed: tat eva rāja upavanam eva upakārikā sannihitam pura sannihitam vā antepura ācitam pamadavana ākhyam

original: Tatra pañcakaṃ pantiyaṃ. Pana byavahāre, thutimhi ca, panti. Vī gamane, thi, vīthi.
analyzed: tatra pañcakam pantiyam pana byavahāre ca gamane

original: Vala saṃvaraṇe, i, āvali. Ālipi, aladhātumhā i. Si sevāyaṃ, ṇi, seṇi. Pā rakkhaṇe,

original: Tipādaṃ rukkhamatte. Pādena mūlena pivatīti pādapo, ṇo. Viṭapayogā viṭapī. Rukkha

analyzed: varaṇe a ruha janane vā kho hassa kaḥ na gacchati iti ago sala gamane ṇo sāravanta tāya

original: u. Kuto bhūmito jāyatīti kujo, aṅgārepi. Sākhāyogato sākhī.
analyzed: u kutas bhūmitaḥ jāyati iti sākhā yogataḥ sākhī

analyzed: gamu gamane ṇo gamissantaḥ cchaḥ vā sabbāsu iti cchaḥ khuddaḥ a vuḍḍhi ppatto pādapo

analyzed: vānappatayaḥ vanappatimhi bhavā vānappatayaḥ

original: itthiliṅgattadīpako.
analyzed: itthi liṅga tta dīpakaḥ

original: vuttā, “latā patāninī vallī matakīthā”ti halāyudho.
analyzed: vuttā latā patāninī vallī halāyudhaḥ

original: Akkhandho appakkhaṇḍo, bahupattatacadaṇḍikādi. Yo vā tanupakaṇḍo vaṃsanaḷādi, so
analyzed: akkhandhaḥ appakkhaṇḍaḥ bahu patta taca daṇḍika ādi yaḥ vā tanu pakaṇḍaḥ vaṃsa naḷa ādi saḥ

original: “thambo, gumbo”ti coccate, thaka saṃvaraṇe, bo, kassa mo. Gupa rakkhaṇe, bo, passa
analyzed: thambaḥ gumbaḥ ti ca uccate thaka saṃvaraṇe bo kassa mo gupa rakkhaṇe bo passa

analyzed: latā sā vīru nāma vividhehi ruhati iti katvā kvi vīru dīgha ādi

original: 551. Pajje pādena nāmaṃ. Yatra dvayaṃ “bodhirukkho”ti saññite buddhassa bhagavato

original: Caladalo, pippalo, kuñjarāsanopi. Dvayaṃ bahupāde. Adhobhāgaṃ rundhatīti nigrodho,

original: usso, gāgamo ca. Vaṭa vedhane, vaṭatīti, a.
analyzed: ca vaṭa vedhane vaṭati iti a

original: Dvayaṃ kabiṭṭhe. Kavimhi vānare tiṭṭhatīti kabiṭṭho pāyena kapayo tiṭṭhanti atra

original: to, ṭhassa tho ca. Dadhittho, ambilaphalopi. Dvayaṃ udumbare. Yaññakammānamaṅgo ekaṅgattā

original: 552. Dvayaṃ koviḷāre.
analyzed: dvayam koviḍāre

original: “Sukapadāccharo campo,
analyzed: su ka padāt śa raḥ campo

original: Koviḷāro tu kañcano;
analyzed: koviḍāro tu kañcano

original: Pubbo sito paro ratto,
analyzed: pubbaḥ sitaḥ paraḥ rattaḥ

Hi ratanakoso, kañjanālakopyatra. Yugaṃ yamakaṃ pattamassa.

original: Tipādaṃ uddāle. Vātaṃ uddālatīti uddālo. Siṅgārādīnaṃ saññāvasena rukkhānaṃ rājā

original: rājarukkho, vātarogahanane rājabhūto rukkho vā rājarukkho. Katā mālā assa pupphehīti
analyzed: rājarukkhaḥ vāta roga hanane rājabhūtaḥ rukkhaḥ vā rājarukkhaḥ katā mālā assa pupphehi iti

original: katamālo, siṅgārappakāso. Indati paramissariyaṃ karoti vātahananeti indīvaro, īvaro,
analyzed: katamālaḥ siṅgāra pakāsaḥ indati paramissariyam karoti vāta hananā iti indīvaraḥ īvaraḥ

analyzed: indiyā sakkassa bhariyāya icchitabbattā vā indīvaro caturaṅgulaḥ ārevataḥ suvaṇṇakaḥ api

original: 553. Dvayaṃ jambhīre, yassa phalamambilaṃ hoti. Ambilattā dantassa saṭho dantasaṭho.
analyzed: dvayam jambhīre yassa phalam ambilam hoti ambilattā dantassa saṭhaḥ dantasaṭhaḥ

original: Saṭha ketavahiṃsāsaṃkilesesu, a. Jamu adane, īro, bhanto ca, jambha gattavināme vā,
analyzed: a adane ca vā

analyzed: jambhaḥ jambhalaḥ jambīraḥ upi dvayam varaṇe varaḥ icchāyam yu kala saṅkhyāne

original: nadādi, rassanto. Varuṇo, tittasākopi.
analyzed: nad ādi rassantaḥ varuṇaḥ tittasākaḥ api

original: Dvayaṃ phalahare. “Ko ayaṃ, suko”ti vimatuppattikarapattakusumatāya kiṃsuko. Pāri
analyzed: dvayam phala hare kaḥ ayam suko ti vimat uppatti kara patta kusuma tāya kiṃsuko

original: 554. Dvayaṃ pītane, yassa pattaphalāni ambilāni, pūgaphalappamāṇañca phalaṃ, sallakīrukkhasaṇṭhāno

Sahassavāraṃ marīcaṃ sitavhayaṃ;
analyzed: sahassavāram marīcam sitavhayam

original: Etena samanti visāhi sambhavā,
analyzed: etena samanti visāhi sambhavā

original: Katañjanasnehanapādanatthuto”ti.
analyzed: katañjana snehana pādanatthutoti

original: Si sevāyaṃ, viddhavināsanatthaṃ sevīteti siggu, gu, thī. Cittahārī, pabhañjano, viddhavināsanopi.
analyzed: si citta hārī pabhañjanaḥ viddha vināsanaḥ api

original: 555. Dvayaṃ visālatace, yo sarade pupphati pupphaṃ. Sattapaṇṇānyassa sattapaṇṇī pume.
analyzed: dvayam sarade pupphati puppham satta paṇṇī pume

original: Chattamiva paṇṇamassa chattapaṇṇo. Visamacchadopi, sattapaṇṇattā visamacchado. Dvayaṃ
analyzed: chattam iva chatta paṇṇaḥ satta paṇṇattā visama chadaḥ dvayam

original: rathaddume. Rathaṃ tanoti yena tiniso, iso. Atipamuccati dāhapittamaneneti atimuttako. Cittakipi.
analyzed: rathaddume ratham tanoti yena tinisaḥ isaḥ atipamuccati dāha pittam anena iti atimuttakaḥ citta kipi

original: Dvayaṃ vātapothe, paṃ vātaṃ lunātīti palāso, aso. “Patte palāsaṃ so rukkhe, pītaharitakiṃ suke”ti hi ruddo. Vātapothopi, vātassa potho vātapotho, putha hiṃsāyaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam vāta pothe vātam lunāti iti palāsaḥ aso patte palāsam saḥ rukkhe hi ruddo vāta potho api vātassa pothaḥ vāta potho hiṃsāyaṃ

analyzed: taṃ rogārivanta janehi icchitabba phala ttā vā ariṭṭhaḥ iccha ayam gatiyam

original: 556. Tikaṃ siriphale. Mala dhāraṇe, ūro. Bila bhedane, ṇuvo, beluvo. Lapaccaye billo.
analyzed: tikam siriphale mala dhāraṇe ūraḥ bila bhedane ṇuvaḥ beluvaḥ la paccaye billaḥ

analyzed: saṇḍilyaḥ munippabhede mālūre saṇḍilyaḥ pādapantare naṭe bille ca selusaḥ iti

original: cintāmaṇiṭīkā 14.32 rabhaso.

analyzed: dvayam tuṅge pumanāmaḥ nāgaḥ rukkho punnāgo punnāge puriso tuṅgo kesaro deva vallabho ti

original: amara 14.25 hyamarasīho, dīgho, “pumassa liṅgādīsu samāsesū”ti akāralopo ca. Atisayapupphakesaravantatāya

original: kesaro, kisa tanukaraṇe vā, aro, pupphakesayuttatāya vā kesaro, ro.

original: Dvayaṃ loddamatte. Sala gamanattho, avo. Rattakaphapittasote lunātīti loddo, ddo.
analyzed: dvayam gamana atthaḥ ratta kapha pitta sote lunāti iti

original: Tiriṭo, sāvaropi. “Sāvaro aparādhe ca, lodde pāpe ca kathyate” cintāmaṇiṭīkā 14.33

analyzed: du dumaḥ sannakaddu sannakaddu cāpapaṭā varaṇo hi kosantare

original: 557. Dvayaṃ “mhanakū”iti khyāte. Likuco nāma ḍahurukkho, tagguṇattā likocako, saññāyaṃ

original: guggulu, nipātanā. Kusa chedane, ṇvu. Kumbho, puropi.
analyzed: guggulu nipātanā kusa chedane ṇvu kumbho purā upi

original: “Rāsibhede gajamuddhaṃse,
analyzed: rāsi bhede gaja mud haṃse

original: Kumbhakaṇṇasuke ghaṭe;
analyzed: kumbha kaṇṇasuke ghaṭe

original: Kāmuke vāranāriyañca,
analyzed: kāmuke vāranāriyañca

original: Kumbho klīvantu vaggulumhī”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 14.34.

original: Rabhaso. Pura aggagamane, ṇo, puro.
analyzed: rabhasaḥ pura agga gamane ṇo puraḥ

original: Dvayaṃ ambe. Ama gatiyaṃ, bo, amba sadde vā, a. Cuti āsecane, rakkhaṇe ca, a, cu

original: cavane vā, to, dīghādi. Rasālopi, rasaṃ lātīti rasālo, dīgho. Eso ambo sugandhavā

original: atisayagandhayutto samāno “saho, sahakāro”ti coccate. Saha sattiyaṃ, sugandhaṃ kattuṃ

original: sahatīti saho, a. Sahanaṃ saho, taṃ karotīti sahakāro, hā vā pamudā, tāya saha vattatīti

original: saho, sahaṃ samudaṃ karotīti sahakāro.
analyzed: sahaḥ saham samudam karoti iti

original: 558. Dvayaṃ setambe. Puṇḍa puṇḍane. Puṇḍa khaṇḍanetyeke, ṇvu, assī, arāgamo ca. Setavaṇṇo
analyzed: dvayam setambe puṇḍa puṇḍane puṇḍa khaṇḍane iti eke ṇvu assī a rāgamaḥ ca setavaṇṇaḥ

original: ambo setambo. Dvayaṃ bahuvārake, yassa phalāni atipicchilāni. Si bandhane, lu, sala

original: gamanattho vā, u, asse. Picchilattā bahūni vārīni yasmiṃ bahuvārako, saññāyaṃ ko.
analyzed: gamana atthaḥ vai u asse picchila ttā bahūni vārīni yasmin bahu vārakaḥ

original: Sīto, uddālo, kaphalopi.
analyzed: sītaḥ uddālaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ kāsmariyaṃ. Sirimantāni paṇṇāni yassā sepaṇṇī, nadādi, sirīsaddassa se. Kasmīradesajattā
analyzed: dvayam kāsmariyam sirimantāni paṇṇāni yassā sepaṇṇī nada ādi sirī saddassa se kasmīra desa jattā

original: kāsmarī, kāsa dittiyaṃ vā, maro, nadādi. Madhupaṇṇī, bhaddapaṇṇīpi. Dvayaṃ sakaṇṭakambilaphalarukkhe.
analyzed: kāsmarī kāsa dittiyam vā maraḥ nada ādi madhupaṇṇī dvayam sa kaṇṭa kambila phala rukkhe

original: Sakaṇṭakattā kucchitaṃ lātīti kolī, nadādi. Vada theriye, aro, nadādi. Kuvalī, kakkandhūpi.
analyzed: kucchitam lāti iti kolī nada ādi vada theriye araḥ nada ādi kuvalī kakkandhūpi

original: 559. Dvayaṃ tassā koliyā phale. Koliyā phalaṃ kolaṃ. Badariyā ayaṃ avayavo badaro.
analyzed: dvayam tassā koliyā phale koliyā phalam kolam badariyāḥ ayam avayavaḥ badaraḥ

original: Kuvalaṃ, phenilaṃ, sovīrampi. “Sotañjane tu sovīraṃ, kañjike badarepi ce”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā
analyzed: kuvalam phenilam sovīram pi sotañjane tu sovīram kañjike badare api ca iti cintāmaṇiṭīkā

original: 14.36 rabhaso. Dvayaṃ assatthakulasambhūte rukkhapāsāṇādīsu sañjātarukkhe. Pilaṃ
analyzed: rabhasaḥ dvayam assattha kula sambhūte rukkha pāsāṇa ādīsu sañjāta rukkhe pilam

original: paraṃ nissayabhūtaṃ kasatīti pilakkho, kasa vilekhane, sassa khattādi nipātanā. Akhādanīyaphalatāya
analyzed: param nissaya bhūtam kasati iti pilakkhaḥ kasa vilekhane sassa khatta ādi nipātanā a khādanīya phala tāya

original: virūpaṃ phalamassatthīti pipphalī, ī, nadādi, vissapi ca.
analyzed: virūpam phalam assatthi iti pipphalī nada ādi ca

original: Dvayaṃ toyādivāpiniyaṃ, yassā mūlaṃ mahāpañcamūle paviṭṭhaṃ. Paṭa gamane, alo, nadādi,
analyzed: dvayam yassā mūlam mahāpañcamūle paviṭṭham gamane alaḥ nada ādi

original: pāṭalī, pāṭalāpi. Kaṇhaṃ pupphavaṇṭaṃ yassā sā kaṇhavaṇṭā, kāsmariyampi. Alippiyaṃ,
analyzed: pāṭalī pāṭalā api kaṇham puppha vaṇṭam yassā sā kaṇhavaṇṭā kāsmariyam pi alippiyam

original: tambapupphipyatra. Dvayaṃ gandhile. Sāduphalatāya sādu ca so kaṇṭasahitatāya kaṇṭo
analyzed: dvayam gandhile sādu phala tāya sādu ca saḥ kaṇṭa sahita tāya

original: ceti sādukaṇṭo. Sakaṇṭakatāya attānaṃ virūpaṃ karotīti vikaṅkato, dvittaṃ, niggahītāgamo ca.
analyzed: ca iti sādukaṇṭaḥ sa kaṇṭaka tāya attānam virūpam karoti iti vikaṅkataḥ ca

original: 560. Catukkaṃ tinduke. Tanu vitthāre, uko, danto ca. Tidi hiṃsāyaṃ vā, u, saññāyaṃ ko. Kāḷo khandho pakaṇḍo yassāti. Tima addabhāve, ūso, sakatthe ko, varanto ca. Upaccaye timbaru.
analyzed: catukkam tinduke tanu vitthāre ukaḥ dantaḥ ca tidi hiṃsāyam vā u saññāyam kaḥ kāḷaḥ khandho pakaṇḍaḥ yassa ati tima adda bhāve ūsaḥ saka tthe kaḥ ca u paccaye timbaru

original: Dvayaṃ tambaphale. Irāvatī nadī, paṭhamakāle tassā tīre jāto erāvato. Nāraṃ vuccati nīraṃ, taṃ gacchatīti nāraṅgo. Dvayaṃ makkaṭatinduke. Kula saṅkhyāne, ṇvu. Kākendu, kākalukopi.
analyzed: dvayam tamba phale irāvatī nadī paṭhama kāle tassā tīre jātaḥ erāvataḥ nāram vuccati nīram tam gacchati iti nāraṅgaḥ dvayam makkaṭatinduke saṅkhyāne kākendu kākaluka upi

original: 561. Tikaṃ kadambe. Kaṃ vātaṃ dametīti kadambo, bo. Pinetīti piyako, ṇvu, iyādeso.
analyzed: tikam kadambe kam vātam dameti iti kadambaḥ pineti iti

original: Nayati mudaṃ nīpo, po. Dvayaṃ, vidarukkhe, yassa niyyāsena peḷādayo limpanti. Bhala,
analyzed: nayati mudam nīpaḥ paḥ dvayam vida rukkhe yassa niyyāsena peḷa ādayaḥ limpanti bhala

original: bhalla paribhāsanahiṃsādānesu, nadādi, aññatra to, kanto ca, bhallātako, tīsvayaṃ.

original: Arukaro, aggimukhopi.

original: Dvayaṃ “pāvusā”iti khyāte. Jhapa dāhe, ṇvu. Passa vo. Paca pāke, ulo. Dvayaṃ sirimati, yassa phalāni marīcappamāṇāni, ambilāni ca. Tila gamane, ṇvu. Khura chedane, ṇvu.

original: Dvayaṃ mallikāyaṃ. Tiṇāni sūlanti yasminti tiṇasūlaṃ, sūla rujāyaṃ. Yatra taṃ jāyati,

original: 576. Pañcakaṃ sumanāyaṃ. Sundaraṃ mano yassaṃ. Sugandhattā jātisumanāti samuditanāmaṃ. Mala dhāraṇe, to, nadādi. Jana janane,ti. Vassakālasañjātapupphatāya vassikī. Iko, nadādi.

original: Dvayaṃ “campeyya”iti khyāte. Yutha hiṃsāyaṃ, i, sakatthe ko, dīghādi. Magadhe bhavā

original: Dvayaṃ kaṇṭena, patrena ca site paṇṇāse. Aja gamane, uko. Sito sukko paṇṇāso sitapaṇṇāso. Dvayaṃ appapatte paṇṇāse. Īra kampane, yu. Phaṇiṃ jayati phaṇijjako, yassa ko.

analyzed: dvayam japā kusume japati vā ussattam marudesaje

original: Sādukaṇṭo vikaṅkatepi. Dvayaṃ hatthipipphaliyaṃ. Kolākārā, taṃnāmikā vā vallī kolavalli,

original: Sālapaṇṇasadisaviṭatāya sālapaṇṇī. Sālaṃ sobhanayuttaṃ paṇṇamassā vā sālapaṇṇī. Thu
analyzed: sāla paṇṇa sadisa viṭatāya sāla paṇṇī sālam sobhana yuttam paṇṇa massā vā sāla paṇṇī

original: gatitheriyesu, iro, thiro.

analyzed: byaggha sadisa tāya byagghī brahatī dvayam

Kāḷā kaṇhativutāyaṃ, nīlī yojanavallisu;

original: 595. Dvayaṃ lasuṇe. Yassa mūlaṃ setavaṇṇaṃ. Palaṇḍukandato mahantakandatāya mahākando.
