original: Ambilenekena rasena ūnatāya lasuṇaṃ, lattaṃ, rassattaṃ, ṇattañca, lasa kantiyaṃ vā,
analyzed: ambilena ikena rasena ūna tāya lasuṇam lattam rassattam ṇattam ca lasa kantiyam vā

original: yu, assu, ṇattaṃ. Mahosadhaṃ, ariṭṭhaṃ, rasonopi. Dvayaṃ rattamūle, harite ca. Palaḍi
analyzed: mahosadham ariṭṭham dvayam ratta mūle harite ca

original: gandhane, u, sundaro kando yassa sukandako. Kraṇasvananī.
analyzed: gandhane u sundaraḥ kandaḥ yassa su kandakaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ paṭole. Paṭa gamane, olo, paṭuṃ rasaṃ lātīti vā paṭolo, usso, tittarasatāya
analyzed: dvayam paṭole paṭa gamane olaḥ paṭum rasam lāti iti vā paṭolaḥ titta rasa tāya

original: tittako. Sakatthe ko. Kulakaṃ, paṭupi. Dvayaṃ “bhiṅgarāja”iti khyāte kesarañjane.
analyzed: tittakaḥ sakatthe kaḥ kulakam dvayam bhiṅgarājaḥ eti khyāte kesa rañjane

original: Bhiṅgo vuccati bhamaro, tabbaṇṇaṃ katvā tesaṃ rañjetīti bhiṅgarājo. Muca mocane, avo, ussā, mākkavo.
analyzed: bhiṅgaḥ vuccati bhamaraḥ tad baṇṇam katvā tesam rañjeti iti bhiṅga rājaḥ muca mocane avaḥ ussā mākkavaḥ

original: 596. Dvayaṃ punannavāyaṃ, vuddhopi puna navo bhavati yāya yogitāyāti punannavā. Sothaṃ
analyzed: dvayam punar nava ayam vuddhaḥ api puna navaḥ bhavati yāya yogitā āyāti punar navā sotham

original: hantīti sothaghātaṃ, hanassa ghāto. Dvayaṃ anūpaje sāke. Tuda byathane, bhāve to.
analyzed: hanti iti sotha ghātam hanassa ghātaḥ dvayam anūpaje sāke tuda byathane bhāve to

original: Vigataṃ tunnametassa khādane vitunnaṃ. Sada visaraṇagatyāvasānesu, to, annādeso, sakatthe ko.
analyzed: vigatam tunnam etassa khādane vitunnam sada visaraṇa gatya avasānesu taḥ anna ādesaḥ saka tthe kaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ kāravellake. Tittarasatāya kucchitākārena lambatīti kāravello. Ussāttaṃ, rattaṃ,
analyzed: dvayam kāravellake titta rasa tāya kucchita ākārena lambati iti kāravellaḥ ussāttam rattam

original: illo, kupubbo lavi avasaṃsane. Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ, avo, nadādi, assu. “He khā le-khyā”.
analyzed: illaḥ ku pubbaḥ lavi avasaṃsane sasu hiṃsā ayam avaḥ nad ādi assu he khā lekhyā

original: Tikaṃ lābuyaṃ. Tumba adane, tumbati hiṃsati pittanti tumbī, nadādi. Napubbo lamba
analyzed: tikam lābuyam adane tumbati hiṃsati tumbī nada ādi napubbaḥ lamba

original: avasaṃsane, u, malopo, nassa attaṃ, alābu, pāṇiniyānaṃ uṇādi 1.87, āpubbo lamba avasaṃsane,
analyzed: avasaṃsane u ma lopaḥ nassa attam alābu pāṇi niyānam uṇ ādi ā pubbaḥ lamba avasaṃsane

original: ālābu. Kātantikānaṃ, candānañcevaṃ, asmākantu rassaṃ katvā alābu, alope lābu, abhedopacārena
analyzed: ālābu kātantikānam candānam ca ivam asmākantu rassam katvā alābu a lope lābu abheda upacārena

original: tīṇipi phalepi itthiliṅgāni, sāsaddo itthi liṅgatthajotako.
analyzed: phale pi itthi liṅgāni sā saddaḥ itthi liṅga ttha jotakaḥ

original: 597. Dvayaṃ sampuse. Iraṃ vāriṃ lāti tabbāhulyatoti eḷālukaṃ. “Irā vārisurā bhūmi-bhāratīsu
analyzed: dvayam sampuse iram vārim lāti eḷālukam irā vāri surā bhūmi bhāratīsu

original: payujjate”ti hi nānatthasaṅgaho. Thiyaṃ, u, sakatthe ko. Kuka ādāne, aro, nadādi,
analyzed: payujjate iti hi nānattha saṅgahaḥ thiyam u sakatthe kaḥ kukaḥ ādāne araḥ nada ādi

original: ussattaṃ, kaṃ vātaṃ, kaphañca karotīti kakkarī, aparatra phalopo. Kakaḷipi. Dvayaṃ
analyzed: ussattam kam vātam kapham ca karoti iti kakkarī aparatra pha lopaḥ kakaḷipi dvayam

original: kumbhaṇḍe. Kumbhappamāṇaphalatāya kumbhaṇḍo, aññatthe ṇḍo, kumbho viya ḍetīti vā
analyzed: kumbhaṇḍe kumbha ppamāṇa phalatāya kumbhaṇḍaḥ aññatthe kumbhaḥ viya ḍeti iti vā

original: kumbhaṇḍo, bindāgamo, kusa chedane vā, aṇḍo, sassa bho, bindāgamo, kaṃ vātaṃ umbhetīti
analyzed: kumbhaṇḍaḥ bindāgamo chedane vā aṇḍo sassa bho bindāgamo kam vātam umbheti iti

original: vā kumbhaṇḍo, aṇḍo. Valla saṃvaraṇe, ibho, mahāphalatāya sabbāsaṃ vallijātīnaṃ bhāti
analyzed: vā kumbhaṇḍaḥ aṇḍaḥ saṃvaraṇe ibhaḥ mahā phala tāya sabbāsam valli jātīnam bhāti

original: dibbatīti vā vallibho, kakkārūpi.
analyzed: dibbatīti vā

original: Dvayaṃ gorakkhakakkariyaṃ. Indassa sakkassa vāruṇī surā indavāruṇī. Visesena sarati
analyzed: dvayam gorakkha kakkariyam indassa sakkassa vāruṇī surā inda vāruṇī visesena sarati

original: hiṃsati kaphapittādayoti visālā. “Sarameho kuṭṭhahari, visālā kaphapittaghā”ti hi
analyzed: hiṃsati visālā saramehaḥ kapha pitta ghāti hi

original: dabbaguṇe. Visarati virecati etāyāti vā visālā. Dvayaṃ anupasāke. Vasati yasmiṃ khāraguṇo
analyzed: dabbaguṇe visarati virecati vā visālā dvayam vasati yasmin khāraguṇaḥ

original: vatthu. Vasa nivāse, ratthu, vasa hiṃsāyaṃ vā, vasati kaphavātapitteti vatthu. Vatthuleyyakoti
analyzed: vatthu vasa nivāse ratthu vasa hiṃsā ayam vā vasati kapha vāta pittā iti vatthu

original: samuditanāmaṃ. Laya sāyye, layāpeti sabbadoseti leyyako, ṇvu, asse, vatthu ca so
analyzed: samudita nāmam laya sāyye layāpa iti sabba dosa iti leyyakaḥ asse vatthu ca so

original: leyyako cāti vatthuleyyako. “Mौṃ-heṃ”.
analyzed: leyyako ca ati vatthuleyyakaḥ

original: 598. Dvayaṃ mūlake. Ṇvumhi mūlako. Cacca paribhāsanatajjanesu, u, assu, muṃlāpaṅa.
analyzed: dvayam mūlake mūlakaḥ cacca paribhāsana tad janesu u assu

original: Dvayaṃ kalambuke. Tamu kaṅkhāyaṃ, ṇvu, banto ca, ke jale lambatīti kalambuko, ṇvu,
analyzed: dvayam kalambuke ca ke jale lambati iti kalambukaḥ ṇvu

original: assu. Upodikāpi, udakaṃ apagatā upodikā.
analyzed: assu upodikā api udakam apagatā upodikā

original: Kāsamaddajhajjharīmaggavādayo sākabhedā sākavisesā. Kāsaṃ maddatīti kāsamaddo. Kaco,
analyzed: kāsamadda jhajjharī maggava ādayaḥ sāka bhedā sāka visesā kāsam maddati iti kāsamaddaḥ kacaḥ

original: jhajjha paribhāsanatajjanesu, aro, nadādi, jhajjharī. Kanakalā. Phaṃ vātaṃ gaṇhātīti
analyzed: paribhāsana tad janesu araḥ nada ādi jhajjharī kanakalā pham vātam gaṇhāti iti

original: phaggavo, hassa vo, phaggavo, “pै-teṃ-khā”.
analyzed: phaggavaḥ hassa vaḥ phaggavaḥ

original: 599-600. Dvayaṃ dubbāyaṃ. Sundaraṃ dalaṃ pattametassa maṅgalapāṭheti saddalo, saddaṃ
analyzed: dvayam dubbāyam sundaram dalam pattam etassa maṅgala pāṭhā iti

original: maṅgalasaddaṃ lānti bhāsanti paṭhanti brāhmaṇā yenāti vā saddalo. Dubbī hiṃsāyaṃ,
analyzed: maṅgala saddam lānti bhāsanti paṭhanti brāhmaṇāḥ yena ati vā saddalaḥ hiṃsa ayam

original: a, avamaṅgalaṃ dubbatīti dubbā, dunnimittādayo vārenti yāyāti vādubbā, nerutto. Satapabbikā,
analyzed: a avamaṅgalam dubbatīti dubbāḥ dunnimitta ādayaḥ vārenti sata pabbikā

original: bhaggavī, anantā, ruhāpi. Sā dubbā sitā sukkā ce, golomī nāma, golomajattā golomī.
analyzed: bhaggavī anantā ruhā api sā dubbā sitā sukkā ce golomī nāma go loma jattā golomī

original: Satavīriyā, gaṇḍālī, sakulākkhakopi.
analyzed: gaṇḍālī

original: Dvayaṃ bhaddamutte. Gu sadde, do. Muca mocane, to, rogaharaṇattā bhaddañca taṃ muttañceti
analyzed: dvayam bhadda mutte sadde do muca mocane bhaddam ca tam muttam ca iti

original: bhaddamuttaṃ, “nvā-mye-yeṃ-jī”. Dvayaṃ ucchumhi. Rasaṃ lātīti rasālo, dīgho. Isu
analyzed: dvayam ucchumhi rasam lāti iti rasālaḥ dīghaḥ isu

original: icchāyaṃ, u, usa dāhe vā, u, sassa cho, pubbatra issu, asarūpadvittaṃ, ucchu, pume.
analyzed: dāhe vā u sassa cho pubbatra issu a sarūpa dvittam ucchu pume

original: Catukkaṃ vaṃse. Vī gamane, ḷu, tacova sāro yassa. Vī gamane, u, nāgamo, ṇattaṃ, vanati
analyzed: catukkam vaṃse vī gamane sāraḥ yassa vī gamane u na āgamaḥ vanati

original: sambhatīti vaṃso. Vana sambhattiyaṃ, so, vasa nivāse vā, karaṇe a, niggahītāgamo.
analyzed: sambhatīti vaṃsaḥ vana sambhattiyam saḥ vasa nivāse vā karaṇe a niggahīta āgamaḥ

original: Satapabbo, yavaphalo, makkaro, tejanopi, makkaroti paṭisevati yena makkaro, saññāyaṃ
analyzed: sata pabbaḥ yava phalaḥ makkaro tejanaḥ api makkaroti paṭisevati yena makkaro saññāyaṃ

original: a. Tikaṃ pabbe. Pabba pūraṇe, pabbaṃ. Phala visaraṇe, u, ḷattaṃ. Gantha ganthane,
analyzed: a tikam pabbe pabba pūraṇe pabbam phala visaraṇe u ḷattam gantha ganthane

original: i, vaṇṇavikāre gaṇṭhi, so pumā.
analyzed: vaṇṇa vikāre saḥ pumā

original: Aniladdhutā anilena kampitā ye veṇū kīṭādibhi katarandhatāya nadanti, te kīcakā nāma siyuṃ, cakī āmasane, ṇvu, pubbāparabyañjanānaṃ vipariyayo, kīcakā.
analyzed: anila ddhutāḥ anilena kampitāḥ ye veṇū kīṭa ādibhi nadanti te kīcakāḥ nāma siyum cakī āmasane pubba apara byañjanānam vipariyayaḥ kīcakā

original: 601. Dvayaṃ naḷe. Nī naye, alo, ḷattaṃ, dhama saddaggisaṃyogesu, yu, poṭagalopyatra.
analyzed: dvayam na ḷe nī naye a laḥ ḷattam dhama sadda ggi saṃyogesu yu poṭaga lopī atra

original: Dvayaṃ kāse. Puṭaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṃsaggaṃ gacchatīti poṭagalo, massa lo. Kāsa dittiyaṃ, a, ayamanitthī.
analyzed: dvayam kāse puṭam aññam aññam saṃsaggam gacchati iti poṭagalaḥ massa lo kāsa dittiyam a ayam anitthī

original: Dvayaṃ sare. Tija nisāne, yu. Sarantyaneneti saro. Pume saññāyaṃ a, sara hiṃsāyaṃ
analyzed: dvayam sare saranti anena iti saro pume sara a sara hiṃsāyam

original: vā. Gundopyatra. Bīraṇassa setakusumassa tiṇavisesassa mūlaṃ usīraṃ nāma, vasa kantiyaṃ,
analyzed: vā gundaḥ upi atra bīraṇassa seta kusumassa tiṇa visesassa mūlam usīram nāma vasa kantiyam

original: usa dāhe vā, īro, pubbasmiṃ vassu, abhayaṃ, naladaṃ, sebyaṃ, jalāsayaṃ, amaṇālaṃ, lāmajjakampi.
analyzed: dāhe vā īraḥ pubbasmim vassu abhayam naladam sebyam jalāsayam amaṇālam lāmajjakampi

original: Haritakyābhayā paṇḍo, usīre nibbhaye tisu.
analyzed: haritakyā abhayā usīre nibbhaye tisu

original: Jalāsayo jalādhāre, usīre tu jalāsayaṃ.
analyzed: jalāsayaḥ jalādhāre usīre tu jalāsayam

original: Sebyā sevārahe siyā.
analyzed: sebyā sevārahe siyā

original: 602. Tikaṃ kuse, kusa chedane, a, varaha pādhānye, paribhāsanahiṃ sādānesu ca, iso, du paritāpe, abbho, dabbho, kutho, pavitrampi.
analyzed: tikam kuse kusa chedane a sādānesu ca isaḥ du paritāpe abbhaḥ dabbhaḥ kutho

original: Dvayaṃ “gandhakheḍa”iti khyāte tiṇe, vuttañca “bhūtinaṃ gandhakheḍañca, sugandhaṃ
analyzed: dvayam gandhakheḍā eti khyāte tiṇe vuttam ca bhūtinam gandhakheḍam ca sugandham

original: gomayappiya”nti. Atha rāmakappūrato ko assa bhedo. Rāmakappūraṃ bahupakaṇḍaṃ kappūrasugandhaṃ.
analyzed: atha rāmakappūrato kaḥ assa bhedaḥ rāmakappūram bahu pakaṇḍam kappūra sugandham

original: Gandhakheḍantu ikaḍasamānapattaṃ sākhāsabhāvaṃ bhūmilaggaṃ, atoyeva bhūtinakamuccate,
analyzed: gandha kheḍam tu ikaḍa samāna pattam sa ākhā sabhāvam bhūmi laggam a toyā iva bhūtinakam uccate

original: bhūmiyaṃ laggaṃ tiṇaṃ bhūtinakaṃ, nattaṃ, sakatthe ko.
analyzed: bhūmiyam laggam tiṇam bhūtinakam nattam saka atthe kaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ gavādīnaṃ madanīye tiṇe, ghasa adane, ṇo, yu missane, aso. Dvayaṃ pūgarukkhe. Pūja pūjāyaṃ, ṇo, pūgo. Kamu icchāyaṃ, ṇvu. Ghoṇṭāpi, “ghoṇṭā badarapūgesū”ti ruddo.
analyzed: dvayam go ādīnam madanīye tiṇe ghasa adane ṇo yu missane asaḥ dvayam pūga rukkhe pūja pūja ayam pūgaḥ kamu iccha ayam ghoṇṭā api ghoṇṭā badara pūgesu iti ruddo

original: 603. Dvayaṃ tāle. Tala patiṭṭhāyaṃ, curādi, a. Vātādayo vibhindatīti vibhedikā.
analyzed: dvayam vibhindati iti vibhedikā

original: “Vātagho brūhano cāpi, kimihā kuṭṭhanāsano;
analyzed: ca api

original: Rattapittaharo sādu, tālo sattaguṇo mato”ti.
analyzed: ratta pitta haraḥ sādu tālaḥ satta guṇaḥ mataḥ iti

original: Hi dabbaguṇo. Tiṇarājāpi. Dvayaṃ khajjūriyaṃ. Khajja khajjane, byathane ca, ūro, nadādi. Sida mocane, snehane ca, i, sanda savane vā, i, upāntassi ca, sindi.
analyzed: hi dabbaguṇaḥ tiṇarājā api dvayam khajjūriyam khajja khajjane byathane ca ūraḥ nada ādi sida mocane snehane ca i sanda savane vā i ca sindi

original: 604. Hintālādayo satta nissāratāya tiṇāni ca tāni mūlena jalapānasāmaññato pādapā
analyzed: hintāla ādayo satta nissāra tāya tiṇāni ca tāni mūlena jala pāna sāmaññato pādapā

original: ceti tiṇapādapā vuccanti, tiṇa adane, pamāṇato tālato hīno hintālo, padavipariyayo,
analyzed: ca iti tiṇa pādapāḥ vuccanti adane pamāṇato tālataḥ hīnaḥ hintālaḥ pada vipariyayo

original: rasso ca. Nāḷi viya jāyatīti nāḷikero. Aññatthe iro, konto ca, nāḷikero. Lāṅgalīpi.
analyzed: rasso ca nāḷi viya jāyati iti nāḷikeraḥ aññatthe iro konto ca nāḷikeraḥ lāṅgalīpi

original: “Lāṅgalī nāḷikere ca, sirapāṇimhi lāṅgalī”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 14.168 rabhaso. Saṇṭhānato
analyzed: lāṅgalī nāḷikere ca sira pāṇimhi lāṅgalī iti cintāmaṇiṭīkā rabhasaḥ saṇṭhānato

original: tālasadisatāya tāḷī, ḷattaṃ, upamāne ī, taḷa āghāte vā, curādi, nadādi, tāḷī. Kita
analyzed: tāḷī upamāne ī taḷaḥ āghāte vā curādi nada ādi tāḷī

original: nivāse, rogāpanayane ca, ṇvu, nadādittā ī, ketakī, ayaṃ nārī.
analyzed: nivāse roga apanayane ca ketakī ayam nārī

original: Araññavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: arañña vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 6. Araññādivaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: araññā ādi vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 605. Nava pabbatassa nāmāni. Pabba pūraṇe, to. Gira niggiraṇe, osadhādayo niggiratīti
analyzed: nava pabbatassa nāmāni pabba pūraṇe taḥ gira niggiraṇe osadha ādayaḥ niggirati iti

original: giri, i. Silānaṃ rāsi selo, silā pacurā santyasmiṃ vā selo, sela gatiyaṃ vā, a. Adda
analyzed: rāsi selo silā vā

original: gatimhi yācane ca, bhūvādi, i, adda hiṃsāyaṃ vā, curādi. Na gacchatīti nago. Na calatīti
analyzed: gatimhi yācane ca bhū ādi vā curādi na gacchati iti nagaḥ na calati iti

original: acalo. Silānamuccayo ubbedho, thūpo vā siluccayo. Sikharayogā sikharī, ī, tilakībhūto.
analyzed: acalaḥ ubbedhaḥ thūpaḥ vā siluccayaḥ sikhara yogā tilakībhūtaḥ

original: Bhuṃ bhūmiṃ dharatīti bhūdharo, bhuyā dharīyatīti vā bhūdharo, bāhulyena a, bhūdharo.
analyzed: bhum bhūmim dharati iti bhūdharaḥ bhuyā dharīyati iti vā bhūdharaḥ bāhulyena

original: Ahāriyo, gottopi, desantaraṃ netumasakyattā ahāriyo, gavaṃ bhūmiṃ dhāraṇena tāyate gotto.
analyzed: ahāriyaḥ gottaḥ api ahāriyaḥ gavam bhūmim dhāraṇena tāyate gottaḥ

original: Pañcakaṃ silāyaṃ. Ama gatiyaṃ, bho. Vana, sana sambhattiyaṃ, pasanati byāpetīti pāsāṇo,
analyzed: pañcakam silāyam gatiyam bho vana sana sambhattiyam pasanati byāpeti iti pāsāṇaḥ

original: nipātanā, pasa bandhane vā, yu. Asu khepane, mo, asmā, rājādi, asu byāpane vā. Pala
analyzed: nipātanā pasa bandhane vā yu asu khepane maḥ asmā rāja ādi asu byāpane vā pala

original: rakkhaṇe, upalo, upa dehe vā, alapaccayo nipāto. Sila ucce, a. Silā, nārī.
analyzed: rakkhaṇe upalaḥ upa dehe vā ala paccayaḥ nipātaḥ sile ucce a silā nārī

original: 606. Gijjhakūṭādayo tikūṭantā “vaṅkādī”ti ettha ādinā malayadaddurādayo ca nagā nagavisesā.
analyzed: gijjhakūṭa ādayaḥ vaṅka ādi iti ettha ādinā malaya daddura ādayaḥ ca nagāḥ naga visesā

original: Gijjhā sakuṇavisesā assa kūṭe vasanti, gijjhasadisakūṭayuttatāya vā gijjhakūṭo. Visesena
analyzed: gijjhā sakuṇa visesāḥ assa kūṭe vasanti gijjha sadisa kūṭa yutta tāya vā gijjha kūṭaḥ visesena

original: bhātīti vebhāro, aro. Pula mahatte, visesena pulatīti vepullo. Isayo gilatīti isigili,
analyzed: bhāti iti vebhāraḥ araḥ mahatte visesena pulatīti vepullaḥ isayaḥ gilatīti isigili

original: i. Ādiccagamanavirodhena viruddhaṃ jhāyatīti viñjho. Paṇḍuvaṇṇatāya paṇḍavo, paṇḍa
analyzed: ādicca gamana virodhena viruddham jhāyati iti viñjhaḥ paṇḍu vaṇṇa tāya paṇḍavaḥ paṇḍa

original: gatiyaṃ vā, avo. Kuṭilatāya vaṅko. Dvayaṃ udayagirimhi. Aparaselāpekkhāya pubbaselo.

analyzed: i nad ādi a nad ādi tte eṇaḥ evam ete api uppāditāḥ dvayam pampaṭake paṭa

original: gamane, ṇvu, upasaggante bindāgamo ca. Pabba gatiyaṃ, ṇvu, bindāgamo, balopo ca.
analyzed: gamane ṇvu upasagga ante binda āgamaḥ ca pabba gatiyam ṇvu binda āgamaḥ ba lopaḥ ca

original: Dvayaṃ vātamige. Gamanena vātasamo migo vātamigo. Calatismā yu, nadādi. Tikaṃ mūsike. Musa theyye, ṇvu, ittañca. Āpubbo khanu avadāraṇe, u, nalopo. Unda pasavanakledanesu, ūro.
analyzed: dvayam vāta mige gamanena vāta samaḥ migaḥ vāta migaḥ calati smā yu nad ādi tikam mūsike musa theyye ṇvu it tañca ā pubbaḥ khanu avadāraṇe u na lopaḥ unda pasavana kledanesu ūro

original: 619. Camarādayo, sarabhādayo ca migantarā migavisesā. Camaro uttarāpathe khyāto,
analyzed: camara ādayaḥ sarabha ādayaḥ ca migantarāḥ miga visesā camaraḥ uttarāpathe khyātaḥ

original: yassa pucchaṃ cāmaraṃ, camu adane, aro, camaro, thiyaṃ camarī. Pasado cittalomī,
analyzed: yassa puccham cāmaram camu adane araḥ camaraḥ thiyam camarī pasadaḥ cittalomī

original: pasa bandhane, ado. Kuyaṃ raṅgatīti kuruṅgo, assu, uttābhāve kuraṅgo. Sabbesampi
analyzed: pasa bandhane ado kuyam raṅgati iti kuruṅgaḥ assu utta abhāve kuraṅgo sabbesam pi

original: migānaṃ mātuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti migamātukā, upamāne ko. Ru sadde, ru. Ruṇaṃ karotīti
analyzed: migānam mātuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati iti migamātukā upamāne kaḥ ru sadde ru ruṇam karoti iti

original: raṅku, u, ṇassa lopo rakārassa, ussa ca. Attānaṃ nīcaṃ karotīti nīko. Saratismā abho,

original: sarabho. Aṭṭhāpado uddhaṃnayano sīhassāpi hantā, tassa ca pādacatukkaṃ uddhaṃ bhavatīti.
analyzed: sarabhaḥ aṭṭhāpadaḥ uddhaṃnayano sīhassa api hantā tassa ca pāda catukkam uddham bhavati iti

original: 620. Piyakādayo tayo, ādinā kandalīcīnasamūruādayo ca cammayonayo, tena bhūtassa
analyzed: piyaka ādayo tayo ādinā kandalī cīna samūru ādayo ca camma yonayo tena bhūtassa

original: cammassa uppattikāraṇattā, ete ca citratanuruhādayo kambojādimhi, uttarāpathe ca
analyzed: cammassa uppatti kāraṇa ttā ete ca citra tanuruha ādayaḥ kamboja ādimhi uttarāpathe ca

original: jāyanti, tatreva sanāmakhyātā. Yathā migasaddo vanyapasusāmaññe, visese ca kuraṅgākhye
analyzed: jāyanti tatra iva sa nāma khyātāḥ yathā miga saddaḥ vanya pasu sāmaññe visese ca kuraṅga ākhye

original: vattati, yathā ca lohasaddo suvaṇṇādike tejasasāmaññe, visese ca, tathā cammayoniajinayonisaddāpi
analyzed: vattati yathā ca loha saddaḥ suvaṇṇa ādike tejasa sāmaññe visese ca tathā cammayoni ajinayoni saddā api

original: migasāmaññe, migavisese ceti tathā vuttā.
analyzed: miga sāmaññe miga visese ca iti tathā vuttā

original: Pī tappanakantīsu, ṇvu, iyādeso. Ūrumhi atisayacammayuttatāya camūru, ekassa massa lopo. Kadi avhāne, alo, ī, kadalī ca so migo ceti kadalīmigo.
analyzed: pī tappana kantīsu ṇvu iya ādesaḥ ūrumhi atisaya camma yutta tāya camūru ekassa massa lopaḥ kadi avhāne a laḥ ī kadalī ca saḥ migaḥ ca iti kadalīmigaḥ

original: Sīhādayo yathāvuttā, avuttā ca sabbe catuppadā sattā “migā, pasavo”ti coccante. Pasavantīti pasavo, su abhisave, pasa bandhane vā, u.
analyzed: sīha ādayaḥ yathā vuttāḥ avuttā ca sabbe catuppadā sattā migā pasavaḥ iti ca uccante pasavanti iti pasavaḥ su abhisave pasa bandhane vā u

original: 621. Catukkaṃ lūtāyaṃ. Lū chedane, to, lūtā, sakatthe iko, lūtikā, dve nāriyaṃ. Uṇṇāpāyo
analyzed: catukkam lūtā ayam lū chedane taḥ lūtā saka tthe i kaḥ lūtikā dve nāriyam uṇṇāpāyaḥ

original: tantu uṇṇā, sā nābhiyaṃ assa uṇṇanābhi, rasso. Makkaṭo viya sākhāyaṃ attano tantumhi
analyzed: tantu uṇṇā sā nābhiyam assa uṇṇa nābhi rassaḥ makkaṭaḥ viya sākhāyam tantumhi

original: gacchatīti makkaṭako.
analyzed: gacchati iti makkaṭakaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ gomayajavicchike. Viccha gamane, ṇvu, vicchiko, satapadiyampi, āḷaṃ vicchikanaṅgulaṃ,
analyzed: dvayam gomaya ja vicchike viccha gamane āḷam

original: taṃyogā āḷi. Dvayaṃ gharagodhāyaṃ. Saratismā ū, avo canto. Gharaṃ nissitā godhā gharagoḷikā,
analyzed: dvayam gharagodhāyam saratismai u avo cantaḥ gharam nissitā godhā gharagoḷikā

original: dhassa ḷo, sakatthe ko.
analyzed: dhassa ḷaḥ sa ka tthe kaḥ

original: 622. Dvayaṃ godhāyaṃ. Gudha rose, a, godhā, nārī. Kuṇḍa dāhe, a, kuṇḍo. Dvayaṃ rattapāyaṃ. Kaṇṇassa jalūkā rattapā kaṇṇajalūkā. Sataṃ padā yassā satapadī, padasaddo pādattho.
analyzed: dvayam godhāyam gudha rose a godhā nārī kuṇḍa dāhe a kuṇḍaḥ dvayam rattapāyam kaṇṇassa jalūkā rattapā kaṇṇajalūkā satam padā yassā satapadī pada saddo pāda ttho

original: Dvayaṃ kalandake. Kanda avhāne, rodane ca, kandatīti kalandako, lamajjho, ṇvu. Kāḷavaṇṇatāya
analyzed: dvayam kalandake avhāne rodane ca kandati iti kalandakaḥ la majjhaḥ ṇvu kāḷa vaṇṇa tāya

original: kāḷakā, nāriyaṃ. Dvayaṃ nakule, natthi kulaṃ etassa sappesu nakulo, arisappopi. Nakka
analyzed: kāḷakāḥ nāriyam dvayam nakule natthi kulam etassa sappesu nakulaḥ ari sappaḥ api

original: nāsane vā, ulo, kalopo, sappe nāsetīti nakulo. Maṅga gatyattho daṇḍako dhātu, uso.
analyzed: nāsane vai ulo ka lopaḥ sappe nāseti iti nakulaḥ maṅga gati atthaḥ daṇḍakaḥ

original: 623. Dvayaṃ kakaṇṭake. Kucchito kaṇṭako assa, ussattaṃ. Sarati dhāvatīti saraṭo, aṭo.
analyzed: dvayam kakaṇṭake kucchitaḥ kaṇṭakaḥ assa ussattam sarati dhāvati iti saraṭaḥ aṭaḥ

original: Catukkaṃ kīṭe. Kīṭa bandhane, a, kīṭa gamane vā, dīghādi. Pula mahatthe, avo, ḷattaṃ. Kucchitaṃ amati gacchatīti kimi, i, assittaṃ. Pakārena anatīti pāṇako, ṇvu, ṇattaṃ.
analyzed: kīṭe kīṭa bandhane a kīṭa gamane vā dīgha ādi pula mahatthe avaḥ ḷattam kucchitam amati gacchati iti pakārena anati iti

original: Dvayaṃ kaṇṭalomakīṭe. Uccaṃ ṭhānaṃ āliṅgatīti uccāliṅgo. Bahulomayutto pāṇako lomasapāṇako.
analyzed: dvayam kaṇṭa loma kīṭe uccam ṭhānam āliṅgati iti uccāliṅgaḥ bahu loma yutto pāṇakaḥ lomasa pāṇakaḥ

original: 624-625. Sāddhapajjena sakuṇassa nāmāni. Vihe ākāse gacchatīti vihaṅgo, vihaṅgamo
analyzed: sāddhapajjena sakuṇassa nāmāni vihe ākāse gacchati iti vihaṅgaḥ vihaṅgamaḥ

original: ca, ākāsapariyāyo cettha vihasaddo, vehāsassa vā vihādeso. Pakkhayuttatāya pakkhī.

analyzed: sakuntaḥ sakuṇī ca saka sattiyam uṇaḥ untaḥ uṇī ca patantaḥ ḍentaḥ pattena vā gacchati iti

analyzed: pataṅgaḥ aparatra ta lopaḥ mātukucchitaḥ aṇḍataḥ ca ati dvi kkhattum jāyati iti dvijaḥ uḍḍana ādīsu

analyzed: pakkhī cakoro paritakkane uro caṅkoraḥ api tarati tittiraḥ

analyzed: pekhuṇam pata gamane to vā pattam pata

analyzed: pattabhede ca koso pumā eva icchito ti cintāmaṇi ṭīkā ruddaḥ dvayam pakkhi gehe

original: Nīla vaṇṇe, a, ḷattaṃ, nī naye vā, ilo. Kucchitaṃ aṇḍavināsanādikaṃ lunātīti kulāvakaṃ, ṇvu.
analyzed: nīla vaṇṇe a ḷattam nī naye vā kucchitam aṇḍa vināsana ādikam lunāti iti kulāvakam ṇvu

original: 628. Dvayaṃ garuḷānaṃ mātari. Vino pakkhino namanti yaṃ vinatā. Thīpumadvayaṃ itthipurisānaṃ
analyzed: dvayam garuḷānam mātari vino pakkhinaḥ namanti yam vinatā itthi purisānam

original: Chakkaṃ yugaḷamatte. Yuja yoge, a, yugaṃ, alapaccaye yugaḷaṃ, ḷattaṃ, yugalampi.

original: Ubha pūraṇe, ṇo, dvandādeso ca, dvandaṃ, yamu uparame, ṇvu, alo ca, yamakaṃ, yamalañca, apaccaye yamaṃ.
analyzed: ubha pūraṇe ṇaḥ dvanda ādesaḥ ca dvandam uparame ṇvu a laḥ ca yamakam yamalam ca a paccaye yamam

analyzed: saha ati ga ṇaḥ saha avayavena gacchati iti saṅghātaḥ hana gamane ṇaḥ saha avayavena

original: Saha avayavena duhayatīti sandoho, duha papūraṇe. Nissesato vahati avayavanti nivaho.
analyzed: saha avayavena duhayati iti sandohaḥ duha pa pūraṇe nissesataḥ vahati avayavanti nivahaḥ

original: Avayavaṃ katvā byapiyati gacchatīti ogho ucyate ogho uca samavāye ghau nipātanā cassa
analyzed: avayavam katvā byapiyati gacchati iti oghaḥ ucyate samavāye ghau nipātanā cassa

original: gho (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 15.39). Visanti avayavā yasminti visaro, aro. Avayavaṃ samīpe
analyzed: cintāmaṇi ṭīkā

original: karotīti nikaro. Ekekāpekkhāya appatthena kasaṅkhātā avayavā āyanti yasmiṃ kāyo,
analyzed: karoti iti nikaraḥ ekeka apekkhāya appatthena avayavāḥ āyanti yasmin kāyo

analyzed: atha vā kucchitānam kesa ādīnam āyo ti kāyo saḥ viya avayavānam uppatti ṭṭhānam

analyzed: idha samūhaḥ vuttaḥ anta tthena kham saṅkhātam avayavam dhāreti iti khandho khādati avayaveti

original: vā khandho, amajjhadīghe samudayo. Ghaṭa ghaṭane. Ghaṭanaṃ rāsibhavanaṃ, ghaṭenti
analyzed: vā khandhaḥ a majjha dīghe samudayaḥ ghaṭa ghaṭane ghaṭanam rāsi bhavanam ghaṭenti

original: assaṃ avayavāti ghaṭā. Saha avayavena etīti samiti,ti. Saha avayavena gacchatīti
analyzed: assam saha avayavena eti iti saha avayavena gacchati iti

original: saṃhati, hana gatiyaṃ,ti, nalopo. Rasa assādane, iṇa. Puñja kucchāyaṃ. Saha avayavena
analyzed: saṃhati hana gati yaṃti na lopaḥ rasa assādane iṇa puñja kucchāyam saha avayavena

original: byāpetvā ayatīti samavāyo. Pūgo tambūlepi. Janeti avayaveti jātaṃ, to. Kaṃ attānaṃ
analyzed: ayati iti tambūle pi jana iti avayaveti jātam kam attānam

original: detīti kado, cakkhādiko sarīrāvayavo. Kado viya kado, avayavo, taṃ vakati ādadātīti
analyzed: deti iti kado cakkha ādiko sarīra avayavo kado viya kado avayavo tam vakati ādadāti iti

original: kadambakaṃ. Visesena ūhantyasmiṃ avayavā byūho. Vitanoti avayaveti vitānaṃ, ṇo. Gupa
analyzed: kadambakam visesena ūhanti asmin avayavāḥ byūhaḥ vitanoti avayava iti vitānam ṇaḥ gupa

original: rakkhaṇe, bo, passa mo, gumbo, gumbampi. Kalaṃ avayavabhāvaṃ pāti rakkhatīti kalāpo,
analyzed: rakkhaṇe baḥ passa maḥ gumbaḥ gumbam pi kalam avayava bhāvam pāti rakkhati iti kalāpaḥ

original: “kalā soḷasamo bhāgo”ti hi vuttattā kalāsaddo bhāgatthopyatthīti ñāyati. Jala dittiyaṃ.
analyzed: kalā soḷasamaḥ bhāgaḥ iti hi vutta ttā kalā saddo bhāga tthaḥ api atthi iti ñāyati

original: Jalati avayavenāti jālaṃ. Avayavena maṇḍatīti maṇḍalaṃ, maṇḍa vibhūsāyaṃ, alo.
analyzed: jalati avayavena ati jālam avayavena maṇḍati iti maṇḍalam

original: 632. Sāddhapajjena gaṇabhedā vuccante. Tatra jātyādīhi samānānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ, apāṇīnañca

original: Dvayaṃ gāmacāṭake, cāṭakamatte vā. Kalahaṃ ravatīti kalaviṅko, yadādi. Kaṃ sukhaṃ lunātīti vā kalaviṅko, iko, niggahītāgamo ca. Caṭa bhede, ṇvu, cāṭako.

original: Dvayaṃ veḷuriyacchavilome citrapakkhe “suvaṇṇacūḷe”ti khyāte. Dibha santhambhe, dvittaṃ, bindāgamo ca. “Ki”iti saddaṃ karotīti kikī, ṇī, cāso, divipi cāso kikīdivi (amara 15.16).
analyzed: dvayam veḷuriya chavi lome citra pakkhe suvaṇṇa cūḷā iti khyāte santhambhe dvittam binda āgamaḥ ca saddam karoti iti ca aso amara

original: 644. Dvayaṃ meghasāme “ṭī-ṭौ”iti khyāte. Kadambayogā kādambo. Kāḷavaṇṇo haṃso kāḷahaṃso, kālahaṃsopi.

original: Dvayaṃ “ṅahe-ḍo”iti khyāte sakuṇe. Sakunto vutto, “sakunto pakkhibhedasmiṃ, bhāsapakkhīkhagesu

original: (?) samuppannassa assattharukkhasadisassa rukkhassa niyyāso, ahicchattamalayakoṅkaṇasiṅgaverapabbatādīsu
analyzed: samuppannassa assattha rukkha sadisassa rukkhassa niyyāsaḥ ahicchatta malaya koṅkaṇa siṅgavera pabbata ādīsu

original: coppajjate. Vaṇṇena kāḷañca taṃ sattānaṃ jīvitaharaṇato lohamuggarasadisatāya kūṭañceti kāḷakūṭaṃ.
analyzed: ca uppajjate vaṇṇena kāḷam ca tam sattānam jīvita haraṇataḥ loha muggara sadisa tāya kūṭam ca iti kāḷakūṭam

original: Brahmaputto tu kapilo, malayaddibhavo kharo;
analyzed: brahmaputto tu kapilaḥ malayaddi bhavaḥ kharo

original: Padīpano tu dahano, rattavaṇṇo’ñjanaddijo cintāmaṇiṭīkā 8.10-11.
Darade bhavo dārado, suppabhanāmako taṃdesapasiddho ca. Vacchanābho sinduvārapattasadiso
analyzed: darade bhavaḥ dāradaḥ suppabha nāmako ca vaccha nābhaḥ sinduvāra patta sadiso

original: ca taṃsamīpe rukkho na vaddhate, taṃsamphassavāyu ca jarayati, viñjhāyaṃ, kikkindāyañca
analyzed: ca taṃ samīpe rukkhaḥ na vaddhate taṃ samphassa vāyu ca jarayati viñjhāyam kikkindāyam ca

original: jāyate, evaṃ visantarānampi sarūpaṃ āgamato viññeyyaṃ.
analyzed: jāyate evam sarūpam āgamataḥ viññeyyam

original: Dvayaṃ dhanatthaṃ sappaggāhe. Vāḷaṃ sappaṃ gaṇhanasīlatāya vāḷagāhī. Ahino tuṇḍena mukhena dibbatīti ahituṇḍiko, ṇiko, “vāḷaggāho’hituṇḍiko”ti amarakose 8.11-gāthāyampi amaramālā.
analyzed: dvayam dhanattham sappa ggāhe vāḷam sappam gaṇhana sīla tāya vāḷagāhī ahinaḥ tuṇḍena mukhena dibbati iti ahituṇḍikaḥ ṇikaḥ amarakose amaramālā

original: 657. Tikaṃ niraye. Ayo iṭṭhaphalaṃ, so niggato asmāti nirayo, nindito rayo gamanaṃ etthāti vā nirayo. Duṭṭhā gati duggati. Apuññe netīti narako, ṇvu, ranto ca, narako.
analyzed: tikam niraye ayaḥ iṭṭha phalam saḥ niggataḥ asmā iti nirayaḥ ninditaḥ rayaḥ gamanam ettha ati vā nirayaḥ duṭṭhā gati duggati apuññe neti iti narakaḥ ranto ca narako

original: Tesu nirayesu yo “mahānirayo”ti vutto, so aṭṭhadhā hotīti taṃ dasseti “sañjīvo”ccādinā
analyzed: tesu nirayesu yo mahānirayo ti vutto so aṭṭhadhā hoti iti tam dasseti sañjīva ucca ādinā

original: silokena. Marantāpi kammaphalānubhavanatthaṃ punappunaṃ jīvanti asmiṃ sañjīvo. Yattha
analyzed: si lokena marantā api kamma phala anubhavana tham punappunam jīvanti asmin sañjīvaḥ

original: niraye nerayikānaṃ sarīrāni vaḍḍhakīnaṃ kāḷasuttena saññāṇaṃ katvā vāsiyā tacchanti,
analyzed: niraye nerayikānam sarīrāni vaḍḍhakīnam kāḷasuttena saññāṇam katvā vāsiyā tacchanti

original: so kāḷasutto. Bhusaṃ, punappunaṃ vā dukkhitasaddena ravanti asmiṃ roruvo, mahanto
analyzed: saḥ kāḷasuttaḥ bhusam punappunam vā dukkhita saddena ravanti asmin roruvaḥ mahantaḥ

original: ca so roruvo cāti mahāroruvo. Puna “roruvo”ti cūḷaroruvo vutto. Bhusaṃ patanti asmiṃ
analyzed: ca saḥ roruvaḥ ca ati mahā roruvaḥ punar roruvā uti cūḷa roruvaḥ vuttaḥ bhusam patanti asmin

original: patāpano, “vīci taraṅge appe cā”ti ruddo, natthi sukhassa vīci lesopi atrāti avīci,
analyzed: patāpanaḥ vīci taraṅge appe ca ati ruddo natthi sukhassa vīci leso pi atra ati a vīci

original: “vīci sukhataraṅgesū”ti tikaṇḍaseso tikaṇḍasesa 3.3.78, tasmā natthi vīci sukhaṃ
analyzed: vīci sukha taraṅgesu iti tikaṇḍaseso tikaṇḍasesa tasmā natthi vīci sukham

original: etthāti avīci. Samantato āgatehi pabbatehi haññanti atrāti saṅghāto. Tapanti atra
analyzed: ettha ati avīci samantataḥ āgatehi pabbatehi haññanti atra ati saṅghātaḥ tapanti atra

original: tāpano, itisaddo aṭṭhannaṃ parisamāpanattho.
analyzed: tāpanaḥ iti saddaḥ aṭṭhannam parisamāpana atthaḥ

original: 658. Tattha nirayesu vetaraṇī ca lohakumbhī cāti ime dve nirayā jalāsayā jalādhārā, te ca thiyaṃ, taraṇī nāvā, sā natthi yassaṃ vetaraṇī. Lohamayā kumbhī lohakumbhī.
analyzed: tattha nirayesu vetaraṇī ca lohakumbhī ca ati ime dve nirayā jalāsayāḥ jalādhārā te ca thiyam taraṇī nāvā sā natthi vetaraṇī loha mayā kumbhī lohakumbhī

original: Dvayaṃ nirayapāle. Kāraṇā yātanā, sā ca tibbavedanā, taṃ karotīti kāraṇiko. Nirayagatasatte pātīti nirayapo.
analyzed: dvayam niraya pāle kāraṇā yātanā sā ca tibba vedanā tam karoti iti kāraṇikaḥ niraya gata satte pāti iti niraya po

original: Dvayaṃ nirayagatasatte. Nirayaṃ gacchatīti nerayiko. Narakaṃ gacchatīti nārako.
analyzed: dvayam niraya gata satte nirayam gacchati iti nerayikaḥ narakam gacchati iti

original: 659. Udadhi pariyantaṃ samuddassa nāmaṃ. Aṇṇo jalaṃ, so vāti gacchati yasmiṃ aṇṇavo,
analyzed: udadhi pariyantam samuddassa nāmam aṇṇaḥ jalam saḥ vāti gacchati yasmin

original: aṇṇo yasmiṃ vijjatīti vā aṇṇavo, assatthyatthe vo. Sagarehi rājakumārehi khato sāgaro,
analyzed: aṇṇaḥ yasmin vijjati iti vā aṇṇavaḥ assatthi atthe vaḥ sagarehi rāja kumārehi khataḥ sāgaraḥ

original: sānaṃ dhanānaṃ ākaroti vā sāgaro, kassa go, sāga saṃvaraṇe vā, aro. Sandateti sindhu,
analyzed: ākaroti vā sāgaraḥ kassa go sāga saṃvaraṇe vā araḥ sandata iti sindhu

original: sanda savane, yadādi. Udi kledane, sammā klidanti candodaye asmā āpānīti samuddo.
analyzed: sanda savane yad ādi udi kledane sammā klidanti canda udaye asmai āpāni iti samuddaḥ

original: Jalāni, udakāni ca nidhīyante, dhīyante cātrāti jalanidhi, udadhi ca, udakassa udādeso.
analyzed: jalāni udakāni ca nidhīyante dhīyante ca atra ati jalanidhi udadhi ca udakassa udādesaḥ

original: Tassa samuddassa khīraṇṇavo, ādinā lavaṇodo, dadhyudo, ghatodo, ucchurasodo, madirodo,
analyzed: tassa samuddassa khīraṇṇavaḥ ādinā lavaṇodaḥ dadhyudaḥ ghatodaḥ ucchurasodaḥ madirodaḥ

original: sādudako cāti ime satta mahaṇṇavavisesā bhavanti byākhyāsudhā 1.10.2. Khīravaṇṇo aṇṇavo khīraṇṇavo.
analyzed: ca ati ime satta bhavanti byākhyā sudhā khīra vaṇṇaḥ aṇṇavaḥ khīraṇṇavaḥ

original: 660. Assa samuddassa kūladeso tīradeso velā nāma, vigacchanti irā yassaṃ velā, lattaṃ. Cakkamiva salilānaṃ jalānaṃ bhamo bhamanaṃ āvaṭṭo nāma, āvaṭṭanti jalāni atrāti āvaṭṭo.
analyzed: assa samuddassa kūla desaḥ tīra desaḥ velā nāma vigacchanti irā velā lattam cakkam iva salilānam jalānam bhamaḥ bhamanam āvaṭṭaḥ nāma āvaṭṭanti jalāni atra ati āvaṭṭaḥ

original: Tikaṃ bindumhi. Thu abhitthave, vo, usse. Vidi avayave, u, bindu. Phusa phusane, to, phusitaṃ. Pākāre, gehāditittiyañca jalaniggamo bhamo nāma, bhamu anavaṭṭhāne.
analyzed: tikam bindumhi thu abhitthave vo usse vidi avayave u bindu phusa phusane to phusitam pākāre geha āditittiyam ca jala niggamaḥ bhamaḥ nāma anavaṭṭhāne

original: 661. Siloko udake. Āpa byāpane, appoti sabbatrāti āpo. Pātabbanti payo, pā pāne,
analyzed: silokaḥ udake āpa byāpane sabbatra ati āpaḥ pātabbanti payaḥ pā pāne

original: ṇyo. Rasso, payo. Jala dhaññe, a. Vārayati ninnonatanti vāri, vara nisedhe, ṇi, vārayati
analyzed: ṇyo rasso payaḥ jala dhaññe a vārayati vāri vara nisedhe ṇi vārayati

original: pipāsanti vā vāri. Pīyateti pānīyaṃ, anīyo. Salatīti salilaṃ, sala gatiyaṃ, ilo.
analyzed: pipāsanti vā vāri pīyate iti pānīyam salati iti salilam

original: Udi kledane, ṇvu, ulopo, dakaṃ pipāsacchedaṃ karotīti vā dakaṃ, “dā dānacchedadhātū”ti
analyzed: udi kledane ṇvu u lopaḥ dakam pipāsa chedam karoti iti vā dakam dā dāna cheda dhātu uti

original: ekakkharakosa 20 gāthā hi ekakkharakose, rasso. Ana sadde, a, dvittaṃ, ara gamane
analyzed: ekakkharakosa gāthā hi ekakkharakose rassaḥ ana sadde a dvittam ara gamane

original: vā, to, annādeso, ṇattaṃ. Nī naye, īro. Vana sambhattiyaṃ. Vanīyate pipāsehīti vanaṃ.
analyzed: vā taḥ anna ādesaḥ na īraḥ vana sambhattiyam vanīyate pipāsehi iti vanam

original: Vā gamane, alo. Tāyate pālayateti toyaṃ, tā pālane, curādi, yo, ākārassottaṃ. Amba
analyzed: vā gamane tāyate pālayata iti toyam pālane curādi amba

original: sadde, u, ambu. Udi pasavanakledanesu, ṇvu, udakaṃ. Kara karaṇe, kvi, kaṃ. Kamalaṃ,
analyzed: ambu udi pa savana kledanesu udakam kara karaṇe kvi kam kamalam

original: khīrampi, kamu icchākantīsu, alo. Khanu hiṃsāyaṃ, īro, nalopo, khī khaye vā, khīraṃ.
analyzed: khīram pi īraḥ khaye vā khīram

original: 662. Catukkaṃ taraṅge. Taranto gacchati, tīraṃ vā gacchatīti taraṅgo, aluttasamāso,
analyzed: catukkam taraṅge tarantaḥ gacchati tīram vā gacchati iti taraṅgaḥ a lutta samāsaḥ

original: paratra īssattaṃ. Sayameva bhijjateti bhaṅgo, a. Ūha vitakke, mi, halopo, ūmi, ara
analyzed: paratra sayam eva bhijjata iti bhaṅgaḥ a ūha vitakke mi ha lopaḥ ū mi ara

original: gamane vā, mi, assū, ralopo. Vimhayaṃ vicittaṃ cinotīti vīci, i, upasaggassa dīgho,
analyzed: gamane vā mi assū ra lopaḥ vimhayam vicittam cinoti iti vīci i upasaggassa dīghaḥ

original: ete dve pumitthiyaṃ.
analyzed: ete dve pumitthiyam

original: Ullolo, kallolo cāti idaṃ dvayaṃ mahāvīcīsu kathyate, lola ummādane, ullolayatīti ullolo, ṇo, ula gamane vā, olo, dvittaṃ. Kalla sadde, olo, kallolo.
analyzed: ullolaḥ kallolaḥ ca ati idam dvayam mahāvīcīsu kathyate lole ummādane ullolayati iti ullolaḥ gamane vā olaḥ kalla sadde olaḥ kallolo

original: 663. Silokaddhaṃ kaddame. Jalaṃ balate jambālo, kammani ṇo, makāro vaṇṇavikāro. Kala
analyzed: silokaddham kaddame jalam jambālaḥ kammani ṇaḥ makāraḥ vaṇṇa vikāraḥ

original: saṅkhyāne, alo. Paca vitthāravacane, kammani ṇo. Cikkha vacane, alo, dvittaṃ. Kada
analyzed: saṅkhyāne a laḥ paca vitthāra vacane kammani ṇo cikkha vacane a laḥ dvittam kada

original: madde, amo, dvittaṃ.
analyzed: madde amaḥ dvittam

original: Chakkaṃ vālukāyaṃ. Pula mahatthe, ino, ḷattaṃ. Vala saṃvaraṇe, ṇvu, assu, vālukā,
analyzed: chakkam vālukāyam mahatthe inaḥ ḷattam vala saṃvaraṇe ṇvu assu vālukā

original: thī. Vaṇṇa sadde, vaṇṇo. Mara pāṇacāge, u, maru, devepi. Ara gamane, u, assu, uru,
analyzed: thī vaṇṇa sadde vaṇṇo mara pāṇa cāge u maru devepi ara gamane u assu uru

original: mahantepi, vaṇṇo ca maru ca uru ca vaṇṇamarūru. Sica paggharaṇe, to, sikatā, thī.
analyzed: mahante pi vaṇṇo ca maru ca uru ca vaṇṇa maru ūru sica paggharaṇe to sikatā thī

original: 664. Jalamajjhagataṃ talaṃ kammabhūtaṃ “antarīpaṃ, dīpo”ti coccate. Dvidhāgatānaṃ
analyzed: talam kamma bhūtam antarīpam ca uccate

original: āpānaṃ antaragataṃ antarīpaṃ, ākārassī. “Antarīya”nti vā pāṭho, tadā dvidhāgatānaṃ
analyzed: āpānam antara gatam antarīpam vā

original: āpānaṃ antare bhavaṃ antarīyanti viggaho, akārassī. Dvidhāgatāni āpāni asmiṃ hetubhūteti
analyzed: āpānam antare bhavam antarīyanti viggahaḥ akārassī dvidhā gatāni āpāni asmin hetu bhūtā iti

original: dīpo. Vakāraākārānaṃ lopo, issī ca, dīpo, vākārena dīpampi.
analyzed: dīpaḥ vakāra ākārānam lopaḥ ca dīpaḥ vākārena

original: Pañcakaṃ tīrassa nāmaṃ. Pāra tīra kammasampattiyaṃ, curādi, a. Kūla āvaraṇe, ṇo. Rudha āvaraṇe, rodhaṃ. Aññapārādinivattanatthaṃ “patīra”nti vuttaṃ. Taṭa ussaye, a, thiyaṃ, taṭī.
analyzed: pañcakam tīrassa nāmam pāra tīra kamma sampattiyam curādi a kūla āvaraṇe ṇo āvaraṇe rodham añña pāra ādi nivattana attham vuttam taṭa ussaye a thiyam taṭī

original: 665. Paramhi tīrasmiṃ pārasaddo, so ca napuṃsake, pāra tīra kammasampattiyaṃ, pāra
analyzed: paramhi tīrasmim pāra saddo saḥ ca napuṃsake kamma sampattiyam

original: sāmatthiye vā, pārayati taraṅgādayo vāretunti pāraṃ. Orantutīraṃ “apāra”ntyuccate,
analyzed: vā pārayati taraṅga ādayaḥ pāram

original: avare tīradese bhavaṃ oraṃ, ṇo. Pārato aññaṃ tīraṃ apāraṃ.
analyzed: avare tīra dese bhavam oram no pāratas aññam tīram apāram

original: Pañcakaṃ uḷumpe. Uḷuto dakato pāti rakkhati uḷupo, soyeva niggahītāgamavasena uḷumpo.
analyzed: pañcakam uḷumpe uḷutaḥ dakataḥ pāti rakkhati uḷupaḥ niggahīta āgama vasena uḷumpaḥ

original: Plavati, plavanti anenāti vā plavo, plava gamane, gamanaṃ atra jalagamanaṃ. Kula
analyzed: plavati plavanti anena ati vā gamane gamanam atra jala gamanam kula

original: santāne, a, ke ulati gacchatīti vā kullo, a, dvittaṃ. Taranti anena taro, tara plavataraṇesu.
analyzed: santāne a ke gacchati iti vā kullaḥ a dvittam taranti anena tara plava taraṇesu

original: Gamanāgamanavasena punappunaṃ jale aranti yāya, sā paccarī, a, nadādi.
analyzed: gamana āgamana vasena punappunam jale sā

original: 666. Tikaṃ nāvāyaṃ. Taranti yāya taraṇī, yu, nadādi, ipaccaye tari, īmhi tu tarī.
analyzed: tikam nāvā ayam taranti yāya taraṇī yu nad ādi i paccaye tari īmhi tu tarī

original: Nu thutiyaṃ, a, vuḍḍhāvādesā, nāvā. Dvayaṃ laṅkārathambhe. Kūpa gamane, ṇvu, kūpako,
analyzed: nu thutiyam a vuḍḍhāvādesā nāvā dvayam laṅkā rathambhe kūpa gamane ṇvu kūpakaḥ

original: apaccayo vā, tadā sakatthe ko. Kamu icchāyaṃ, bho, sakatthe ko, assu ca, kumbhakaṃ.
analyzed: a paccayaḥ vā tadā saka tthe kaḥ iccha ayam bho saka tthe kaḥ assu ca kumbhakam

original: Dvayaṃ “pe seṃ”iti khyāte. Tarassa pacchābhāge bandhitabboti pacchābandho. Ga’micchitadisaṃ
analyzed: dvayam seṃ iti khyāte tarassa pacchābhāge bandhitabbo ti pacchābandhaḥ

original: aṭati yena goṭaviso, iso, avanto ca assottañca, goṭaviso. Dvayaṃ “pe tamā”iti khyāte.
analyzed: aṭati yena goṭa visaḥ isaḥ ca goṭa visaḥ dvayam khyāte

original: Nāvāya kaṇṇo viya kaṇṇo, mahanto kenipāto, tena pavahaṇapatisavanato, taṃ dharatīti,
analyzed: kaṇṇaḥ viya kaṇṇaḥ mahantaḥ tena pavahaṇa pati savanataḥ tam dharati iti

original: kammani ṇo. Nāvāya yutto nāviko.
analyzed: kammani ṇaḥ nāvāya yuttaḥ nāvikaḥ

original: 667. Dvayaṃ nāvāya gamanopāye. Arati yenāti arittaṃ, chadādīhi tatraṇa, ikārāgamo, dvittañca. Ke jale nipātiyate kenipāto, aluttasamāsoyaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam nāvāya gamana upāye arati yena ati arittam chada ādīhi ikāra āgamaḥ jale nipātiyate kenipātaḥ a lutta samāsaḥ ayam

original: Dvayaṃ niyāmake. Poto pavahanaṃ, taṃ vāhayatīti potavāho. Niyacchati potanti niyāmako, yamu uparame, nipubbo gamane, ṇvu, niyāmako, curādi. Niyāmakepi.
analyzed: dvayam niyāmake potaḥ pavahanam tam vāhayati iti pota vāhaḥ niyacchati potanti niyāmakaḥ uparame nipubbaḥ gamane niyāmakaḥ curādi niyāmake pi

original: Ye vāṇijā nāvāya vāṇijakammaṃ ācaranti, te saṃyattikā nāma, saṃyānaṃ saṃyātrā, dīpantaragamanaṃ,
analyzed: ye vāṇijāḥ nāvāya vāṇija kammam ācaranti te saṃyattikā nāma saṃyānam saṃyātrā dīpa antara gamanam

original: traṇa, sā payojanametesaṃ saṃyattikā, ṇiko, ralopo, rasso ca. Tapaccayena vā siddhaṃ.
analyzed: payojanam etesam saṃyattikā ṇ ikaḥ ra lopaḥ ca ta paccayena vā siddham

original: Potavāṇijāpi, poto pavahanaṃ, tassa vāṇijā.
analyzed: potavāṇijā api poto pavahanam tassa vāṇijā

original: 668. Laṅkārādayo, phiyādayo ca nāvāya aṅgā avayavā. Lo indo, tassa kāraṇaṃ laṅkāro.
analyzed: laṅkāra ādayo ca nāvāya aṅgāḥ avayavāḥ indo tassa kāraṇam laṅkāro

original: Vaṭo vuccati sivaṭo, tadākāratāya vaṭākāro. “Vaṭo kamadde nigrodhe”ti hi nānatthasaṅgaho.
analyzed: vaṭaḥ vuccati sivaṭaḥ tad ākāra tāya vaṭa ākāraḥ vaṭaḥ kamadde nigrodha iti hi nānattha saṅgahaḥ

original: Phā vuḍḍhiyaṃ, iyo, phiyo.
analyzed: phā vuḍḍhiyam iyaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ “talaka”iti khyāte. Pū pavane, to, vuḍḍhi, pavahati niyāmaketi pavahanaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam talaka eti khyāte pavane pavahati pavahati niyāmaka iti pavahanam

original: Vuttanti kriyāpadaṃ. Dvayaṃ kaṭṭhambuvāhiniyaṃ, duṇa gatihiṃsāsu, a, nadādi, vuḍḍhi,
analyzed: kriyāpadam dvayam gati hiṃsāsu a nad ādi

original: doṇī. Ambuṃ neti yena ambaṇaṃ, ussattaṃ, ṇattañca, amba sadde vā, yu.
analyzed: doṇī ambum neti yena ambaṇam ussattam amba sadde vā

original: 669. Tikaṃ gambhīre. Gamu gamane, īro, bhonto ca malopo ca, gabhīro. Mālope tu gambhīro,
analyzed: tikam gambhīre gamu gamane īraḥ ca ma lopaḥ ca gabhīraḥ mā lope tu gambhīraḥ

original: gacchantā bhāyanti asminti vā gabhīro, gambhīro ca. Nipubbo mana abhyāse, ṇo, massa
analyzed: gacchantāḥ bhāyanti asmin ti vā gabhīraḥ gambhīraḥ ca nipubbaḥ manaḥ abhyāse ṇaḥ massa

original: no. Tabbipakkhato gambhīraviparītato uttānaṃ nāma, uggataṃ tānaṃ pamāṇaṃ assa uttānaṃ, agambhīraṃ.

analyzed: aciravatī uparame unaḥ yamassa bhaginī vā yamunā bhaginyatthe unaḥ sarāni

original: bhavanti yāya avadhibhūtāyāti sarabhū, sara gatihiṃsācintāsu vā, ū, abhonto ca, sarabhū.
analyzed: bhavanti avadhi bhūtāya ati sarabhū gati hiṃsā cintāsu ca

original: Maha pūjāyaṃ, a, nadādi.
analyzed: maha pūjā ayam a nadādi

original: Candabhāgādikā ninnagā pañca mahānadito aññāsaṃ nadīnaṃ bhedā. Candabhāgo nāma pabbato,

original: tato pabhavatīti candabhāgā. Sarayogā vantu, majjhe sakārāgamo, nadādi, sarasvatī. Vanturatrātisaye.
analyzed: pabhavati iti canda bhāgā sara yogā majjhe sakāra āgamaḥ nada ādi sarasvatī

original: 683. Niddosaṃ jalaṃ assaṃ nerañjarā, yadādi, atha vā nerañjarā nāma tūriyaviseso,
analyzed: niddosam jalam assam nerañjarāḥ yad ādi atha vā nerañjarāḥ nāma tūriya viseso

analyzed: assā kāverī nada ādi nammam sukham dadāti iti nammadā ṇo ādinā sarāvatī vettavatī

original: kaṇṭakī kosikīādikā anekā nadībhedā saṅgahitā.
analyzed: kaṇṭakī kosikī ādikā anekā nadī bhedā saṅgahitā

original: Dvayaṃ hammiyadevālayādīsu jalamagge. Vārino nikkhamanamaggo vārimaggo. Nala gandhe, a, nadādi, ḷattaṃ, panāḷi, ayaṃ itthiyaṃ, pume ca.

analyzed: sarasi ruhati iti saroruham satam pattāni assa

original: visesato abhedo. Araṃ vindatīti aravindaṃ. Pada gamane, umo. Padumaṃ, anitthī. Paṅke
analyzed: visesataḥ abhedaḥ aram vindati iti aravindam gamane an itthī paṅke

original: pupphati muḷālapupphaṃ. Kaṃ jalaṃ alayati bhūsayatīti kamalaṃ, ala bhūsane. Bhisatopi

original: Tāmarasampi, tāmaraṃ jalaṃ, “tāmaraṃ ghatamaṇṇo ce”ti tantatantaraṃ, tatra seti tiṭṭhatīti tāmarasaṃ, ro.
analyzed: tāmarasam pi tāmaram jalam tāmaram ca iti tanta tantaram tatra sā iti tiṭṭhati iti tāmarasam

original: Dvayaṃ padmādidaṇḍe. Daṇḍasadisatāya daṇḍo. Nala gandhe, ṇo.
analyzed: dvayam padma ādi daṇḍe daṇḍa sadisa tāya daṇḍaḥ gandhe ṇaḥ

original: 687. Dvayaṃ muḷāle. Visa peraṇe, vassa bho, bhisaṃ, bhāsa dittiyaṃ vā, ākārassi.

analyzed: sesam pubba sadisam

original: Dvayaṃ kaṇṇikāyaṃ. Bījassa koso ākaro bījakoso. Kaṇṇe karīyatīti kaṇṇikā, kaṇṇālaṅkāro,
analyzed: dvayam kaṇṇikā ayam bījassa kosaḥ ākaraḥ bīja kosaḥ kaṇṇe karīyati iti kaṇṇikā kaṇṇālaṅkāro

original: bhāguri ca, “romo siti ca nīlo, kuvalayamindīvarañca nīlambuja”nti tu vararuci. “Kuvalayadalasāmopyaṅgadadhiti

original: sobhākarattā kuvalayaṃ.
analyzed: kuvalayam

original: Dvayaṃ nīluppale. Nīlavaṇṇe, a, nīlaṃ, indatīti indī, nadādi, indī lakkhī, tassā varaṃ indīvaraṃ, inda paramissariye vā, īro.

analyzed: asmin nīluppale sete kumudam nāma kuyam modate kumudam naḥ assa paduma ādinaḥ kando

original: Ambujayogato, ambujānaṃ samūhato vā ambujinī.

analyzed: pātāla vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: sāmaññakaṇḍa

analyzed: visesya adhīna vagga vaṇṇanā

analyzed: tatas yā iva sādhāraṇa ttā sāmañña kaṇḍam idam

original: 692. Iha satthe bhiyyo rūpantarā liṅgavinicchayo, so atrāpi vagge bhiyyo rūpantarāyevāti

original: sabbe guṇasaddā, dabbasaddā, kriyāsaddā ca visesyādhīnabhāvena hetunāyeva, na bhiyyo

analyzed: u manam toseti iti manuññam ñā parimāṇa tosana nisāmanesu antassukāraḥ manam ā bhusaḥ

original: tosetīti vā manuññaṃ, tadā “mano añña”nti chedo, ālopo. Cara gatibhakkhanesu, ṇvu,

original: carati cittametthāti cāru. Suṭṭhu darīyate sundaraṃ, dara dāraṇe. Vagga gamane, u,

original: vaggu. Mano ramati asmiṃ. Kamu icchāyaṃ, to. Harati cittaṃ hārī, ṇī. Mana ñāṇe, ju,

original: mano javati yasmiṃ vā mañju, nalopo. Piyasīlayuttatāya pesalaṃ, piyassa pe, īssattaṃ.

original: Bhadi kalyāṇe, do. Vā gatiyaṃ, mo. Kala saṅkhyāne, yāṇo. Manaṃ appeti vaḍḍhetīti
analyzed: kalyāṇe vā gatiyam mo saṅkhyāne yāṇaḥ manam appeti vaḍḍheti iti

original: manāpaṃ, mano appoti yasminti vā manāpaṃ, āpa pāpuṇane, apādipubbo ca. Labhitabbanti
analyzed: manāpam manaḥ yasmin ti vā manāpam āpa pāpuṇane ca labhitabbanti

original: laddhaṃ, to, sakatthe ko. Subhatīti subhaṃ, sundarena sabhāvena bhavatīti vā subhaṃ.
analyzed: laddham to sa katthe kaḥ subhati iti subham sundarena sabhāvena bhavati iti vā subham

original: Puṅgavantaṃ uttame, ubbhuto atyatthaṃ uttamo, ubhasaddato ubbhutatthato visesatthe
analyzed: puṅgavantam uttame ubbhutaḥ atyattham uttamaḥ ubha saddataḥ ubbhuta tthataḥ visesa tthe

original: jeṭṭho. Pakaṭṭhaṃ mukhaṃ ārambho assa pamukho. Natthi uttaro uttamo yasmā anuttaro.
analyzed: jeṭṭhaḥ pakaṭṭham mukham ārambhaḥ assa pamukhaḥ na atthi uttaraḥ uttamaḥ yasmai anuttaraḥ

original: Pamukho ca anuttaro cāti dvando. Apādipubbe varo. Mukhamiva mukhyo, ivatthe yo. Padadhātīti
analyzed: pamukhaḥ ca anuttaraḥ ca ati dvandaḥ ap ādi pubbe varaḥ mukham iva mukhyaḥ ivatthe yaḥ padadhāti iti

original: padhānaṃ, yu. Pamukhabhāve tiṭṭhatīti pāmokkho, ubhayatrāpi vuḍḍhi. Pakaṭṭhaṃ rātīti
analyzed: padhānam pamukha bhāve tiṭṭhati iti pāmokkhaḥ ubhayatra api vuḍḍhi pakaṭṭham rāti iti

original: paraṃ, ṇo. “Agga”nti jānitabbanti aggaññaṃ, “agga”nti pamānitabbanti vā aggaññaṃ.
analyzed: param naḥ agganti jānitabbanti aggaññam agganti pamānitabbanti vā aggaññam

original: Uttaro uttamasadiso. Padhānabhāvaṃ nītaṃ paṇītaṃ, nī naye, kammani ṇo. Paraṃ paccanīkaṃ

analyzed: phalane ca a tuṅgaḥ uggatam aggam assa udaggaḥ uddham sitaḥ ucchitaḥ si

original: to, sassa cho, asarūpadvittaṃ, ucchito. Paṃsupi, pakaṭṭho aṃsu ditti yassa paṃsu.
analyzed: taḥ sassa chaḥ a sarūpa dvittam ucchitaḥ paṃsupi pakaṭṭhaḥ aṃsu yassa paṃsu

original: Tikaṃ vāmane. Uddhaṃ na añcatīti nīco, añca gamane, ṇo, akārañakārānaṃ lopo, nisaddo atra nisedhe. Rasa sadde, so, rasso. Vā gamane, mano, vāmano.
analyzed: tikam vāmane uddham na añcati iti nīcaḥ gamane ṇaḥ akāra ñakārānam lopaḥ nisaddaḥ atra nisedhe rasa sadde saḥ rassaḥ vā gamane manaḥ vāmanaḥ

original: Tikaṃ ujumhi. Na jimhaṃ kuṭilaṃ ajimhaṃ. Tasmiṃ avaṅkatāya pakaṭṭho guṇo yassa paguṇo. Aja gamane, u, assu, uju.
analyzed: tikam ujumhi na jimham kuṭilam ajimham tasmin a vaṅka tāya pakaṭṭhaḥ guṇaḥ yassa paguṇaḥ aja gamane u assu uju

original: 709. Chakkaṃ vaṅke. Aladhātumhā aro, ḷattaṃ. Vela gamane, to, dvittādi, virūpena
analyzed: chakkam vaṅke gamane dvitta ādi virūpena

original: ilayatīti vā vellitaṃ, to, ila gamane. Vaṅka koṭilye, a. Kuṭa chedane, ilo, kuṭa
analyzed: ilayati iti vā vellitam to ila gamana vaṅka koṭilye a kuṭa chedana

original: koṭilye vā. Hā cāge, kattari mo, dvittaṃ, vaṇṇavipariyayādi, jimhaṃ. Kuñca koṭilye,
analyzed: koṭilye vā hā cāge kattari mo dvittam vaṇṇa vipariyaya ādi jimham koṭilye

original: to. Vakkampi, vakka gamane.
analyzed: taḥ vakkampi vakka gamane

original: Pañcakaṃ dhuve. Dhu gatitheriyesu, a, uvādeso. Sassate nicce bhavo sassato. Nicco
analyzed: pañcakam dhuve dhu gati theriyesu a u vā ādesaḥ sassate nicce bhavaḥ sassataḥ niccaḥ

original: vutto abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkā. Sadā kāle bhavo sadātano. Sanasaddo niccattho sattamyanto
nipāto, sanaṃsaddo vā abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkā, tatra bhavo sanantano, ubhayatrāpi
analyzed: nipātaḥ sanaṃsaddaḥ vā abhidhānappadīpikā ṭīkā tatra bhavaḥ sanantanaḥ ubhayatra api

original: bhavatthe tano, pubbe niggahītāgamo.
analyzed: bhavatthe tano pubbe niggahīta āgamaḥ

original: 710. Ekeneva bhāvādirūpena kālassa byāpako nibbānākāsādikūṭaṭṭhoti pakāsito. Māyāniccalayantādīsu
analyzed: ekena iva bhāva ādi rūpena kālassa byāpakaḥ nibbāna ākāsa ādi kūṭaṭṭhaḥ ti pakāsitaḥ māyā niccalayanta ādīsu

original: kūṭaṃ vakkhati abhidhānappadīpikāṭīkā. Niccalo tiṭṭhatīti kūṭaṭṭho, pabbato, kūṭaṭṭho
analyzed: kūṭam vakkhati abhidhānappadīpikā ṭīkā niccalo tiṭṭhati iti kūṭa ṭṭho pabbataḥ kūṭa ṭṭho

original: viya sadā tiṭṭhatīti kūṭaṭṭho.
analyzed: sadā tiṭṭhati iti kūṭaṭṭhaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ lahuke. Laṅgha gati sosanesu, u, ghassa hattaṃ, niggahītalopo, lahu, laghupi.
analyzed: dvayam lahuke laṅgha gati sa usanesu u ghassa hattam niggahīta lopaḥ lahu laghupi

original: Saṃpubbe, satthikakapaccaye ca sallahukaṃ. Tikaṃ saṅkhyāte. Khyā kathane. Gaṇa saṅkhyāne.
analyzed: saṃpubbe satthikaka paccaye ca sallahukam tikam saṅkhyāte khyā kathane gaṇa saṅkhyāne

original: Mā parimāṇe, sabbatra to.
analyzed: mā parimāṇe sabbatra to

original: 711. Tikaṃ tikhiṇe. Tija nisāne, ho, vaṇṇavikāro, tiṇhaṃ. Tija nisāne, ino, jassa
analyzed: tikam tikhiṇe tija nisāne ho vaṇṇa vikāraḥ tiṇham tija nisāne inaḥ jassa

original: kho, ṇattaṃ, tikhiṇaṃ. Tijatoyeva vo, jassa vo, battaṃ, tibbaṃ. Tikaṃ caṇḍe. Caṇḍa
analyzed: kho vaḥ jassa vaḥ battam tibbam tikam caṇḍe caṇḍa

original: kope, caṇḍaṃ. Ujja balapālanesu, a, jjassa ggo, uggaṃ. Khara vināse, a, kharaṃ.
analyzed: kope caṇḍam bala pālanesu a uggam khara vināse a kharam

original: Catukkaṃ jaṅgame. Gamu gamane, dvittādi, jaṅgamaṃ. Cara gamane, a, caraṃ. Tasati
analyzed: jaṅgame gamu gamane jaṅgamam cara gamane a caram tasati

original: calatīti tasaṃ, tasa ubbege, ubbego bhayaṃ, calanañca. Carabhismā caro, majjhe dīgho,
analyzed: calati iti tasam tasaḥ ubbege ubbegaḥ bhayam calanam ca carabhismā caraḥ majjhe dīghaḥ

original: carācaraṃ, abbhāsante vā rāgamo, carācaraṃ, sabbatra apaccayo. Iṅgampi, iṅgatīti iṅgo, iṅga gamane.
analyzed: carācaram carācaram sabbatra a paccayaḥ iṅgam pi iṅgati iti iṅgo gamane

original: 712-713. Dvayaṃ calanamatte. Kampa calane. Cala kampane, sabbatra kattari yu.
analyzed: dvayam calana matte kampa calane cala kampane sabbatra kattari yu

original: Dvayaṃ adhike. Atiriccatīti atiritto, rica viyojanasampaṭicchanagatīsu, to, bhujādi. Adhi eti gacchatīti adhiko, i gamane, ko.
analyzed: dvayam adhike atiriccati iti viyojana sampaṭicchana gatīsu bhuja ādi adhi eti gacchati iti adhikaḥ gamane kaḥ

original: Jaṅgamā pāṇito añño thāvaro nāma, tiṭṭhatīti thāvaro, ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ, varo, vaṇṇavikāro, thāvaro, ṭhāvaropītyeke.
analyzed: jaṅgamā pāṇitaḥ añño thāvaro nāma tiṭṭhati iti thāvaraḥ gati nivattiyam varaḥ vaṇṇa vikāro thāvaraḥ ṭhāvaro pi iti eke

original: Catukkaṃ lole. Lola ummādane. Cala kampane, dvittādi, cañcalaṃ. Tara plavanataraṇesu, taraṃ lātīti taralaṃ, ete calanamattepi.
analyzed: catukkam lole lole ummādane cala kampane dvitta ādi cañcalam tara plavana taraṇesu taram lāti iti taralam ete calana matte pi

original: Catukkaṃ purāṇe. Pure bhavo purāṇo, yadādinā napaccayo, ṇattaṃ. Purā bhavo purātano,
analyzed: catukkam purāṇe pure bhavaḥ purāṇaḥ yad ādinā na paccayaḥ ṇattam purā bhavaḥ purātanaḥ

original: tanapaccayo. Sanaṃsaddo iha sattamyanto purāṇatthe nipāto. Tatra bhavo sanantano,
analyzed: tana paccayaḥ sanaṃsaddaḥ iha sattamī antaḥ purāṇa tthe nipātaḥ tatra bhavaḥ sanantanaḥ

original: pubbe viya sanaṃsaddo vā, tatrāpi pubbe viya niggahītāgamo. Ciraṃsaddo nipāto sattamyanto
analyzed: pubbe viya sanaṃsaddaḥ vā tatra api pubbe viya niggahīta āgamaḥ ciraṃsaddaḥ nipātaḥ sattamī antaḥ

original: purāṇattho iha gayhate, tatra bhavo cirantano. Niggahītalopo cirakālādīsu.
analyzed: purāṇa atthaḥ iha tatra bhavaḥ cirantanaḥ niggahīta lopo cira kāla ādīsu

original: Catukkaṃ abhinave. Patito aggo yassa paccaggho, gassa gho, bahuko vā aggho yassa
analyzed: catukkam abhinave patitaḥ aggaḥ yassa paccagghaḥ gassa ghaḥ bahukaḥ vā agghaḥ yassa

original: paccaggho, anekatthattā hi upasagganipātānaṃ bahukattho ettha patisaddo. Navasaddāsakatthe
analyzed: paccagghaḥ aneka attha ttā hi upasagga nipātānam bahuka tthaḥ ettha pati saddaḥ nava sadda asaka tthe

original: tano, navassa nubhāvo ca. Navo eva abhinavo, nu thutiyaṃ, a, navo.
analyzed: tano navassa nubhāvaḥ ca navaḥ eva abhinavaḥ nu thutiyam a navaḥ

original: 714-715. Pañcakaṃ kakkhaḷe. Kantatīti kurūraṃ, ūro, kantassa ca kurādeso, kara hiṃsāyaṃ
analyzed: pañcakam kakkhaḷe kantati iti kurūram ūro kantassa ca kura ādesaḥ

original: vā, ūro, assu. Kaṭha kicchajīvane, muddhajadutiyanto dhātu, ino, vaṇṇavipariyaye
analyzed: vā ūraḥ assu dhātu inaḥ vaṇṇa vipariyaye

original: kathinantipi. Dala vidāraṇe, ho, ḷattaṃ, baha vuddhimhi vā, bassa do, ḷanto ca, daḷhaṃ
analyzed: dala vidāraṇe ho ḷattam vā vuddhimhi vā

original: daha bhasmīkaraṇe vā, a, ḷanto ca. Niṭṭhātīti niṭṭhuraṃ, ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ, uro.
analyzed: daha bhasmīkaraṇe vā a ḷ antaḥ ca niṭṭhāti iti niṭṭhuram ṭhā gati nivattiyam uro

original: Kakkha hasane, alo, ḷattaṃ. Kaṭhoraṃ, jaraṭhaṃ, muttimaṃ, muttampi, kaṭha kicchajīvane,
analyzed: hasane hasane alaḥ ḷattam kaṭhoram jaraṭham muttimam muttampi kaṭha kiccha jīvane

original: oro. Jara jīraṇe, bhūvādi, ṭho. Mutti kathinyaṃ, taṃyogā muttimaṃ. Apaccaye muttaṃ.
analyzed: oraḥ jara jīraṇe bhū vādi ṭhaḥ mutti a paccaye muttaṃ

original: Sattakaṃ ante. Ama gamane, to, anto, anitthī. Paripubbo pariyanto. Papubbo panto.
analyzed: sattakam ante ama gamane taḥ antaḥ an itthī paripubbaḥ pariyantaḥ papubbaḥ pantaḥ

original: Pacchā bhavo pacchimo. Ante bhavo antimo, imo. Jaghane sādhu jighaññaṃ, yo, assi.
analyzed: pacchā bhavaḥ pacchimaḥ ante bhavaḥ antimaḥ imaḥ jaghane sādhu jighaññam yaḥ assi

original: Caratismā imo. Carimaṃ, carasaddā vā imo.
analyzed: carimam carimam cara saddāḥ vai imaḥ

original: Catukkaṃ paṭhame. Pubba pūraṇe, a. Aggaṃ seṭṭhepi vuttaṃ. Paṭha viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ,
analyzed: catukkam paṭhame pubba pūraṇe a aggam seṭṭhe pi vuttam vācāyam

original: amo, patha saṅkhyāne vā, amo, vaṇṇavikāro, paṭhamaṃ, pathamantipi. Ādīyate paṭhamaṃ
analyzed: amaḥ saṅkhyāne vā amaḥ ādīyate paṭhamam

original: gaṇhīyateti ādi, i, pume, sosaddo ādissa pulliṅgattajotako, purimaṃ, puratthāpi, bhavatthe imatthā.
analyzed: ādi i pume so saddo ādissa purimam puratthā api bhavatthe imatthā

original: Dvayaṃ anucchavike. Paṭiggahito rūpo patirūpo. Chaviyā anurūpaṃ anucchavikaṃ, sakatthe ko.
analyzed: dvayam anucchavike paṭiggahitaḥ chaviyā anurūpam anucchavikam sakatthe kaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ niratthake. Mūha vecitte, a, hassa gho. Natthi attho yassa, sakatthe ko.
analyzed: dvayam niratthake mūha vecitte a hassa ghaḥ natthi atthaḥ yassa sa ka tthe kaḥ

original: 716. Dvayaṃ pākaṭe. Visiṭṭho attā yassa byattaṃ. Puṭa pakāsane, puṭa vikāsane vā.
analyzed: dvayam pākaṭe visiṭṭhaḥ attā yassa byattam puṭa pakāsane puṭa vikāsane vā

original: Tikaṃ mudumhi. Muda modane, u, muda saṃsagge vā. Sobhanaṃ kumāraṃ kanti yassa. Ku sadde, alo, manto ca.
analyzed: tikam mudumhi muda modane u muda saṃsagge vā sobhanam kumāram kanti yassa ku sadde alaḥ manto ca

original: Dvayaṃ indriyaggayhe. Akkhaṃ indriyaṃ patigataṃ nissitaṃ, akkhena vā patigataṃ paccakkhaṃ,
analyzed: dvayam indriyaggayhe akkham indriyam patigatam nissitam akkhena vā patigatam paccakkham

original: kate samāse patisaddassa pubbanipāto abhidhānato. Indriyaṃ cakkhādikaṃ, tena gayhaṃ indriyaggayhaṃ.
analyzed: kate samāse pati saddassa pubba nipātaḥ abhidhānataḥ indriyam cakkha ādikam tena gayham indriyaggayham

original: Dvayaṃ apaccakkhe. Paccakkhaviparītaṃ apaccakkhaṃ, paramāṇvādi. Indriyaṃ atikkantaṃ atindriyaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam a paccakkhe paccakkha viparītam a paccakkham paramāṇu ādi indriyam atikkantam atindriyam

original: 717. Catukkaṃ aññatthe. Itarasaddo pāṭipadiko aññatthavācako, idaṃsaddā vā taro aññatthe,
analyzed: catukkam aññatthe itara saddo pāṭipadikaḥ aññattha vācakaḥ idam saddāḥ vā taraḥ aññatthe

original: daṃlopo ca. Aññasaddā sakatthe taro. Eko seṭṭhepi vutto. Aññasaddo pāṭipadiko bhinnattho,
analyzed: daṃ lopaḥ ca añña saddā saka tthe taraḥ ekaḥ seṭṭhe pi vuttaḥ añña saddaḥ pāṭipadikaḥ bhinna tthaḥ

original: na ñāyateti vā añño.
analyzed: na ñāyate iti vai

original: Tikaṃ nānappakāre. Bahavo vidhā pakārā assa bahuvidho. Vicittā vidhā yassa vividho.
analyzed: tikam nānappakāre bahavaḥ pakārāḥ assa bahuvidhaḥ vicittāḥ vidhāḥ yassa

original: Dvayaṃ anivārite. Natthi bādho nisedho yassa abādhaṃ. Natthi aggaḷaṃ assa.
analyzed: dvayam a nivārite natthi bādhaḥ nisedhaḥ yassa a bādham natthi aggaḷam assa

original: 718. Catukkaṃ asahāye. Asahāyatthe ekato ākī, cco, ko ca, ekākī, ekacco. Aññatthepi ekako vutto. Samā tulyatthā.
analyzed: catukkam asahāye asahāya tthe ekatas ākī cco kaḥ ca ekākī ekaccaḥ aññatthe pi ekakaḥ vuttaḥ samā tulya tthā

original: Anekasambandhini sādhāraṇādidvayaṃ. Saha ādhāraṇena vattatīti sādhāraṇaṃ, yadādi, thiyaṃ sādhāraṇī, sādhāraṇā ca. Samānameva sāmaññaṃ, yo, sāmaññā itthiyaṃ.
analyzed: aneka sambandhini sādhāraṇa ādi dvayam saha ādhāraṇena vattati iti sādhāraṇam yad ādi thiyam sādhāraṇī sādhāraṇā ca samānam eva sāmaññam sāmaññā itthiyam

original: Dvayaṃ appāvakāse. Sambādhate asmiṃ, ro. Saṃsaddā kaṭo, yadādi, saṅkaṭaṃ, saha āvaraṇena vattatīti vā saṅkaṭaṃ, sahattho saṃsaddo.
analyzed: dvayam appa avakāse sambādhate asmin saṃsaddā kaṭaḥ yad ādi saṅkaṭam saha āvaraṇena vattati iti vā saṅkaṭam sahatthaḥ saṃsaddo

original: 719. Vāmaṃ kaḷevaraṃ vāmakāyo sabyaṃ nāma. “Sabyaṃ vāme ca dakkhiṇe”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 21.84 hi ajayo, sava gatiyaṃ, yo. Dakkhiṇaṃ kaḷevaraṃ apasabyaṃ, sabyato apagataṃ apasabyaṃ.
analyzed: vāmam kaḷevaram vāma kāyo sabyam nāma sabyam vāme ca dakkhiṇā iti cintāmaṇiṭīkā hi dakkhiṇam kaḷevaram apasabyam sabyataḥ apagatam apasabyam

original: Dvayaṃ viparīte. Paṭikūlati āvaratīti paṭikūlaṃ, kūla āvaraṇe. Apasabyaṃ dakkhiṇepi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam viparīte paṭikūlati āvarati iti paṭikūlam kūle āvaraṇe apasabyam dakkhiṇe pi vuttam

original: Duradhigamanto pathaṃ gahanaṃ, yathā – gahanametaṃ satthaṃ, dubbivekamiccattho. Gacchantaṃ hantīti gahanaṃ, gahaṇampi, yadādi. Kala gamane, ilo, kaliṃ lātīti vā kalilaṃ.
analyzed: patham gahanam yathā gahanam etam sattham dubbivekam icca atthaḥ gacchantam hanti iti gahanam gahaṇam pi yad ādi kala gamane kalim lāti iti vā kalilam

original: 720-721. Dvayaṃ bahuppakāre. Uccañca taṃ avacañceti uccāvacaṃ, kammadhārayo. Bahavo bhedā assa.
analyzed: dvayam bahu ppakāre uccam ca tam avacam ca iti uccāvacam kammadhārayaḥ bahavaḥ bhedāḥ assa

original: Tikaṃ janādinirantaragate. Saṅka saṅkāyaṃ, to. Kira pakkhepavikkhipanesu, to, iṇṇādeso. Saṅka saṅkāyaṃ, ulo, saṅkulaṃ, saṃpubbo kula santāne vā, ro.
analyzed: tikam jana ādi nirantara gate saṅka saṅkāyam to kira pakkhepa vikkhipanesu to iṇ ṇa ādesaḥ saṅka saṅkāyam ulaḥ saṅkulam saṃpubbaḥ kula santāne vā raḥ

original: Siloko cheke. Kato abhyāsito hattho padattho yena katahattho. Kusa silesane, alo.
analyzed: silokaḥ cheke kataḥ abhyāsitaḥ hatthaḥ padatthaḥ yena katahatthaḥ silesane alo

original: Pakaṭṭhā vīṇā assa. Abhijānāti abhiñño. Sikkha vijjopādāne, to. Puṇa kammani subhe,
analyzed: pakaṭṭhā vīṇā assa abhijānāti abhiñño sikkha vijjopādāne to puṇa kammani subhe

original: ro. Paṭa gamane, u. Chidi dvidhākaraṇe, kattari a, dassa ko. Cata yācane, uro. Dala
analyzed: ro paṭa gamane u chidi dvidhākaraṇe kattari a dassa ko cata yācane uro dala

original: dittiyaṃ, kho, lassa ko, dakkha vuḍḍhiyaṃ vā, a, dakkha vuḍḍhihiṃsāgatisīghesu vā.
analyzed: dittiyam kho lassa ko dakkha vuḍḍhiyam vā a dakkha vuḍḍhi hiṃsā gati sīghesu vā

original: Pisa hiṃsābaladānaniketanesu, alo, pesalo. Katamukho, katīpi, katasaddo abhyāsitattho,
analyzed: hiṃsā bala dāna niketanesu alaḥ pesalaḥ kata mukhaḥ kata saddaḥ abhyāsita atthaḥ

original: kataṃ abyāsitaṃ mukhaṃ upāyo anenāti katamukho. Kataṃ assatthīti katī.
analyzed: katam a byāsitam mukham upāyaḥ anena ati katamukho katam assatthi iti katī

original: Sattakaṃ bāle. Bala pāṇane, balatīti bālo, assāsitapassāsitamattena jīvati, na paññājīvitenātyattho.
analyzed: sattakam bāle pāṇane balati iti bālaḥ assāsita passāsita mattena jīvati na

original: Dā kucchāyaṃ gatiyaṃ vā, tu, dvittaṃ, rassādi. Jala dhaññe, a, ḷattaṃ. Mūha vecitte,
analyzed: dā kucchāyam gatiyam vā tu dvittam rassādi jala dhaññe a ḷattam mūha vecitte

original: lo, vaṇṇavipariyayo, mūḷho. Manda jaḷatte. Bālyayogā bāliso, iso. Añño, yathājātopi,
analyzed: vaṇṇa vipariyayaḥ mūḍhaḥ manda bālya yogā bālisaḥ isaḥ aññaḥ yathā jātaḥ api

original: na jānātīti añño. Yādiso jāto viveko yathājāto.
analyzed: na jānāti iti aññaḥ yādisaḥ jātaḥ vivekaḥ yathā jātaḥ

original: 722. Tikaṃ bhāgyasampanne. Puññaṃ, sukatañca yasmiṃ atthi puññavā, sukatī, vantu,
analyzed: tikam bhāgya sampanne puññam su katañca yasmin atthi puññavā su katī vantu

original: ī ca. Dhanaṃ gahaṇaṃ laddhoti dhañño, yo. Dvayaṃ mahāvīriye. Mahādhiti mahāvīriyo.
analyzed: ca dhanam laddho ti dhaññaḥ yaḥ dvayam mahā vīriye mahā dhiti mahā vīriyaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ mahicche. Mahāsayopi.
analyzed: dvayam

original: Dvayaṃ bahulahadaye, pasatthahadaye ca. Hadayaṃ bahulaṃ, pasatthañca yassa hadayī, hadayālu ca, tabbahule ī, ālu ca, suhadayopi.

original: 723. Dvayaṃ haṭṭhacitte. “Hāsamano vikubbāno, pamāno haṭṭhamānaso”ti amara 21.7 amarasīho. Dvayaṃ dummane. Duṭṭhaṃ, dukkhitaṃ vā mano yassa. Virūpaṃ mano yassa. Antamanopi.

original: Tikaṃ bahudhane. Ibhaṃ arahatīti ibbho, vo, vaṇṇavipariyayo. Jhe cintāyaṃ, a, ajjhāyati dhanaṃ aḍḍho, jhassa ḍho, asarūpadvittaṃ, rassādi ca. Dhanā atisaye ī, dhanī.

original: 726. Dvayaṃ dakkhiṇeyye. Dānaṃ paṭiggaṇhituṃ arahatīti dānāraho, dakkha vuddhiyaṃ, sīghatthe ca, dakkhanti bhogasampadādīhi yāya, sā dakkhiṇā, iṇo, taṃ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo.

original: Dvayaṃ snehavati. Siniha pītiyaṃ, dho, hassa do, siniddho, vaccho sineho yassatthi vacchalo, lo.

original: Pamāṇiko parikkhako, parikkhate avadhārayate pamāṇehi atthanti parikkhako, ikkha dassanaṅkesu, ṇvu. Kāraṇaṃ jānātīti kāraṇiko, iko.
