original: Katasannāho vadhudyato hantumudyato uyyuto ātatāyī nāma. “Vadhuyyutto”tipi pāṭho. Āpubbo tā pālane, ṇī, dvittaṃ, ākārantānamāyo, ātatāyī.
analyzed: kata sannāhaḥ vadhu udyataḥ hantum udyataḥ uyyutaḥ ātatāyī nāma pāṭhaḥ āpubbaḥ tā pālane ṇī ātatāyī

original: 737. Sīsacchejjamhi sīsacchedārahe vajjho. Hantabboti vajjho, hana hiṃsāyaṃ, ṇyo, hanassa vadho, jhassa jho. Asarūpadvittaṃ, vajjho.
analyzed: sīsacchejjamhi sīsaccheda arahe vajjhaḥ hantabbo ti vajjhaḥ hana hiṃsā ayam ṇyaḥ hanassa vadhaḥ jhassa jhaḥ a sarūpa dvittam vajjhaḥ

original: Tikaṃ vakkāsaye. Nikantatīti nikato, kanta chedane, a, nalopo. Saṭha ketave, a. Natthi ujutā yassa anuju.
analyzed: tikam vakka āsaye nikantati iti nikataḥ kanta chedane a na lopaḥ ketave a natthi uju tā yassa anuju

original: Tikaṃ bhedakārake. Sūca pesuññe, ṇvu. Pisi sañcuṇṇane, pisi avayave vā, pisatīti pisuṇo, yadādinā uno, ṇattaṃ. Kaṇṇe japatīti, aluttasamāso, arucitabbarocakepi kaṇṇejapo.
analyzed: tikam bheda kārake sūca pesuññe ṇvu pisi sañcuṇṇane pisi avayave vā pisati iti pisuṇaḥ yad ādinā u naḥ ṇattam kaṇṇe japati iti a lutta samāsaḥ aruci tabba rocake pi kaṇṇejapaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ paharaṇasīle. Dhubbī hiṃsāyaṃ, to, bhujādi. Vañcayate vippalapateti vañcako, vañca gamane.
analyzed: dvayam paharaṇa sīle bhuja ādi vañcayate vippalapata iti vañcakaḥ gamane

original: 738. Ariyāsāmaññena ca bālapurisassa lakkhaṇamāha. Hi padapūraṇe. Yo puriso yo jano,
analyzed: ariya asāmaññena ca bāla purisassa lakkhaṇam āha hi pada pūraṇe yaḥ purisaḥ yaḥ jano

original: janapariyāyo cettha purisasaddo “dve mahāpurisā abhinikkhantā”tyādīsu viya, anisamma
analyzed: jana pariyāyaḥ ca ittha purisa saddaḥ dve mahāpurisāḥ

original: anupaparikkhitvā vadhabandhanādikiccaṃ karoti, so khalu ekantato “capalo”ti viññeyyo,
analyzed: an upaparikkhitvā vadha bandhana ādi kiccam karoti so khalu ekantataḥ capalaḥ ti viññeyyaḥ

original: kasmā? Avinicchitakārittā sammā avinicchitassa kāriyassa karaṇasīlattā. Capa kakkaraṇe,
analyzed: kasmai a vinicchita kāri ttā sammā a vinicchitassa kāriyassa karaṇa sīla ttā kakkaraṇe

original: capa santāne vā, alo, capalo.
analyzed: capa santāne vā alo capalo

original: 739. Catukkaṃ kadariye. Kucchitaṃ dadātīti khuddo, do, kassa kho, adānasīlatāya samparāyesu
analyzed: catukkam kadariye kucchitam dadāti iti kassa kho a dāna sīla tāya samparāyesu

original: khuddaṃ bubhukkhissāmīti vā khuddo, khuda bubhukkhāyaṃ, do anāgatatthe. Parānupabhogena
analyzed: khuddam bubhukkhissāmi iti vā khuddaḥ khuda bubhukkha ayam daḥ anāgata tthe para an upabhogena

original: atthasañcayasīlattā kucchito ariyo atthapati kadariyo, adāyakattā kucchitaṃ ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: attha sañcaya sīla ttā kucchitaḥ ariyaḥ attha pati kadariyaḥ a dāyaka ttā kucchitam ṭhānam

original: aratīti vā kadariyo, iyo. Dānādīsu namanābhāvena thaddhena maccherayuttacittena sahitatāya
analyzed: arati iti vā dāna ādīsu namana abhāvena thaddhena macchera yutta cittena sahita tāya

original: thaddhamaccharī, ī. Kucchito paṇo yassa kapaṇo, kipacāno, mitappacopi. Kucchitaṃ
analyzed: kucchitaḥ paṇaḥ yassa kapaṇaḥ kipacānaḥ mitappacaḥ upi kucchitam

original: pacānoti dutiyāsamāso. Mitaṃ pacatīti mitappaco, ṇo.
analyzed: pacānaḥ iti dutiyā samāsaḥ mitam pacati iti mitappacaḥ ṇaḥ

original: Addhaṃ dalidde. Natthi kiñcanaṃ appamattakampi dhanaṃ yassa akiñcano. Dalidda duggatiyaṃ,
analyzed: addham dalidde natthi kiñcanam appamattakam pi dhanam yassa akiñcanaḥ dalidda duggatiyam

original: a, dala vidāraṇe vā, ido, dvittaṃ. Dīna duggatabhāve, dīno, di khaye vā, īno. Natthi
analyzed: a dala vidāraṇe vā idaḥ dvittam dīna duggata bhāve dīnaḥ di khaye vā īnaḥ natthi

original: dhanaṃ assa. Ninditaṃ gamanaṃ assa duggato.
analyzed: dhanam assa ninditam gamanam assa duggato

original: 740. Yaṃ kammaṃ “idamahaṃ uppādessāmī”ti asambhāvitaṃ acintitameva hutvā sampattaṃ,
analyzed: yam kammam idam aham uppādessāmi iti asambhāvitam a cintitam eva hutvā sampattam

original: taṃ “kākatālīya”ntyuccate. Tālassa idaṃ phalaṃ tālaṃ, kāko ca tālañca kākatālāni,
analyzed: tam kākatālīyanti uccate tālassa idam phalam tālam kāko ca tālam ca kākatālāni

original: tehi sadisaṃ kammaṃ kākatāliyaṃ, kākassa, tālaphalassa uḍḍanapatanasadisaṃ kammantyattho.
analyzed: tehi sadisam kammam kākatāliyam kākassa tāla phalassa uḍḍana patana sadisam

original: Catukkaṃ yācake. Yācanaṃ karotīti yācanako, yācatīti vā, yāca yācane, yu. Sakatthe
analyzed: catukkam yācake yācanam karoti iti yācanakaḥ yācati iti vā yāca yācane sakatthe

original: ko. Attha yācanāyaṃ, atthanaṃ attho, so assatthīti atthī. Ṇvu, yācako. “Mādisassa
analyzed: kaḥ attha yācanā ayam atthanam saḥ assatthi iti atthi yācakaḥ mādisassa

original: dhanaṃ datvā rājā saggaṃ gamissatī”tyādinā dānaphalaṃ vaṇṇetvā vakati yācatīti vanibbako,
analyzed: dhanam da tvā rājā saggam gamissati ityādinā dāna phalam vaṇṇetvā vakati yācati iti vanibbakaḥ

original: vaṇṇassa vani, vaka ādāne, ādānamettha yācanameva.
analyzed: vaṇṇassa vani vake ādāne ādānam ettha yācanam eva

original: 741. Kiñcidūnakantaṃ patipādena nāmaṃ. Pakkhisappamacchādayo aṇḍato jātattā aṇḍajā.
analyzed: kiñcid ūna kantam patipādena nāmam pakkhi sappa maccha ādayaḥ aṇḍataḥ jāta ttāḥ aṇḍa jā

original: Narādayo pana gabbhāsayasaṅkhātajalābuto, tatra vā jātattā jalābujā. Kimi ca ḍaṃsā
analyzed: nara ādayaḥ pana tatra vā jāta ttā jalābu jā ca

original: ca ādinā makasamaṅgurādayo ca sedajā, sedakāraṇattā usmā sedo, tato jātā sedajā.
analyzed: ca ādinā maka samaṅgura ādayaḥ ca seda jā seda kāraṇattā tatas jātā seda jā

original: Devo ca ādinā brahmanerayikādayo ca opapātikā, upagantvā patatīti upapātī, ṇī, soḷasavassuddesikādiko
analyzed: ca ādinā brahma nerayika ādayaḥ ca opapātikāḥ upagantvā patati iti upapātī soḷasa vassuddesika ādiko

original: attabhāvo, so yesamatthi, te opapātikā.
analyzed: atta bhāvo so yesam atthi te opapātikā

original: 742. Jaṇṇumatte jaṇṇuppamāṇayutte udakādimhi jaṇṇutaggho, jaṇṇuppamāṇo jaṇṇutaggho,
analyzed: jaṇṇu matte jaṇṇu ppamāṇa yutte udaka ādimhi jaṇṇu tagghaḥ jaṇṇu ppamāṇaḥ jaṇṇu tagghaḥ

original: pamāṇatthe taggho, jaṇṇuppamāṇo jaṇṇumatto, pamāṇatthe matto moggallāne 4.47 sutte
analyzed: pamāṇa atthe tagghaḥ jaṇṇuppamāṇaḥ jaṇṇumattaḥ pamāṇa atthe mattaḥ moggallāne sutte

original: passitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ.
analyzed: passitabbam tasmin

original: Kiñcidūnake appamattakayutte kappo pāṇini 5.4.67, ūnassa appakatāya kappīyati ekādivasena paricchijjatīti kappo, kappa paricchedane.
analyzed: kiñcid ūnake appa mattaka yutte kappo pāṇini ūnassa appaka tāya kappīyati eka ādi vasena paricchijjati iti kappo kappa paricchedane

original: Catukkaṃ pariyāpanne. Anto gacchatīti antaggataṃ, “lopañca tatrākāro”ti olope aāgamo,
analyzed: catukkam pariyāpanne antar gacchati iti antaggatam lopam ca tatra a kāraḥ iti o lope a āgamaḥ

original: dvittaṃ. Antogatampi. Paricchinditvā āpannaṃ gahitaṃ pariyāpannaṃ. Gādha patiṭṭhāyaṃ,
analyzed: paricchinditvā āpannam gahitam pariyāpannam gādha

original: anto ogādhatīti antogadhaṃ, rasso, ogādhatīti ogadhaṃ.
analyzed: antaḥ ogādhati iti antogadham rassaḥ ogādhati iti ogadham

original: 743. Dvayaṃ sādhite. Rādha sādha siddhiyaṃ, kammani to.
analyzed: dvayam sādhite rādha sādha kammani

original: Dvayaṃ kuthite. Paca pāke, atīte kattari to, tassa kko, calopo. Kutha nippakke, to.
analyzed: dvayam kuthite paca pāke atīte kattari to tassa kkaḥ ca lopaḥ kutha nippakke to

original: Āpadaṃ byasanaṃ patto āpanno nāma, atipīḷanaṃ āpajjatīti āpanno, “ā tukodhamudāṭṭīsū”ti
analyzed: āpadam byasanam pattaḥ āpannaḥ nāma atipīḍanam āpajjati iti āpannaḥ ā tu kodha mud āṭṭīsu iti

original: hi ekakkharakoso ekakkharakosa 14 gāthā. Pada gamane, “āpanno ca vipattimhi, patte
analyzed: hi ekakkharakosaḥ ekakkharakosa gāthā pada gamane āpanno ca vipattimhi patte

original: ca vāccaliṅgiko”ti nānatthasaṅgaho.
analyzed: ca vāccaliṅgiko ti nānattha saṅgahaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ paresamavasagate. Natthi vaso āyatto paresaṃ etasmiṃ serībhūteti vivaso, avaso ca.
analyzed: dvayam natthi vaso āyatto paresam etasmin ca

original: 744. Chakkaṃ khitte. Nuda peraṇe, nuda khepe vā, to, tassa inno. Aninnādese bhujādi, nutto. Nutopi. Asu khepane, to, bhujādi, atto. Khipa peraṇe, to.
analyzed: chakkam khitte nuda peraṇe nuda khepe vā to tassa innaḥ an inna ādese bhuja ādi nuttaḥ nutaḥ api asu khepane to bhuja ādi attaḥ khipa peraṇe to

original: Īra gatiyaṃ, kampane ca, ito, īrito. Āpubbo vidha peraṇe, to, āviddho.
analyzed: īra gatiyam kampane ca itaḥ īritaḥ āpubbaḥ vidha peraṇe taḥ āviddhaḥ

original: Catukkaṃ kampite. Kampa calane, dhū vidhunane, kampane ca. Dhūto, ādhūto, cala kampane, calito. Vellito, pekhitopi. Vella calanattho. Pekha gatyattho, pekhito.
analyzed: catukkam kampite kampa calane vidhunane kampane ca dhūtaḥ ādhūtaḥ cala kampane calitaḥ vellitaḥ pekhitaḥ api vella calana atthaḥ pekha gati atthaḥ pekhitaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ nisite. Nisi nisāne. Tija nisāne, nisānaṃ tikkhakaraṇaṃ, ubhayatrāpi kammani to.
analyzed: dvayam nisite nisi nisāne nisānam tikkha karaṇam ubhayatra api kammani to

original: 745-746. Tikaṃ pattabbe. Pata gamane, tabbo. Gamu gatiyaṃ, ṇyo, myassa mmo vā, gammaṃ, gamyaṃ, dyassa jjo, āpajjaṃ.
analyzed: tikam pattabbe pata gamane tabbaḥ gamu gatiyam ṇyaḥ myassa mmaḥ vā gammam gamyam dyassa jjaḥ āpajjam

original: Dvayaṃ pariṇate. Pacino anekatthattā iha pariṇatattho. Namu namane, bhūvādi, kattari to, samā dve tulyatthā.
analyzed: dvayam pariṇate pacinaḥ anekatthattā iha pariṇata tthaḥ namu namane bhū vādi kattari samā dve tulya tthā

original: Pañcakaṃ veṭhite. Veṭha veṭhane. Valamiva valayaṃ, kuṇḍalākāraṃ valayaṃ kataṃ valayitaṃ,
analyzed: pañcakam veṭhite veṭha veṭhane valam iva valayam kuṇḍala ākāram valayam katam valayitam

original: nāmadhātu, kāritantā to. Rudha āvaraṇe, ruddhaṃ. Saṃpubbo vu saṃvaraṇe, saṃvutaṃ.
analyzed: nāmadhātu kāri tantā taḥ rudhaḥ āvaraṇe ruddham saṃpubbaḥ vu saṃvaraṇe saṃvutam

original: Samantato vutaṃ āvutaṃ, vu saṃvaraṇe, sabbatra kammani to.
analyzed: samantataḥ vutam āvutam vu saṃvaraṇe sabbatra kammani to

original: Dvayaṃ parikhādinā parikkhitte. Pari samantato karīyateti parikkhittaṃ, parikkhatampi. Vu saṃvaraṇe, nivutaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam parikhādinā parikkhitte pari samantataḥ parikkhittam saṃvaraṇe nivutam

original: Tikaṃ vitthate. Sara gatiyaṃ, to, tassa ṭo, ralopo, visaṭaṃ. Tanu vitthāre, to, tassa to, nalopo, vitthataṃ, tataṃ.
analyzed: tikam vitthate tassa ṭo ra lopaḥ vitthatam tatam

original: Dvayaṃ lepanīye. Lipa lepane, diha upalepane, ubhayatrāpi kammani to.
analyzed: dvayam lepanīye lipa lepane upalepane ubhayatra api kammani to

original: Dvayaṃ guḷhe. Guha saṃvaraṇe, ḷo, guḷho. Gupa gopane, gutto.
analyzed: dvayam guḷhe guha saṃvaraṇe ḷaḥ guḍhaḥ gupa gopane

original: Dvayaṃ posanīye. Pusa posane, to, satānaṃ ṭṭho, ṭṭhābhāve posito.
analyzed: dvayam posanīye pusa posane to satānam ṭṭho ṭṭha abhāve

original: 747. Dvayaṃ salajje. Lajja pīḷe, pīḷo lajjāva. Hīḷa nindālajjāsu, hīḷito.
analyzed: dvayam sa lajje nindā lajjāsu

original: Dvayaṃ sadde. Sana dhana sadde, sanitaṃ, dhanitaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam sadde sana dhana sadde sanitam dhanitam

original: Pañcakaṃ bandhanīye. Sandanaṃ bandhanaṃ, taṃyogā vantu. Sandānavantaṃ kataṃ sandānitaṃ,
analyzed: pañcakam bandhanīye sandanam bandhanam vantu sandānavantam katam sandānitam

original: nāmadhātumhā to, vantulopo. Sandānaṃ sajjā, tamassāti vā, ito. Si bandhane, to. Bandha
analyzed: nāma dhātumhā taḥ vantu lopaḥ sandānam sajjā tamassā ati vā i taḥ si bandhane taḥ bandha

original: bandhane, baddho. Kīla bandhane. Yamu uparame, saṃpubbo bandhane, sabbatra kammani
analyzed: bandhane baddhaḥ kīla bandhane uparame saṃpubbaḥ bandhane sabbatra kammani

original: to. Mūtaṃ, udditaṃ, sadditampi. Mū bandhane. Dā avakhaṇḍane. U saṃpubbo bandhane.
analyzed: bandhane dāḥ avakhaṇḍane u saṃ pubbaḥ bandhane

original: Vuttañca “uddānantu ca bandhana”nti.
analyzed: vuttam ca uddānantu ca bandhananti

original: 748. Tikaṃ siddhe. Sidha saṃsiddhimhi. Pada gamane, nipubbo siddhiyaṃ. Vatta vattane, vattanaṃpyatra sijjhanaṃ nipubbattā.
analyzed: tikam siddhe sidha saṃsiddhimhi pada gamane nipubbaḥ siddhiyam vatta vattane vattanam pi atra sijjhanam nipubba ttā

original: Tikaṃ vidārite. Dara bhida vidāraṇe, innādeso. Bhinnaṃ. Aninnādese tu bheditaṃ.
analyzed: tikam vidārite dara bhida vidāraṇe inna ādesaḥ bhinnam an inna ādese tu bheditam

original: Dvayaṃ tiṇādīhi chādanīye. Chada saṃvaraṇe, to, tassa sadhātvantassa annādeso.
analyzed: dvayam tiṇa ādīhi chādanīye chada saṃvaraṇe to tassa sa dhātu antassa anna ādesaḥ

original: Tikaṃ chindite. Vidha vedhane. Chidda kaṇṇabhede, curādi. Vidha vedhane, sabbatra kamme to, aparadvaye ca sañjātatthe ito.
analyzed: tikam chindite vidha vedhane chidda kaṇṇabhede cur ādi vidha vedhane sabbatra kamme to apara dvaye ca sañjāta tthe i to

original: 749. Tikaṃ ānīte. Hara haraṇe, bhara dhāraṇaposanesu, āpubbo nī naye.
analyzed: tikam ānīte hara haraṇe bhara dhāraṇa posanesu ā pubbaḥ nī naye

original: Dvayaṃ damayutte. Damu damane, kattari to. Pakkamādīhi nto. Antādese damito. Kammasādhanopyayaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam dama yutte damu damane kattari to pakkama ādīhi anta ādese damitaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ sante. Samu upasame, kattarito. Antādese samito, kammasādhanopyayaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam sante samu upasame anta ādese samitaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ puṇṇe. Pūra pūraṇe, tarādīhi iṇṇo, dvīsupi kattukammasādhanāni labbhanti.
analyzed: dvayam puṇṇe pūra pūraṇe tara ādīhi dvīsupi kattu kamma sādhanāni labbhanti

original: 750. Tipādaṃ pūjite. Cāya pūjānisāmanesu. Maha pūjāyaṃ, pūja pūjane, araha pūjāyaṃ,
analyzed: ti pādam pūjite cāya pūjā nisāmanesu maha pūjāyam pūja pūjane araha pūjāyam

original: arahito. Acca pūjāyaṃ. Māna pūjāyaṃ. Ci caye, apapubbo pūjane. Namassitopi, namassadhātu pūjāyaṃ.
analyzed: arahitaḥ acca pūjāyam mā ana pūjāyam ci caye pūjane namassitaḥ api namassadhātu pūjāyam

original: Dvayaṃ tacchite dāruādimhi. Taccha tanukaraṇe, tanukarīyateti tanūkato, dīgho.
analyzed: dvayam tad śite tanu karaṇe tanukarīyate iti tanūkataḥ dīghaḥ

original: 751. Dvayaṃ aggiādīhi tatte. Tapa dhūpa santāpe.
analyzed: dvayam aggi ādīhi tat te tapa dhūpa santāpe

original: Dvayaṃ rājādīnaṃ santike bhajanādivasena upagate. Cara gatyattho, upacarito. Āsa upavesane, upāsito.
analyzed: dvayam rāja ādīnam santike bhajana ādi vasena upagate cara gati atthaḥ upacaritaḥ āsa upavesane upāsito

original: Addhaṃ cute. Bhasa adhopatane, to. Gaḷa secane, gaḷitaṃ. Pada gamane, pannaṃ. Cu cavane, cu gamane vā. Dhaṃsu avasaṃsane, gatiyañca. Kannampi, kanna gatisosanesu.
analyzed: addham cute bhasa adhopatane to gaḷa secane gaḷitam pada gamane pannam cu cavane cu gamane vā dhaṃsu avasaṃsane gatiyam ca kannampi kanna gati sosanesu

original: 752. Tuṭṭhantaṃ pamudite, pī tappanakantīsu. Muda hāse. Hasa haṃsane, hasa alike vā. Mada hāse, matto. Tusa pītiyaṃ.
analyzed: tuṭṭhantam pamudite tappana kantīsu muda hāse hasa haṃsane hasa alike vā mada hāse matto tusa pītiyam

original: Catukkaṃ chinne. Kanta chedane. Chidi dvidhākaraṇe. Lū chedane, ṇo, yu vā. Dā lavane, tu, dā avakhaṇḍane vā. Chātampi. Cho chedane, ossākāro.
analyzed: catukkam chinne chedane chidi dvidhākaraṇe chedane ṇaḥ yu vā dā lavane tu dā avakhaṇḍane vā cho chedane

original: Tikaṃ pasatthe. Saṭha thutiyaṃ, to. Vaṇṇa vaṇṇakriyāvitthāraguṇavacanesu. Thu abhitthave. Īḍito, paṇitopi, īḍa thutimhi. Paṇa byavahāre, thutimhi ca, paṇito.
analyzed: tikam pa satthe thutiyam to vaṇṇa vaṇṇa kriyā vitthāra guṇavacanesu thu abhitthave īḍitaḥ paṇitaḥ api īḍa thutimhi paṇa byavahāre thutimhi ca paṇitaḥ

original: 753. Pañcakaṃ alle, tima addabhāve niccalepi, pakkamādīhi nto. Alla kledane, lo,
analyzed: pañcakam alle tima adda bhāve nicca lepi pakkama ādīhi ntaḥ alla kledane lo

original: allaṃ. Adda gatimhi, yācane ca, āpubbo dā avakhaṇḍane vā, do, addaṃ. Kilida addabhāve,
analyzed: allam adda gatimhi yācane ca ā pubbaḥ dāḥ avakhaṇḍane vā daḥ addam kilida adda bhāve

original: innādeso. Unda kledane, inno, unno vā, sāddampi. Addaguṇayuttaṃ addaṃ, tena saha vattate sāddaṃ.
analyzed: inna ādesaḥ unda kledane innaḥ unnaḥ vā adda guṇa yuttam addam tena saha vattate

original: Catukkaṃ gavesite. Magga anvesane, curādi. Esa gatiyaṃ, bhūvādi. Gavesa maggane, curādi.
analyzed: catukkam gavesite magga anvesane cur ādi gatiyam bhū ādi gavesa maggane cur ādi

original: Dvayaṃ laddhe. Labha pattiyaṃ. Papubbo āpa byāpane, to, bhujādi, ālopo, pattaṃ. Bhāvitaṃ, āsāditaṃ, vibhūtañca.
analyzed: dvayam laddhe labha pattiyam papubbaḥ āpa byāpane taḥ bhuja ādi ālopaḥ pattam bhāvitam āsāditam vibhūtam ca

original: 754. Pālitantaṃ rakkhanīye, rakkha pālane. Gupa gopane, bhujādi. Tā pālane, tātaṃ. Āyāgame gopāyitaṃ. Ava rakkhaṇe, avitaṃ.
analyzed: rakkhanīye rakkha pālane gupa gopane bhuja ādi tā pālane tātam āya āgame gopāyitam ava rakkhaṇe avitam

original: Catukkaṃ catte. Saja vissagge. Caja hāniyaṃ. Hā cāge, ino, dīghādi, hīno. Ujha ussagge, samujjhitaṃ. Dhūtampi, dhū kampane.
analyzed: catukkam catte saja vissagge caja hāniyam hā cāge inaḥ dīgha ādi hīnaḥ ujhaḥ ussagge samujjhitam dhūtampi dhū kampane

original: 755. Pajjaṃ bhāsite. Bhāsa byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Lapa byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vaca bhāsane,
analyzed: pajjam bhāsite bhāsa byattiyam vācāyam lapa byattiyam vācāyam bhāsane

original: vuttaṃ. Abhipubbo dhā dhāraṇe, to, dhātissa hi, hi gamane vā, abhihitaṃ. Khyā kathane.
analyzed: vuttam abhipubbaḥ dhā dhāraṇe to dhātissa hi hi gamane vā abhihitam khyā kathane

original: Jappa byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Īra khepagativacanakampanesu, udīritaṃ. Katha vākyapabandhe.
analyzed: vācāyam īra khepa gati vacana kampanesu udīritam vākya apabandhe

original: Gada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ. Bhaṇa bhaṇane. Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, to, vassu, uditaṃ.
analyzed: gada viyattiyam vācāyam bhaṇa bhaṇane vada viyattiyam vācāyam to

original: 756. Catukkaṃ avamānite. Ñā avabodhane. Gaṇa saṅkhyāne. Bhū sattāyaṃ. Māna pūjāyaṃ,
analyzed: avamānite ñā avabodhane gaṇa saṅkhyāne bhū sattāyam māna pūjāyam

original: mana ñāṇe vā, avaparipubbā ete paribhūte. Heṭṭhā katvā ñāyati, gaṇīyati, maññatīti
analyzed: mana ñāṇe vā avaparipubbā ete paribhūte heṭṭhā katvā ñāyati gaṇīyati maññati iti

original: avaññito, avagaṇito, avamānito ca. Paribhavīyati avamānaṃ karīyatīti paribhūto.
analyzed: avaññitaḥ avagaṇitaḥ avamānito ca paribhavīyati avamānam karīyati iti paribhūtaḥ

original: Catukkaṃ chāte. Ghasa adane, cho, dvittaṃ. Jighacchā sañjātā yassa jighacchito. Khuda
analyzed: catukkam chāte ghasa adane cho dvittam jighacchā sañjātā yassa jighacchitaḥ khuda

original: pipāsāyaṃ. Chāda bhakkhane. Bhuja pālanajjhohāresu, kho, dvittādi, bubhukkhā sañjātā yassa bubhukkhito.
analyzed: pipāsā ayam chāda bhakkhane bhuja pālana ajjhohāresu kho dvitta ādi bubhukkhā sañjātā yassa bubhukkhitaḥ

original: 757. Chakkaṃ ñāte. Budha ñā avagamane. Pada gamane, to, tassa anno, paṭipannaṃ. Vida ñāṇe. Gati bujhattho. Avagataṃ. Mana ñāṇe, to, mataṃ.
analyzed: chakkam ñāte budha ñā avagamane pada gamane to tassa paṭipannam vida ñāṇe gati bujhattho avagatam mana ñāṇe to matam

original: Addhaṃ gilite. Gala adane, assi, gilito. Khāda bhakkhane. Bhuja pālanajjhohāresu.
analyzed: addham gilite gala adane assi gilitaḥ khāda bhakkhane bhuja pālana ajjhohāresu

original: Bhakkha adane. Adhiavapubbo hara haraṇe, to, tassa ṭo, ralopo, ajjhohaṭo. Asa bhakkhane,
analyzed: bhakkha adane adhi avapubbaḥ hara haraṇe to tassa ṭaḥ ra lopaḥ ajjhohaṭaḥ asa bhakkhane

original: asito. Jappito, gasitopi, jappa adane. Gasa adane.
analyzed: asitaḥ jappitaḥ gasitaḥ api jappa adane gasa adane

original: Visesyādhīnavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: visesya adhīna vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 2. Saṃkiṇṇavaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: saṃkiṇṇa vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 758. Pubbasmiṃ kaṇḍadvaye buddhādīni nāmāni samānatthāni pakaraṇena nibaddhāni, asmimpi
analyzed: pubbasmim kaṇḍa dvaye buddha ādīni nāmāni samāna atthāni pakaraṇena nibaddhāni asmim pi

original: kaṇḍe sobhanādīni visesananāmāni, samayādīnyanekatthāni, cirassamādīni ca abyayāni
analyzed: kaṇḍe sobhana ādīni visesana nāmāni samaya ādīni aneka atthāni cirassama ādīni ca abyayāni

original: pakaraṇeneva nibaddhāni, idāni pana pubbavaggesu vitthārabhayā ye na nibaddhā, taṃsaṅgahatthaṃ,
analyzed: pakaraṇena iva nibaddhāni idāni pana pubba vaggesu vitthāra bhayā ye na nibaddhā

original: taṃsamayānupālanatthañca saṃkiṇṇamārabhate “ñe yya”miccādinā. Tassattho – ihāpi saṃkiṇṇavaggepi
analyzed: tad samaya anupālana ttham ca saṃkiṇṇam ārabhate ñe yyam iccādinā tassa atthaḥ iha api saṃkiṇṇa vagge pi

original: kvāpi katthaci kriyādīsu paccayatthavasena āpaccayādīnaṃ itthiliṅgādibhāvajotakassa
analyzed: kvāpi katthaci kriyā ādīsu paccaya ttha vasena ā paccaya ādīnam itthi liṅga ādi bhāva jotakassa

original: sabhāvassa vasena liṅgaṃ itthiliṅgādikaṃ ñeyyanti. Cakārena bhiyyo rūpantarādipariggahopi.
analyzed: sa bhāvassa vasena liṅgam itthi liṅga ādikam ñeyyanti cakārena bhiyyaḥ rūpa antara ādi pariggahaḥ api

original: Ihāti ca upalakkhaṇaṃ, vaggantaresupi paccayatthavasena liṅgādinicchayasambhavato.
analyzed: iha ati ca upalakkhaṇam vagga antaresu pi paccaya ttha vasena liṅga ādi nicchaya sambhavato

original: Kattabbato kriyā, kara karaṇe, ṇyo, ikārāgamo, assi, vaṇṇavipariyaye kriyā, kriyampi, ririyapaccaye kiriyaṃ, kiriyāpi. Rammapaccaye kammaṃ.
analyzed: kattabbataḥ kriyā kara karaṇe ikāra āgamaḥ assi vaṇṇa vipariyaye kriyā kriyam pi ririya paccaye kiriyam kiriyā api ramma paccaye kammam

original: Tikaṃ cittopasame. Samu upasame,ti, santi. Thamhi samatho. Amhi samo.
analyzed: tikam citta upasame upasameti santi thamhi samathaḥ amhi samaḥ

original: Tikaṃ kāyopasame. Damu upasame. Thamhi damatho. Timhi danti. Cittopasamepyete.
analyzed: tikam kāya upasame upasame thamhi damatho timhi danti citta upasame pi ete

original: Suddhakammani vattaṃ bhavati. Vatta vattane, vatta samādāne vā vattaṃ, asītimahāvattādi.
analyzed: suddha kammani vattam bhavati vatta vattane vatta samādāne vā vattam asīti mahā vatta ādi

original: Āsaṅgavacanaṃ āsattavacanaṃ saddasarūpaṃ parāyaṇaṃ nāma vuttaṃ, tañca tīsu. Paraṃ
analyzed: āsaṅga vacanam āsatta vacanam sadda sarūpam parāyaṇam nāma vuttam tat ca tīsu param

original: āyanaṃ āyatto tāṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ, kammāsatto iccattho, sākalyavacane tu pārāyaṇaṃ, pāraṃ
analyzed: āyanam āyattaḥ tāṇam parāyaṇam kamma āsatto sākalya vacane tu pārāyaṇam pāram

original: pariyantaṃ ayanti gacchanti kassaci anenāti pārāyaṇaṃ, yu, ṇattaṃ, yathā – nāmapārāyaṇaṃ, dhātupārāyaṇaṃ.
analyzed: pariyantam ayanti gacchanti kassaci anena ati pārāyaṇam yu ṇattam yathā nāma pārāyaṇam dhātu pārāyaṇam

original: 759. Tikaṃ dvidhābhāve. Bhidi dvidhākaraṇe, ṇo. Dara vidāraṇe. Phuṭa vikasane, phuṭa bhedane vā, yu.
analyzed: tikam dvidhā bhāve bhidi dvidhākaraṇe ṇaḥ dara vidāraṇe phuṭa vikasane phuṭa bhedane vā yu

original: Dvayaṃ tappane. Tapa pīṇane, yu. Pī tappane, yu, kiyādi, nassa ṇattaṃ. Avanampi, ava pālane, dittiyañca anekatthattā.
analyzed: dvayam tappane tapa pīṇane yu pī tappane yu kiyā ādi nassa ṇattam avanam pi ava pālane dittiyam ca anekattha ttā

original: Dvayaṃ sāpe. Kusa avhāne, bhedane ca, yu. Sanja saṅge, abhisaṅgo.
analyzed: dvayam sāpe kusa avhāne bhedane ca sanja saṅge abhisaṅgo

original: Tikaṃ yācanāyaṃ. Bhikkha yācane, yu. Yāca yācane. Attha yācane. Addanopyatra, adda gatimhi, yācane ca.
analyzed: tikam yācanāyam bhikkha yācane yu yāca yācane attha yācane gatimhi yācane ca

original: 760. Nimittarahitaṃ yadicchā nāma, yā yā icchā adhippāyo yadicchā nāma. Seritāpi.
analyzed: nimitta rahitam yat icchā nāma yā yā icchā adhippāyaḥ yat icchā nāma sā īritā api

original: Tikaṃ āpucchane, āpucchanañca gamanāgamanādisamaye suhajja bandhavādīnamāliṅgana
analyzed: tikam āpucchane āpucchanam ca gamana āgamana ādi samaye

original: cumbanasvāgatapiyavacanārogyapucchanagamanānuññādinā ānandanaṃ. Puccha pucchane,
analyzed: cumbana svāgata piya vacana ārogya pucchana gamana anuññā ādinā ānandanam puccha pucchane

original: āpucchanaṃ. Nanda samiddhiyaṃ, ānandanaṃ. Sabhāja pītidassanesu, sabhāja pītivacanesu
analyzed: āpucchanam nanda samiddhiyam ānandanam sabhāja pīti dassanesu sabhāja pīti vacanesu

original: vā, curādi, yu, sabhājanaṃ.
analyzed: vā curādi yu sa bhājanam

original: Dvayaṃ naye. Ñāyanti yenāti ñāyo, ākārantānamāyo. Nyāyopi, nissesato ayati yena nyāyo. Nī naye, ayādeso, nayo.
analyzed: dvayam naye ñāyanti yena ati nyāyaḥ nyāyaḥ api nissesataḥ yena nyāyaḥ nī naye aya ādesaḥ nayaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ vuddhimhi. Phā vuddhimhi, phāya vuddhiyaṃ vā, yalopo,ti, phāti, nāriyaṃ. Vaddha vaddhane,ti, dalopo, dhaḍhabhahehi dhaḍhā ca, assu, vuddhi, vuḍḍhipi.
analyzed: dvayam vuddhimhi vuddhimhi vuddhimhi vā ya lopaḥ uti nāriyam vaddha vaddha na iti da lopaḥ dhaḍha bhahehi dhaḍhā ca assu vuddhi

original: 761. Kilama hāsakkhaye, tho, kilamatho. Yumhi kilamanaṃ. Sū pāṇipasave, pasavanaṃ pasavo, timhi pasūti.
analyzed: kilama hā sakkhaye tho kilamatho yumhi kilamanam sū pāṇi pasave pasavanam pasavaḥ timhi pasūti

original: Kasa gatiyaṃ hiṃsāyañca, niggahītāgamo, ukkaṃso, kasa vilekhane vā. Atisayo vutto.
analyzed: gatiyam hiṃsāyam ca niggahīta āgamaḥ ukkaṃso vilekhane vā atisayaḥ vutto

original: Bhusādayo pamāṇātisayavasena vuttā, ukkaṃso guṇātisayavasena vutto, atisayo pana
analyzed: bhusa ādayo pamāṇa atisaya vasena vuttāḥ ukkaṃsaḥ guṇa atisaya vasena vuttaḥ atisayaḥ pana

original: ubhayavasenāti ubhayatra niddiṭṭhānaṃ bhedo. Tikaṃ jayane. Jayanaṃ jayo, yu, jayanaṃ. Timhi jiti, nārī.
analyzed: ubhaya vasena ati ubhayatra niddiṣṭhānam bhedaḥ tikam jayane jayanam jayaḥ jayanam nārī

original: 762. Bandhanantāni dve dve nāmāni. Vasa kantiyaṃ. Kamu kantiyaṃ,ti. Vidha vedhane,
analyzed: bandhana antāni dve dve nāmāni vasa vedhane

original: byathane ca anekatthattā, a, ikārassa yādeso, byadho, vedho. Gaha upādāne nibandhane
analyzed: byathane ca anekatthattā a ikārassa ya ādesaḥ byadhaḥ vedhaḥ gahaḥ upādāne nibandhane

original: ca, gaho, gāho ca. Vara āvaraṇe, varo. Vu saṃvaraṇe,ti, vuti. Paca pāke, itthiyamatiyavo
analyzed: ca gahaḥ gāhaḥ ca vare āvaraṇe varaḥ saṃvaraṇa iti paca pāke

original: vā, a. Pacanaṃ pāko, ṇo.
analyzed: vā a pacanam pākaḥ ṇaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ āhvāne. Hu dānādanahabyappadānesu, ṇo, havo. Timhi huti. Dvayaṃ anubhavane.
analyzed: dvayam āhvāne hu dāna āda na ha bya ppadānesu no havaḥ timhi hu ti dvayam anubhavane

original: Vida ñāṇe, ṇo, vedo. Vida vedanākhyānanivāsesu, curādi, yu, vedanaṃ, vākāro vedanāsaddassa napuṃsakattāpekkho.
analyzed: vidaḥ ñāṇe ṇaḥ vedaḥ vida vedanā ākhyāna nivāsesu curādi vedanam vākāraḥ vedanā saddassa napuṃsaka ttā apekkhaḥ

original: 763. Dvayaṃ dhanādijāniyaṃ. Jara vayohānimhi, yu, jīraṇaṃ, assī. Hā cāge, yu, nadādi, rasso, hassa jo, jāni. Tā pālane, yu, ṇattaṃ. Dvayaṃ pamāṇe. Mā māne,ti, pamiti. Amhi pamā.
analyzed: dvayam dhana ādi jāniyam vayaḥ hānimhi jīraṇam assī hā cāge yu nad ādi rassaḥ hassa jaḥ jāni tā pālane dvayam pamāṇe mā māneti amhi pamā

original: Dvayaṃ saṃyoge. Silisa āliṅgane. Saṃpubbo dhā dhāraṇe, i, sandhanaṃ sandhi. Dvayaṃ
analyzed: dvayam saṃyoge silisaḥ āliṅgane saṃpubbaḥ dhā dhāraṇe sandhanam sandhi dvayam

original: khaye. Khi khaye, ṇo, isse, e aya, khayo. Ci caye, apapubbo khaye. Dvayaṃ sadde.
analyzed: khaye khi khaye ṇaḥ isse e aya khayaḥ ci caye apa pubbaḥ khaye dvayam sadde

original: Ru sadde, ṇo, vuddhyādeso. Raṇa sadde. A, raṇo.
analyzed: ru sadde ṇaḥ vuddhi ādesaḥ raṇa sadde a raṇaḥ

original: 764. Gada byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, ṇo, a ca, nigādo, nigado ca. Dvayaṃ made. Mada ummāde, mādo, mado ca. Si bandhane,ti, siti.
analyzed: gada byattiyam vācāyam no ca nigādaḥ nigado ca dvayam made made ummāde mādaḥ ca si bandhana iti s iti

original: Tikaṃ ākāre. Ākaraṇaṃ ākāro, anekatthattā mukhavaṅkādyaṅgavikāro vā, iṅgati jānātīti
analyzed: ākāre ākaraṇam ākāraḥ anekatthattā mukha vaṅka ādi aṅga vikāraḥ vā iṅgati jānāti iti

original: vā yena ākāro. Iṅga gamanattho, to, a ca, iṅgitaṃ, iṅgo ca. Atthassa dhanassa apagamo
analyzed: vā yena ākāraḥ gamana tthaḥ to a ca iṅgitam iṅgo ca atthassa dhanassa apagamaḥ

original: vināso byayo nāma. Byaya cittasamussagge.
analyzed: vināsaḥ byayaḥ nāma citta samussagge

original: 765. Dvayaṃ antarāye. Cutipaṭisandhīnamantare ayatīti antarāyo. Paṭipakkhavasena
analyzed: dvayam antarāye cuti paṭisandhīnam antare ayati iti antarāyaḥ paṭipakkha vasena

original: ūhati pavattatīti paccūho, atha vā kāriyasiddhi antaraṃ byavadhānaṃ ayati gamayatīti
analyzed: ūhati pavattati iti paccūhaḥ atha vā antaram byavadhānam ayati gamayati iti

original: antarāyo. Paccūhanti vinihantīti paccūho.
analyzed: antarāyaḥ paccūhanti vinihanti iti paccūhaḥ

original: Vikaraṇaṃ aññathā bhavananti vikāro, vikati ca, kara karaṇe, ṇo,ti ca.
analyzed: vikaraṇam aññathā bhavananti vikāraḥ ca kara karaṇe ca

original: Dvayaṃ sabhāvavigame. Silisa āliṅgane, pavipubbo taṃsabhāvavigame, vigato dhuro sadisabhāvo
analyzed: dvayam sa bhāva vigame silisaḥ āliṅgane taṃ sa bhāva vigame vigataḥ dhuraḥ sadisa bhāvaḥ

original: yasmāti vidhuro, “vidhuraṃ pavisilese, klivañca vikale tisū”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 22.20
analyzed: vidhuraḥ vidhuram pavi silese klivan ca vikale

original: rabhaso. Vidha vidhāne vā, uro. Dvayaṃ āsane. Visa pavesane, upavesanaṃ. Āsa upavesane, āsanaṃ.
analyzed: rabhasaḥ vidha vidhāne vai uro dvayam āsane pavesane upavesanam āsaḥ upavesane āsanam

original: 766. Tipādaṃ adhippāye. Cittamadhyāgantvā sayatīti ajjhāsayo. Anamipubbe āsayo. Adhipayati
analyzed: ti pādam adhippāye cittam adhyāgantvā sayati iti ajjhāsayaḥ anamipubbe āsayaḥ adhipayati

original: citteti adhippāyo, ṇo, paya gamane. Citte abhisandhāyatīti abhisandhi, dvīsu. Bhavati
analyzed: citta iti adhippāyaḥ ṇo paya gamane citte abhisandhāyati iti abhisandhi dvīsu bhavati

original: citteti bhāvo, ṇo. Adhimuccanaṃ citte adhiṭṭhānaṃ adhimutti, nārī. Chando taṇhāyampi vutto.
analyzed: citta iti bhāvaḥ ṇo adhimuccanam citte adhiṭṭhānam adhimutti nārī chando vutto

original: Dvayaṃ ādīnave. Doso paṭighe vutto. Ā bhuso dīnaṃ vāyati gamayatīti ādīnavo, dīna duggatabhāve, vo, vī gamane ca.
analyzed: dvayam ādīnave doso paṭighe vutto ā bhusaḥ dīnam vāyati gamayati iti ādīnavaḥ dīna duggata bhāve gamane ca

original: 767. Dvayaṃ ānisaṃse. Saṃsa hiṃsāthutīsu, ānisaṃso amukhyaphale, mukhyaphale ca,
analyzed: dvayam ānisaṃse saṃsa hiṃsā thutīsu ānisaṃsaḥ amukhya phale mukhya phale ca

original: tathā guṇo. Guṇa pakāsane, pakāseti kāraṇanti guṇo, gaṇa saṅkhyāne vā, assu, guṇo.
analyzed: tathā guṇaḥ guṇa pakāsane guṇaḥ gaṇa saṅkhyāne vā assu guṇaḥ

original: Dvayaṃ majjhe. Maja suddhiyaṃ, jho. Vipubbe vemajjhaṃ.
analyzed: dvayam majjhe maja suddhiyam vipubbe vemajjham

original: Dvayaṃ taruṇasūriyaṭṭhāne. Ahassa majjho majjhaho, so eva majjhanhiko, hassa nho
analyzed: dvayam taruṇa sūriya ṭṭhāne ahassa majjhaḥ majjhahaḥ saḥ eva majjhanhikaḥ hassa nho

original: moggallāna 3.110 suttaṃ passitabbaṃ. Ahassa majjho majjhanho, majjhantopi. Dvayaṃ
analyzed: moggallāna suttam passitabbam ahassa majjhaḥ majjhanhaḥ majjhantaḥ pi dvayam

original: nānattāyaṃ. Vigatā mattā sadisappamāṇaṃ etena hetubhūtena vemattaṃ. Nānameva nānatā,
analyzed: nānattā ayam vigatā mattā sadisa ppamāṇam etena hetu bhūtena vemattam nānam eva nānatā

original: nānasaddo punnapuṃsake, abyaye tu nānā.
analyzed: nānā saddaḥ put napuṃsake abyaye tu nānā

original: 768. Dvayaṃ niddāpaṭikkhepe. Jāgara niddakkhaye, jāgarameva jāgariyo. Dvayaṃ jalādīnamavicchannāyaṃ santatiyaṃ. Vahatismā ṇo, pavāho. Vatu āvattane,ti, pavatti.
analyzed: dvayam niddā paṭikkhepe jāgara nidda khaye jāgaram eva jāgariyaḥ dvayam jala ādīnam avicchannāyam santatiyam vahatisma no pavāhaḥ vatu āvattana iti pavatti

original: Tikaṃ vitthāre. Asu khepane, ṇo, byāso. Papubbo pañca vitthāre. Thara santharaṇe, pādipubbo ca vitthāre. Tikaṃ saṃyame. Yamu uparame, ṇo, yāmo. Itaresu a.
analyzed: tikam vitthāre asu khepane ṇo byāsaḥ pa pubbo pañca vitthāre thara santharaṇe ca vitthāre tikam saṃyame uparame ṇo yāmaḥ itaresu a

original: 769. Dvayaṃ gattānaṃ maddane. “Sambāhano’ṅgamaddako”ti vopālito, saṃpubbo vāha payatane,
analyzed: dvayam gattānam maddane sambāhana uṅgamaddakā iti vopālitaḥ saṃpubbaḥ vā āha payatane

original: maddane vā, yu. Madda maddane. Dvayaṃ nānārammaṇādīsu visappane. Sara gamane, ṇa.

original: Sappa gamane, yu, visappanaṃ.
analyzed: sappa gamane yu visappanam

original: Dvayaṃ paricaye. Thu abhitthave. Ci caye. Tikaṃ saṅgame. Mila silesane, ṇo, sakatthe ko, melako. Sanja saṅge, ṇo. Saṃpubbā gamito a.

original: 770. Sannikaṭṭhamhi samīpe sannidhisaddo, sannidhānaṃ sannidhi, pume, ṭhapanepyayaṃ. Nasa adassane, ṇo. Disa pekkhane, yu, dissādeso, issattaṃ.

original: Tikaṃ dhaññādīnaṃ lavane. Lū chedane, a. Ṇamhi abhilāvo. Yumhi lavanaṃ. Dvayaṃ khaṇappattiyaṃ. Papubbo thu abhitthave. Sara gamane, avasaro. Samāti dve tulyatthā.

original: 771. Catukkaṃ pariyosāne. Sā tanukaraṇe, yu, osānaṃ. Paripubbo pariyosānaṃ. Ukkaṃsātisayā pakaṭṭhepyuttā.

original: Dvayaṃ saṇṭhāne. Visa pavesane, sanniveso. Ṭhā gatinivattiyaṃ, yu, saṇṭhānaṃ. Dvayaṃ

original: 808. Bandhave so pume. Attani saṃ napuṃsake. Dhanasmiṃ so saṃ anitthiyaṃ. Sunakhe sā pume vutto. Attaniye so tiliṅgiko.

original: 817. Semhādo tidose. Rasarattādi pubbevutto. Pabhādike rūpadhātumhi. Cakkhādike visayadhātumhi.
analyzed: semha ādaḥ ti dose rasa ratta ādi pubbevuttaḥ pabhā ādike rūpadhātumhi cakkhu ādike visaya dhātumhi

original: 818. Amaccādikā satta pakatiyo vuttā. Sattādisāmyavatthā sattarajatamabhūtānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ guṇānaṃ sāmyavatthā. Paccayā ṇapaccayādito paṭhame paṭhamasaṇṭhite karotyādidhātumhi.
analyzed: amacca ādikā satta pakatiyaḥ vuttā satta ādi sāmya vatthā satta rajatama bhūtānam tiṇṇam guṇānam sāmya vatthā paccayā ṇa paccaya ādeḥ paṭhame paṭhama saṇṭhite karoti ādi dhātumhi

original: 819. Parittāṇaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Vatthumhi okāse. Tallañchanaṃ pādassa ṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: parittānam rakkhaṇam vatthumhi okāse tallañchanam pādassa ṭhānaṃ

original: 820. Lohamuggare lohamaye muggare. Tāḷādike sammatāḷakaṃsatāḷādike. Kaṭhine kakkhaḷe.
analyzed: loha muggare loha maye muggare tāḷa ādike samma tāḷa kaṃsa tāḷa ādike kaṭhine kakkhaḷe

original: 821. Makkhikā nīlamakkhikādikā. Tāsaṃ bhedā savisā madhukatā piṅgalamakkhikā. Madhumhi khuddaṃ appakādīsu catūsvatthesu vattamānaṃ tīsu liṅgesu. Adhamo nihīno. Kapaṇo ekacārī.
analyzed: makkhikā nīlamakkhikā ādikā tāsam bhedā sa visā madhuka tā piṅgalamakkhikā madhumhi khuddam appaka ādīsu catūsu atthesu vattamānam tīsu liṅgesu adhamaḥ nihīnaḥ kapaṇaḥ ekacārī

original: 822. Takke gorasavisese. Maraṇaliṅge maraṇañāpakalakkhaṇe. Asubhe, subhe cāti catūsvatthesu ariṭṭhaṃ. Āsavo majjaviseso. Pheṇiladdumo “baḍī-yौ-kho”.
analyzed: takke go rasa visese maraṇa liṅge maraṇa ñāpaka lakkhaṇe asubhe subhe ca ati catūsu atthesu ariṭṭham āsavaḥ majja viseso pheṇiladdumaḥ baḍīykho

original: 823. Gehānaṃ dārubandhappayojanaṃ pīṭhikā nāma. Pakkhandadvayassa, kaṇṇikādīnañca nissayabhūtā pīṭhikā.
analyzed: gehānam dāru bandha payojanam pīṭhikā nāma pakkhanda dvayassa kaṇṇikā ādīnam ca nissaya bhūtā pīṭhikā

original: 824. Mittākāre amittassāpi mittasaṇṭhāne. Bale, rāsimhi, vipattiyañca, “balassa rāsī”tipi eke.
analyzed: mitta ākāre amittassa api mitta saṇṭhāne bale rāsimhi vipattiyam ca balassa eke

original: 825. Khandhe rūpakkhandhe. Bhave rūpabhave. Nimittamhi kāraṇe. Vapu sarīraṃ.
analyzed: khandhe rūpa kkhandhe bhave rūpa bhave nimittamhi kāraṇe vapu sarīraṃ

original: 826. Vatthukilesakāmesūti vatthukāmakilesakāmesu. Madane māradevaputte. Rate methune. Nikāme icchārahite kāmaṃ napuṃsake. Anuññāyaṃ kāmamabyayaṃ bhave.
analyzed: vatthu kilesa kāmesu iti vatthu kāma kilesa kāmesu madane māradeva putte rate methune nikāme icchā rahite kāmam napuṃsake anuññāyam kāmam abyayam bhave

original: 827. Vajjabhaṇḍamukhe vīṇādoṇimukhe. Mātaṅgassa hatthino karakoṭi hatthaggaṃ.
analyzed: vajjabhaṇḍa mukhe vīṇā doṇi mukhe mātaṅgassa hatthino kara koṭi hatthaggaṃ

original: 828. Rambho saṭhyaṃ, ketavantyattho. Asaccaṃ musā. Ayoghanaṃ yena paharati. Girisiṅgamhi giragge. Sīraṅge phālaṅge. Yante kūṭayante.
analyzed: rambho asaccam musā ayaḥ ghanam yena paharati girisiṅgamhi giragge sīraṅge phālaṅge yante kūṭayante

original: 830. Paṭivākye paṭivacane. Uttarāsaṅge uparivatthe. Seṭṭhādīsu uttaro tīsu, parasmiṃ uparismiñca īrito.
analyzed: paṭivākye paṭivacane uttarāsaṅge uparivatthe seṭṭha ādīsu uttaraḥ tīsu parasmin īritaḥ

original: 831. Vimutti arahattaphalaṃ magganibbānānipi.
analyzed: vimutti arahatta phalam magga nibbānāni pi

original: 832. Saṅkhate paccayābhisaṅkhate dhamme. Puññābhisaṅkhāro, apuññābhisaṅkhāro, āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti
analyzed: saṅkhate paccaya abhisaṅkhate dhamme puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ apuñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ āneñja abhisaṅkhāraḥ iti

original: puññābhisaṅkhārādi. Payogo ussāho. Kāyasaṅkhāro, vacīsaṅkhāro, cittasaṅkhāroti kāyasaṅkhārādi.
analyzed: puñña abhisaṅkhāra ādi payogaḥ ussāhaḥ kāya saṅkhāro vacī saṅkhāro citta saṅkhāro ti kāya saṅkhāra ādi

original: Abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇakriyā.
analyzed: abhisaṅkharaṇam abhisaṅkharaṇa kriyā

original: 833. Tabbhāve diṭṭhisahagataṃ.
analyzed: tad bhāve diṭṭhi sahagatam

original: 834. Patirūpe yutte. Chādite tiṇādīhi. Raho suññaṭṭhānaṃ. Paññattiyaṃ channo bhikkhu, paññattiyaṃyeva pume.
analyzed: patirūpe yutte chādite tiṇa ādīhi rahaḥ suñña ṭṭhānam paññattiyam channaḥ bhikkhu paññattiyam yeva pume

original: 835. Buddhacakkhu buddhānaṃ cakkhu. Samantacakkhu sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Dhammacakkhu heṭṭhāmaggattaye ñāṇaṃ.
analyzed: buddha cakkhu buddhānam cakkhu samanta cakkhu sabbaññuta ñāṇam dhammacakkhu heṭṭhāmagga ttaye ñāṇam

original: 836. Abhikkamo abhikkamanīyo.
analyzed: abhikkamaḥ abhikkamanīyaḥ

original: 837. Vevacanaṃ abhinnattho saddo. Pakārasmiṃ bhede. Avasaro avakāso.
analyzed: vevacanam abhinna tthaḥ saddo pakārasmin bhede avasaraḥ avakāsaḥ

original: 838. Cittakammaṃ cittakārānaṃ kammaṃ. Vicitte nānāvidhe. Paññattiyaṃ citto dhanudharoyeva.
analyzed: citta kammam citta kārānam kammam vicitte nānāvidhe paññattiyam cittaḥ

original: Cittamāso puṇṇenduyuttena cittena nakkhattena lakkhito māso. Tārantare cittanakkhatte. Thiyaṃ nāriyaṃ.
analyzed: citta māsaḥ puṇṇa indu yuttena cittena nakkhattena lakkhitaḥ māso tāra antare citta nakkhatte thiyam nāriyam

original: 839. Sāmale nīle. Sayamatthe sayaṃsaddassa atthe. Sārivā upāsakā.
analyzed: sāmale nīle sayam atthe sayaṃsaddassa atthe sārivā upāsakā

original: 840. “Pume”tyādinā pubbaddhena gurusaddassa atthā vuttā, aparaddhena garusaddassa,
analyzed: pumā ityādinā pubbaddhena guru saddassa atthāḥ vuttāḥ aparaddhena garu saddassa

original: “ekadesekattamanaññaṃve”ti nyāyena dvinnampi ekattamaññamānena gāthānekatthavagge
analyzed: eka desa ekattam anaññam vā iti nyāyena dvinnam pi ekattam añña mānena gāthā anekattha vagge

original: kathitā. Mahante bahutte. Dujjare jīrāpetumasakkuṇeyye, dukkare vā.
analyzed: kathitāḥ mahante bahutte dujjare dukkare vā

original: 841. Accite pūjite. Khinne kilamathappatte. Samite upasamite.
analyzed: accite pūjite khinne kilamatha ppatte samite upasamite

original: Gāthānekatthavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: gāthā anekattha vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 842. Visuddhidevo, sammutidevo, upapattidevo cāti visuddhidevādi. Nabhaṃ ākāso.
analyzed: visuddhidevaḥ sammutidevaḥ upapattidevaḥ ca ati visuddhideva ādi nabham ākāsaḥ

original: Taruṇādīsu tīsvatthesu māṇavo.
analyzed: taruṇa ādīsu tīsu atthesu māṇavaḥ

original: 843. Ādyatthādīsu aggaṃ. Vare seṭṭhe tīsu.
analyzed: ādi attha ādīsu aggam vare seṭṭhe tīsu

original: Paccanīko sattu. Aññe aññatthe. Pacchābhāge “dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti.
analyzed: paccanīkaḥ sattu aññe aññatthe pacchābhāge dhātu liṅgehi parā

original: 844. Yoni itthīnaṃ yonimaggo. Kāmo icchā. Sirī paññā, puñño ca. Issaraṃ pabhutā. Dhammo sīlādi. Uyyāmo vīriyaṃ. Yaso parivāro, kitti ca.
analyzed: yoni itthīnam yoni maggaḥ kāmaḥ icchā sirī paññā puññaḥ ca issaram pabhu tā dhammo sīla ādi uyyāmaḥ vīriyam yaso parivāro kitti ca

original: 845. Samaṅgini samannāgate.
analyzed: samaṅgini samannāgate

original: 846. Ṭhiti ṭhānakriyā.
analyzed: ṭh iti ṭhāna kriyā

original: 848. Khandhakoṭṭhāso aṇḍajādicatukkaṃ. Passāvamaggo itthīnaṃ yoni. So pulliṅgo. Kūle tīre.
analyzed: khandha koṭṭhāsaḥ aṇḍaja ādi catukkam passa avamaggaḥ itthīnam yoni saḥ pulliṅgo kūle tīre

original: 849. Nāgotunāgasaddo tu. Urage sappe, hatthini ca.
analyzed: tu urage sappe hatthini ca

original: 850. Saṅkhyā gaṇanā. “Aññatthe”tyeke vadanti.
analyzed: saṅkhyā gaṇanā aññatthā iti eke vadanti

original: 851. Bhe nakkhattavisese. Santike samīpe. Mūlamūle lobhādike. Pābhate mūladhane. Aṃso sarīrāvayavo. Pakaṇḍe rukkhādīnaṃ sarīre.
analyzed: bhe nakkhatta visese santike samīpe mūla mūle lobha ādike pābhate mūla dhane aṃsaḥ sarīra avayavaḥ pakaṇḍe rukkha ādīnam sarīre

original: 852. Kamme kriyāyaṃ. Vikopanaṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ.
analyzed: vikopanam

original: 853. Pacchātāpo vippaṭisāro. Anubandho punappunaṃ pavattanaṃ. Rāgādo sattake. Mātaṅgassa muddhani piṇḍadvaye kumbho.
analyzed: pacchātāpaḥ vippaṭisāraḥ anubandho punappunam pavattanam rāgādo sattake mātaṅgassa muddhani piṇḍa dvaye kumbho

original: 854. Khaggakose khaggapidhāne. Paṭicchade samantato chādane. Sārambhe kolāhale.
analyzed: khagga kose khagga pidhāne paṭicchade samantataḥ chādane sa ārambhe kolāhale

original: 855. Kālaviseso dasaccharakālo. Nibyāpāraṭṭhiti aciraṭṭhiti, aciraṭṭhitīti dasaccharatopi ūnaṭṭhiti.
analyzed: kāla visesaḥ dasacchara kālaḥ nibyāpāra ṭṭhiti acira ṭṭhiti acira ṭṭhiti iti dasaccharataḥ pi ūna ṭṭhiti

original: Uppattibhūmi jātibhūmi.
analyzed: uppatti bhūmi jāti bhūmi

original: 856. Kabaḷīkārāhārādīsu catūsu.
analyzed: kabaḷīkāra āhāra ādīsu catūsu

original: 857. Saddhāya aparappaccaye. Cīvarādīsu catūsu. Ādhāro nissayo.
analyzed: saddhāya apara ppaccaye cīvara ādīsu catūsu ādhāraḥ nissayaḥ

original: Dibbavihāro, ariyavihāro, brahmavihāro cāti dibbavihārādi. Sugatālaye bhikkhūnamāvāse.
analyzed: dibba vihāro ariya vihāro brahma vihāro ca ati dibba vihāra ādi sugata ālaye bhikkhūnam āvāse

original: 858. Samattane niṭṭhāyaṃ. Cakārena niyamādike saṅgaṇhāti.
Saṅge lagge. Kāmādo catukke.
analyzed: saṅge lagge kāma ādaḥ catukke

original: 859. Sappaphaṇaṅgesūti sappassa phaṇe, aṅge ca sarīre. Koṭille kuṭilatāya. Bhuñjanaṃ bhojanakriyā.
analyzed: sappa phaṇa aṅgesu iti sappassa phaṇe aṅge ca sarīre koṭille kuṭila tāya bhuñjanam bhojana kriyā

original: Bhūmibhāge rājaṅgaṇādimhi. Kilese saṃkilese. Male rāgādike.
analyzed: bhūmi bhāge rājaṅgaṇa ādimhi kilese saṃkilese male rāga ādike

original: 860. Dhanādidappeti dhanādike paṭicca uppanne dappe.
analyzed: dhana ādi dappe iti dhana ādike paṭicca uppanne dappe

original: Nimitte kāraṇe. Chale saṭhye.
analyzed: nimitte kāraṇe chale saṭhye

original: 861. So pulliṅgo. Paramattani diṭṭhīnaṃ gāhaladdhe attani. Thambhasmiṃ gehādīnaṃ thambhe. Balasajjanaṃ yuddhakāle balassa sajjanaṃ.
analyzed: so pulliṅgaḥ param attani diṭṭhīnam gāha laddhe attani thambhasmim geha ādīnam thambhe bala sajjanam yuddha kāle balassa sajjanam

original: 862. Kusūlo dhaññādīnaṃ gehaṃ.
analyzed: kusūlaḥ dhañña ādīnam geham

original: Sopānaṅgamhi sopānasīse.
analyzed: sopānaṅgamhi sopāna sīse

original: 863. Niyyāse silese. Sekhare sīse. Nāgadantake bhittiādīsu pavesite nāgadantākāre daṇḍe.
analyzed: niyyāse silese sekhare sīse nāgadantake bhitti ādīsu pavesite nāgadanta ākāre daṇḍe

original: Sikhaṇḍo piñchaṃ. Tūṇīre usunidhimhi. Nikare samūhe.
analyzed: sikhaṇḍaḥ piñcham tūṇīre usu nidhimhi nikare samūhe

original: 864. Saṃyatakesesu bandhitakesesu.
analyzed: saṃyata kesesu bandhita kesesu

original: Kambu jalajantuviseso. Nalāṭaṭṭhi nalāṭe jātaṭṭhi. Gopphake pādagaṇṭhimhi.
analyzed: kambu jala jantu visesaḥ nalāṭa ṭṭhi nalāṭe jāta ṭṭhi gopphake pāda gaṇṭhimhi

original: 865. Kāle pañcadasīdivasaparimāṇe. Sādhye pattasādhanīye. Sakhī sahāyo. Vājo pattaṃ. Paṅguḷo pīṭhasampī.
analyzed: kāle pañcadasī divasa parimāṇe sādhye patta sādhanīye sakhī sahāyaḥ vājaḥ pattam paṅguḷaḥ pīṭha sampī

original: Dese desavisese. Aṇṇave samudde, ete pume. So sindhusaddo saritāyaṃ nadiyaṃ bhave.
analyzed: dese desa visese aṇṇave samudde ete pume so sindhu saddaḥ saritā ayam nadiyam bhave

original: 866. Kareṇusaddo gaje hatthimhi, purise pulliṅge vattati. Hatthiniyaṃ tu itthiyaṃ.
analyzed: kareṇu saddaḥ gaje hatthimhi purise pulliṅge vattati hatthiniyam tu itthiyam

original: Ratane ratanavisese. Maṇivedho nāma yaṃ loke “cina” iti vuccati. Indaheti indāvudho.
analyzed: ratane ratana visese maṇivedhaḥ nāma yam loke cinaḥ iti vuccati inda hā iti indāvudhaḥ

original: 867. Koṭiyaṃ ante. Vādittavādane vīṇādivādittavādanopāye.
analyzed: ante vāditta vādane vīṇā ādi vāditta vādana upāye

original: “Koṇo vajjappabhede ca,
analyzed: koṇaḥ vajja ppabhede ca

original: Koṇo selaguḷe ije;
analyzed: koṇaḥ selaguḷe i je

original: Vīṇādivādanopāye,
analyzed: vīṇā ādi vādana upāye

original: Ekadese gatassa ce”ti. –
analyzed: eka dese gatassa ca iti

original: Tikaṇḍaseso tikaṇḍasesa 3.3.125.
analyzed: tikaṇḍasesaḥ

original: 868. Vaṇippathe vāṇijānaṃ vohārakammapathe. Vede vedavisese, vāṇijepi nigamo.
analyzed: vaṇi pathe vāṇijānam vohāra kamma pathe vede veda visese vāṇije pi nigamaḥ

original: Vivādādo “vivādādhikaraṇa” pāci. 394 ntyādīsu. Ādhāro kārakaviseso, nissayo ca. Kāraṇe “yatvādhikaraṇamena”nti dha. sa. 1354.
analyzed: vivāda adaḥ vivāda adhikaraṇa  ntyādīsu ādhāraḥ kāraka visesaḥ nissayaḥ ca kāraṇe dha sa

original: 869. Pasumhi goṇe. Vasudhā pathavī. Vācā vacanaṃ. Ādinā saggaraṃsivajiracandajalādayo gahitā.
analyzed: pasumhi goṇe vasudhā pathavī vācā vacanam ādinā sagga raṃsi vajira canda jala ādayaḥ

original: Harite sukapattasadise vaṇṇavisese. Vāsudeve kaṇhe.
analyzed: harite suka patta sadise vaṇṇa visese vāsudeve kaṇhe

original: 870. Āyatte nissaye.
analyzed: āyatte nissaye

original: Kaṇṇapūro kaṇṇālaṅkāro. Sekhare agge. Ete dvinnampi atthā.
analyzed: kaṇṇapūraḥ kaṇṇālaṅkāro sekhare agge ete dvinnam pi atthā

original: 871. Vijjuyaṃ cañcalāyaṃ. Itthipurise purisitthiyaṃ.
analyzed: vijjuyam cañcalāyam itthi purise purisitthiyam

original: Koṇe asse. Saṅkhyāviseso “koṭipakoṭī”tyādīsu. Ukkaṃse pariyosāne.
analyzed: koṇe asse saṅkhyā visesaḥ koṭi pakoṭi ityādīsu ukkaṃse pariyosāne

original: 872. Jālā aggijālā. Aggaṃ koṭi.
analyzed: jālāḥ aggi jālāḥ aggam koṭi

original: Nārī āsīsaddo sappadāṭhāyaṃ. Iṭṭhassa vatthuno āsīsanāyaṃ patthanāyampi itthī eva.
analyzed: nārī āsīsaddo iṭṭhassa vatthuno itthī eva

original: 873. Vilīnatele visaraṇatele. Vasagā vasaṃ gacchantī nārī. Vañcyagāvī anavacchā sorabheyī.
analyzed: vilīna tele visaraṇa tele vasagā vasam gacchantī nārī anavacchā sorabheyī

original: Abhilāse icchāyaṃ. Kiraṇe raṃsimhi. Abhisaṅge laggane.
analyzed: abhilāse kiraṇe raṃsimhi abhisaṅge laggane

original: 874. Aṃse koṭṭhāse. Sippe nāṭakasatthāgate. Candassa soḷasame bhāge ca kalā.
analyzed: aṃse koṭṭhāse sippe nāṭaka satthāgate candassa soḷasame bhāge ca kalā

original: 875. Bījakose varāṭake. Kaṇṇabhūsāyaṃ kaṇṇālaṅkāre.
analyzed: bījakose varāṭake kaṇṇabhūsāyam kaṇṇālaṅkāre

original: Āgāmikāle anāgatakāle. Pabhāvo daṇḍatejo. Saṃyamepi āyati bhave.
analyzed: āgāmi kāle anāgata kāle saṃyame api āyati bhave

original: 876. Mesādilome eḷakādīnaṃ lome. Bhūmajjhe dvinnaṃ bhūnaṃ majjhe jātāyaṃ romadhātuyaṃ lome.
analyzed: mesa ādi lome eḷaka ādīnam lome bhū majjhe dvinnam bhūnam majjhe lome

original: Naṭṭakī nāṭakitthī. Madirā surā.
877. Kriyacitte vīsatividhe kriyacitte. Karaṇe karaṇakriyāyaṃ, etesu dvīsu atthesu kriyaṃ. Kammani kattabbe kriyā nārī.
analyzed: kriya citte vīsatividhe kriya citte karaṇe karaṇa kriyā ayam etesu dvīsu atthesu kriyam kammani kattabbe kriyā nārī

original: Suṇisāyaṃ puttassa bhariyāyaṃ. Kaññāyaṃ anibbiddhāyaṃ. Jāyāyaṃ bhariyāsāmaññe.
analyzed: suṇisāyam puttassa bhariyāyam kaññāyam a nibbiddhāyam jāyāyam bhariyā sāmaññe

original: 878. Issariyaṃ pabhutā. Akkharāvayave garuakkharānaṃ avayave.
analyzed: issariyam akkhara avayave avayave

original: Pāvacane buddhavacane. Siddhe siddhante. Tante suttamaye. Supite niddāsīle.
analyzed: pāvacane buddhavacane siddhe siddhante tante suttamaye supite niddāsīle

original: 879. Rājaliṅgaṃ khaggādi. Usabhaṅgo usabhāvayavo. Rukkhe rukkhavisese. Nimittaṃ guyhaṅgaṃ. Cihane lakkhaṇe. Pade vibhatyante.
analyzed: rāja liṅgam khagga ādi usabhaṅgaḥ usabha avayavaḥ rukkhe rukkha visese nimittam guyhaṅgam cihane lakkhaṇe pade

original: 880. Vohāre vāṇijakamme. Kīḷādo kīḷādimhi. Ādinā jutithutigatyādayo saṅgahitā.
analyzed: vohāre vāṇija kamme kīḷādo kīḷā ādimhi ādinā juti thuti gati ādayaḥ saṅgahitā

original: Sarīre sarīrādhideve.
analyzed: sarīre sarīra adhideve

original: 881. Sussūsāyaṃ sotumicchāyaṃ. Issātyāse sarābhyāse. Hiṃsanepi upāsanaṃ.
analyzed: sussūsāyam sotumicchāyam upāsanam

original: Hetibhede āvudhabhede. Saṅku khāṇuviseso.
analyzed: heti bhede āvudha bhede saṅku kha aṇu visesaḥ

original: 882. Vīṇāguṇo vīṇāyajiyā. Tantaṃ tantasaddo. Mukhyaṃ padhānaṃ. Siddhantaṃ udāharaṇaṃ. Tantu suttaṃ.
analyzed: vīṇā guṇaḥ vīṇā yajiyā tantam tanta saddaḥ mukhyam padhānam siddhantam udāharaṇam tantu suttam

original: Rathanaṅgalādīnaṃ aṅge rathādyaṅge. Kappamhi katādike.
analyzed: ratha naṅgala ādīnam aṅge ratha ādi aṅge kappamhi kata ādike

original: 883. Itthipupphaṃ itthīnaṃ utu. Reṇu dhūlī. Pakatije guṇe tiṇṇaṃ guṇānaṃ dutiye guṇe.
analyzed: itthi puppham itthīnam utu reṇu dhūlī pakati je guṇe tiṇṇam guṇānam dutiye guṇe

original: Nyāsappaṇe ṭhapitassa dhanassa dāne. Dānamhi tadaññassa dāne.
analyzed: nyāsa ppaṇe ṭhapitassa dhanassa dāne dānamhi tad aññassa dāne

original: 884. Guru ācariyādi. Upāyo hetu. Avatāro otaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Pūtambu pavittajalaṃ. Diṭṭhi buddhadassanā aññadassanaṃ. Āgamepi titthaṃ.
analyzed: guru ācariya ādi upāyaḥ hetu avatāraḥ otaraṇa ṭṭhānam pūtambu pavitta jalam diṭṭhi buddha dassanā añña dassanam āgame pi tittham

original: Jotisaddo nakkhattaraṃsīsu paṇḍake napuṃsake. Aggimhi tu so pumā.
analyzed: joti saddaḥ nakkhatta raṃsīsu paṇḍake napuṃsake aggimhi tu saḥ pumā

original: 885. “Iti sandhikappe paṭhamo kaṇḍo”tyādīsu vagge. Avasarepi, avasaro avakāso.
analyzed: iti sandhi kappe paṭhamaḥ vagge avasare pi avasaraḥ avakāsaḥ

original: Atha bāhudvayassa uddhaṃ māne. Sūratte sūrabhāve.
analyzed: atha māne sūratte sūrabhāve

original: 886. Porisaṃ purisakāro. Īhā vīriyaṃ. Nisinnādyuggamo nisinnādiko uggamo ṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: porisam purisakāraḥ īhā vīriyam nisinna ādi uggamaḥ nisinna ādikaḥ uggamaḥ ṭhānam

original: Anissayamahībhāge lokanissayabhūtānaṃ tarupabbatanagarādīnaṃ abhāvato anissayasaṅkhāte
analyzed: anissaya mahībhāge loka nissaya bhūtānam taru pabbata nagara ādīnam abhāvataḥ anissaya saṅkhāte

original: suññamahīkoṭṭhāse. “Irīṇaṃ ūsare suññe”ti medinīkosa 15.36 hi tikaṇḍaseso. Ūsare ūsavati ṭhāne.
analyzed: suñña mahī koṭṭhāse irīṇam ūsare suññā iti hi ti kaṇḍa sesaḥ ūsare ṭhāne

original: 887. Sādhanatthādīsu ārādhanaṃ. Rādhanaṃpyatra. “Pattiyaṃ sādhane vuttaṃ, rādhanaṃ tosanepi ce”ti tikaṇḍaseso.
analyzed: sādhana ttha ādīsu ārādhanam rādhanam api atra sādhane vuttam rādhanam tosane pi ca iti ti kaṇḍa sesaḥ

original: Sānumhi pabbatassa same bhūbhāge. Visāṇe mātaṅgadante, pasūnaṃ siṅge ca.
analyzed: sānumhi pabbatassa same bhū bhāge visāṇe mātaṅga dante pasūnam siṅge ca

original: 888. Diṭṭhaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ. Ādimaggo sotāpattimaggo. Ñāṇaṃ sāmaññaṃ. Akkhi cakkhu. Ikkhanaṃ olokanaṃ. Laddhi gāho.
analyzed: diṭṭham rūpa ārammaṇam ādi maggo sotāpatti maggo ñāṇam sāmaññam akkhi cakkhu ikkhanam olokanam laddhi gāho

original: Suvaṇṇo pañcadharaṇaṃ. Pañcasuvaṇṇo nikkho. Pasādhanaṃ alaṅkāraviseso.
analyzed: suvaṇṇaḥ pañcadharaṇam pañcasuvaṇṇaḥ nikkhaḥ pasādhanam alaṅkāra viseso

original: 889. Tithibhede horasatthāgate aniṭṭhasammate tithimhi. Sākhādiphaḷumhi rukkhasākhādīnaṃ gaṇṭhimhi. Pūraṇepi pabbaṃ.
analyzed: tithi bhede horasa thāgate aniṭṭha sammate tithimhi sākhā ādi phaḷumhi rukkha sākhā ādīnam gaṇṭhimhi pūraṇe pi pabbam

original: Balavāmukho yatra plavādayo sīghasotena ākaḍḍhitvā pavesiyanti.
analyzed: yatra plava ādayaḥ sīgha sotena ākaḍḍhitvā

original: 890. Kāmaje taṇhāje surāpānādike. Dose aparādhe. Kopaje daṇḍapharusādike ca. Vipattiyaṃ vināse.
analyzed: kāma je taṇhā je surā pāna ādike dose aparādhe kopa je daṇḍa pharusa ādike ca

original: Upakaraṇaṃ kulālādīnaṃ daṇḍacakkādi. Siddhi nipphatti. Kārako kattādisattavidho.
analyzed: upakaraṇam kulāla ādīnam daṇḍa cakka ādi siddhi nipphatti kārako kattā ādi sattavidhaḥ

original: 891. Dānasīle dānapakatike ca. Vagguvādini madhuravādini ca vadaññū bhave. Ito paṭṭhāya ussitapariyanto tīsu vutto. Abhisitte muddhābhisitte rājini.
analyzed: dāna sīle dānapakatike ca vaggu vādini madhura vādini ca vadaññū bhave itas paṭṭhāya ussita pariyanto tīsu vuttaḥ abhisitte muddha abhisitte rājini

original: 892. Bhāgyavihīne apuññe. Appake abahuke. Mūḷhe bāle. Apaṭu acheko. Khale, jagatiyañca mando. Vuddhiyutte vaḍḍhanayutte. Samunnaddhe anīce ussitaṃ tīsu bhave, “bhāsita”ntipi pāṭho.
analyzed: bhāgya vihīne apuññe appake abahuke mūḷhe bāle apaṭu achekaḥ khale jagatiyam ca mandaḥ vuddhi yutte vaḍḍhana yutte samunnaddhe anīce ussitam tīsu bhave pāṭhaḥ

original: 893. Rathaṅge rathāvayave. Suvaṇṇasmiṃ palassa catutthabhāge. Pāsake catuvīsatippamāṇe, tiṃsappamāṇe vā. Hatthidantādivikatiyaṃ tīsu akkho. Cakkhādindriye akkhaṃ.
analyzed: rathaṅge ratha avayave suvaṇṇasmim palassa catuttha bhāge pāsake catuvīsati ppamāṇe tiṃsa ppamāṇe vā hatthi danta ādi vikatiyam tīsu akkhaḥ cakkhāt indriye akkham

original: Sassate nicce. Takke vitakke. Nicchite vinicchite.
analyzed: sassate nicce takke vitakke nicchite vinicchite

original: 894. Hare mahissare sivo, bhadde kalyāṇe. Mokkhe nibbāne ca sivaṃ. Jambuke siṅgāle sivā.
analyzed: hare mahissare sivaḥ bhadde kalyāṇe mokkhe nibbāne ca sivam jambuke siṅgāle sivā

original: Sattiyaṃ thāme. Thūlatte thūlabhāve.
analyzed: sattiyam thāme thūlatte thūlabhāve

original: 895. Saṅkhyābhedo uppalapuṇḍarīkānaṃ majjhe gaṇanā. Narakabhede “padumaniraye nibbatto”tyādīsu. Vārije kakkasanāḷe kamale.
analyzed: saṅkhyā bhedaḥ uppala puṇḍarīkānam majjhe gaṇanā naraka bhede paduma niraye nibbatto tyādīsu vāri je kakkasa nāḷe kamale

original: Devabhedeti
analyzed: deva bheda iti

original: “Āpo dhuvo ca somo ca,
analyzed: āpaḥ dhuvaḥ ca somaḥ ca

original: Dhavo cevā’nilo’nalo;
analyzed: dhavaḥ

original: Paccūso ca pabhāso ca,
analyzed: paccūsaḥ ca pabhāsaḥ ca

original: Aṭṭhete vasavo matā”ti cintāmaṇiṭīkā 1.10. –
analyzed: aṭṭhā ete vasavaḥ matā ati cintāmaṇi ṭīkā

original: Kathite devavisese. Ratane ratanasāmaññe, dhane ca, paṇḍakaṃ napuṃsakaṃ.
analyzed: kathite deva visese ratane ratana sāmaññe dhane ca paṇḍakam napuṃsakam

original: 896. Atthagamane vināsagamane. Apavagge sabbakilesānaṃ khayahetubhūte virāgadhamme.
analyzed: attha gamane vināsa gamane apavagge sabba kilesānam khaya hetu bhūte virāga dhamme

original: Setambuje setakamale. Rukkhantare “puṇḍarīka”iti khyāte dumavisese, dvīsvatthesu pume.
analyzed: setambuje setakamale rukkhantare puṇḍarīkā eti khyāte duma visese pume

original: “Puṇḍarīkaṃ sitamboje, setacchatte ca bhesajje;
analyzed: puṇḍarīkam sitamboje seta chatte ca bhesajje

original: Kosakārantare byagghe, so disāvāraṇaggisū”ti. –
analyzed: kosakārantare byagghe saḥ

original: Nānatthasaṅgaho.
analyzed: nānattha saṅgahaḥ

original: 897. Upahāre pūjādyatthaṃ ābhate vatthumhi. Karasmiṃ khettādisambhave rājabhāge. Asurantare balināmake asure.
analyzed: upahāre pūjā ādi attham vatthumhi karasmim khetta ādi sambhave rāja bhāge asura antare bali nāmake asure

original: Sambhave itthipurisasambhave asucimhi sukkaṃ. Dhavale sete sukko, kusale puññe tīsu,
analyzed: sambhave itthi purisa sambhave asucimhi sukkam dhavale sete sukkaḥ kusale puññe tīsu

original: “puññaṃ dhammamanitthiya”nti ettha dhammasaddassa anitthibhāvassa vuttattā sukkasaddo tīsu vutto.
analyzed: puññam dhammam anitthiyanti ettha dhamma saddassa anitthi bhāvassa vuttattā sukka saddo tīsu vuttaḥ

original: 898. Vibhattabbadhane vibhajitabbadhane. Pitūnaṃ dhane petānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ puttehi vibhajitabbadhane ca.
analyzed: vibhattabba dhane vibhajitabba dhane pitūnam dhane petānam mātā pitūnam puttehi vibhajitabba dhane ca

original: Pabhuno puggalassa bhāvo pabhuttaṃ, tathā āyattassa bhāvo āyattatā. Āyatto puggalo. Abhilāso icchā.
analyzed: puggalassa bhāvaḥ pabhuttam tathā āyattassa bhāvaḥ āyatta tā āyattaḥ puggalaḥ abhilāso icchā

original: 899. Dhanimhi saddamatte. Yodhasīhanādamhi yodhānaṃ abhītanāde ca seḷanaṃ.
analyzed: dhanimhi sadda matte yodha sīha nādamhi yodhānam abhīta nāde ca

original: 900. Ādyupaladdhiyaṃ paṭhamasañjāte vatthumhi.
analyzed: paṭhama sañjāte vatthumhi

original: 901. Sādhakatame kattuto aññesaṃ kriyāsādhakatame karaṇakārake, kriyāyaṃ, gatte sarīre ca. Indriye cakkhādike.
analyzed: sādhakatame kattutaḥ aññesam kriyā sādhakatame karaṇa kārake kriyā iyam gatte sarīre ca indriye cakkhu ādike

original: Kuñcikāyaṃ apāpuraṇe. Tūriyaṅge sammatāḷādike.
analyzed: kuñcikāyam apāpuraṇe tūriyaṅge sammatāḷādike

original: 902. Uppāde janane. Gabbhamocane puttavijāyane.
analyzed: uppāde janane gabbha mocane putta vijāyane

original: Asse assamatte.
analyzed: asse assamatte

original: 903. Pupphaṃvinā phalaggāhirukkhe assatthādo, rukkhamatte ca vanappatisaddo. Āhate upaṭṭhāpite varāhapurisādirūpe ca, rajatamatte ca rūpiyaṃ.
analyzed: pupphaṃvinā phalaggāhi rukkhe assattha ādaḥ rukkha matte ca vanappati saddaḥ āhate upaṭṭhāpite varāha purisa ādi rūpe ca rajata matte ca rūpiyam

original: 904. Kesasaddo pubbo yassa pāsasaddassa so kesapubbo. Caye samūhe vattati, yathā “kesapāso”ti, kesakalāpotyattho.
analyzed: kesa saddo pubbaḥ yassa pāsa saddassa so kesa pubbaḥ caye samūhe vattati yathā kesa pāsaḥ iti kesa kalāpo ti attho

original: Akkhimajjhe yā “sūlā”ti vuttā. Nakkhatte sattavīsatividhe, tadaññesu ca tārā itthī. Uccatarassare uccatare sadde tāro.
analyzed: akkhi majjhe yā sūlā ati vuttā nakkhatte sattavīsatividhe tad aññesu ca tārā itthī uccatara ssare uccatare sadde tāro

original: 905. Patte bhājanasāmaññe, bhuñjanapatte ca. Lohabhedasmiṃ ayotambādimaye bhājanavisese. Dehamajjhaṃ udaraṃ.
analyzed: patte bhājana sāmaññe bhuñjana patte ca loha bhedasmin ayaḥ tamba ādi maye bhājana visese deha majjham udaram

original: 906. Vese saṇṭhāne. Sippasālā sippīnaṃ sālā.
analyzed: vese saṇṭhāne sippa sālā sippīnam sālā

original: Sampatti dhanādisampatti tivaggasampatti ca. Lakkhiyā katapuññehi seviyati. Itthī itthiviseso. Devatā sirīnāmikā ekā devadhītā.
analyzed: sampatti dhana ādi sampatti tivagga sampatti ca lakkhiyā kata puññehi itthī itthi visesaḥ devatā sirī nāmikā ekā deva dhītā

original: 907. Yuvarājā pitari devaṅgate rājabhāvāraho rājaputto. Khande harassa putte. Susu taruṇo.
analyzed: yuvarājā pitari devaṅgate rāja bhāvārahaḥ rāja putto khande harassa putte su su taruṇaḥ

original: Maṇibhede yo loke “santā”ti vuccati. Aṅkure rukkhādīnaṃ aṅkure.
analyzed: maṇi bhede yaḥ loke vuccati aṅkure rukkha ādīnam aṅkure

original: 908. Vetanaṃ kammakārehi labhitabbadhanaṃ. Mūlaṃ mūladhanaṃ. Vohāre vāṇijakamme.
analyzed: vetanam kammakārehi labhitabba dhanam mūlam mūla dhanam vohāre vāṇija kamme

original: Bhājanantaraṃ yena kheḷādyasuciṃ paṭiggaṇhāti.
analyzed: bhājana antaram yena kheḷa ādi asucim paṭiggaṇhāti

original: 909. Asubhe ca kamme subhe ca kamme dvayepi kamme cāti tīsvatthesu bhāgyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: asubhe ca kamme subhe ca kamme dvaye pi kamme ca ati bhāgyam vuttam

original: Tarubhede assatthe.
analyzed: taru bhede as satthe

original: 910. Vimuttiyaṃ nibbāne.
analyzed: vimuttiyam nibbāne

original: “Ayaṃ pumā”ti jānanassa kāraṇabhāvo pumattaṃ, tadādimhi.
analyzed: ayam pumā iti jānanassa kāraṇa bhāvo pumattam tad ādimhi

original: 911. Ajjhāye paricchede. Dive devaloke.
analyzed: ajjhāye paricchede dive deva loke

original: 912. Sapattasmiṃ amitte. Rukkhaṅge rukkhāvayave.
analyzed: sapattasmin amitte rukkha aṅge rukkha avayave

original: 913. Mukhye padhāne. Upāye hetumhi. Vadane lapane. Ādismiṃ paṭhame.
analyzed: mukhye padhāne upāye hetumhi vadane lapane ādismin paṭhame

original: Bhabbe vimuttārahe, bhavitabbe ca. Guṇādhāre guṇassa nissaye. Vitte dhane. Budhe paṇḍite. Dāru dārukkhandho.
analyzed: bhabbe vimutta arahe bhavitabbe ca guṇa ādhāre guṇassa nissaye vitte dhane budhe paṇḍite dāru dāru khandho

original: 914. Patthādo pattho, tulā, aṅgulīti patthādi. Vidhāya unnatiyaṃ. Parissame khede.
analyzed: pattha adaḥ patthaḥ tulāḥ aṅgulī iti pattha ādi vidhāya unnatiyam parissame khede

original: 915. Saroruhe kamale. Khagantare rukkhakimikhādakasakuṇe. Tūriyantare vaṃsasaṅkhādike.
analyzed: saroruhe kamale khaga antare rukkha kimi khāda kasakuṇe tūriya antare vaṃsa saṅkhādike

original: 916. Saṃvege ubbege, vimhaye ca.
analyzed: saṃvege ubbege vimhaye ca

original: 917. Tadupetanisāya candappabhāya yuttarattiyaṃ.
analyzed: tad upeta nisāya canda ppabhāya

original: 918. Māse tatiyamāse. Ativuddhe ca atipasatthe ca.
analyzed: māse tatiya māse ativuddhe ca atipasatthe ca

original: 919. Nibandhe balakkāre “balaggaho”tyādīsu.
analyzed: nibandhe balakkāre

original: Mattikābhedo nīlādivaṇṇayuttakittimamattikā. Sikkāyaṃ udakakumbhādivāhike. Nayanāmaye cakkhurogavisese.
analyzed: mattikā bhedaḥ nīla ādi vaṇṇa yutta kittima mattikā sikkāyam udakakumbha ādi vāhike nayana āmaye cakkhu roga visese

original: 920. Maṇḍale parimaṇḍale. Bimbikā latājāti, tassā phale ca bimbaṃ.
analyzed: maṇḍale parimaṇḍale bimbikā latā jāti phale ca bimbam

original: 921. Pathe añjase.
analyzed: pathe añjase

original: 922. Santi nibbānaṃ. Nibhe sadise.
analyzed: santi nibbānam nibhe sadise

original: Cāpe dhanumhi issāsaṃ. Usuno sarassa khepakamhi perake issāso.
analyzed: cāpe dhanumhi issāsam usuno sarassa khepakamhi perake issāsaḥ

original: 923. Bālasaddo tīsu. Kutratthesu? Ādivayasā paṭhamavayena samaṅgini samannāgate ca. Apaṇḍite mūḷhe ca.
analyzed: bāla saddaḥ tīsu kutratthesu ādi vayasā paṭhama vayena samaṅgini samannāgate ca apaṇḍite mūḷhe ca

original: Soṇite lohite. Tambaṃ udumbaraṃ. Anuratto anurāgayutto puggalo. Rañjitaṃ raṅgarañjitaṃ.
analyzed: soṇite lohite tambam udumbaram anurattaḥ anurāga yuttaḥ puggalaḥ rañjitam raṅga rañjitam

original: 924. Viraḷe nirantare. Kise athūle. Hime tuhine.
analyzed: viraḷe nirantare kise athūle hime tuhine

original: 925. Guḷabhedo yo loke “sakkharā”ti vuccati. Kaṭhale silākhaṇḍe.
analyzed: guḷa bhedaḥ yaḥ loke sakkharā ti vuccati kaṭhale silākhaṇḍe

original: 926. Tikhiṇe tikkhe. Byatte cheke. Rogamutte niroge.
analyzed: tikhiṇe tikkhe byatte cheke roga mutte niroge

original: Khattiye muddhābhisitte. Naranāthe tadaññasmiṃ. Pabhumhi issare.
analyzed: khattiye muddhābhisitte naranāthe tad aññasmin pabhumhi issare

original: 927. Dhaññakaraṇaṃ dhaññamaddanaṭṭhānaṃ. Kakke nahānacuṇṇe. Nīce adhame. Setepi khalo.
analyzed: dhañña karaṇam dhañña maddana ṭṭhānam kakke nahāna cuṇṇe nīce adhame sete pi khalo

original: 928. Brahmacārī ca gahaṭṭho ca vānappattho ca bhikkhu cāti brahmacārīgahaṭṭhādi, tapodhane piyasīle.
analyzed: brahmacārī ca gahaṭṭho ca vānappattho ca bhikkhu ca ati brahmacārī gahaṭṭha ādi tapodhane piya sīle

original: Kaṭhine kakkhaḷe. Niddaye nikkaruṇe.
analyzed: kaṭhine kakkhaḷe niddaye nikkaruṇe

original: 929. Kaniṭṭho ca kaniyo cāti ete tīsu. Kutratthesu? Atyappe, atiyuvepi.
analyzed: kaniṭṭhaḥ ca kaniyaḥ ca ati ete tīsu kutratthesu atyappe atiyuve pi

original: Iṭṭhe, nissāre ca agarumhi cāti etesvatthesu tīsu.
analyzed: iṭṭhe nissāre ca agarumhi ca ati etesu atthesu tīsu

original: 930. Adhobhāge ca hīne ca. Dantacchade dantāvaraṇe.
analyzed: adhobhāge ca hīne ca dantacchade danta āvaraṇe

original: Pāricariyāyaṃ upaṭṭhāke.
analyzed: pāricariyāyam upaṭṭhāke

original: 931. Ratane dvividatthike. Gaṇe samūhe yathā “kesahattho”ti. Soṇḍāya karikare. Bhantaraṃ terasamanakkhattaṃ.
analyzed: ratane dvividatthike gaṇe samūhe yathā kesahattho ti soṇḍāya kari kare

original: Āvāṭe kāsuyaṃ. Udapānaṃ andhu, yatra jalaṃ ghaṭiyantena uddharitvā pivanti.
analyzed: āvāṭe kāsuyam udapānam andhu yatra jalam uddharitvā pivanti

original: 932. Paṭhamaṃ pamukhañcāti idaṃ abhidhānadvayaṃ ādimhi padhāne vattati.

original: Vajjabhedo ubhayatalaṃ tūriyaṃ.

original: 933. Thiraṃso thirakoṭṭhāso.
analyzed: thiraṃsaḥ thira koṭṭhāsaḥ

original: Khandhabhāro khandhena vahitabbo bhāro. Ādinā kaṭibhārādayo gahitā. Yasmā palasataṃ tulā, vīsatitulā bhāro, tasmā “dvisahassapale”ti vuttaṃ.

original: 934. Mandire gehe. Rogabhede khayaroge. Apacayamhi viddhaṃsane, vināse ca.
analyzed: mandire gehe roga bhede khaya roge apacayamhi viddhaṃsane vināse ca

original: Sāpade byagghādike duṭṭhamige. Sappe urage. Kurūre kakkhaḷe.
analyzed: sā pade byaggha ādike duṭṭha mige sappe urage kurūre kakkhaḷe

original: 935. Sajjadume assakaṇṇarukkhe. Rukkhe rukkhamatte.
analyzed: sajja dume assa kaṇṇa rukkhe rukkhe rukkha matte

analyzed: sote kaṇṇe yajane pūjane sutiyam savana kriyāyam

original: 936. Peto ca paretocāti ime mate kālaṅkate ca petayonije petayonisambhave siyuṃ.

original: Khyāte pākaṭe. Haṭṭhe pahaṭṭhe.
analyzed: khyāte pākaṭe haṭṭhe pahaṭṭhe

original: 937. Adhippāye ajjhāsaye.
analyzed: adhippāye ajjhāsaye

original: Pakkhe sakuṇādīnaṃ pakkhe. Dale rukkhādīnaṃ chade. Bhājane lohamayādike. “Sogate”ti idaṃ “bhājane”ti imassa visesanaṃ. Sogate sugatassa santake bhājanetyattho.
analyzed: pakkhe sakuṇa ādīnam pakkhe dale rukkha ādīnam chade bhājane loha maya ādike sogata iti idam bhājana iti imassa visesanam sogate sugatassa santake bhājana iti attho

original: 938. Suṭṭhukate sammā kate kammani.
analyzed: suṭṭhu kate sammā kate kammani

original: Anukampāyārahe dukkhitasatte.
analyzed: anukampāya arahe dukkhita satte

original: 939. Dhanimhi sadde.
analyzed: dhanimhi sadde

original: 940. Vihite vidhātabbe.
analyzed: vihite vidhātabbe

original: Añjase magge. Visikhā racchā. Pantiyaṃ pāḷiyaṃ.
analyzed: añjase magge visikhā racchā pantiyam pāḷiyam

original: 941. Gagane ākāse. Byasane vipattiyaṃ.
analyzed: gagane ākāse byasane

original: Nettaroge cakkhurogavisese. Chadimhi gehādīnaṃ chadane.
analyzed: netta roge cakkhu roga visese chadimhi geha ādīnam chadane

original: 942. Saṅghaṭṭane dvinnaṃ antarabhūte. Puna sandhīti padapūraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Atisante atisamite.
analyzed: saṅghaṭṭane dvinnam antara bhūte puna sandhi iti pada pūraṇa attham vuttam ati sante ati samite

original: 943. Yāpanā yāpanakārako kabaḷīkārāhāraraso. Ditti jalanaṃ. Balaṃ thāmo.
analyzed: yāpanā kabaḷīkāra āhāra rasaḥ

original: 944. Kucchi udaraṃ. Ovarako gehaviseso.
analyzed: kucchi udaram ovarakaḥ geha viseso

original: Khaṇḍane chedane. Itivutte ca kammanīti “iti evaṃ mayā pubbe carita”nti vattabbe subhāsubhakamme. “Ativatte ca kammanī”tipi pāṭho, atītakāle pavattakammanītyattho.
analyzed: khaṇḍane chedane iti vutte ca kammani iti iti evam mayā pubbe caritan ti vattabbe subha asubha kamme ativatte ca pāṭhaḥ atīta kāle pavatta kammani iti atthaḥ

original: 945. Cittake nalāṭe katakāḷādibindumhi rukkhabhede marīcappamāṇambilarukkhe, yassa phalena ambilasūpaṃ pacanti. Tilakāḷake taṃtaṃsarīrāvayave sañjātatilasaṇṭhāne kāḷake.
analyzed: cittake nalāṭe katakāḷa ādi bindumhi rukkha bhede marīca ppamāṇa ambila rukkhe yassa phalena ambila sūpam pacanti tila kāḷake taṃ taṃ sarīra avayave sañjāta tila saṇṭhāne kāḷake

original: Bodhe bujjhane. Patti lābho, pāpuṇañca.
analyzed: bodhe bujjhane lābhaḥ pāpuṇañca

original: 946. Āyumhi jīvite. Hadayaṅgānile urogamavāte.
analyzed: āyumhi jīvite uraḥ gama vāte

original: Vase āyattatāyaṃ. Vede catubbidhavede. Icchā ārammaṇicchā.
analyzed: vede catubbidha vede icchā ārammaṇa icchā

original: 947. Sirasaṭṭhimhi siraso aṭṭhimhi. Ghaṭādisakale ghaṭādikhaṇḍe.
analyzed: siras aṭṭhimhi sirasaḥ aṭṭhimhi ghaṭa ādi sakale ghaṭa ādi khaṇḍe

original: 948. Veṇvādisākhājālasminti veṇuādīnañca aññamaññasaṃsagge sākhāsamūhe. Laggakese tāpasādīnaṃ laggakese. Ālaye taṇhāyaṃ.
analyzed: veṇu ādi sākhā jālasmin ti veṇu ādīnam ca aññamañña saṃsagge sākhā samūhe lagga kese tāpasa ādīnam lagga kese ālaye

original: Vadhe māraṇe. Rakkhitasmiṃ kammani, kattari ca.
analyzed: vadhe māraṇe rakkhitasmin kammani kattari ca

original: 949. Thiyaṃ itthiyaṃ. Piye sāmike. Manuññe manaso tosanajanake. Gavakkhe sīhapañjare.
analyzed: thiyam itthiyam piye sāmike manuññe manasaḥ tosana janake gavakkhe sīhapañjare

original: 950. Kiṃ saddo pucchanatthādīsu saliṅgo. Vikappatthādīsu tu abyayaṃ.
analyzed: kim saddaḥ pucchana ttha ādīsu sa liṅgaḥ vikappa ttha ādīsu tu abyayam

original: Sasaddhe saddhāya sahite. Nivāpe petādīnaṃ kattabbapūjādāne. Paccaye saddahane saddhā.
analyzed: sa saddhe saddhāya sahite nivāpe peta ādīnam kattabba pūjā ādāne paccaye saddahane saddhā

original: 951. Aṭṭhismiṃ “panasabījaṃ tālabīja”ntyādīsu. Sukke ca bijaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhismim panasa bījam tāla bīja antya ādīsu sukke ca bijam

original: Pūye pakkavaṇasañjāte. Aggato purato. Disādo sūriyuggamanadisāyaṃ. Sā hi disānaṃ ādibhūtā, “disā”ti vā disāviseso. Ādinā pubbajādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: pūye pakkavaṇa sañjāte aggataḥ puratas sā hi disānam ādi bhūtā disā ati vā disā visesaḥ ādinā pubbaja ādīnam gahaṇam

original: 952. Āgamane asantuppattikriyāyaṃ. Dīghādinikāyasmiṃ dīghanikāyamajjhimanikāyādike.
analyzed: āgamane asanta uppatti kriyā ayam dīgha ādi nikāyasmin dīgha nikāya majjhima nikāya ādike

original: 953. Devarukkho sirīso. Santatiyaṃ vaṃse.
analyzed: deva rukkhaḥ sirīsaḥ santatiyam vaṃse

original: Uttaraviparīte aseṭṭhe, imasmiṃ atthe nakāro paṭisedhattho. Seṭṭhe uttame. Imasmiṃ atthe paṭisedhatthova nakāro. “Anu uttara”nti chedo ca viññeyyo.
analyzed: uttara viparīte aseṭṭhe imasmin atthe nakāro paṭisedha ttho seṭṭhe uttame imasmin atthe paṭisedha ttho va nakāro anu uttaranti chedo ca viññeyyo

original: 954. Sattisampattiyaṃ pabhāvādīhi sattīhi sampattiyaṃ. Kantimatte kamanīyamatte. Sūravīriyesupi vikkamo.
analyzed: satti sampattiyam pabhāva ādīhi sattīhi sampattiyam kanti matte kamanīya matte sūra vīriyesu pi vikkamaḥ

original: Paṭibimbe patirūpake. Pabhāyaṃ āloke.
analyzed: paṭibimbe patirūpake pabhāyam āloke

original: 955. Ghammo nidāgho cāti dve abhidhānāni. Sedajale kāyato mutte.
analyzed: ghammaḥ nidāghaḥ ca ati dve abhidhānāni seda jale kāyataḥ mutte

original: Kantane chedane. Vikappe vitakke. Sajjane hatthādīnaṃ sajjane.
analyzed: kantane chedane vikappe vitakke sajjane hattha ādīnam sajjane

original: 956. Deso desaviseso. Aṅgasaddo puṃbahutte. “Bahumhī”tipi pāṭho. Aṅgasaddo bahutte desetyattho. Vapumhi sarīre aṅgaṃ. Avayave hetumhi ca aṅgaṃ.
analyzed: desaḥ desa visesaḥ aṅga saddo pum bahutte bahumhi iti pi pāṭhaḥ aṅga saddaḥ bahutte desa iti atthaḥ vapumhi sarīre aṅgam avayave hetumhi ca aṅgam

original: “Aṅgaṃ gattantikopāya-patikesva’ppadhānake;
analyzed: aṅgam gat tantika upāya patike su appadhānake

original: Aṅgadesavisesamhi, aṅgā sambodhane’byaya”nti. –
analyzed: aṅga desa visesamhi aṅgā

original: Nānatthasaṅgahe.
analyzed: nānā attha saṅgahe

original: Cetiyadume pūjetabbabhūte rukkhe assatthādo.
analyzed: cetiya dume pūjetabba bhūte rukkhe

original: 957. Sādhupurise sappurise. Kappane hatthādīnaṃ kappane. “Sajjane sajjanā kappanāya”nti nānatthasaṅgaho.

analyzed: paccakkhe sammukhe sannidhāne payoge vidhāne ca bhiyyosaddaḥ pahūtaratthe saḥ pumā

analyzed: visa litta sare visena lepita sare diddhaḥ pumā litte lepitabba sāmaññe

original: Vāse vasane. Dhūmādisaṅkhāre gandhacuṇṇadhūmādinā abhisaṅkhāre. Sampaṭicchane paṭiggahaṇe.

original: 960. Suppagabbhe vacanasūre.
analyzed: suppa gabbhe vacana sūre

original: Madhucchiṭṭhe madane, yena dīpampi jālenti. Odanasambhave bhuttodanato patite lāmakasammate odanabindumhi.
analyzed: madhucchiṭṭhe madane yena dīpam pi jālenti odana sambhave bhutta udanataḥ patite lāmaka sammate odana bindumhi

original: 961. Surabhimhi sugandhe.
analyzed: surabhimhi sugandhe

original: Uppattiyaṃ uddhaṅgamane ca uggamanaṃ.
analyzed: uppattiyam uddhaṅgamane ca uggamanam

original: 962. Lūkhe samale, kakkhaḷe ca. Niṭṭhuravācāyaṃ akaṇṇasukhavacane.
analyzed: lūkhe sa male kakkhaḷe ca niṭṭhura vācāyam a kaṇṇa sukha vacane

original: Ambuvege ambuno udakassa vege sote.
analyzed: ambu vege ambuno udakassa vege sote

original: 963. Tappare tappadhāne. Kavace uracchade. Vāravāṇe cammamaye yuddhālaṅkāre ca. Nimmoke sappānaṃ jiṇṇacammani.

original: 965. Padāne dāne. Sele pabbate.
analyzed: padāne dāne sele pabbate

original: 967. Valaye kaṭake.
analyzed: valaye kaṭake

original: 969. Surāya kādambariyaṃ, yāya pītāya mattā sattā anāgamanīyavatthūsupi gacchanti. Rathaṅge cakke. Kāmupadhiādīsu catūsu upadhīsu ca upadhi, anitthī.

original: 970. Dabbe dhanādike. Bhūbhedo vatthādi. Mahārāje catūsu mahārājesu ekasmiṃ mahārāje. Nare satte.
analyzed: dabbe dhana ādike bhū bhedaḥ vattha ādi mahārāje catūsu mahārājesu ekasmin mahārāje nare satte

original: 971. Āpaṇe kayavikkayaṭṭhāne. Sambhāre upakaraṇe. “Ratho sīlaparikkhāro, jhānakkho cakkavīriyo”ti saṃ. ni. 5.4 ettha alaṅkāro “parikkhāro”ti vutto.
analyzed: āpaṇe kaya vikkaya ṭṭhāne sambhāre upakaraṇe ratho sīla parikkhāro jhāna kkho cakka vīriyaḥ ti sam ni ettha alaṅkāro parikkhāro ti vutto

original: 972. Vohārasmiṃ rathasakaṭādivohāre. Upaṭṭhitagirā saddato atthato ca pākaṭagirā.
analyzed: vohārasmim ratha sakaṭa ādi vohāre upaṭṭhita girā saddataḥ atthataḥ ca pākaṭa girā

analyzed: vacana avayava iti vākya avayave hetu dāharaṇa ādi yuttassa sambandha tthassa vacana samūhassa

original: avayave. Mūle lobhādike. Kāraṇe lobhādito aññasmiṃ kāraṇe. Pācānalasmiṃ udaraṭṭhe
analyzed: avayave mūle lobha ādike kāraṇe lobha āditaḥ aññasmin kāraṇe pāca analasmin udara ṭṭhe

original: bhuttapācane kammajatejasmiṃ. Rogabhedepi gahaṇī.
analyzed: bhutta pācane roga bhede pi gahaṇī

original: 974. Saṃyame cakkhādindriyasaṃyame.
analyzed: saṃyame

original: 975. Muddikassa rukkhassa rase ca. Pupphassa sabbassa pupphassa rase ca. Khudde makkhikākate ca madhu punnapuṃsakaṃ.
analyzed: muddikassa rukkhassa rase ca pupphassa sabbassa pupphassa rase ca khudde makkhikā kate ca madhu punnapuṃsakam

original: “Madhu khudde jale khīre, majje puppharase madhu;
analyzed: madhu khudde jale khīre majje puppha rase madhu

original: Racche citte vasante ca, jīvasāke madhuddume”ti. –
analyzed: racche citte vasante ca jīvasāke madhuddumā iti

original: Nānatthasaṅgahe.
analyzed: nānā attha saṅgahe

original: Ulloceti seyyādīnaṃ uparibhāge rajopātanivāraṇatthaṃ ṭhapite dussamayādike.
analyzed: ullocā iti seyyā ādīnam upari bhāge rajopāta nivāraṇa attham ṭhapite dussamaya ādike

original: 976. Apavagge nibbāne. Sudhāyaṃ devatānaṃ bhojane.
analyzed: apavagge nibbāne sudhāyam devatānam bhojane

original: “Amataṃ yaññasesasmiṃ, pīyūse salile ghate;
analyzed: amatam yaññasesasmin pīyūse salile ghate

original: Ayācite ca mokkhe ca, dhanvantarisudhāsisu;
analyzed: a yācite ca mokkhe ca dhanvantari sudhāsisu

original: Amato amatā sivā-gaḷo jhāmalakīsu ce”ti medinīkosa 16.77-8 gāthāyampi.
analyzed: amataḥ amatā sivāgaḷaḥ jhāmalakīsu ca iti

original: Nānatthasaṅgahe vuttaṃ. Mohe avijjāyaṃ. Timire andhakāre. Saṅkhyā gaṇanaviseso. Guṇe tatiye guṇe.
analyzed: nānattha saṅgahe vuttam mohe timire andhakāre saṅkhyā gaṇana visesaḥ guṇe tatiye guṇe

original: 977. Khare pharuse. Akāriye akattabbe. Purise pulliṅge. Sukate kusale dhamme puññaṃ paṇḍake napuṃsake. Pavane pūte.
analyzed: khare pharuse akāriye a kattabbe purise pulliṅge su kate kusale dhamme puññam paṇḍake napuṃsake pavane pūte

original: 978. Asiniddho sukkho. Saṅge lagge.
analyzed: asi niddhaḥ sukkhaḥ saṅge lagge

original: 979. Lañchane paṭibimbe. Sīmā mariyādo. Pakāro tulyo.
analyzed: lañchane paṭibimbe sīmā mariyādaḥ pakāro tulyaḥ

original: 980. Mantane catukkaṇṇādike. Byasane bhogabyasanādike. Vipattiyaṃ anatthe.
analyzed: mantane catukkaṇṇa ādike byasane bhoga byasana ādike vipattiyam anatthe

original: 981. Raṃsibhedo pubbe udayato sūriyassa raṃsiviseso. Abyattarāge kiñciratte. Lohite ratte.
analyzed: raṃsi bhedaḥ pubbe udayataḥ sūriyassa raṃsi viseso abyatta rāge kiñci ratte lohite ratte

original: Pakatānivatte pakatito anivattane. “Pakatiyañca anivattane cā”tipi attho. Nassanakkhareti vināsanakkhare. Nassa adassane akkhare.
analyzed: pakata anivatte pakatitaḥ anivattane pakatiyam ca anivattane ca atipi atthaḥ nassa nakkhare iti vināsa nakkhare nassa a dassane akkhare

original: “Anubandho pakatyādo, dosuppāde vinassare;
analyzed: anubandhaḥ pa ka ti ādaḥ dos uppāde vinassare

original: Susumukhyānusāresu, pakatassā’nuvattane”ti amara 23.98 gāthāyampi passitabbaṃ. –
analyzed: su su mukhya anusāresu pakatassa anuvattanā iti amara gāthāyam pi passitabbam

original: Nānatthasaṅgahe.
analyzed: nānā attha saṅgahe

original: 982. Avataraṇe otaraṇe. Titthasmiṃ nadyādīnaṃ titthe. Vivare vivaraṇe. Iṅgite sīsacalanādike.
analyzed: avataraṇe otaraṇe titthasmin nadī ādīnam titthe vivare vivaraṇe iṅgite sīsa calana ādike

original: 983. Khattā khattiyato sañjāte sudditthitanaye sudditthiyā putte ca. Tibbamhi adhimatte ca. So uggo. Aggo seṭṭho. Dhiti vīriyaṃ.
analyzed: khattā khattiyataḥ sañjāte sudditthi tanaye sudditthiyā putte ca tibbamhi adhimatte ca so uggaḥ aggaḥ seṭṭhaḥ vīriyam

original: 984. Pabhāte paccūse. Niroge rogamutte. Sajje saṅgate, ādhārepi ca. “Sajjutto sannaddhe saṅgatepi ce”ti nānatthasaṅgahe. Dakkho cheko. Yuttepi kallaṃ. Kūṭacariyāyaṃ saṭhacariyāyaṃ.
analyzed: pabhāte paccūse niroge rogamutte sajje saṅgate ādhāre pi ca sajjuttaḥ sannaddhe saṅgate pi ca iti nānattha saṅgahe dakkhaḥ chekaḥ yutte api kallam kūṭa cariyāyam saṭha cariyāyam

original: 985. Pakkhibhedo pārāvatappamāṇo pakkhī. Yasmiṃ gehe palinā patite asubhanimittaṃ karonti. Pārāvate kalarave.
analyzed: pakkhi bhedaḥ pārāvata ppamāṇaḥ pakkhī yasmin gehe palinā patite asubha nimittam karonti pārāvate kalarave

original: Saradabbhūte saradakāle sambhūte. Appagabbhe kātaravacane.
analyzed: saradabbhūte sarada kāle sambhūte appagabbhe kātara vacane

original: 986. Kaṭhine kakkhaḷe. Sāhaso balakkāro. Appiye amanāpe. Cīre nantake, vāke ca cīraṃ.
analyzed: kaṭhine kakkhaḷe sāhasaḥ balakkāraḥ appiye amanāpe cīre nantake vāke ca cīram

original: 987. Migabhede kukkurappamāṇe mige. Paṭākāyaṃ dhaje. Mocaṃ pasiddhaṃ, kadalī īkāranto. Dakkhiṇā kammaphalaṃ saddahitvā dātabbaṃ dānaṃ.

original: 988. Uppāte bhūtavikatiyaṃ. Vessānare aggimhi.
analyzed: uppāte bhūta vikatiyam vessānare aggimhi

original: 989. Potavāhe talakavāhe. Niyantari pājitari.
analyzed: pota vāhe talaka vāhe niyantari pājitari

original: 990. Rodhane āvaraṇe.
analyzed: rodhane āvaraṇe

original: Samaye gajagaṇḍe ca,
analyzed: samaye gaja gaṇḍe ca

original: 1001. Upaṭṭhāne pāricariyāyaṃ, sevane ca. Aññaropane abhaṃsabhāvassa aññassa taṃsabhāvaropane. Sakko sakkasaddo. Inde devarāje sakko. Janapade sakkā. Sākiye ca khame tīsu.

original: 1002. Vajjanatthādīsu tīsu parihāro. Pañhavissajjanepi parihāro. Dvije brāhmaṇe. Vessepi ariyo.

original: 1006. Makacivatthe yaṃ loke “cakkū”ti vuccati, “sāṇavattha”ntipi eke. Ganthe saddasatthādike. Lepyādikammani cittakārādīhi katarūpe.
