original: cātako nāma. Eṇe eṇīmigakhyāte. Saro kaṇḍo. Sede sedane, sida pāke. Pāko pacanaṃ.
analyzed: cātakaḥ nāma eṇe eṇīmiga khyāte kaṇḍo sede sedane sida pāke pacanam

original: Bhikkhubhede “gaṇapūrako”tyādīsu. Caye samūhe.
analyzed: bhikkhu bhede gaṇa pūraka uti ādīsu caye samūhe

original: 1051. Puñje piṇḍe. Meso usabho methunaṃ kakkaṭo sīho kaññā tulā vicchiko dhanu makaro kumbho mīnoti mesādi. Loṇe lavaṇuttame. Saṃvaṭṭe vināsakappe. Kamuke tambūlaphalarukkhe.
analyzed: puñje piṇḍe mesaḥ usabhaḥ methunam kakkaṭaḥ sīhaḥ kaññā tulā vicchikaḥ dhanu makaro kumbhaḥ mīno ti mesa ādi loṇe lavaṇuttame saṃvaṭṭe vināsakappe kamuke tambūla phala rukkhe

original: 1052. Amate devatābhojane. Lepe suddhasakkharacuṇṇādimaye. Satthe dīghadaṇḍe satthavisese.
analyzed: amate devatā bhojane lepe suddha sakkhara cuṇṇa ādi maye satthe dīgha daṇḍe sattha visese

original: Najjantareti gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahīti pañcasu mahānadīsu pañcamāya mahānadiyaṃ.
analyzed: najjantarā iti gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahī iti pañcasu mahā nadīsu pañcamāya mahānadiyam

original: Bhuvi pathaviyaṃ. Kriyā nārīsiṅgārabhāvajā kriyā. Vilāso pana tadaññajo. Atraje putte.
analyzed: bhuvi pathaviyam kriyā nārī siṅgāra bhāva jā kriyā vilāsaḥ pana tad aññajaḥ atra je putte

original: 1053. Kutho hatthipiṭṭhattharaṇaṃ. Veṇī nārīnaṃ kesakalāpo. “Paveṇī veṇī kuthayo”ti
analyzed: kuthaḥ veṇī nārīnam kesa kalāpo paveṇī veṇī kuthayo ti

original: hi vopālito. “Paveṇī kulaveṇīsū”tipi kvaci pāṭho. Vutti bhavanaṃ. Vuttā vuttanto.
analyzed: hi vopālitaḥ paveṇī kulaveṇīsu itipi kvaci pāṭhaḥ vutti bhavanam vuttā vuttanto

original: Vetane kammena laddhabbe. Bharaṇe posane, dhāraṇe ca.
analyzed: vetane kammena laddhabbe bharaṇe posane dhāraṇe ca

original: 1054. Mariyādasaddo dvīsu. Sattā vijjamānatā. Samiddhi sampatti. Soppe niddāyaṃ. Vutti jīvitavutti.
analyzed: mariyāda saddaḥ dvīsu sattā vijjamāna tā samiddhi sampatti soppe niddā ayam vutti jīvitavutti

original: 1055. Kucchā garahā. Apavādo avaṇṇavādo, abhūtākkhānampi. Dhaññe dhaññavisese, yassa sīsaṃ aṅguṭṭhappamāṇaṃ dīghañca. Piyaṅgu gandhadabbaṃ. Mokkhe nibbāne. Sive kalyāṇe.
analyzed: kucchā garahā apavādaḥ avaṇṇa vādaḥ dhaññe dhañña visese yassa sīsam aṅguṭṭha ppamāṇam dīgham ca piyaṅgu gandha dabbam mokkhe nibbāne sive kalyāṇe

original: 1056. Rañjane kāsāyādirañjane. Sūrate methune. Vāse vasanakriyāyaṃ.
analyzed: rañjane kāsāya ādi rañjane sūrate methune vāse vasana kriyā ayam

original: 1057. Patthe mānatumbe. Nāḷe uppalādīnaṃ nāḷe. Pipāsāyaṃ pātumicchāyaṃ. Vutti bhavanaṃ.
analyzed: patthe māna tumbe nāḷe uppala ādīnam nāḷe pipāsāyam pātumicchāyam vutti bhavanam

original: 1058. Pāṇyaṅge saṅkhanābhiyaṃ. Cakkante cakkassa ante.
analyzed: pāṇi aṅge saṅkha nābhiyam cakkante cakkassa ante

original: “Nābhi pāṇyaṅgaṅge khette, cakkantacakkavattisu;
analyzed: nābhi khette cakkanta cakkavattisu

original: Nābhi padhāne katthūri-maṃse ca kvaci kittito”ti. –
analyzed: nābhi padhāne katthūri maṃse ca kvaci

original: Vopālito.
analyzed: vopālitaḥ

original: 1059. Antareti dvinnaṃ antare. “Vīci sukhataraṅgesū”ti vopālito. Thiratte thirabhāve. “Dhīratte”tipi pāṭho, soyevattho. Save savane.
analyzed: antare iti antare sukha taraṅgesu iti vopālitaḥ thiratte thirabhāve pāṭhaḥ save savane

original: 1060. Nissaye ādhāre.
analyzed: nissaye ādhāre

original: 1061. Vitte dhane. Aṅko lakkhaṇaṃ. Buddhi ñāṇaṃ. Khe ākāse.
analyzed: vitte dhane aṅkaḥ lakkhaṇam buddhi ñāṇam khe ākāse

original: 1062. Vate titthiyasamācāre. Āgumhi aparādhe. Maṇi silāvikati, maṇisaṅkhāto vā ratanaviseso idha maṇi nāma. Hāyane saṃvacchare. Vuṭṭhi vassanaṃ.
analyzed: vate titthiya samācāre āgumhi aparādhe maṇi maṇi saṅkhātaḥ vā ratana visesaḥ idha maṇi nāma hāyane saṃvacchare vassanam

original: 1063. Lipi akārādīnaṃ sannivesaviseso. Mokkho nibbānaṃ. Rate sūrate.
1064. Pāpe ca asubhe ca riṭṭhaṃ. Ariṭṭhaṃpyatra, tabbhāve tatra akāro. Aparādho ādīnavo. Ketumhi paṭākāyaṃ. Cihane lakkhaṇe. “Dhajo soṇḍikalesesu, paṭākāyañca cihane”ti vopālito.
analyzed: pāpe ca asubhe ca riṭṭham tad bhāve tatra akāraḥ aparādhaḥ ādīnavaḥ ketumhi paṭākāyam cihane lakkhaṇe dhajo soṇḍika lesesu paṭākāyam ca cihane iti vopālito

original: 1065. Dvāramattepi bahidvārepi. Ito paraṃ ye anekatthā vuccante, te vāccaliṅgā. Phuṭe pākaṭe.
analyzed: dvāra matte api bahidvāre api itas param ye anekatthāḥ vuccante te vāccaliṅgā phuṭe pākaṭe

original: 1066. Ajjhakkhe adhikate. Jaḷe aññāṇe. Lolupe atitaṇhe. Cale kampite.
analyzed: ajjhakkhe adhikate jaḷe aññāṇe lolupe atitaṇhe cale kampite

original: 1067. Vikate virūpe. Komalaṃ akaṭhinaṃ. Atikhiṇo kuṇṭho.
analyzed: vikate virūpe komalam a kaṭhinam ati khiṇaḥ kuṇṭhaḥ

original: 1068. Site sete. Sūcako pesuññakārako. Ahi sappo. Sakke khame. “Satte”ti pāṭhe pana sattiyuttetyattho. Sambandhe avippayoge. Akhile sakale.
analyzed: site sete sūcakaḥ pesuñña kārakaḥ ahi sappaḥ sakke khame sattā iti pāṭhe pana satti yuttā iti attho sambandhe a vippayoge akhile sakale

original: 1069. Kevalaṃ asammissaṃ. Anto avasānaṃ. Adhamo nihīno. Paṇato buddhādīsu ninno. Ninno thalapaṭipakkho.
analyzed: kevalam asammissam antaḥ avasānam adhamaḥ nihīnaḥ paṇataḥ buddha ādīsu ninnaḥ ninnaḥ thala paṭipakkho

original: 1070. Suddhe aññena asammissite. Pūte mejjhe.
analyzed: suddhe aññena a sammissite pūte mejjhe

original: 1071. Byāpe byāpite. Bhāvini anāgate vatthumhi. There jiṇṇe.
analyzed: byāpe byāpite bhāvini anāgate vatthumhi there jiṇṇe

original: 1072. Bahusaddo “ekasmiṃ, dvīsu ca na pavattatī”tyādīsuyeva pavattatīti maññamāno
analyzed: bahu saddo ekasmin dvīsu ca na pavattati ityādīsu yeva pavattati iti maññamānaḥ

original: “tyādo”ti vadati. “Ekavacanaṃ, bahuvacana”nti vuttattā pana dvīsupi bahusaddo vattateva.
analyzed: tya ādaḥ iti vadati ekavacanam bahuvacanam iti vutta ttā pana dvīsu pi bahu saddaḥ vattatā iva

original: Ācariyena vā parasamayavacanāni manasi katvā “tyādo”ti vuttaṃ. Tividhañhi tattha
analyzed: ācariyena vā para samaya vacanāni manasi katvā tyādi vuttam tividham hi tattha

original: vacanaṃ ekavacanaṃ dvivacanaṃ bahuvacananti. Sabbapārisadattā hi byākaraṇassa sabbesaṃ
analyzed: vacanam ekavacanam dvivacanam bahuvacanam ti sabba pārisadattā hi byākaraṇassa sabbesam

original: vādā katthaci kathīyante.
analyzed: vādāḥ katthaci kathīyante

original: Dhī vuccati paññā, sā yassa atthi, sa dhīro, budho. Dhānaṃ vā dhī, sā yassatthīti sa dhīro, dhitimanto. Dhute cale.
analyzed: dhī vuccati paññā sā yassa atthi sa dhīraḥ budhaḥ dhānam vā dhī sā yassa atthi iti sa dhīraḥ dhitimantaḥ dhute cale

original: 1073. Yāne hatthādiyāne yoggaṃ. Khame pana yoggo.
analyzed: yāne hattha ādi yāne yoggam khame pana yoggo

original: 1074. Vuḍḍhe āyuvuḍḍhe. Kulaje kulīne. Vuddho āyuvuḍḍho. Uru pamāṇato mahanto.
analyzed: vuḍḍhe āyu vuḍḍhe kula je kulīne vuddhaḥ āyu vuḍḍhaḥ uru pamāṇataḥ mahantaḥ

original: 1075. Vutte vattabbe. Uggate uddhaṃgate. Āditte agyādīhi, gabbite sañjātamāne.
analyzed: vutte vattabbe uggate uddhaṃgate āditte agi ādīhi gabbite sañjāta māne

original: 1076. Vigate vigatarāge. Vāyane vīte paṭe. Bhajjite dhaññādike. Bhajja pāke.
analyzed: vigate vigata rāge vāyane vīte paṭe bhajjite dhañña ādike pāke

original: 1077. Caye samūhe. Samo tulyo. Ari sattu. “Samādisū”tipi pāṭho. Vīre akātare sūre. Ravisūroti ravisūriyo “sūro”ti vutto. Kuddhe kodhasahite. Dūsite appiye.
analyzed: caye samūhe samaḥ tulyaḥ pāṭhaḥ vīre akātare sūre ravi sūra uti ravi sūriyaḥ sūraḥ iti vuttaḥ kuddhe kodha sahite dūsite appiye

original: 1078. Arimhi sattumhi diṭṭho. Ikkhitepi diṭṭho. Pote bālake. Vate ekantasādhane vatakamme.
analyzed: arimhi sattumhi diṭṭho ikkhite api diṭṭho pote bālake vate ekanta sādhane vata kamme

original: 1079. Salākāyaṃ kusāvahāre. Dabbe varahisatiṇe. Khaye udayabbayānupassīti. Sakuṇepi vayo “visayuttannabhuttānaṃ, vayānaṃ maraṇaṃ bhave”tyādīsu. Gabbo abhimāno.
analyzed: salākāyam kusa avahāre dabbe vara hisa tiṇe khaye udaya bbaya anupassī iti sakuṇe pi vayaḥ vayānam maraṇam bhava ityādīsu gabbaḥ abhimānaḥ

original: 1080. Biḷāle majjāre. Nakule ahisattumhi. Manthano khīramanthanadaṇḍo. Sattu taṇḍulavikatikhajjaviseso. Assādilome assādīnaṃ lome. Ghāto maraṇaṃ. Rāsi puñjo.
analyzed: biḷāle majjāre nakule ahi sattumhi manthanaḥ khīra manthana daṇḍaḥ sattu taṇḍula vikati khajja viseso assa ādi lome assa ādīnam lome ghātaḥ maraṇam rāsi puñjaḥ

original: 1081. Gopagāme gopālānaṃ gāme. Rave sadde. Sārathi pājitā. Vandī thutipāṭhako.
analyzed: gopa gāme gopālānam gāme rave sadde sārathi vandī thuti pāṭhakaḥ

original: “Sārathimhi ticchake ca, pasute veditepi ca;
analyzed: sārathimhi ticchake ca pasute veditepi ca

original: Khattiyā brāhmaṇiyā jepi, visūto pādavandisū”ti. –
analyzed: khattiyā brāhmaṇiyā

original: Vopālito. Pupphe suttādinā asaṅkhate. Taddāme pupphadāme suttādinā saṅkhate. Sakaṭe ane. Haye asse.
analyzed: vopālito pupphe sutta ādinā asaṅkhate tad dāme puppha dāme sutta ādinā saṅkhate sakaṭe ane haye asse

original: 1082. Accane pūjāyaṃ. Bhe nakkhatte. Nettamajjhe “sūlā”ti khyāte. Odhi mariyādo.
analyzed: bhe nakkhatte netta majjhe khyāte odhi mariyādaḥ

original: 1083. Puṇṇatā paripuṇṇatā. Avajjaṃ doso. Manakkārepi ābhogo. Āḷisaddo itthī. Sakhī
analyzed: puṇṇa tā paripuṇṇa tā avajjam dosaḥ ābhogaḥ āḷi saddaḥ itthī sakhī

original: vayasā. Setu jalavāraṇo, nadyādimaggo ca. Satte sattiyutte, thiretyattho. “Daḷho
analyzed: vayasā setu jala vāraṇaḥ nadī ādi maggaḥ ca satte satti yutte thira iti atthaḥ daḷhaḥ

original: thūle bhuse satte, pagāḷhepi daḷhe mato”ti vopālito.
analyzed: thūle bhuse satte daḷhe

original: 1084. Mokkhe nibbāne, arahattaphalepi. Sāmini patimhi. Dhāraketi dhāretīti dhārako, tattha. Posakepi bhattā.
analyzed: mokkhe nibbāne arahatta phale api sāmini patimhi dhāraka iti dhārā iti iti dhārako tattha posake pi bhattā

original: 1085. Sikhā cūḷā. Piñchaṃ pucchaṃ. Attani “saṅghikaṃ puggalika”ntyādīsu. Khepe nindāyaṃ.
analyzed: sikhā cūḷā piñcham puccham attani saṅghikam puggalika nti ādīsu khepe nindā ayam

original: 1086. Rūpe vaṇṇe. Karīse gūthe.
analyzed: rūpe vaṇṇe karīse gūthe

original: 1087. Khaṇḍe sakale. Paṇṇe rukkhādīnaṃ paṇṇe. Kaṇḍe sare. Salākā vaṇopayuttā. Sucino
analyzed: khaṇḍe sakale paṇṇe rukkha ādīnam paṇṇe kaṇḍe sare salākā vaṇa upayuttā su cino

original: bhāvo sucittaṃ, tasmiṃ. Gate gamanakriyāyaṃ. “Dhāva gatisuddhiya”nti hi dhātupāṭho.
analyzed: tasmin gate gamana kriyā ayam dhāva hi dhātu pāṭhaḥ

original: Hāvo itthīnaṃ siṅgārabhāvajakriyā. Avijjāya aññāṇe. Mucchane visaññibhāve.
analyzed: hāvaḥ itthīnam siṅgāra bhāva ja kriyā avijjāya aññāṇe mucchane visaññi bhāve

original: 1088. Ghammajalaṃ kāye uṇhena sañjātajalaṃ. Pāke paccane. Goḷe “mu-yī”iti khyāte
analyzed: ghamma jalam kāye uṇhena sañjāta jalam pāke paccane goḷe muyī iti khyāte

original: mattikāguḷake. Ucchumaye ucchurasasañjāte. Mitte piyamitte, mittamatte vā. Sahāye
analyzed: mattikā guḷake ucchu maye ucchu rasa sañjāte mitte piya mitte mitta matte vā sahāye

original: atthacare. Pabhū adhipati. So pulliṅgo.
analyzed: attha care pabhū adhipati saḥ pulliṅgaḥ

original: 1089. Kurūre kakkhaḷakammante. Parasmiṃ paraṭṭhāne, paraloke vā. Atra ṭhāne, loke
analyzed: kurūre kakkhaḷa kammante parasmim para ṭṭhāne para loke vā atra ṭhāne loke

original: vā. Aṅko cihanaṃ. Aparādhe nāṭakaparicchedepi aṅko. Apavādo lokagarahā. Dese desavisese.
analyzed: vā aṅkaḥ cihanam aparādhe nāṭaka paricchede api aṅkaḥ apavādaḥ loka garahā dese desa visese

original: “Bhave janapado dese, jane janapadepi ce”ti vopālito.
analyzed: bhave janapadaḥ dese jane janapade pi ca iti vopālitaḥ

original: 1090. Pajje siloke. Vacībhede byattavācāyaṃ. Anvaye santāne. Sarūpasmiṃ samānabhāve. Adhobhāge ca talaṃ.
analyzed: pajje si loke vacī bhede anvaye santāne sarūpasmin samāna bhāve adhobhāge ca talam

original: 1091. Vilagge kāyamajjhe. Vemajjhe majjhasāmaññe. Kusumaṃ pasavaṃ. Utu itthipupphaṃ. Subbate sundare vate.
analyzed: vilagge kāyamajjhe vemajjhe majjha sāmaññe kusumam pasavam utu itthi puppham subbate sundare vate

original: 1092. Kose liṅgapasibbake. Gabbhare guhāyaṃ. Bile kipillikādīnaṃ āvāse. Gaṇḍake khaggavisāṇe. Kadambe “thina”iti khyāte. Dume rukkhe. Caye samūhe.
analyzed: kose liṅga pasibbake gabbhare guhāyam bile kipillikā ādīnam āvāse gaṇḍake khagga visāṇe kadambe thinaiti khyāte dume rukkhe caye samūhe

original: 1093. Bhe nakkhattabhede. Dhenuyaṃ siṅginiyaṃ. Yoniyaṃ itthīnaṃ aṅgajāte. Sire sīse.
analyzed: bhe nakkhatta bhede dhenuyam siṅginiyam yoniyam itthīnam aṅga jāte sire sīse

original: 1094. Bhogīsaddo bhogavati puggale, urage ca. Sivo mahissaro. Bale thāme. Pabhāve
analyzed: bhogīsaddaḥ bhogavati puggale urage ca sivaḥ mahissaraḥ bale thāme pabhāve

original: tejasi. “Vīriyaṃ sukke pabhāve, tejo sāmatthiyesvapī”ti vopālito. Tejasaddo pana
analyzed: tejasi vīriyam sukke pabhāve tejaḥ sāmatthiyesu api iti vopālitaḥ teja saddaḥ pana

original: tesu ca yathāvuttesupi dvīsvatthesu, dittiyañca vattati.
analyzed: tesu ca yathā vuttesu pi dvīsu atthesu dittiyam ca vattati

original: 1095. Santati ādhāro. Khaggaṅge khaggassa tikhiṇāvayave. Sūte sārathimhi. Paṭihāre vacanahāre. “Vida lābhe”ti dhātvatthato vitti. Pīḷā vibādhā.
analyzed: santati ādhāraḥ khaggaṅge khaggassa tikhiṇa avayave sūte sārathimhi paṭihāre vacanahāre vida lābheti dhātu atthataḥ vitti pīḍā vibādhā

original: 1096. Rave sadde. Palāse nittaṇḍulavīhimhi.
analyzed: rave sadde palāse nittaṇḍula vīhimhi

original: 1097. Rukkhe ambaṭṭharukkhe. Parasamaye pana bādhā. Adhikappeme atisayapeme.
analyzed: rukkhe ambaṭṭha rukkhe para samaye pana bādhā adhika peme atisaya peme

original: 1098. Ketumhi dhaje. Lekhye likhitabbe lekhe. Rājiyaṃ tu lekhā.
analyzed: ketumhi dhaje lekhye likhitabbe lekhe rājiyam tu lekhā

original: 1099. Satthe āvudhabhede. Satte pāṇimhi. Caye samūhe.
analyzed: satthe āvudha bhede satte pāṇimhi caye samūhe

original: 1100. Āḷiyaṃ nadīmagge, jaladhāraṇe ca.
analyzed: āḷiyam nadī magge jala dhāraṇe ca

original: 1101. Saṃsade sabhāye. Ayanasaddo gamane, pathe ca vattati.
analyzed: saṃsade sabhāye ayana saddaḥ gamane pathe ca vattati

original: 1102. Rukkhantare gaṇadume. Sūre sūriye. Koṇe vidisāyaṃ. Haye turaṅge ca asso. Khandhe
analyzed: rukkha antare gaṇa dume sūre sūriye koṇe vidisāyam haye turaṅge ca asso khandhe

original: bhujasire. Accisaddo jālāyaṃ aggijālāyaṃ. Aṃsumhi tassa, aññesañca aṃsumhi vattati.
analyzed: bhuja sire acci saddaḥ jālāyam aggi jālāyam aṃsumhi tassa aññesam ca aṃsumhi vattati

original: So ca no pume pulliṅge na vattati.
analyzed: saḥ ca no pume pulliṅge na vattati

original: 1103. Abhāvasaddo nāse vijjamānassa nāse. Asattasaddo avijjamānatthe vattati. Bhutti bhuñjanakriyā. Pāṇe āyumhi jīvaṃ. Jane pāṇavati jīvo.
analyzed: abhāva saddaḥ nāse vijjamānassa nāse asatta saddaḥ avijjamāna tthe vattati bhutti bhuñjana kriyā pāṇe āyumhi jīvam jane pāṇavati jīvaḥ

original: 1104. Chadane gahādīnaṃ chadane. Rāsi puñjo, sahadhammīnaṃ gaṇo ca.
analyzed: chadane chadane rāsi ca

original: “Nikāyo nilaye lakkhye, saṃhatānaṃ samuccaye;
analyzed: nikāyaḥ nilaye lakkhye saṃhatānam samuccaye

original: Ekattha bhājini vase, paramattani vuccate”ti. –
analyzed: ekattha bhājini vase paramattani

original: Vopālito. Yajane devapūjāyaṃ. Accane pūjāmatte. Dikkha muṇḍiyopanayananiyamabbatādesesu.
analyzed: vopālitaḥ yajane deva pūjā ayam accane pūjā matte muṇḍiya upanayana niyama bbata ādesesu

original: 1105. Karaṇaṃ kāro, so eva kārikā, kriyā, sakatthe ṇiko. Pajjepi soyevattho. Cihane lakkhaṇe. Thīraje itthīnaṃ utumhi. Pupphe sumane. Vānare makkaṭe.
analyzed: karaṇam kāro saḥ eva kārikā kriyā saka atthe ṇikaḥ pajje pi cihane lakkhaṇe thīra je itthīnam utumhi pupphe sumane vānare makkaṭe

original: 1106. Adhare dantāvaraṇe. Kharabhe “ka-la-au”iti khyāte. Lobhapuggalepi luddho. Āvile anacche.
analyzed: adhare danta āvaraṇe khara bhe khyāte lobha puggala ipi luddhaḥ āvile anacche

original: 1107. Caramhi guttapurise.
analyzed: caramhi gutta purise

original: 1108. Hāso ca gandho ca hāsagandhā, tesu. Gandhotra dūragāmī. Kalyāṇepi cāru. Khala calane, sañcaye ca, to, khalito.
analyzed: hāso ca gandho ca hāsagandhā tesu gandho tra dūra gāmī kalyāṇe pi cāru khala calane sañcaye ca

original: 1109. Vakkale rukkhattace. Adhirohe ārohanakriyāyaṃ. Vatthantaraṃ vicittarūpaṃ vatthaṃ, yaṃ cīnadese sañjātaṃ.
analyzed: vakkale rukkhattace adhirohe ārohana kriyā ayam vatthantaram vicitta rūpam vattham yam cīna dese sañjātam

original: 1110. Paṭihāre “ḍa-gā”iti khyāte. Mukhe bhattādīnaṃ pavesanaṭṭhāne. Pete paralokaṃ gate. Aparaṇṇaṃ muggādi. Kālo tiṃsarattidivaparicchinno.
analyzed: paṭihāre khyāte mukhe bhatta ādīnam pavesana ṭṭhāne pete para lokam gate aparaṇṇam mugga ādi kālo tiṃsa ratti diva paricchinno

original: 1111. Dose kodhe. Ghāte māraṇe. Migādo catuppade. Chagale aje. Arūpe phassādike. Avhaye saññāyaṃ. Darathe kāyacittasambhūte santāpe. Bhīti bhayaṃ.
analyzed: dose kodhe ghāte māraṇe migādo catuppade chagale aje arūpe phassa ādike avhaye saññāyam darathe kāya citta sambhūte santāpe bhīti bhayaṃ

original: 1112. Bhāre khandhabhārādike. Sujāsaddo dabbiyaṃ kaṭacchuyaṃ, indajāyāyaṃ sakkassa bhariyāyañca. Vihāyase ākāse.
analyzed: bhāre khandha bhāra ādike sujāsaddaḥ dabbiyam kaṭacchuyam indajāyāyam sakkassa bhariyāyam ca vihāyase ākāse

original: 1113. Maṇike mahati udakabhājane. Ratane asmavikāre ratanasāmaññe. Selo candanapabbato. Ārāme pupphārāmādiārāme.
analyzed: maṇike mahati udaka bhājane ratane asma vikāre ratana sāmaññe selaḥ candana pabbataḥ ārāme puppha ārāma ādi ārāme

original: “Malayo dese selaṅgapabbatantare, malayātivutāyañcā”ti vopālito. Aṅko cihanaṃ.
analyzed: malayaḥ dese selaṅga pabbata antare malaya ativuta ayam ca ati vopālitaḥ

original: 1114. Sappimhi ghate, tadaññe hotabbe ca havi.
analyzed: sappimhi tad aññe hotabbe ca havi

original: “Rahasi ca vicāre ca, viveko jaladoṇiya”nti vopālito.
analyzed: rahasi ca vicāre ca vivekaḥ

original: 1115. Pavāhe jalappavāhe.
analyzed: pavāhe jala ppavāhe

original: “Vego jave pavāhe ca, mahākālaphalepi ce”ti medinīkosa 3.24 vopālito. Khile aṇukhāṇumhi. Kaṇe appe.
analyzed: vegaḥ jave pavāhe ca mahākāla phale pi ca iti medinīkosa khile kaṇe appe

original: 1116. Nettante cakkhukoṇe. Cittake tilake.
analyzed: netta ante cakkhu koṇe cittake tilake

original: “Apāṅgaṃ aṅgahīne ca, nettante tilakepi ce”ti medinīkosa 3.28 vopālito. Muttāguṇe suttabandhamuttāyaṃ. Gahaṇaṃ gāho, tasmiṃ. Makuḷe apupphite. Rase loṇarase.
analyzed: apāṅgam aṅga hīne ca tilake pi ca iti medinīkosa muttāguṇe gahaṇam gāho tasmin makuḷe a pupphite rase loṇa rase

original: 1117. Ago, nago cāti dve abhidhānāni selarukkhesu vattanti. Svappe suṭṭhu appe, appataretyattho. Avadhāraṇe “namanamatta”ntyādīsu. Accane pūjāyaṃ.
analyzed: agaḥ nagaḥ ca ati dve abhidhānāni sela rukkhesu vattanti su appe suṭṭhu appe appatara iti atthaḥ avadhāraṇe namana mattanti ādīsu

original: 1118. Chidde dose. Otaraṇaṃ jalatitthādīsu avataraṇaṃ. Ayyake pitupitari.
analyzed: chidde dose otaraṇam jala tittha ādīsu avataraṇam ayyake pitu pitari

original: 1119. Rukkhe khaggaphale. Sune sunakhe. Gandhe adhivāsanagandhe.
analyzed: rukkhe khagga phale sune sunakhe gandhe adhivāsana gandhe

original: 1120. Koṇe asse. Savane sote. Pantiyaṃ vīthiyaṃ. Bhāgyaṃ puññaṃ. Ekadeso tatiyabhāgādi. Ajapālake pokkhare. “Kuṭṭhaṃ roge sugandhe cā”ti vopālito.
analyzed: koṇe asse savane sote pantiyam vīthiyam bhāgyam puññam ekadesaḥ tatiya bhāga ādi ajapālake pokkhare kuṭṭham roge sugandhe ca ati vopālitaḥ

original: 1121. Senāsane vihārādike. Sene pīṭhādike. Cundabhaṇḍamhi cundānaṃ upakaraṇe. “Bhamo’mbuniggame
analyzed: senāsane vihāra ādike sene pīṭha ādike cunda bhaṇḍamhi cundānam upakaraṇe bhama umbu niggame

original: bhaṇḍi, cundākhye sippiyantake”ti nānatthasaṅgahe vopālito. Aṃsusaddo vatthādīnaṃ
analyzed: cunda ākhye sippiyantaka iti nānattha saṅgahe vopālitaḥ aṃsu saddaḥ vattha ādīnam

original: lome, kare kiraṇamatte ca. Abyaye pakārādike.
analyzed: lome kare kiraṇa matte ca a byaye pakāra ādike

original: 1122. Khajjantare sūkaravaccasaṇṭhāne dhaññavikāre. Dise ripumhi. Pati dhavo. Ariyo adhipati.
analyzed: khajja antare sūkara vacca saṇṭhāne dhañña vikāre dise ripumhi pati dhavaḥ ariyaḥ adhipati

original: 1123. Rāge kasāyādike rāge.
analyzed: rāge kasāya ādike rāge

original: “Raṅgo dāne khale rāge, tacche raṅgaṃ tipumhi ce”ti vopālito. Peyye udakādike. Pītiyaṃ
analyzed: raṅgaḥ dāne khale rāge tacche raṅgam ca iti vopālitaḥ peyye udaka ādike

original: pivanakriyāyaṃ. “Rakkhaṇe pītiyaṃ pāna”nti vopālito. Iṇe, ukkhepane ca uddhāro. Ummāre
analyzed: rakkhaṇe pītiyam iṇe ukkhepane ca uddhāraḥ ummāre

original: dvārummāre. Eḷakasaddassa ajassāpi vācakattā “eḷako aje”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dvārummāre eḷaka saddassa ajassa api vācaka ttā eḷakaḥ aja iti vuttam

original: 1124. Paharaṇaṃ pahāro, pothanaṃ. Paharati etthāti pahāro, yāmo, hāyano saṃvaccharo. Kuṇḍikāyaṃ “kayā”iti khyātāyaṃ. Āḷhake catupatthappamāṇe. Bhusamhi taṇḍulattace.
analyzed: paharaṇam pahāro pothanam paharati ettha ati pahāraḥ yāmaḥ hāyano saṃvaccharaḥ kuṇḍikāyam āḷhake catu pattha pamāṇe bhusamhi

original: 1125. Āvāṭe kūpe. Caye samūhe ca. Kāsu sā, kāraṇe, rahasi ca upanisā.
analyzed: āvāṭe kūpe caye samūhe ca kāsu sā kāraṇe rahasi ca upanisā

original: “Bhave upanisā dhamme, vedantepi rahasyampī”ti vopālito. Poṭagale “pho-khā”iti khyāte. Guṇetare avajje.
analyzed: bhave upanisā dhamme rahasyam pi iti vopālitaḥ poṭagale phokhā iti khyāte guṇa itare avajje

original: 1126. Yutte “aṭṭaṃ vinicchinātī”tyādīsu. Aṭṭāle “gopuraṭṭehi saṃyutta”miccādīsu.
analyzed: yutte aṭṭam vinicchināti ityādīsu aṭṭāle gopura aṭṭehi saṃyuttam iccādīsu

original: Aṭṭite “aṭṭassaraṃkarotī”tyādīsu. Aṭṭa abhiyoge, aṭṭa atikkamahiṃsāsūti dhātvattho.
analyzed: aṭṭite aṭṭaḥ saraṃkaroti ityādīsu aṭṭa abhiyoge aṭṭa atikkama hiṃsāsu iti dhātvatthaḥ

original: Kānane vane. Uppattiyaṃ janane, vihāyasāgamane ca.
analyzed: kānane vane janane vihāyasā āgamane ca

original: 1127. Lāmake nihīne. Khandhe rūpādike. Mūlaṃ mūladhanaṃ. Upadā paheṇakaṃ. Avatthāyaṃ, paṭassa ante ca dasā. Ghāto māraṇaṃ.
analyzed: lāmake nihīne khandhe rūpa ādike mūlam mūla dhanam upadā paheṇakam avatthāyam paṭassa ante ca dasā ghātaḥ māraṇam

original: 1128. Gabbe māne. Ghaṭanaṃ silesakaraṇaṃ. Rāsi puñjo, etesu ghaṭasaddo. Abhihāre pūjāyaṃ. Bandhane “pākāracayo”tyādīsu.
analyzed: gabbe māne ghaṭanam silesa karaṇam rāsi puñjaḥ etesu ghaṭa saddaḥ abhihāre bandhane

original: 1129. Thoke appake. Dāne, hāniyañca cāgo. Gīvā, galo cāti dve abhidhānāni iṇe siyuṃ. “Iṇe gīvā galepi cā”tipi pāṭho. Gale kaṇṭhe.
analyzed: thoke appake dāne ca cāgaḥ gīvā galaḥ ca ati dve abhidhānāni iṇe siyum iṇe gīvā gale pi ca atipi pāṭhaḥ gale kaṇṭhe

original: 1130. Daṇḍepi sāhasaṃ. Paṭe vatthavisese bhaṅgaṃ. Sāṇādike missitvā katañhi vatthaṃ “bhaṅga”nti vuttaṃ. Chavake kaḷevare.
analyzed: daṇḍe api sāhasam paṭe vattha visese bhaṅgam sāṇa ādike missitvā katam hi vattham bhaṅgam ti vuttam chavake kaḷevare

original: 1131. Anaṅge māre. Dume karahāṭake.
analyzed: anaṅge māre dume karahāṭake

original: “Madano māradhuttara-vasantadumasitthake”ti vopālito. Pamātari mātumātari. Veṭhe uṇhīse ca veṭhanaṃ.
analyzed: madanaḥ pamātari mātumātari veṭhe uṇhīse ca veṭhanam

original: 1132. Taṇḍuleyye tilaphalasāke. Ayye sāmini. Mutti muccanaṃ.
analyzed: taṇḍuleyye tila phala sāke ayye sāmini mutti muccanam

original: 1133. Aṅke lakkhaṇe. Ākāre sīsacalanādike. Vappe vappanīyabīje. Taṭe tīre ca vappo,
analyzed: aṅke lakkhaṇe ākāre sīsa calana ādike vappe vappanīya bīje taṭe tīre ca vappo

original: pākāramūle, nettajale, usume ca vappo. Anuññāyaṃ, vohāre ca sammutisaddo. Akkhatasaddo
analyzed: pākāra mūle netta jale usume ca vappaḥ anuññāyam vohāre ca sammuti saddaḥ akkhata saddaḥ

original: lājāsu dhaññavikatīsu napuṃsake.
analyzed: lājāsu dhañña vikatīsu napuṃsake

original: 1134. Yāge devapūjāyaṃ, sadādāne ca satraṃ. Sasu hiṃsāyaṃ, traṇa, satraṃ. Osadhimhi, cande ca somo.
analyzed: yāge ca satram satram osadhimhi cande ca somaḥ

original: “Somo kuvere pitudevatāyaṃ,
analyzed: somaḥ kuvere pitu devatā ayam

original: Vasuppabhede vasudhākare ca;
analyzed: vasuppa bhede vasudhākare ca

original: Dibbosadhisāmalatāsamīra-
analyzed: dibba usadhi sāma latā samīra

original: Kappūranīresu ca vānare cā”ti. –
analyzed: kappūra nīresu ca vānare ca ati

original: Vopālito. Yugagehaṅgeti pubbāparāyāmavasena thambhānaṃ upari ṭhapite yugabhūte gehāvayave. Dakkhiṇuttarāyāmavasena ṭhapite gehaṅge saṅghāṭo.
analyzed: vopālitaḥ yuga gehaṅge ti pubba apara āyāma vasena thambhānam upari ṭhapite yuga bhūte geha avayave dakkhiṇa uttara āyāma vasena ṭhapite gehaṅge saṅghāṭaḥ

original: Gāthāpādavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: gāthā pāda vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Anekatthavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: anekattha vagga vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 4. Abyayavaggavaṇṇanā
analyzed: abyaya vagga vaṇṇanā

original: 1136-1137. Cirassādayo cattāro ciratthakā. Cirāya, cirā cātra. Sahādayopi cattāro sahatthā. Punappunamādayo pañca punappunatthā. Vinādayo pañca vajjanatthā.
analyzed: cirassa ādayo cattāraḥ ciratthakā cirāya cirā ca atra saha ādayaḥ pi cattāraḥ sahatthā punappunam ādayo pañca punappunatthāḥ vina ādayo pañca vajjanatthāḥ

original: 1138. Balavaṃ suṭṭhu atīva kimuta su ati ete cha atisayatthe. Pasaṃsāyañca suṭṭhu.
analyzed: balavam suṭṭhu atīva kim uta su ati ete cha ati saya tthe suṭṭhu

original: Pañhepi kimuta. Āho kiṃ kimu udāhu kimuta uda ete cha vikappe vitakke. Tatra āhosaddo
analyzed: pañhe pi kim uta āho kim kimu udāhu kim uta uda ete cha vikappe vitakke tatra āhosaddaḥ

original: dīghādi. “Diṭṭho āho udāhu ca, vikappatthe vibhāvane”ti hi bhāguri. Khāṇurayamāho
analyzed: dīgha ādi diṭṭhaḥ āho udāhu ca vikappa atthe vibhāvanā iti hi bhāguri khāṇuḥ ayam āho

original: puriso. Ruddo tu rassādimāha “issarepyadhikepi ca, vikappevimhayepyaho”ti. Kimusaddo
analyzed: purisaḥ ruddaḥ tu rassa ādim āha ca kimu saddaḥ

original: rassanto. Kimāyaṃ khāṇu, kimu puriso. Udasaddo rassādi. Dhūmoyamoda kāpotaṃ, samūhatthe
analyzed: rassantaḥ kim ayam khāṇu kimu purisaḥ uda saddaḥ rassa ādi kāpotam samūha atthe

original: ṇo. Kiñcasaddopi vikappe. Kimutasaddo atisayeti vutto.
analyzed: ṇaḥ kiñca saddaḥ api vikappe kim uta saddaḥ atisaye iti vuttaḥ

original: 1139. Bho are ambho hambho re je aṅga āvuso he hare ete dasa avhāne. Haṃ hosaddāpyatra. Kathaṃ kiṃsu nanu kacci nu kiṃ ete cha samā samānatthā.
analyzed: bho are ambho hambho re je aṅge āvuso he hare ete dasa avhāne haṃ samā samāna atthā

original: 1140. Adhunā, etarahi, idāni, sampati cāti cattāro idānītyatthe. Aññadatthu taggha sasakkaṃ addhā kāmaṃ jātu ve have ete aṭṭha ekaṃse ekaṃsatthe.
analyzed: adhunā etarahi idāni sampati ca ati cattāraḥ idāni iti atthe aññadatthu sasakkam addhā kāmam jātu ve have ete aṭṭha ekaṃse ekaṃsa tthe

original: 1141. Yāvatādayo satta paricchedavācakā. Tatra yāvatā, yāvāti dve aniyamaparicchedatthavācakā.
analyzed: tatra yāvatā ādayaḥ dve aniyama pariccheda ttha vācakā

original: 1142-1143. Yathā tathā yatheva evaṃ yathānāma yathāhi seyyathāpi evamevaṃ vā tatheva
analyzed: yathā tathā yathā iva evam yathānāma yathā hi seyyathā api evam evam vā tathā iva

original: yathāpi evampi seyyathāpi nāma yathariva yathā ca viya tathariva iccete sattarasa
analyzed: yathā api evampi seyyathāpi nāma yathā ca tathariva iccā ete sattarasa

original: paṭibhāgatthe sadisatthe bhavanti.
analyzed: paṭibhāga atthe sadisa tthe bhavanti

original: 1144. Saṃ, sāmaṃ, sayañceti tayo sayamiccatthe. Āma sāhu lahu opāyikaṃ patirūpaṃ sādhu evaṃ ete satta sampaṭicchanatthe. Āmantāpyatra.
analyzed: sam sāmam sayam ca iti tayoḥ sayam iccatthe sāhu lahu opāyikam patirūpam sādhu evam ete satta sampaṭicchana atthe

original: 1145. Yamādayo cha kāraṇatthesiyuṃ. Canasaddo, cisaddo cāti dve asākalye asakalatthe.
analyzed: yama ādayaḥ cha cana saddaḥ ci saddaḥ ca ati dve a sākalye a sakala tthe

original: Kadācanaṃ, kadācītyādi payogo. Mudhāsaddo nipphale phalarahite, nippayojanetyattho. Amūlepi ca mudhā.
analyzed: kadācanam kadāci ityādi payogaḥ mudhā saddaḥ nipphale phala rahite nippayojana iti atthaḥ amūle api ca mudhā

original: 1146. Jātusaddo ekaṃsepi. Sabbato, samantato, parito, samantā cāti cattāro tulyatthā.
analyzed: jātu saddaḥ ekaṃse pi sabbatas samantataḥ paritas samantā ca ati cattāro tulya tthā

original: 1147. Na a no mā alaṃ nahi iccete cha nisedhe. Ce, sace, yadīti tayo yadyatthe. Saddhaṃsaddo anukūlatthe. Nattaṃ doso ca rajanīyamiccatthe. Divāsaddo ahe ahanītyatthe.
analyzed: na a no mā alam nahi iti ete cha nisedhe ce sace yadi iti tayaḥ yadi atthe saddhaṃsaddo anukūla atthe doso ca rajanīyam iccatthe divāsaddo ahe ahani ityatthe

original: 1148. Īsaṃ, kiñci, manaṃ iccete appatthe. Atakkite avitakkite. Balakkāre tu sāhasaṃ. Aggato, purato ca pureiccatthe. Pecca amutrasaddā bhavantare.
analyzed: īsam kiñci manam icca ete appa atthe atakkite avitakkite balakkāre tu sāhasam aggataḥ puratas ca amutra saddāḥ bhavantare

original: 1149. Aho ca hi cāti ete vimhaye. Vikappepi aho. Sammodepi hi. Tuṇhīsaddo mone abhāsane. Āvi, pātu ca pākaṭatthe. Sajju sapadisaddā taṅkhaṇetyatthe.
analyzed: aho ca hi ca ati ete vimhaye vikappe pi aho sammode pi hi tuṇhī saddaḥ mone abhāsane āvi pātu ca pākaṭa atthe sajju sapadi saddā

original: 1150. Sudaṃ kho assu yagghe ve hādayo hakārādayo ca padapūraṇe siyuṃ. Antarena, antarā, anto cāti ete abbhantareiccatthe. Avassaṃ, nūna ca nicchayatthe.
analyzed: sudam kho assu ve ha ādayaḥ hakāra ādayaḥ ca pada pūraṇe siyum antarena antarā antaḥ ca ati ete abbhantare iccatthe avassam nūna ca nicchaya tthe

original: 1151. Saṃsaddo diṭṭhāsaddo ānandatthe. Samupajo, saṃpyatra. Kāmappavedane icchāya akkhāne kacci jīvati te mātā, mamedamabhimatamiccatthe. Usūyopagame usūyāpubbake upagame.
analyzed: saṃsaddaḥ diṭṭhāsaddaḥ ānanda atthe samupajaḥ kāma ppavedane icchāya akkhāne kacci jīvati te mātā mama idam abhimatam iccatthe usūyā upagame usūyā pubbake upagame

original: “Kāmānumatiyaṃ kāmo,
analyzed: kāma anumatiyam kāmaḥ

original: Usūyopagamepi cā”ti ruddo.
analyzed: usūyā upagame pi ca ati ruddo

original: Usūyopagamānuññāṇepicāyaṃ attho dissate.
analyzed: usūyā upagama anuññāṇe pica ayam attho dissate

original: 1152-1153. Yathāttanti saccaṃ. Tathassa anatikkamo yathātathaṃ, yathātthe abyayībhāvo.
analyzed: saccam tathassa an atikkamaḥ yathātatham yathātthe abyayībhāvaḥ

original: Tathasaddoyaṃ bhūtapariyāyo. Sadāsaddo, sanaṃsaddo cāti nicce. Sanasaddopyatra. Pāyo,
analyzed: tatha saddaḥ iyam bhūta pariyāyo sadā saddaḥ ca ati nicce sana saddaḥ api atra

original: bāhulyañca samā. Pañcakaṃ bāhye. Saṇikaṃsaddo asīghe.
analyzed: bāhulyam ca samā pañcakam bāhye

original: 1154. Sammā, suṭṭhūti dve abhidhānāni.
analyzed: sammā suṭṭhu iti dve abhidhānāni

original: 1155. Sāyaṃ sāye sāyanhe. Atrāheti imasmiṃ ahani ajjasaddo.
analyzed: sāyam sāye sāyanhe atra āha iti imasmin ahani ajja saddaḥ

original: 1156. Yatthādayo tayo aniyamaṭṭhānādivācakā. Tatthādayo niyamaṭṭhānādivācakā.
